src: Dann werdet ihr (noch) erfahren, wer die Leute des ebenen Weges sind und wer rechtgeleitet ist.
ref: You will come to know soon who are the men of the straight path and who have come to guidance.

result.output: Then you will (still) come to know who the people of the straight path are and who is rightly guided.

src: Bereits hast du unter uns Vertrauen vor dieser (Aufforderung) genossen.
ref: You seemed very promising among us, before this – What!

result.output: Already you have enjoyed trust among us before this (request).

src: Soll ich etwa andere außer Ihm zu Göttern nehmen? Wenn der Allerbarmer mir ein Leid zufügen will, so wird ihre Fürsprache mir nichts nützen, noch können sie mich retten.
ref: Should I take other gods apart from Him, who would neither be able to intercede for me nor save me if Ar-Rahman brings me harm?

result.output: Should I take others as gods besides Him? If the Most Merciful intends to afflict me with harm, their intercession will not benefit me, nor can they save me.

src: Noch werdet ihr verehren, was ich verehre.
ref: Nor will you worship who I worship:

result.output: Still, you will adore what I adore.,

src: Und sag zu den Mumin-Frauen, daß sie von ihren Blicken niederschlagen, ihre Keuschheit bewahren und ihren Schmuck nicht sichtbar tragen außer dem, was davon sichtbar wird, und daß sie ihre Khumur bis über ihre Dschuyub ziehen, und daß sie ihren Schmuck vor niemandem sichtbar tragen außer vor ihren Ehemännern, ihren Vätern, den Vätern ihrer Ehemänner, ihren Söhnen, den Söhnen ihrer Ehemänner, ihren Brüdern, den Söhnen ihrer Brüder, den Söhnen ihrer Schwestern, ihren Frauen, denjenigen, die ihr gehören, den Bediensteten außer denjenigen mit Verlangen von den Männern oder den Kindern, die noch nichts über die Blößen der Frauen wissen, und daß sie mit ihren Füßen nicht (auf den Boden) stampfen, damit bekannt wird, was sie noch von ihrem Schmuck verbergen. Und bittet ALLAH um Vergebung allesamt - ihr Mumin! - damit ihr erfolgreich werdet.
ref: And say to the believing women that they cast down their looks and guard their private parts and do not display their ornaments except what appears thereof, and let them wear their head-coverings over their bosoms, and not display their ornaments except to their husbands or their fathers, or the fathers of their husbands, or their sons, or the sons of their husbands, or their brothers, or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or those whom their right hands possess, or the male servants not having need (of women), or the children who have not attained knowledge of what is hidden of women; and let them not strike their feet so that what they hide of their ornaments may be known; and turn to Allah all of you, O believers! so that you may be successful.

result.output: And tell the Moomin women to cast down their eyes, guard their modesty and not display their adornment except what is apparent, and to draw their head-coverings over their breasts and not display their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no (sexual) desire, or children who are not yet aware of the nakedness of women, and not let their feet make a noise when they walk to reveal their hidden adornment. And all of you ask Allah to forgive you, O believers, that you may be successful.

src: Als dein HERR den Engeln Wahy zuteil werden ließ: "Gewiß, ICH bin mit euch, so festigt diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben.
ref: And the Lord said to the angels: "I am with you; go and strengthen the faithful.

result.output: As your LORD bestowed Wahy upon the angels: Indeed, I am with you, so strengthen those who have internalized faith.

src: Ist der, der seinen Bau auf die Furcht Gottes und sein Wohlgefallen gegründet hat, besser oder der, der seinen Bau auf den Rand eines brüchigen Hanges gegründet hat, worauf er mit ihm ins Feuer der Hölle abstürzt?
ref: Is the man who lays the foundations of his sanctum on his allegiance to God and the wish to seek His favour, better, or he who lays the foundations of his building on the edge of a bank eroded by water, which will collapse with him into the fire of Hell?

result.output: Is the one who has founded his building on the fear of God and His pleasure better, or the one who has founded his building on the edge of a crumbling slope, on which he falls with it into the fire of Hell?

src: Und (erinnere daran), als 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam sagte: "Kinder Israil! Gewiß, ich bin ALLAHs Gesandter zu euch bestätigend dessen, was vor mir von At-taurat war, und überbringend eine frohe Botschaft von einem Gesandten, der nach mir kommt, dessen Name Ahmad (Gelobter) ist." Und als er zu ihnen mit den klaren Zeichen kam, sagten sie: "Dies ist eine eindeutige Magie."
ref: And when (Prophet) Jesus, the son of Mary said: 'Children of Israel, I am sent to you by Allah to confirm the Torah that was before me, and to give news of a Messenger (Prophet Muhammad) who will come after me whose name shall be Ahmad' Yet when he came to them with clear proofs, they said: 'This is clearsorcery'

result.output: And (remember) when Isa Ibnu-Maryam said: 'O Children of Israel! Surely, I am Allah's Messenger to you, confirming what came before me of the At-Taurat (Torah), and giving glad tidings of a Messenger to come after me, whose name shall be Ahmad (the most praised). But when he came to them with clear proofs, they said: This is plain magic.',

src: Gewiß, Qarun gehörte zum Volk Musas, doch unterdrückte er sie. Und Wir gaben ihm solche Schätze, daß deren Schlüssel wahrlich eine schwere Last für eine (ganze) Schar kräftiger Männer gewesen wären. Als sein Volk zu ihm sagte: "Sei nicht (übermütig) froh, denn Allah liebt nicht diejenigen (Unterdrücker), die (zu übermütig) froh sind,
ref: Indeed Qaroon was from the people of Moosa – he then oppressed them; and We gave him so many treasures that their keys were a heavy burden for a strong group; when his people said to him, “Do not show off – indeed Allah does not like the boastful.”

result.output: Surely, Qarun belonged to the people of Moses, but he oppressed them. And We gave him treasures such that their keys would have been a burden to a body of strong men. His people said to him, 'Do not exult, surely Allah loves not those who exult (in riches).'

src: Und unter ihnen gibt es manche, die auf dich schauen. Kannst du aber die Blinden rechtleiten, auch wenn sie nicht sehen?
ref: Some of them look toward you: But can you show the blind the way even when they cannot see?

result.output: And among them are some who look to you. But can you guide the blind even though they cannot see?

src: Doch wer mit der gottmißfälligen Tat kommt, so wird denjenigen, welche die gottmißfälligen Taten begingen, nichts außer dem vergolten, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: But whoever brings evil—the evildoers will be rewarded only according to what they used to do.

result.output: But whoever comes with the god-pleasing act, nothing will be rewarded to those who committed the god-displeasing acts except what they used to do.

src: Er sagte: "Ich will dich mit einer dieser meiner beiden Töchter verheiraten unter der Bedingung, daß du acht Jahre in meinen Dienst trittst. Wenn du sie aber auf zehn vollmachst, so steht es bei dir.
ref: He said: "I intend to wed one of these two daughters of mine to you, on condition that you serve me for eight years, but if you complete ten years, it will be (a favour) from you.

result.output: He said, I want to marry you to one of my two daughters on the condition that you serve me for eight years. But if you complete ten, it's up to you.

src: Seid ihr dann dankbar?!
ref: Will you not be grateful even then?

result.output: Are you then grateful?!

src: Dies ist gerechter vor ALLAH, glaubwürdiger für das Zeugnis und näher dazu, keine Zweifel zu hegen.
ref: Do not neglect to reduce to writing your transaction for a specified term, whether it be big or small.

result.output: This is more just before Allah, more reliable as testimony and closer to not harboring any doubts.

src: ER ist Der Allwissende vom Verborgenen.
ref: (He is) the Knower of the Unseen.

result.output: HE is the Omniscient One from the Hidden.

src: Und denen, die das Gebet verrichten und die Abgabe entrichten und an Gott und den Jüngsten Tag glauben, denen werden Wir einen großartigen Lohn zukommen lassen.
ref: (Those who truly believe) establish the Prayer and pay Zakah, those who firmly believe in Allah and in the Last Day, to them We shall indeed pay a great reward.

result.output: And those who perform the prayer and give the alms and believe in Allah and the Last Day - to them We will give a great reward.

src: Kämpft nicht gegen sie bei der heiligen Moschee, bis sie dort gegen euch kämpfen.
ref: Do not fight them by the Holy Mosque unless they fight you there.

result.output: Do not fight against them at the holy mosque until they fight against you there.

src: Das Versprechen unseres HERRN wird gewiß erfüllt."
ref: The promise of our Lord has indeed been fulfilled."

result.output: The promise of our Lord will certainly be fulfilled.

src: Sprich: "Doch! Die Religion Abrahams, der rechtgläubig war und nicht den Götzenanbetern angehörte."
ref: Say thou: 'Nay, rather the creed of Abraham, a man of pure faith; he was no idolater.'

result.output: Say: 'Yes! The religion of Abraham, who was righteous and did not belong to the idolaters.',

src: Und die Gesandten waren wahrhaftig."
ref: The Messengers have also spoke the truth".

result.output: And the emissaries were truly.

src: Allah weiß über alles Bescheid.
ref: Surely God has knowledge of everything.

result.output: Allah knows everything.

src: Haben sie etwa über das Vorgetragene nicht nachgedacht?! Oder kam etwa zu ihnen das, was zu ihren ersten Ahnen nicht kam?!
ref: Have they not pondered the matter, or did that come to them, which did not come to their forefathers?

result.output: Did you not contemplate about what was presented?! Or did what didn't come to your first ancestors come to you?!

src: Doch wenn ihr euch abkehrt, so habe ich von euch keinen Lohn verlangt.
ref: If you turn away from me (remember) I do not ask any recompense from you.

result.output: But if you turn away, I have not asked you for any payment.

src: Auf Ihn allein ist das Wissen um die Stunde zurückzuführen.
ref: To Him is referred the knowledge of the Hour.

result.output: To Him alone is the knowledge of the hour attributable,

src: Sag: "Gewiß, ALLAH ist immer im Stande, eine Aya nach und nach hinabzusenden." Doch die meisten von ihnen wissen es nicht.
ref: Say: "God certainly has power to send down a miracle; but most men cannot understand."

result.output: Say, Certainly, ALLAH is capable of sending down a sign gradually. But most of them do not know.

src: Und Allah liebt die Gutes Tuenden
ref: God loves the doers of good.

result.output: And Allah loves those who do good deeds

src: Sag: "Betreibt ihr etwa Kufr Demjenigen gegenüber, Der die Erde in zwei Ayyam erschuf, und setzt ihr Ihm etwas als Ebenbürtiges bei?!
ref: Say “What! You disbelieve in Him Who created the earth in two days, and you appoint equals to Him?

result.output: Say: Do you practice disbelief towards the One Who created the earth in two days, and do you set up equals with Him?

src: Und wenn ihr euch geduldig zeigt, so ist es besser für die Geduldigen.
ref: But if you endure patiently, verily, it is better for As-Sabirin (the patient ones, etc.).

result.output: And if you show patience, it is better for the patient ones.

src: Jedoch sie besitzen darüber kein Wissen; sie vermuten es nur.
ref: Yet they have no knowledge of this: They only speculate.

result.output: However, they do not possess any knowledge about it; they only suspect it.

src: "Wem gehört die Herrschaft heute?!" (Sie gehört) ALLAH, Dem Einzigen, Dem Allbezwingenden.
ref: Whose then will be the kingdom? -- God's, the one, the omnipotent.

result.output: To whom does the rule belong today?! It belongs to Allah, The One and Only, The Almighty.

src: Sie sagen: "Wäre ihm von seinem Herrn ein Zeichen niedergesandt worden!" Sprich: "Allah hat die Macht, ein Zeichen herabzusenden, doch die meisten von ihnen wissen es nicht!"
ref: They ask: 'Why has no sign been sent down to him from his Lord' Say: 'Allah is Able to send down a sign' But most of them do not know.

result.output: They say, 'Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?' Say, 'Indeed, Allah has the power to send down a sign, but most of them do not know.'

src: - vollendete Weisheit; allein selbst die Warnungen richteten (bei ihnen) nichts aus
ref: Containing consummate wisdom; yet warnings were of no avail.

result.output: completed wisdom; only the warnings themselves did not have any effect on them

src: Ihr laßt euch wenig ermahnen.
ref: Yet little do you care to remember.

result.output: You don't let yourselves be admonished much..

src: Und (du wirst Erstaunliches erleben), würdest du nur sehen, als sie sich erschreckten. Dann gibt es kein Entkommen.
ref: And if only you see, when they will be forced into a terror from which they will be unable to escape, and are seized from a place nearby.

result.output: And (you will experience amazing things), if only you could see them frightened. Then there's no escape.

src: So lasse die Kinder Isra'ils mit mir gehen!"
ref: So let the Children of Israel depart along with me."

result.output: So let the children of Israel go with me!

src: Und ohne die Huld Allahs gegen euch und Seine Barmherzigkeit würde niemand von euch jemals lauter sein. Allah aber läutert, wen Er will.
ref: But for the grace of God and His mercy upon you none of you would have escaped undefiled; but God makes whosoever He will grow in goodness, for God is all-hearing and all-knowing.

result.output: And without the Grace of Allah upon you and His Mercy, none of you would ever be pure. But Allah purifies whom He wills.

src: Und wie hörend!
ref: How well He hears!

result.output: And how listening!

src: Sag: "Ihr Schriftbesitzer! Kommt zu einem Wort, das gleichermaßen für euch und uns gilt, daß wir nur ALLAH dienen und Ihm gegenüber mit Nichts Schirk praktizieren, und daß die einen von uns sich die anderen nicht als Herren anstelle von ALLAH nehmen."
ref: Tell them: "O people of the Book, let us come to an agreement on that which is common between us, that we worship no one but God, and make none His compeer, and that none of us take any others for lord apart from God."

result.output: Say: \O owners of the scripture! Come to a word that is equitable between us and you - that we will not worship except Allah and not associate anything with Him and not take one another as lords instead of Allah.,

src: Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers; darin werden sie ewig weilen.
ref: They are the people of Hell, where they will abide for ever,

result.output: These are the companions of the fire; therein they will dwell forever.

src: Allah sieht wohl, was sie tun.
ref: God sees the things they do.

result.output: Allah surely sees what they are doing.

src: Der Prophet hat eher Anspruch auf die Gläubigen als sie selbst. Und seine Gattinnen sind ihre Mütter. Und die Blutsverwandten haben nach dem Buch Gottes eher Anspruch auf gegenseitige Freundschaft als die Gläubigen und Ausgewanderten, es sei denn, ihr möchtet euren Freunden Gutes tun. Dies ist im Buch Gottes zeilenweise niedergeschrieben.
ref: The Prophet is closer to the Muslims than their own lives, and his wives are their mothers; and the relatives are closer to each other in the Book of Allah, than other Muslims and immigrants, except that you may be kind towards your friends; this is written in the Book.

result.output: The Prophet has a greater claim on the believers than they do on themselves. And his wives are their mothers. And blood relatives are more entitled [to inheritance] in the decree of Allah than believers and emigrants, except that you may do to your close associates a kindness [through bequest]. That was in the Book inscribed.

src: Und ob ihr das, was in eurem Inneren ist, offenlegt oder geheimhaltet, Gott rechnet mit euch darüber ab.
ref: Whether you publish what is in your hearts or hide it, God shall make reckoning with you for it.

result.output: Whether you reveal or conceal what is inside of you, God will hold you accountable for it.

src: Und sollten sie dich um Erlaubnis wegen mancher privaten Angelegenheiten bitten, dann gewähre Erlaubnis demjenigen von ihnen, dem du willst, und bitte ALLAH für sie um Vergebung.
ref: Surely those who ask leave of you are the ones who believe in God and His Apostle. Therefore when they ask leave of you for personal business give leave to those you please, and seek God's forgiveness for them.

result.output: And if they ask you for permission about certain private affairs, then grant permission to whoever among them you wish and ask Allah for their forgiveness.

src: Das ist ein Tag, an dem die Menschen versammelt werden, und das ist ein Tag, den jeder erleben wird.
ref: That is a Day whereon mankind shall be gathered together, and that is a Day to be witnessed.

result.output: This is a day when people will be gathered, and this is a day that everyone will experience.

src: Diese haben uns irregeleitet, so laß ihnen das Doppelte an Peinigung des Feuers zuteil werden!"
ref: These misled us, so give them a double torment of the Fire."

result.output: They have misled us, so let them have double the punishment of the fire!

src: Dann werden sie zu Allah, ihrem Herrn, zurückgebracht. Wahrlich, Sein ist das Urteil, und Er ist der Schnellste im Rechnen.
ref: Then are they sent back to Allah, their Master, the True one; now surely His is the judgment and He is swiftest in taking account.

result.output: Then they will be returned to Allah, their Lord. Surely, His is the judgement, and He is the Swift in reckoning.

src: Doch wenn die einen von ihnen sich mit den anderen zurückzogen, sagten sie: "Erzählt ihr ihnen von dem, was ALLAH euch erläuterte, damit sie mit diesem gegen euch vor eurem HERRN argumentieren?
ref: But when they go apart one with another they say: Prate ye to them of that which Allah hath disclosed to you that they may contend with you before your Lord concerning it?

result.output: But when some of them withdrew to confer in private, they said, 'Do you not know what [bad thing] he has done? He has even claimed that Allah has spoken to him directly!

src: Und Mose sagte: «Ich suche Zuflucht bei meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn vor jedem Hochmütigen, der nicht an den Tag der Abrechnung glaubt.»
ref: Moses said: "I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every insolent imposter who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning."

result.output: And Moses said, 'I take refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one refusing to believe in the Day of Reckoning.'

src: Gewiß, sie fanden ihre Ahnen abirrend vor,
ref: They had found their fathers astray,

result.output: Surely, they found their ancestors wandering off,

src: Nein, mit Sicherheit!
ref: By no means! Aye!

result.output: No, for sure!

src: Aber nein! Diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, sind dem Leugnen (der Botschaft) verhaftet.
ref: Yet the infidels persist in denial.

result.output: But no! Those who are unbelievers are committed to denying (the message).

src: "Und gewiß, wir wissen nicht, ob Böses für diejenigen auf der Erde gewollt wird, oder ob ihr HERR für sie Gutes wollte."
ref: We do not know if this means ill for the dwellers of the earth, or their Lord wishes guidance for them.

result.output: And certainly, we do not know whether evil is intended for those on earth, or whether their LORD has intended good for them.

src: Und Wir haben euch ja erschaffen. Hierauf haben Wir euch gestaltet.
ref: And We have certainly created you, [O Mankind], and given you [human] form.

result.output: And We have created you. Then We have formed you.

src: Und tötet eure Kinder nicht aus Furcht vor Armut; Wir sorgen für sie und für euch. Wahrlich, sie zu töten ist ein großer Fehler.
ref: And do not kill your children, fearing poverty; We shall provide sustenance to them as well as to you; indeed killing them is a great mistake.

result.output: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is a great mistake.

src: Doch wenn ihr sie verbergt und den Bedürftigen zukommen lasst, dann ist dies besser für euch.
ref: But if you keep it secret, and give it to the needy in private, that is better for you.

result.output: But if you conceal them and give them to the needy, then that is better for you.

src: Er sagte: "Ich bin eurer Tat gegenüber von den Verabscheuenden.
ref: (Lot) said: "I am disgusted with your actions,"

result.output: He said, I am disgusted by your deed.

src: Gewiß, bereits haben WIR Nuh zu seinen Leuten entsandt, dann sagte er: "Meine Leute! Dient ALLAH!
ref: Indeed We sent Nooh to his people – he therefore said, “O my people!

result.output: Certainly, WE have already sent Nuh to his people, then he said: "My people! Serve ALLAH!"

src: Dieser Koran ist mir offenbart, damit ich euch und auch jeden, den er erreicht, durch ihn warne.
ref: This Quran was revealed to me, that I may warn you with it, and whomever it may reach.

result.output: This Quran has been revealed to me so that I may warn you and all those whom it reaches.

src: Fühlen sie sich etwa sicher vor ALLAHs Versuchung?!
ref: Can they remain secure against the plan of God?

result.output: Do you feel safe from ALLAH's temptation?!,

src: Du bist doch nur ein Warner für denjenigen, der vor ihr Ehrfurcht hat.
ref: Your duty is only to warn him who fears it.

result.output: You are only a warning for those who have reverence before her.

src: Wer aber von euch danach Kufr betreibt, den werde ICH doch mit einer Peinigung peinigen, mit der ICH sonst keinen anderen der Menschen peinigen werde."
ref: But whoever among you disbelieves thereafter, I will punish him with a punishment the like of which I never punish any other being.”

result.output: But whoever of you commits Kufr thereafter, then I will surely inflict a chastisement upon him, such as I have not inflicted on anyone among the people.

src: Er kennt euren Zustand wohl.
ref: He knows what you are about.

result.output: He knows your state well.

src: ER sagte: "Mein Untergang!
ref: He said, 'Woe is me!

result.output: He said, My downfall!

src: Und fürchtet das Feuer, das für die Ungläubigen vorbereitet ist
ref: Keep away from the Fire prepared for the infidels;

result.output: And fear the fire that is prepared for the unbelievers.

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig sind und Unsere Zeichen leugnen, sollen die Bewohner des Feuers sein. Darin bleiben sie auf ewig; und das ist eine schlimme Bestimmung!
ref: Those who did not believe and denied Our revelations will be inmates of Hell, where they will abide for ever, and how evil a journey's end!

result.output: But those who are unbelievers and deny Our signs will be the inhabitants of the Fire; therein they shall abide forever, and that is a woeful journey's end!

src: Gepriesen sei Er! Nein, aber sie sind (nur) geehrte Diener
ref: Hallowed be He! aye! they are bondmen honoured.

result.output: Praise be to Him! No, but they are (only) honored servants.,

src: Als er zu seinem Volk sagte: "Ihr begeht fürwahr das Abscheuliche, wie es vor euch niemand von den Weltenbewohnern getan hat.
ref: (Remember) when he said unto his folk: Lo! ye commit lewdness such as no creature did before you.

result.output: When he said to his people, "You are committing a truly abominable act, unlike anything any of the inhabitants of the worlds before you have done."

src: Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm, dem Allmächtigen und Allweisen.
ref: There is no god but He, the all-mighty and all-wise.

result.output: There is no god but Him, the Almighty and All-Wise.

src: Ihnen aber steht es nicht zu, zu wählen.
ref: The good is not for them to choose.

result.output: However, you are not entitled to vote.

src: Er spricht: "lhr verweiltet nur kurze Zeit, wenn ihr es nur wüßtet!
ref: He will say: "You stayed there only a moment, if you knew.

result.output: He says: You only stay for a short time if you only knew it!

src: Oder haben sie ihren Gesandten nicht erkannt, so daß sie ihn (nun) verwerfen?
ref: Or did they not recognise their apostle, and rejected him?

result.output: Or have they not recognized their messenger, so that they reject him now?

src: Und eine bestimmte Frist ist bei Ihm festgesetzt.
ref: A term is fixed with Him.

result.output: And a certain deadline is set for him.

src: Und sie erlernten, was ihnen schadet und nicht nützt. Und sie wußten doch, daß, wer es erkaufte, am Jenseits wahrlich keinen Anteil hätte.
ref: They knew indeed whoever bought this had no place in the world to come, and that surely they had sold themselves for something that was vile.

result.output: And they learned what harmed them and was of no benefit to them. And yet they knew that whoever bought it would have no share in the afterlife.

src: Sie bieten den Frieden an: «Wir pflegten nichts Böses zu tun.» - «Doch, Gott weiß Bescheid über das, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: Then they will offer surrender: 'We were doing nothing evil. 'Nay; but surety God has knowledge of the things you did.

result.output: They offer peace: We used to do no evil. - Yet, God knows what you used to do.

src: Und vor dem Unheil eines Neiders, wenn er neidisch ist.
ref: From the evil of the envier when he envies.

result.output: And before the calamity of an envious person, when he is envious.,

src: Und diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurden nach Dschahannam in Gruppen getrieben.
ref: Those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in throngs.

result.output: And those who committed disbelief were driven in groups towards Jahannam (Hell).

src: Er kennt sehr wohl die Rechtgeleiteten.
ref: He knows best who will come to guidance.

result.output: He knows the rightly guided ones very well.

src: Oder fühlen sich etwa die Bewohner der Ortschaften davor sicher, daß Unsere Peinigung sie morgens überkommt, während sie sich vergnügen?!
ref: Or, are the people of the towns so unafraid that (even when) Our retribution comes upon them in the hours of the morning they remain engrossed in sport and play?

result.output: Or do the inhabitants of the villages in front feel safe that Our punishment comes over them in the morning while they enjoy themselves?!

src: Bestimmt nicht! WIR werden registrieren lassen, was er sagt, und werden ihm noch viel mehr von der Peinigung zuteilen lassen.
ref: Never; We shall now record what he says and give him a prolonged punishment.

result.output: Certainly not! We will register what he says, and we will let him undergo much more torment.

src: Sie machten für ihn, was er begehrte: Paläste und Bildwerke, Becken wie Teiche und feststehende Kochbottiche: "Wirkt ihr vom Hause Davids in Dankbarkeit."
ref: They made for him whatever he wished, synagogues and statues, dishes large as water-troughs, and cauldrons firmly fixed (on ovens; and We said): "O House of David, act, and give thanks."

result.output: They did for him what he desired: palaces and sculptures, basins like ponds and standing cooking tubs: "You work in gratitude from the house of David."

src: Wollt ihr ihn etwa ableugnen?!
ref: Will you then deny it?

result.output: Do you really want to deny him?!

src: Und richte nicht an das Bittgebete anstelle von ALLAH, was dir weder nutzt noch schadet.
ref: And do not call, apart from God, on what neither benefits you nor harms you.

result.output: And do not address the prayer to anyone other than Allah, who neither benefits you nor harms you.

src: Und Wir riefen ihn von der rechten Seite des Berges und ließen ihn zu vertraulichem Gespräch nähertreten.
ref: We called him from the right side of the Mount, and brought him close for communion;

result.output: And we called him from the right side of the mountain and let him approach for a confidential conversation.

src: Er ißt von dem, was ihr esset, und trinkt von dem, was ihr trinkt.
ref: He eats as you do, and drinks as you drink.

result.output: He eats what you eat, and drinks what you drink.

src: Sie sagten: "O Wehe uns!
ref: They said, 'Alas for us!

result.output: They said: Oh woe to us!

src: Als er ein Feuer sah, sagte er zu seinen Angehörigen: "Bleibt (hier), ich habe ein Feuer wahrgenommen; vielleicht kann ich euch ein Stück Glut davon bringen oder den rechten Weg am Feuer finden.
ref: I have seen a fire. I may haply be able to bring an ember from it, or find direction by the fire."

result.output: When he saw a fire, he said to his relatives, \Stay here, I have noticed a fire; maybe I can bring you a piece of ember or find the right way by the fire.\,

src: Ihre Spenden werden nur deshalb nicht angenommen, weil sie nicht an Allah und an Seinen Gesandten glauben und nur träge zum Gebet kommen und ihre Spenden nur widerwillig geben.
ref: Nothing prevents the acceptance of what they spend except that they do not believe in God and His Apostle, and come to worship but languidly and spend only grudgingly.

result.output: Your donations are not accepted only because you do not believe in Allah and His Messenger and you come to prayer only sluggishly and give your donations only reluctantly.

src: Dann habe Ich sie ergriffen.
ref: Then (in the end) I seized it (with punishment).

result.output: Then I grabbed her.

src: Wenn ihr ungläubig seid, so ist Allah eurer unbedürftig, obgleich Er mit dem Unglauben für Seine Diener nicht zufrieden ist. Wenn ihr aber dankbar seid, ist Er damit zufrieden für euch.
ref: If you are ungrateful, then remember! God is independent of you, and He does not favour ingratitude on the part of His creatures.

result.output: If you are unbelievers, Allah is independent of you, although He is not pleased with disbelief in His servants. But if you are grateful, He is pleased with you.

src: Hinter ihnen ist eine Schranke bis zu dem Tag, da sie auferweckt werden.
ref: Behind them lies the intervening barrier (stretching) to the day of their resurrection.

result.output: Behind them is a barrier until the day they are resurrected.

src: Dem, der sich hochmütig von Allahs Weg abwendet, ist Schande im Diesseits bestimmt; und am Tage der Auferstehung werden Wir ihn die Strafe des Verbrennens kosten lassen.
ref: Turning their backs that they may lead away from the path of God. For such there is disgrace in the world, and on the Day of Judgement We shall make them taste the torment of burning.

result.output: To him who arrogantly turns away from Allah's way, shame is surely destined in this life; and on the Day of Resurrection We shall make him taste the torment of burning.

src: Und rufe die Menschen zur Pilgerfahrt auf. Sie werden zu Fuß und auf jedem mageren Kamel aus allen entfernsten Gegenden zu dir kommen
ref: “And publicly announce the pilgrimage to all people – they will come to you, on foot and on every lean she-camel, coming from every far distant journey.” (The announcement by Prophet Ibrahim reached each and every soul.)

result.output: And call the people to the pilgrimage. They will come to you on foot and every lean camel from the most remote areas.

src: Und ohne die Huld Allahs gegen euch und Seine Barmherzigkeit, und daß Allah nicht Gnädig und Barmherzig wäre ...
ref: But for the grace of God and His mercy (much harm would have been done); yet God is compassionate and kind.

result.output: And without the grace of Allah to you and His mercy, and that Allah would not be gracious and merciful ...

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR euer Gelöbnis entgegennahmen: "Ihr vergießt euer Blut nicht und vertreibt euch selbst nicht aus euren Wohnstätten." Dann habt ihr es gebilligt, während ihr es bezeugt habt.
ref: And remember, when We made a covenant with you whereby you agreed you will neither shed blood among you nor turn your people out of their homes, you promised, and are witness to it too.

result.output: And (remember), when WE accepted your pledge: You do not shed your blood and do not drive yourselves out of your dwellings. Then you approved it while you bore witness.

src: ALLAH wußte, daß ihr an sie denken werdet, doch gebt ihnen kein Heiratsversprechen, außer daß ihr gebilligtes Wort sagt! Und entschließt euch nicht zum Heiratsvertrag, bis die Vorgeschriebene (Idda-Zeit) ihr Ende hat.
ref: Yet do not make a promise in secret, unless you speak in a manner that is proper; and do not resolve upon marriage till the fixed term of waiting is over.

result.output: ALLAH knew that you would think of them, but do not promise marriage to them except for saying a recognized word! And do not decide on the marriage contract until the prescribed (Idda) time has elapsed.

src: "Nein! Vielmehr erklären sie das für Lüge, wovon sie kein umfassendes Wissen haben, und schon bevor seine Deutung zu ihnen gekommen ist. So haben es auch diejenigen, die vor ihnen waren, für Lüge erklärt. Schau, wie das Ende der Ungerechten war!
ref: On the contrary, they denied the thing the knowledge of which they could not master, whereas they have not yet seen its outcome; similarly those before them had denied, therefore see what sort of fate befell the unjust!

result.output: No! Rather, they declare as a lie that of which they have no comprehensive knowledge, even before its interpretation has come to them. Thus did those before them [deny]. So observe how was the end of the unjust.

src: Muhammad ist ALLAHs Gesandter!
ref: Muhammad is the apostle of Allah.

result.output: Muhammad is the messenger of Allah!

src: Zum Volk Pharaos, ob sie nicht gottesfürchtig sein wollen.»
ref: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear and take heed?"

result.output: To the people of Pharaoh, whether they want to be God-fearing.

src: Angezündet (wird die Lampe) von einem gesegneten Ölbaum, der weder östlich noch westlich ist, dessen Öl beinahe leuchten würde, auch wenn das Feuer es nicht berührte.
ref: The glass is like a brilliant planet, fueled by a blessed tree, an olive tree, neither eastern nor western. Its oil would almost illuminate, even if no fire has touched it.

result.output: Lit (will be the lamp) by a blessed olive tree, which is neither in the east nor in the west, whose oil would almost shine, even if the fire did not touch it.

src: Ein Wohlgefallen von Gott ist aber größer. Das ist der großartige Erfolg.
ref: Yet Allah’s pleasure is greater [than all these]; that is the great success.

result.output: But the pleasure of God is greater. This is the great success.

src: Und dein HERR ist immer allsehend.
ref: Your Lord is always watching.

result.output: And your Lord is always all-seeing.

src: Und die Hölle umfaßt die Ungläubigen.
ref: And surely Gehenna encompasses the unbelievers.

result.output: : And hell encompasses the unbelievers.

src: Er befiehlt ihnen das Rechte und verbietet ihnen das Verwerfliche, er erlaubt ihnen die köstlichen Dinge und verbietet ihnen die schlechten, und er nimmt ihnen ihre Last und die Fesseln, die auf ihnen lagen, ab.
ref: He directs them to righteousness, and deters them from evil, and allows for them all good things, and prohibits for them wickedness, and unloads the burdens and the shackles that are upon them.

result.output: He commands them to do what is right and forbids them from doing what is wrong, he allows them the good things and forbids them the bad, and he lifts from them their burdens and the chains that were upon them.

src: Die Allerersten, die ersten der Auswanderer und der Helfer und jene, die ihnen auf die beste Art gefolgt sind - mit ihnen ist Allah wohl zufrieden und sie sind wohl zufrieden mit Ihm; und Er hat ihnen Gärten vorbereitet, durch welche Bäche fließen.
ref: Those among the migrants (from Makkah) and helpers (in Madina) who were the first to believe, and those who followed them in goodness, have been accepted by God and they follow His way.

result.output: The very first, the first of the emigrants and helpers, and those who followed them in the best way - Allah is well pleased with them and they are well pleased with Him; and He has prepared gardens for them through which rivers flow.

src: Und als WIR von ihm sein Unglück wegnahmen, fuhr er fort, als richtete er an Uns niemals Bittgebete wegen des Unglücks, das ihm zustieß.
ref: But when We take away his troubles, he moves away, as though he had never called to Us in affliction.

result.output: And when WE took away his misfortune from him, he continued as if he never prayed to Us for the misfortune that befell him.

src: Sag: "ALLAH, DU Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde, Der Allwissende über das Verborgene und das Sichtbare!
ref: Say thou: O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth!

result.output: Say: "ALLAH, YOU Creator of the heavens and the earth, The All-Knowing of the unseen and the seen!

src: Sag: "Erwartet ihr für uns etwas anderes außer eines der beiden Schönen (Sieg oder Schahada fi-sabilillah)?" Und wir erwarten für euch, daß ALLAH euch mit einer Peinigung trifft entweder (direkt) von Sich oder durch uns.
ref: Say thou await ye for us ought save one of the two excellences; while for you we wait that Allah shall afflict you with a torment from Himself or at our hands.

result.output: Say: Do you expect anything different from us other than one of the two beautiful things (victory or martyrdom for the sake of Allah)? And we expect for you that Allah will punish you with a torment, either directly from Him or through us.

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der lebendig macht und sterben läßt. Und Ihm unterliegt die Aufeinanderfolge von Nacht und Tag. Besinnt ihr euch etwa nicht?!
ref: And it is He Who gives life and causes death, and for Him are the alternations of night and day; so do you not have sense?

result.output: And HE is the One who gives life and causes death. And to Him belongs the succession of night and day. Do you not use reason?

src: Aber nein! Allah hat sie wegen ihres Unglaubens verflucht.
ref: Rather, God has cursed them for their ingratitude.

result.output: But no! Allah has cursed them for their unbelief.

src: Wer Böses tut, dem wird danach vergolten, und er wird für sich anstelle Gottes weder Freund noch Helfer finden.
ref: Whosoever does evil shall be recompensed for it, and will not find for him, apart from God, a friend or helper.

result.output: Whoever does evil will be repaid for it, and he will not find a friend or helper for himself instead of God.

src: Denn für euch gibt es keinen anderen als Gott.
ref: You have no god other than He.

result.output: For there is no other but God for you.

src: O Prophet, furchte Allah und gehorche nicht den Ungläubigen und den Heuchlern.
ref: O Prophet, fear God, and obey not the unbelievers and the hypocrites.

result.output: O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites.

src: Nehmt diejenigen, die euren Din zum Spott und zur Belustigung mißbrauchen von denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, und von den Kafir, nicht als Wali!
ref: Do not befriend those who take your religion in mockery and as a sport, be they from among those who were given the Scripture before you, or the disbelievers.

result.output: Do not take those who abuse your Din for mockery and entertainment from those to whom the Scripture was given before you, and from the Kafir, as allies!

src: Und den, der an Allah glaubt und recht handelt, wird Er in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (er) auf ewig verweilen wird.
ref: Whosoever believes in God and does the right, He will admit into gardens with rivers flowing by, where they will abide for ever.

result.output: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness, He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein he will abide forever.

src: Ich schwöre bei dem, was ihr seht,
ref: I swear by that you see

result.output: I swear by what you see.

src: Sie sagten: «O unser Vater, bitte für uns um Vergebung unserer Sünden.
ref: They said, ‘Father! Plead [with Allah] for forgiveness of our sins!

result.output: They said: O our father, please pray for the forgiveness of our sins.

src: Er gehört wahrlich zu den Ungerechten."
ref: He is surely a mischief-monger."

result.output: Truly, he belongs to the unjust.

src: So versiegeln Wir die Herzen der Übertreter.
ref: That is how We seal the hearts of the iniquitous.

result.output: So we seal the hearts of the transgressors.

src: Und wenn Unser Befehl ergeht und die Oberfläche der Erde (Wasser) hervorwallen läßt, dann nimm ein Paar von jeglicher Gattung an Bord sowie deine Angehörigen mit Ausnahme derer, gegen die das Wort bereits ergangen ist.
ref: Then, when Our Command comes, and the oven gushes forth water, take on board of each kind two (male and female), and your family, except those thereof against whom the Word has already gone forth.

result.output: And when Our command is issued, and the surface of the earth (water) gushes forth, then take on board a pair of every species, along with your family members, except those against whom the word has already gone forth.

src: Sag: "Ihr folgt uns nicht!
ref: Tell them: "You will not follow us.

result.output: Say: "You're not following us!"

src: Doch ER machte mich nicht zu einem widerspenstigen Widersacher!
ref: He has not made me haughty or rebellious.

result.output: But HE did not make me into a defiant adversary!

src: Sie scheuen keine Mühe, euch zu verwirren, und möchten gern, daß ihr in Bedrängnis geratet. Schon wurde aus ihren Mündern Haß offenkundig, aber was ihre Brüste verborgen halten, ist (noch) schwerwiegender.
ref: O believers, take not for your intimates outside yourselves such men spare nothing to ruin you; they yearn for you to suffer Hatred has already shown itself of their mouths, and what their breasts conceal is yet greater.

result.output: They shy away from no effort to confuse you and would like you to get into trouble. Hatred has already become apparent from their mouths, but what they conceal in their breasts is even more serious.

src: Und wenn Du uns nicht vergibst und dich unser erbarmst, werden wir bestimmt zu den Verlierern gehören.»
ref: If You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we shall certainly be lost."

result.output: And if you do not forgive us and have mercy on us, we will certainly be among the losers.

src: Dann bestimmte ER sie zu sieben Himmeln in zwei Ay-yam, und ließ in jedem Himmel seine Anweisung als Wahy zuteil werden. Und WIR schmückten den untersten Himmel mit Lampen und Bewahrendem. Dies ist die Bestimmung Des Allwürdigen, Des Allwissenden.
ref: He then established them into seven heavens in two days, and to each heaven He sent the command of its affairs; and We decorated the lower heaven with lamps; and for its protection; this is the command set by the Most Honourable, the All Knowing.

result.output: Then He directed her to the seven heavens in two days and inspired to each heaven its instructions as Wahy. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

src: Ich will dir keine Härte auferlegen.
ref: I do not wish to impose any hardship on you.

result.output: I do not want to impose any harshness on you.

src: Und wenn du sie fragst: "Wer schuf sie?" werden sie sicher sagen: "Allah." Wie lassen sie sich da (von Ihm) abwenden?
ref: And if you ask them as to Who created them, they will surely answer “Allah” – so where are they reverting?

result.output: And if you ask them, Who created them? they will surely say, Allah. So how can they be turned away (from Him)?

src: "Was brachte euch in Saqar hinein?"
ref: "What was it that brought you to Hell?"

result.output: What brought you into Saqar?

src: Oder wer hat die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen und euch vom Himmel Wasser herabkommen lassen? Dadurch haben Wir Gärten wachsen lassen, die Freude bereiten. Ihr hättet unmöglich deren Bäume wachsen lassen können. Gibt es denn einen (anderen) Gott neben Gott? Nein, ihr seid ja Leute, die (Gott andere) gleichsetzen.
ref: Or He Who created the heavens and the earth, and sent down water from the sky for you; so We grew delightful gardens with it; you had no strength to grow its trees; is there a God along with Allah?! In fact they are those who shun the right path.

result.output: Or who created the heavens and the earth and sent down rain from the sky for you? And We have caused to grow thereby gardens of noble qualities. You could not have grown its trees. Is there a deity with Allah? No, but they are people who ascribe equals [to Him].

src: Für sie ist darin bestimmt, was sie wollen. Und bei Uns ist noch mehr.
ref: Theirs will be whatsoever they wish: And with Us there is more.

result.output: For them, it is determined in it what they want. And there is even more with us.

src: Aber naht euch nicht diesem Baum, sonst gehört ihr zu den Ungerechten!"
ref: But neither of you should come close to this tree or else you shall both become transgressors'

result.output: But do not approach this tree, or you will be among the unjust!,

src: Und kehrt euch zu eurem Herrn, und ergebt euch Ihm, bevor die Strafe über euch kommt; (denn) dann werdet ihr keine Hilfe finden.
ref: Turn towards your Lord and obey Him before the punishment comes upon you when you will not be helped.

result.output: And turn towards your Lord and surrender yourselves to Him before the punishment comes upon you, for then you will not find any help.

src: Ja! Wenn diese sie dann trifft, wird sie von ihnen nicht mehr abgewendet werden, und sie werden dann von dem umgeben, was sie zu verspotten pflegten.
ref: And yet, the day it comes, they will not be able to avert it; and what they used to laugh at will encompass them.

result.output: Yes! When she meets them, she will no longer be turned away from them, and they will then be surrounded by what they used to mock.

src: Dann iß von allen Früchten und folge den Wegen deines Herrn, (die Er dir) leicht gemacht hat." Aus ihren Leibern kommt ein Trank, mannigfach an Farbe.
ref: Then eat thou of all the fruits and tread the ways of thy Lord made easy.

result.output: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the paths of your Lord, which He has made easy for you. A drink of many colors comes from their bodies.

src: Wenn aber einer gezwungen wird, wobei er weder Auflehnung noch Übertretung begeht, so ist Gott voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: Yet whoso is constrained, not desiring nor transgressing, God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

result.output: But if someone is forced without being rebellious or exceeding limits, then God is Forgiving and Merciful.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch Gnade erweist und Seine Engel erbitten sie für euch, damit ER euch von den Finsternissen ins Licht herausbringt.
ref: It is He who blesses you, and His angels, to bring you forth from the shadows into the light.

result.output: HE is the One who grants you mercy and His angels ask it for you, so HE brings you from darkness into light.,

src: Er ist nichts anderes als ein deutlicher Warner.
ref: He is only a plain admonisher.

result.output: He is nothing but a clear Warner.

src: Oder fühlt ihr euch sicher davor, daß ER euch dorthin (ins Meer) noch einmal zurückkehren läßt, und dann über euch einen Orkan schickt, dann euch ertrinken läßt für das, was ihr an Kufr betrieben habt? Dann findet ihr darin gegen Uns keinen Bestreitenden.
ref: Or are you unafraid that He may again take you back to the sea, then send against you a ship-breaking gust of wind, therefore drowning you because of your disbelief – then you may not find for yourself anyone to come after Us for this?

result.output: Or do you feel safe that HE will let you return there (to the sea) again, and then send a hurricane over you, then let you drown for what you have done in Kufr? Then you will find no contender against Us in it.,

src: Und wenn alle Bäume, die auf der Erde sind, Schreibrohre wären und der Ozean (Tinte), und sieben Ozeane würden sie mit Nachschub versorgen, selbst dann könnten Allahs Worte nicht erschöpft werden. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allmächtig, Allweise.
ref: And if all the trees in the earth were pens, and the seas were its ink, with seven more seas to back it up – the Words of Allah will not finish; indeed Allah is Almighty, Wise.

result.output: And if all the trees on the earth were pens and the ocean (were ink), replenished by seven oceans more, the Words of Allah would not be exhausted. Allah is indeed Mighty, Wise.

src: Und Allah liebt jene, die Gutes tun.
ref: And Allah loves the good-doers.

result.output: And Allah loves those who do good.

src: Er sagte: "Ja, und dann werdet ihr zu unseren Nächsten gehören."
ref: "Yes," he replied. "You 'will be among the honoured."

result.output: He said: "Yes, and then you will belong to our neighbors."

src: Und die ihnen keine Unterstützung gewähren, noch sich selbst helfen können?
ref: Who can neither help them, nor help themselves?

result.output: : And those who cannot provide support for themselves nor help themselves?

src: Oder (gewahrtest du etwa nicht) denjenigen, der an einer Ortschaft vorbeiging, während die Stützen ihrer (Häuser) dem Erdboden gleichgemacht wurden?!
ref: Or take the man who passed by a town which lay destroyed upside down.

result.output: Or (did you not notice, perhaps) the one who passed by a village while its pillars (houses) were razed to the ground?!

src: Dann entfernten sie sich.
ref: Then they turn away.

result.output: Then they moved away.

src: Aber er blieb nicht lange aus. Er sagte: "Ich habe (an Wissen) erfaßt, was du nicht erfaßt hast.
ref: But he was not long in coming, and reported: "I have been around where you have not been.

result.output: But he didn't stay away for long. He said, "I have comprehended what you haven't comprehended."

src: Es wird für sie keine Speise geben außer aus trockenen Dornen,
ref: They will have no food except bitter thorn,

result.output: There will be no food for them except dry thorns.,

src: Und wenn ihr (es) nicht vermögt, also gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: If you do not have the means, then surely God is forgiving and kind.

result.output: And if you are not capable, then Allah is surely all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Aber nein, die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: Nay, but the most of them have no knowledge.

result.output: But no, most of them do not know.

src: Und die ihre Scham bewahren,
ref: Who guard their sex

result.output: And those who preserve their shame,

src: Ibrahim!
ref: "O Ibrahim (Abraham)!

result.output: Ibrahim!

src: Gehen sie jedoch weg, so ist es kein Vergehen für euch, wenn sie zu ihrem Besten über sich selbst verfügen.
ref: But if they leave (of their own accord), you will not be blamed for what they do with themselves in their own rights.

result.output: However, if they go away, it is not an offense for you if they act in their own best interest

src: Was hinderte dich daran, nachdem du gesehen hattest, daß sie irregingen,
ref: What stopped you when you saw them going astray;

result.output: What prevented you, after you had seen that they went astray,,

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran.
ref: When We said to you: "Verily your Lord circumscribes mankind," and showed you the vision and the accursed tree of the Qur'an, it was as a bone of contention for men.

result.output: And (remember) when WE told you: "Surely, your Lord will destroy the people!" And WE made the dream which WE showed you, only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.

src: Also was ist mit denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sie kommen zu dir eilend
ref: What is the matter with unbelievers that they stare at you with fixed gazes and hasten towards you

result.output: So what about those who have engaged in disbelief, they come to you hastening.

src: Hast du etwa nicht diejenigen gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde, sie erkaufen sich das Irregehen und wollen, daß auch ihr irregeht?!
ref: Have you not seen the people who were given a share of the Book, but who purchased only error, and wish that you also go astray?

result.output: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given, who buy error and desire that you should be misguided along with them?

src: Und wenn dann unsere Boten zu ihnen kommen, um sie abzuberufen, sagen sie: «Wo sind diejenigen, die ihr anstelle Gottes anzurufen pflegtet?»
ref: Until, when Our envoys come to them, to take their souls away, they will say, “Where are they whom you used to pray to besides God?”

result.output: And when our messengers come to them to take them away, they say, "Where are those whom you used to call upon instead of Allah?"

src: Bist du denn gegen meinen Befehl ungehorsam gewesen?»
ref: Did you not disobey my command?" (And Moses pulled him by the hair).

result.output: Have you been disobedient to my command then?,

src: Es läßt nichts aus, ob klein oder groß, sondern hält alles aufgezeichnet."
ref: They will find in it whatsoever they had done.

result.output: : It leaves nothing out, whether small or large, but keeps everything recorded.

src: Sie sagten: "Wenn er stiehlt, so stahl bereits sein Bruder vor ihm." Yusuf behielt es jedoch bei sich und offenbarte es ihnen nicht, er sagte (bei sich): "Ihr seid sicherlich niedriger in der Stellung.
ref: They [(Yusuf's (Joseph) brothers] said: "If he steals, there was a brother of his [Yusuf (Joseph)] who did steal before (him)." But these things did Yusuf (Joseph) keep in himself, revealing not the secrets to them.

result.output: They said, 'If he steals, his brother already stole before him.' However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them. He said to himself, 'You are certainly inferior in status.'

src: Hat nicht Derjenige, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Ja doch! Und Er ist der Allerschaffer und Allwissende.
ref: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!

result.output: The one who created the heavens and the earth, does He not have the power to create the likes of them? Yes, indeed! And He is the All-Creator, the All-Knower.

src: Sie sagen: «Unser Herr, unser Unglück hat uns besiegt, und wir waren abgeirrte Leute.
ref: They will say: "O Lord, our misery overwhelmed us, so we remained a people astray.

result.output: They say: 'Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us and we were astray people.'

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: O YOU WHO believe, do not forestall the judgements of God and His Apostle, and have fear of God.

result.output: You who have internalized the faith! Do not overtake Allah and His Messenger, and act with Taqwa towards Allah!

src: Darum wende dich von ihnen ab und sprich: "Frieden!" Und bald werden sie es wissen.
ref: Therefore excuse them and proclaim, “Peace”; for they will soon come to know.

result.output: Therefore turn away from them and say: "Peace!" And soon they will know.

src: ER sagte: "Fürchtet euch beide nicht! Gewiß, ICH bin mit euch beiden, ICH höre und sehe.
ref: He said, “Do not fear – I am with you, All Hearing and All Seeing.”

result.output: He said, "Fear not! Indeed, I am with both of you, I hear and see."

src: Sag: "Soll ich euch in Kenntnis setzen über schlimmere Vergeltung als für dies, (was ihr uns verübelt), bei ALLAH?: Es ist (die Vergeltung für) denjenigen, wen ALLAH verflucht, über den ER zürnt und aus denen ER Affen, Schweine und Taghut-Anbeter machte." Diese haben die niedrigere Stellung und sind vom rechten Weg noch mehr verirrt.
ref: Say, “Shall I tell you of those who are in a worse position than this, in Allah’s sight? It is those whom Allah has cursed and has wreaked His wrath upon and turned some of them into apes and swine, and worshippers of the devil; theirs is a worse destination and they have wandered further astray from the Straight Path.”

result.output: Say, \Shall I inform you of something worse than that (regarding the recompense) which you have attributed to Allah as partners? It is the recompense of those whom Allah has cursed and with whom He became angry, and in whose forms He transformed them into apes and swine and Taghut worshippers.\ Such are in a worse plight and further astray from the straight path.

src: Nun belohnt sie Gott für das, was sie gesagt haben mit Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen.
ref: God will reward them for saying so with gardens where streams flow by, where they will live for ever.

result.output: Now God rewards them for what they said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will abide eternally.

src: Und das Jenseits ist wahrlich besser für dich als das Diesseits.
ref: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;

result.output: And the hereafter is certainly better for you than this world.

src: Sei nun geduldig. Das Versprechen Gottes ist wahr.
ref: So have thou patience; verily the promise of Allah is true.

result.output: Be patient now. The promise of God is true.

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing by, and excellent mansions in the garden of Eden.

result.output: Then He will forgive you your sins and allow you to enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, and into pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden.,

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann einen Jungen trafen, er ihn tötete.
ref: The two went on till they came to a boy, whom he killed.

result.output: They both continued on until, when they met a boy, he killed him.

src: Und sooft eine Sura herabgesandt wird, schauen sie einander an (und sagen): "Sieht euch jemand?" Dann wenden sie sich ab. Allah hat ihre Herzen abgewendet, weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: And whenever a chapter is sent down, one of them looks at the other; “Is there someone watching you?” – and then they turn away; Allah has inverted their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.

result.output: And whenever a Sura is revealed, they look at one another (saying): 'Does anyone see you?' Then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are a people who do not understand.

src: Ob Wir dich einen Teil dessen, was Wir ihnen androhen, sehen lassen oder dich abberufen, zu Uns wird ihre Rückkehr sein. Dann ist Gott Zeuge über das, was sie tun.
ref: Whether We show you some of the promise (of punishment in wait) for them, or take you to Ourself, their returning is to Us in the end; and God is a witness to all they do.

result.output: Whether We let you see a part of what We threaten them with or recall you to Us, their return will be to Us. Then God will bear witness to what they do.

src: Und er beerbt sie, wenn sie kein Kind hat.
ref: And he inherits from her if she leaves no children.

result.output: And he inherits from her if she doesn't have a child.

src: Denken sie nicht über den Quran nach?!
ref: Do they not ponder on what the Qur'an says?

result.output: Don't they think about the Quran?

src: Und wenn sie das Sinnlose hören, wenden sie sich davon ab und sagen: "Uns gehören unsere Handlungen und euch gehören eure Handlungen, Salam sei mit euch!
ref: When they hear idle talk they turn aside and say: "To us our actions, to you yours.

result.output: And when they hear the meaningless, they turn away from it and say, 'For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. Peace be upon you!'

src: Dennoch wollen sie dir mit denjenigen, die es außer Ihm geben soll, Furcht einflößen. Und wen Allah in die Irre gehen läßt, der hat niemanden, der ihn rechtleitet.
ref: They frighten you with others apart from Him, although he whom Allah lets go astray, none can guide him to the Right Way.

result.output: However, they want to scare you with those whom there are besides Him, and whoever Allah sends astray - for him there is no guide.

src: Auch die Sterne sind durch seinen Befehl dienstbar gemacht worden.
ref: The stars are subjected by His Command.

result.output: Even the stars have been made obedient to his command.

src: ICH werde euch Meine Ayat zeigen, so fordert keine Eile von Mir.
ref: We will show you Our signs, then you will not desire to hasten (the punishment).

result.output: I will show you My verses, so do not ask Me to be hasty.

src: Und zu Ihm werdet ihr zurückgebracht.
ref: And to Him will you be brought back in the end.

result.output: And you will be brought back to Him.

src: Sag: "Es wird mir nur alsWahy zuteil, daß euer Gott nur ein einziger Gott ist.
ref: Say: "This is what has been revealed to me: 'Your God is one and only God.'

result.output: Say: "It is only revealed to me by Wahy, that your God is only one God."

src: ER sagte: "Adam! Teile ihnen deren Namen mit!" Und nachdem er ihnen deren Namen mitgeteilt hatte, sagte ER: "Sagte ICH euch etwa nicht, daß ICH das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde kenne, und daß ICH das kenne, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr zu verheimlichen pflegtet?!"
ref: He said, ‘O Adam, inform them of their names,’ and when he had informed them of their names, He said, ‘Did I not tell you that I know the Unseen of the heavens and the earth, and that I know whatever you disclose and whatever you conceal?’

result.output: He said, \Adam! Tell them their names!\ And after he had informed them of their names, he said, \Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you conceal?!\,

src: Und wenn ihr eure Riten beendet habt, dann gedenket Gottes, wie ihr eurer Väter (früher) gedacht habt oder mit noch innigerem Gedenken. Unter den Menschen gibt es welche, die sagen: «Unser Herr, beschenke uns im Diesseits.»
ref: So when you have completed your Hajj rites, remember Allah as you used to remember your forefathers, in fact more than that; and among the people are some that say, “Our Lord!

result.output: And when you have finished your rituals, then remember God as you used to remember your fathers (before) or with even more intense remembrance. Among people there are those who say: 'Our Lord, give us in this world.'

src: So vergelten Wir den Übeltätern.
ref: That is how We requite the transgressors:

result.output: So we retaliate against the wrongdoers.

src: Darum fürchtet Allah, ihr Verständigen, auf daß ihr erfolgreich sein möget.
ref: So fear God, O men of wisdom; you may haply find success.

result.output: Therefore fear Allah, O you of understanding, that you may be successful.

src: Friede sei auf euch!
ref: Peace be to you.

result.output: Peace be upon you!

src: Sag: Allah hat die Wahrheit gesprochen. So folgt dem Glaubensbekenntnis Ibrahims, (als) Anhänger des rechten Glaubens, und er gehörte nicht zu den Götzendienern.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Allah is truthful; so follow the religion of Ibrahim, who was free from all falsehood; and he was not of the polytheists.”

result.output: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the faith of Ibrahim, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not of the idolaters.

src: Sag: "Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam die Wahrheit zu euch von eurem HERRN. Wer also der Rechtleitung folgt, der folgt der Rechtleitung nur für seinen eigenen Nutzen. Wer jedoch irregeht, der geht nur irre zu seinem eigenen Schaden. Und ich bin kein Wakil über euch."
ref: Say: "O men, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so he who follows the right path does so for himself, and he who goes astray errs against himself, and I am not a guardian over you.

result.output: Sag: O people! There has already come to you the truth from your Lord. So whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul, and whoever goes astray only goes astray to its detriment. And I am not accountable for you.

src: Hierauf rufe sie. Sie werden eilends zu dir kommen.
ref: Then [after slaughtering them] put on each hill a portion of them; then call them - they will come [flying] to you in haste.

result.output: After this, she calls. They will come to you in a hurry.

src: Haben denn die Gläubigen nicht den Versuch (, daran zu zweifeln,) aufgegeben, daß, wenn Allah gewollt hätte, Er sicher der ganzen Menschheit hätte den Weg weisen können?
ref: Have the believers not learnt that if God had so willed He could have guided all mankind?

result.output: Have not the believers given up trying to doubt that if Allah had wanted to, He could have certainly shown the whole of mankind the way?

src: Und (damit) Er die Heuchler und Heuchlerinnen und die Götzendiener und Götzendienerinnen strafe, die von Allah die böse Erwartung hegen.
ref: And that He may chastise the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women and the associaters and the associatresses, the thinkers of evil thought concerning Allah.

result.output: And to punish the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters, men and women, who entertain evil thoughts about Allah.

src: Dann rief er in den Finsternissen: "Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir!
ref: Glory be to Thee!

result.output: Then he called out in the darkness: "There is no god but You!"

src: Ihr haltet sie (beide Zeugen) nach dem rituellen Gebet auf, dann schwören sie bei ALLAH - falls ihr Zweifel hegen solltet -: "Wir erkaufen uns damit nichts Geringfügiges, selbst dann nicht, wenn derjenige, (für den wir Zeugnis ablegen), ein Verwandter ist, und wir verbergen nicht das von ALLAH gebotene Zeugnis, sonst gehören wir doch zu den Verfehlenden."
ref: Detain them after the service of prayer, and if you doubt their word make them swear by God that: "We shall not take a bribe even though it be offered by a near relative, nor hide the testimony of God, for then we shall surely be sinful."

result.output: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by ALLAH - if you should have any doubts -: We are not buying anything insignificant with this, not even if the person (for whom we bear witness) is a relative, and we do not hide the testimony that ALLAH has commanded, otherwise we would be among the wrongdoers.

src: Dann sagten sie: "Etwa einem einzigen Menschen von uns folgen wir?
ref: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us?

result.output: Then they said: Do we follow only one person among us?

src: Und gedenke deines HERRN viel und lobpreise Ihn zu Sonnenuntergang und zu Sonnenaufgang!"
ref: And mention thy Lord oft, and give glory at evening and dawn.'

result.output: And remember your Lord abundantly and exalt Him in the morning and evening.

src: Wenn ihn Gutes trifft, so ist er damit zufrieden; trifft ihn aber eine Prüfung, dann kehrt er zu seinem (früheren) Weg zurück.
ref: When something good comes his way, he is content with it. But when an ordeal strikes him, he makes a turnaround.

result.output: If something good happens to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he is tested, he returns to his (former) way.

src: Dann ängstigte sich insgeheim, Musa.
ref: And Moses felt afraid within himself.

result.output: Then Musa secretly got scared.

src: Hast Du nicht gesehen, daß Allah Wasser vom Himmel niedersendet und es als Quellen in die Erde dringen läßt und dadurch Gewächs hervorbringt, das mannigfaltig an Farben ist?
ref: Beholdest thou not that Allah sendeth down water from the heaven, and causeth it to enter springs in the earth, and thereafter produceth thereby corn various coloured.

result.output: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from the sky and allows it to penetrate into the earth as springs, and thereby produces vegetation that is diverse in color?

src: Laß uns herausbringen, damit wir gottgefällig Gutes tun, anderes als das, das wir zu tun pflegten." Haben WIR euch etwa nicht ein langes Lebensalter gewährt, während dessen derjenige sich erinnern konnte, der sich erinnern wollte?!
ref: Extricate us, so that we may do good deeds, the opposite of what we used to do”; (It will be said to them) “And did We not give you an age long enough, in which anyone who wants to understand would have understood?

result.output: Let us find out so that we can do good in the sight of God, different from what we used to do. Have WE not granted you a long life span during which one who wanted to remember could remember?

src: O die ihr glaubt, wer von euch sich von seiner Religion abkehrt -, so wird Allah Leute bringen, die Er liebt und die Ihn lieben, bescheiden gegenüber den Gläubigen, mächtig (auftretend) gegenüber den Ungläubigen, und die sich auf Allahs Weg abmühen und nicht den Tadel des Tadlers fürchten. Das ist Allahs Huld, die Er gewährt, wem Er will. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: O you who believe! whoever from among you turns back from his religion, then Allah will bring a people, He shall love them and they shall love Him, lowly before the believers, mighty against the unbelievers, they shall strive hard in Allah's way and shall not fear the censure of any censurer; this is Allah's Face, He gives it to whom He pleases, and Allah is Ample-giving, Knowing.

result.output: O you who believe, whoever of you renounces his religion, Allah will bring forth people whom He loves and who love Him, humble toward the believers, powerful against the disbelievers, striving in the way of Allah and not fearing the reproaches of any reproacher. That is the grace of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.

src: Und wenn Wellen wie überschattende Hüllen sie überdecken, rufen sie zu Gott, wobei sie Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion sind. Wenn Er sie ans Land errettet, zeigen nur einige von ihnen einen maßvollen Wandel.
ref: And when the waves cover them like shadows they call upon God, making their religion sincerely His; but when He has delivered them to the land, some of them are lukewarm.

result.output: And when waves cover them like overshadowing mantles, they call upon Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, then some of them falter.

src: Wäre dies ein demnächst verfügbarer Profit mit einer Reise von mittlerer Entfernung gewesen, wären sie dir gewiß gefolgt.
ref: Were it a gain at hand or a short journey, they would have surely followed you, but the distance seemed too far to them.

result.output: Would this have been a soon-to-be available profit with a moderately distanced trip, they would surely have followed you.

src: Von Zaqqum-Bäumen essen
ref: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,

result.output: eating from the trees of Zaqqum

src: Allah aber ist der Schutzherr der Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And Allah is the Friend of the God-fearing.

result.output: However, Allah is the protector of the pious.,

src: Folge dem, was dir an Wahy von deinem HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Follow what was revealed to you from your Lord.

result.output: Follow what has been revealed to you from your Lord.

src: (Ist es) etwa einer, der im Glanz aufgezogen wird und nicht beredt im Wortstreit ist?
ref: Can one who has been raised on ornaments and cannot present her case coolly in a dispute (be associated with God?)

result.output: Is it someone who is brought up in splendor and not eloquent in argument?

src: Keiner außer Allah kann sie abwenden.
ref: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.

result.output: Nobody but Allah can turn them away.

src: Wenn sie sich abkehren, so befinden sie sich in Widerstreit.
ref: But if they turn away, then they are in schism.

result.output: If they turn away, they find themselves in conflict.

src: Er ist es, Der euch erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created you.

result.output: He is the One who created you.

src: Und wisset, daß Allah dessen gewahr ist, was in euren Seelen ist.
ref: Know that God knows what is in your hearts.

result.output: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.

src: Das Feuer darin ist mit Brennstoff,
ref: Full of fire fed by faggots,

result.output: : The fire in it is fueled,

src: Doch wenn sie sich abkehren, so liebt Allah die Ungläubigen nicht.
ref: But if they turn their backs, God loves not the unbelievers.

result.output: But if they turn away, then Allah does not love the disbelievers.

src: Sag (in Meinem Namen): "Meine Diener, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!"
ref: Tell them: "O my creatures who have come to belief, have fear of displeasing your Lord.

result.output: Say (in My name): "O My servants who have believed, fear Allah as He should be feared and do not die except as Muslims [in submission to Him]."

src: Doch die, denen Kenntnis und Glauben verliehen wurden, sagen: "lhr habt wahrlich gemäß dem Buche Allahs bis zum Tage der Auferstehung (im Grabe) geweilt.
ref: But those endowed with knowledge and faith will say, “You remained in God’s Book until the Day of Resurrection.

result.output: But those who were given knowledge and faith say: 'You have indeed sojourned in accordance with the Book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave).'

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen). Und wir entsandten dich für die Menschen als Gesandten. Und ALLAH genügt als Bezeugender.
ref: Whatever good reaches you, O listeners, is from Allah, and whatever ill reaches you is from yourselves; and We have sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a Noble Messenger towards all mankind; and Allah is Sufficient, as a Witness.

result.output: What hit you with good is from Allah. And what hit you with misfortune is owing to yourself. And We have sent you as a messenger for the people. And Allah suffices as a Witness.

src: Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: Do not put (yourselves) forward before Allah and His Messenger (SAW), and fear Allah.

result.output: Do not surpass Allah and His Messenger, and act with taqwa towards Allah!

src: Doch Allah gehört die Macht, und auch Seinem Gesandten und den Gläubigen.
ref: In truth, all honour belongs to Allah, and to His Messenger, and to the believers.

result.output: However, power belongs to Allah, and also to His Messenger and to the believers.

src: Laßt sie auf Allahs Erde weiden und fügt ihr nichts Böses zu, sonst überkommt euch eine baldige Strafe."
ref: So leave her alone to graze on God's earth, and do not molest her, otherwise the swiftest punishment would befall you."

result.output: Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will overtake you.

src: Sind es aber zwei (Schwestern), dann erhalten sie zwei Drittel von seiner Erbschaft.
ref: In ease he has two sisters then they will get two-thirds of the heritage.

result.output: But if they are two (sisters), they will receive two thirds of his inheritance.

src: Vergib uns unsere Verfehlungen und unsere Übertretungen in unseren Angelegenheiten, mache uns standhaft und stehe uns bei gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: Forgive us our sins and the excesses committed during our efforts, and keep our feet steady, and bestow us help over the disbelievers.”

result.output: Forgive us our sins and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the disbelieving people!

src: Sag: Wenn Allah wollte, würde ich ihn euch nicht verlesen, und Er würde euch nicht davon Kenntnis geben. Ich habe doch vordem ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: Say, ‘Had Allah [so] wished, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I have dwelled among you for a lifetime before it.

result.output: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had dwelt among you a lifetime before [this].

src: Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt keinen stolzen Eingebildeten.
ref: Do not walk around puffed-up with pride; God does not love arrogant and boastful people.

result.output: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.

src: Daß ihr (sogar) die Gräber besucht.
ref: Till you reach the grave.

result.output: That you (even) visit the graves.

src: ALLAH leitet nicht diejenigen Menschen recht, die Unrecht begehen.
ref: And Allah guides not those people who are the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers).

result.output: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoing.

src: Er sagte: "Bringt ihr mir die frohe Kunde ungeachtet dessen, daß ich vom Alter getroffen bin?
ref: "You bring me the good news now," he said, "when old age has come upon me.

result.output: He said: Will you bring me the joyful news regardless of me being struck by old age?

src: Und warne die Menschen vor dem Tag, an dem die Strafe über sie kommen wird.
ref: Warn the people of that Day when the punishment would be inflicted upon them.

result.output: And warn the people about the day on which the punishment will come upon them.

src: Tauscht er dann aber nach der bösen Tat etwas Gutes ein, dann bin Ich voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: But if he substitutes good in place of evil, I am Most Forgiving, Most Compassionate.

result.output: But if he exchanges something good after the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy.

src: ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH weiß, was ihr nicht wißt."
ref: And God said: "I know what you do not know."

result.output: He said: 'Certainly, I know what you don't know.'

src: Aber Allah läßt im richtigen Maß herabkommen, was Er will.
ref: So He gives according to measure as He will.

result.output: But Allah sends down in measure whatever He wills.

src: O Yusuf, wende dich ab von dieser Sache, und du (, o Frau), bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde.
ref: “O Yusuf! Disregard this – and O woman!

result.output: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (o woman), seek forgiveness for your sin.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der die Schrift wahrheitsgemäß hinabsandte sowie Almizan. Und was läßt dich wissen?! Vielleicht liegt die Stunde doch nahe.
ref: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Scales of Justice; and what do you know – possibly the Last Day could really be near!

result.output: ALLAH is the One who sent down the scripture truthfully as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near.

src: Das ist - sie sollen es kosten - heißes Wasser und stinkender Eiter
ref: There will be boiling water for them and cold, clammy, fetid drink to taste,

result.output: : That is - they should try it - hot water and smelly pus.

src: Dies, weil ihre Gesandten immer wieder zu ihnen mit den klaren Beweisen kamen, sie aber sagten: "Sollen (etwa) menschliche Wesen uns rechtleiten?" So wurden sie ungläubig und kehrten sich ab.
