ref: That is because, when their Messengers came to them with clear proofs they said: 'Shall humans be our guides' They disbelieved and turned away, but Allah was not in need (of them).

result.output: This is because their envoys kept coming to them with clear proofs, but they said, 'Shall mere mortals guide us?' So they disbelieved and turned away.

src: Vielleicht werdet ihr (Allah) fürchten.
ref: It is expected that this will produce piety in you.

result.output: Maybe you will fear (Allah).

src: Gewiß, wer ALLAH gegenüber Schirk betreibt, dem hat ALLAH bereits die Dschanna für haram erklärt und sein Aufenthaltsort ist das Feuer." Und für die Unrecht-Begehenden gibt es keine Helfer.
ref: Whosoever associates a compeer with God, will have Paradise denied to him by God, and his abode shall be Hell; and the sinners will have none to help them.

result.output: Certainly, whoever commits shirk against Allah, Allah has already declared Jannah haram for him and his abode is the Fire. And for the wrongdoers, there are no helpers.

src: Diejenigen, die Enthaltsamkeit von ihren Frauen beschwören, sollen vier Monate warten.
ref: Those who vow abstinence from their wives must wait for four months.

result.output: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives shall wait four months.

src: Doch vergebt und seid nachsichtig, bis Allah Seine Entscheidung ergehen läßt. Wahrlich, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: But you forbear and overlook till God fulfil His plan; and God has power over all things.

result.output: But forgive and be patient until Allah issues His judgment. Indeed, Allah has power over all things.

src: An jenem Tag habt ihr keinen Zufluchtsort und keine Möglichkeit, (irgend etwas) abzustreiten.
ref: You will have no place of refuge then nor time for denying.

result.output: On that day you will have no refuge and no means of denying (anything).

src: Diejenigen, die sie anrufen, trachten nach einem Mittel zu ihrem Herrn (und wetteifern), wer von ihnen (Ihm) am nächsten sei, und hoffen auf Seine Barmherzigkeit und fürchten Seine Strafe.
ref: Those they invoke themselves seek the way to their Lord, (striving) which one of them shall be nearest (to Him); and hope for His grace, and dread His punishment.

result.output: Those who call upon them seek a means of access to their Lord, vying with one another to be closer to Him. They hope for His mercy and fear His punishment.

src: Dein Herr ist wahrlich voll Huld gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten von ihnen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: Verily your Lord is gracious to men, though most men are ungrateful.

result.output: Verily, your Lord is full of grace towards mankind, but most of them are not grateful.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin bleiben sie ewig.
ref: They are the inmates of Hell, where they will abide for ever.

result.output: And these are the companions of fire. Therein they will abide forever.

src: Gewiß, mit denjenigen, die ihre Religion spalteten und zu Lagern geworden sind, hast du nichts gemein.
ref: As for those who have created schisms in their order, and formed different sects, you have no concern with them.

result.output: Surely, you have nothing in common with those who have divided their religion and become separate factions.

src: Für diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurde dann Kleidung aus Feuer gefertigt.
ref: But they who disbelieve will be fitted out with garments of flames.

result.output: For those who practiced disbelief, clothing made of fire was then made.

src: Also werden jene, die gläubig sind und gute Werke tun, in den Gärten der Wonne sein.
ref: Then those who had come to believe and done the right will be in gardens of delight.

result.output: So those who believe and do good works will be in the Gardens of Bliss.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch vieles von dem zu enthüllen, was ihr von der Schrift verborgen habt, und vieles unenthüllt zu lassen. Bereits kam doch zu euch von ALLAH Licht und deutliche Schrift!
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you a lot of the things which you had hidden in the Book, and forgiving a lot of them; indeed towards you has come a light* from Allah, and a clear Book. (* The Holy Prophet is a light from Allah).

result.output: Already Our Messenger came to you and revealed to you many things which you used to hide from the Holy Book and left many things undisclosed. Indeed, there has come to you from Allah a light and a clear Book.

src: Und dem Zeugen und dem, was bezeugt ist!
ref: And the witness and the witnessed,

result.output: And to the witness and what is testified!

src: Und wenn Allah es gewollt hätte, hätte Er euch in Bedrängnis gebracht. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allmächtig, Allweise.
ref: And had Allah so willed, He could have harassed you; verily Allah is Mighty, Wise.

result.output: And had Allah willed, He could have put you in distress. Surely Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.

src: Eine Rechtleitung und Barmherzigkeit für die Rechtschaffenen,
ref: And a guidance and grace for those who do good,

result.output: Guidance and mercy for the righteous,

src: Und sprich zu den gläubigen Frauen, daß sie ihre Blicke zu Boden schlagen und ihre Keuschheit wahren und ihren Schmuck nicht zur Schau tragen sollen - bis auf das, was davon sichtbar sein darf, und daß sie ihren Schal um ihre Kleidungsausschnitte schlagen und ihren Schmuck vor niemand (anderem) enthüllen sollen als vor ihren Gatten oder Vätern oder den Vätern ihrer Gatten oder ihren Söhnen oder den Söhnen ihrer Gatten oder ihren Brüdern oder den Söhnen ihrer Brüder oder Söhnen ihrer Schwestern oder ihren Frauen oder denen, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, oder solchen von ihren männlichen Dienern, die keinen Geschlechtstrieb mehr haben, und den Kindern, die der Blöße der Frauen keine Beachtung schenken. Und sie sollen ihre Füße nicht so (auf den Boden) stampfen, daß bekannt wird, was sie von ihrem Schmuck verbergen.
ref: And command the Muslim women to keep their gaze low and to protect their chastity, and not to reveal their adornment except what is apparent, and to keep the cover wrapped over their bosoms; and not to reveal their adornment except to their own husbands or fathers or husbands’ fathers, or their sons or their husbands’ sons, or their brothers or their brothers’ sons or sisters’ sons, or women of their religion, or the bondwomen they possess, or male servants provided they do not have manliness, or such children who do not know of women’s nakedness, and not to stamp their feet on the ground in order that their hidden adornment be known; and O Muslims, all of you turn in repentance together towards Allah, in the hope of attaining success.

result.output: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their chastity, and not to reveal their adornment except that which is revealed normally, and to draw their headscarves over their cleavage, and not to display their adornments except to their husbands, or their fathers, or their husbands' fathers, or their sons, or their husbands' sons, or their brothers, or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their womenfolk, or those in their possession, or male attendants lacking vigor, or small children who have no sense of women’s nakedness. And let them not stamp their feet to draw attention to their hidden adornments.

src: Sie empfinden insgeheim Reue, wenn sie die Pein sehen. Und zwischen ihnen wird in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: And they shall conceal remorse when they behold the torment, and the matter will be decreed between them in equity, and they shall not be wronged.

result.output: They secretly feel regret when they see the pain. And justice is decided between them, and they are not wronged.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erdichtet oder das Wahre ableugnet, nachdem es zu ihm gekommen war! Gibt es etwa nicht in Dschahannam eine Bleibe für die Kafir?!
ref: And who is a greater wrong-doer than he who fabricateth a lie against Allah or belieth the truth when it cometh unto him Will there not be in the Hell an abiding-place for the infidels?

result.output: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him! Is there not a place for the Kafir in Jahannam?!,

src: Du warst nicht auf der westlichen Seite', als Wir Musa die Angelegenheit auftrugen, und du warst nicht zugegen.
ref: You were not there on the western side (of Mount Sinai) when We gave the commandments to Moses, nor were you witness (to the event).

result.output: You were not on the western side when We appointed Musa to the matter, and you were not present.,

src: Und werdet ihr nun Muslime werden?!
ref: (And say:) "Will you now submit?"

result.output: And will you now become Muslims?!

src: Bäche werden unter ihnen in den Gärten der Wonne fließen.
ref: At their feet shall flow streams of running water in gardens of delight.

result.output: Streams will flow beneath them in the gardens of delight.

src: Und ihr pflegtet euch nicht so zu verdecken, daß nicht euer Gehör, eure Augen und eure Häute Zeugnis wegen euch ablegten. Aber ihr meintet, daß Gott nicht viel wisse von dem, was ihr tut.
ref: Not so did you cover yourselves, that your hearing, your eyes and your skins should not bear witness against you; but you thought that God would never know much of the things that you were working.

result.output: And you did not cover yourselves up so well that your hearing, your eyes, and your skins did not testify about you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.

src: Diejenigen von den Leuten des Buches und von den Polytheisten, die nicht glauben, mögen es nicht gern, daß auf euch etwas Gutes von eurem Herrn herabgesandt wird.
ref: Those without faith among the people of the Book, and those who worship idols, do not wish that good should come to you from your Lord.

result.output: Those of the people of the Scripture and the polytheists who disbelieve do not like any good to be sent down to you from your Lord's bounty.

src: Damit beleben Wir eine abgestorbene Ortschaft. Auf diese Weise werdet auch ihr hervorgebracht werden.
ref: Then We revive a dead land therewith, and even so you will be brought forth (from the dead),

result.output: Thus, we revive a dead village. In this way, you will also be brought forth.

src: Hierauf wird eure Rückkehr zu eurem Herrn sein.
ref: No one shall bear another's burden.

result.output: Your return will be to your Lord.

src: Jede Gemeinschaft hat einen Gesandten. Wenn nun ihr Gesandter kommt, wird zwischen ihnen in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und es wird ihnen kein Unrecht zugefügt.
ref: For every people there is an apostle; and when their apostle is come the matter is decided between them equitably, and no one is wronged.

result.output: Every community has a messenger. So, when their messenger comes, it will be judged between them with justice, and they will not be wronged.

src: Und ihm dann die Herzader durchschnitten,
ref: Then cut off his aorta,

result.output: And then they cut his heart vein

src: Sie waren beide in der Höhle, und er sagte zu seinem Gefährten: «Sei nicht traurig. Gott ist mit uns.»
ref: When both of them were in the cave, he said to his companion: "Do not grieve, for God is with us."

result.output: They were both in the cave and he said to his companion: 'Do not be sad. God is with us.'

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: And Allah will never give respite to any soul when its promise arrives; and Allah is Aware of your deeds.

result.output: However, God will not postpone any soul when its time comes. And Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Dann sagte ich: "Bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung! Gewiß, ER ist immer allvergebend,
ref: “I therefore told them, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord; He is indeed Most Forgiving.’

result.output: Then I said, Ask your LORD for forgiveness! Certainly, HE is always forgiving.

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt. Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.

result.output: : But Allah has saved you. Surely, He knows the secrets of the hearts.

src: Und gedenke deines Herrn in deinem Herzen in Demut und Furcht, ohne laut vernehmbare Worte am Morgen und am Abend; und sei nicht einer der Unachtsamen.
ref: Meditate on your Lord inwardly with humility and trepidation, reciting His Book softly, morning and evening, and be not negligent.

result.output: And remember your Lord in your heart with humility and awe, without loud words in the morning and evening; and do not be one of the heedless.

src: Und von wo du auch herkommst, wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der heiligen Moschee.
ref: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque.

result.output: And from wherever you come, turn your face towards the Holy Mosque.

src: Darin sollen sie verweilen auf ewig und immerdar.
ref: He has prepared for them Gardens under which rivers flow (Paradise), to dwell therein forever.

result.output: There they shall abide forever and ever.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht machte, damit ihr euch darin ausruht, sowie den Tag hell. Gewiß, ALLAH hat bestimmt den Menschen Gunst erwiesen. Doch die meisten Menschen erweisen sich nicht dankbar.
ref: It is Allah Who created night for you so that you may gain rest in it, and the day giving sight; indeed Allah is Most Munificent towards mankind, but most people do not give thanks.

result.output: ALLAH is the One who made the night for you to rest in it, and the day bright. Indeed, Allah has bestowed favor upon the people. But most of the people are not grateful.

src: Gleich wohlverwahrten Perlen.
ref: Like pearls within their shells,

result.output: Equally well-preserved pearls.

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist.
ref: The secrets of the hearts of these people are well known to God.

result.output: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts.

src: Darin erfaßt sie keine Mühsal, und sie werden nicht daraus vertrieben.
ref: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.

result.output: Therein they shall not experience fatigue, nor shall they be driven therefrom.

src: Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: He is all-forgiving and all-merciful.

result.output: He is indeed the Most Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Und sag: "Ich hoffe, daß mein HERR mich zu einer besseren Führung als dieses rechtleitet.
ref: Say, "I hope that my Lord will provide me better guidance."

result.output: And say: "I hope that my Lord will guide me to a better guidance than this one."

src: Allah aber verspricht euch Vergebung von Sich aus und Huld. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: But God promises His pardon and grace, for God is bounteous and all-knowing.

result.output: But Allah promises you forgiveness from Himself and bounty. Allah is All-Encompassing and All-Knowing.

src: Als Lebensunterhalt für die Diener. Und Wir haben damit abgestorbene Ortschaften wieder belebt. So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: As sustenance for the bondmen; and with it We revived a dead city; this is how you will be raised.

result.output: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have revived dead villages with it. This is also how the emergence occurs.

src: Was gibt es denn anstelle der Wahrheit außer dem Irregehen?!
ref: What then is there after the truth but error?

result.output: What is there instead of truth other than deception?!

src: Und verfertige das Schiff vor Unseren Augen und nach Unserer Eingebung. Und sprich Mich nicht an zugunsten derer, die Unrecht getan haben; sie werden ertränkt werden."
ref: “And build the ship in front of Us, and by Our command, and do not speak to Me regarding the unjust; they will surely be drowned.”

result.output: And build the ship before Our eyes and according to Our inspiration. And do not address Me favorably on behalf of those who have done wrong; they will be drowned.

src: Diejenigen aber, die sie an seiner Stelle anrufen, entscheiden ohne jede Grundlage.
ref: But those they call apart from Him can not adjudge in the least.

result.output: However, those who call them in his place make decisions without any basis.

src: Da sagte er zu seinem Gefährten, während er mit ihm einen Wortwechsel führte: "Ich habe mehr Besitz als du und auch eine mächtigere Schar."
ref: Arguing one day with his friend he said: "I have more wealth than you and more powerful kinsmen."

result.output: He said to his companion while exchanging words with him: 'I have more possessions than you and also a more powerful squad.'

src: Aber Allah hebt auf, was der Satan dazwischenwirft. Hierauf legt Allah Seine Zeichen eindeutig fest.
ref: But God nullifies what Satan interjects, and God affirms His revelations.

result.output: But Allah raises up what Satan puts between them. Then Allah clearly sets His signs.

src: Er sagte: "O mein Volk, was meint ihr, wenn ich mich auf einen klaren Beweis von meinem Herrn stütze und Er mir eine Barmherzigkeit von Sich hat zukommen lassen, die aber eurem Blick entzogen wurde, sollen wir sie euch da aufzwingen, wo sie euch zuwider ist?
ref: He said: "O my people, think. If I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has bestowed on me His grace, though unknown to you, can we force it upon you when you are averse?

result.output: He said, O my people, what do you think if I rely on clear proof from my Lord and He has bestowed upon me a mercy from Himself, but it has been made unapparent to you, should we then compel it upon you while you are averse to it?.

src: Er sagte: "Allah bewahre mich davor, einer der Unwissenden zu sein."
ref: And he said: "God forbid that I be of the ignorant."

result.output: He said, "God forbid that I should be one of the ignorant."

src: Ich bin doch nur ein Ermahner und ein Überbringer froher Botschaft für Leute, die den Iman verinnerlichen."
ref: I am only a bearer of warnings and bringer of happy news for those who believe."

result.output: But I am only a reminder and a bearer of good news for people who internalize the Imam.

src: damit er weiß, ob sie wohl die Botschaften ihres Herrn ausgerichtet haben, und daß Er das, was bei ihnen ist, umfaßt, und Er die Zahl von allem erfaßt'.
ref: So that He may know if they have delivered their Lord's messages. He comprehends all that has been given them, and keeps count of everything.

result.output: so that he knows whether they have indeed conveyed the messages of their Lord and that He encompasses whatever is with them and gives full account of all things.

src: Sag: "Mein HERR weiß besser Bescheid über denjenigen, der mit der Rechtleitung kam, und über denjenigen, der in einem klaren Fehlgehen ist.
ref: Say: "My Lord knows who has come to guidance, and who is clearly in error."

result.output: Say: My LORD knows better about the one who came with guidance, and about the one who is in clear error.

src: Und rezitiere das, was dir als Wahy von der Schrift deines HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord.

result.output: And recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Erklärt nicht für haram die Tay-yibat dessen, was ALLAH euch für halal erklärte, und übertretet nicht! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt nicht die Übertretenden.
ref: O believers, forbid not such good things as God has permitted you; and transgress not; God loves not transgressors.

result.output: O you who have internalized faith! Do not declare as forbidden the good things that Allah has made lawful for you, and do not transgress. Indeed, Allah does not like transgressors.

src: (Alles) Lob gehört Allah, dem Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde, Der die Engel zu Gesandten gemacht hat mit Flügeln, (je) zwei, drei und vier! Er fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was Er will. Gewiß, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: All praise is to Allah, the Maker of the heavens and the earth, Who assigns angels as messengers – who have pairs of two, three, four wings; He increases in creation whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.

result.output: (All) praise belongs to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who has made the angels messengers with wings, (in) pairs, triples and quadruples! He adds to creation what He wills. Indeed, Allah has power over all things.

src: Allein nur diejenigen lassen sich warnen, die verständig sind.
ref: Only they think who are wise."

result.output: Only those who are sensible can be warned.

src: Aber die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
ref: Verily, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the mankind believe not.

result.output: But most people do not believe.

src: Aber es glaubten Musa nur junge Leute aus seinem Volk, trotz ihrer Furcht vor Fir'aun und ihrer führenden Schar, davor, daß er sie verfolgen würde.
ref: But none believed in Moses except some children of his people, for fear that Pharaoh and his chiefs would persecute them.

result.output: But only young people from his people believed in Musa, despite their fear of Fir'aun and his leading group, that he would persecute them.

src: Darum gewähre nun den Ungläubigen Aufschub, ein klein wenig Aufschub.
ref: So bear with unbelievers with patience, and give them respite for a while.

result.output: Therefore grant the unbelievers a little respite, a small respite.

src: Und du wirst im Verfahren Gottes keine Veränderung finden.
ref: And you will not find any change in the Way of Allah.

result.output: And you will find no change in the process of God.

src: Gewiß, WIR ließen dir Wahy zuteil werden, wie WIR Wahy Nuh und den Propheten nach ihm zuteil werden ließen. Ebenso ließen WIRWahy zuteil werden Ibrahim, Isma'il, Ishaq, Ya'qub, den Stämmen Israils, 'Isa, Ayyub, Yunus, Harun und Sulaiman. Auch ließen WIR Dawud Zabur zukommen.
ref: We have sent revelations to you as We sent revelations to Noah and the prophets (who came) after him; and We sent revelations to Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac and Jacob, and their offspring, and to Jesus and Job, and to Jonah and Aaron and Solomon, and to David We gave the Book of Psalms,

result.output: Surely, WE have bestowed upon you revelation just as WE had bestowed upon Noah and the prophets after him. And WE had bestowed revelation upon Abraham, Ismail, Isaac, Jacob, the descendants of Jacob, Jesus, Job, Jonah, Aaron, and Solomon. And to David WE gave the Psalms.

src: Und wenn ihnen eine Angelegenheit zu (Ohren) kommt, die Sicherheit oder Furcht betrifft, machen sie es bekannt. Wenn sie es jedoch vor den Gesandten und den Befehlshabern unter ihnen brächten, würden es wahrlich diejenigen unter ihnen wissen, die es herausfinden können.
ref: When there comes to them a matter, be it of security or fear, they broadcast it; if they had referred it to the Messenger and to those in authority among them, those of them whose task it is to investigate would have known the matter.

result.output: And when they hear a matter concerning security or fear, they spread it around. If they had referred it to the Messenger and to those in authority among them, then those who can investigate and find out for certain would know about it.

src: ER wird denjenigen, die Schlechtes taten, doch das vergelten, was sie taten, und ER wird denjenigen, die Ihsan taten, mit dem Besseren vergelten.
ref: He will repay those who do evil according to their deeds, and recompense those who do good with the best.

result.output: He will repay those who did something bad with what they did, and He will repay those who did Ihsan with something better.

src: (Erwähne) den Tag, an dem ALLAH die Gesandten versammelt, dann sagt: "Welche Antwort wurde euch gegeben?!"
ref: The day God will gather the apostles and ask: "What answer was made to you?"

result.output: Erwähne the day when ALLAH gathers the messengers, then says, What answer was given to you?!

src: Und wenn WIR es wollten, gewiß hätten WIR dir sie gezeigt, dann wirst du sie sicher an ihren Merkmalen erkennen. Und du erkennst sie doch an der Andeutung mit dem Gesagten. Und ALLAH kennt eure Handlungen.
ref: And if We will, We can show them to you so that you may recognise them by their faces; and you will surely recognise them by the way they talk; and Allah knows your deeds.

result.output: And if WE wanted, we would have certainly shown them to you, then you would surely recognize them by their marks. And you recognize them by the hint with the spoken. And ALLAH knows your actions.

src: Und beleidigt euch nicht gegenseitig durch Gesten und bewerft euch nicht gegenseitig mit (häßlichen) Beinamen.
ref: Do not slander one another, nor give one another nick-names.

result.output: And do not insult each other through gestures and do not throw (ugly) nicknames at each other.

src: An ihnen habt ihr sonst allerlei Nutzen. Und damit ihr, auf ihnen reitend, etwas, was ihr in eurer Brust hegt und anstrebt, erreichen könnt.
ref: And in them you have other benefits as well, and through them you satisfy your needs.

result.output: You can otherwise benefit from them. And so that, riding on them, you can achieve something that you cherish and strive for in your heart.

src: Auch Derjenige, Der vom Himmel Wasser nach Bestimmung fallen ließ, dann ließen WIR damit eine tote Landschaft erstehen. Solcherart werdet ihr hervorgebracht.
ref: Who sent down water in due measure from the sky, then quickened a region that was dead -- So shall We bring you forth --

result.output: Even the one who made water fall from the sky according to a plan, thereby made a lifeless landscape rise with it. This is how you will be created.

src: ER weiß, was in die Erde hineingeht, was aus ihr herauskommt, und was vom Himmel hinabkommt, und in ihn hinaufsteigt. Und ER ist Der Allgnädige, Der Allvergebende.
ref: He knows all that goes into the earth and all that comes out of it, and all that descends from the skies and all that ascends into it; and only He is the Most Merciful, the Oft Forgiving.

result.output: HE knows what goes into the earth, what comes out of it, what comes down from heaven, and what goes up into it. And HE is The Most Compassionate, The Most Forgiving.

src: Und WIR machten sie zur Rechtleitung für die Kinder Israils.
ref: And We appointed it to be a guidance unto the Children of Is'rail.

result.output: And WE made it a guidance for the Children of Israel.

src: Gibt es denn einen (anderen) Gott neben Gott? Nein, ihr seid ja Leute, die (Gott andere) gleichsetzen.
ref: Nay, but they are a people who assign to Him equals!

result.output: Is there a (different) god beside God? No, you are people who equate (others with God).

src: Und gewiß, von seiner Gefolgschaft ist doch Ibrahim.
ref: And Abraham indeed was of his inducement,

result.output: And certainly, Ibrahim is from his entourage.

src: Geht also in die Häuser durch ihre Türen.
ref: Enter the house through the main gate, and obey God.

result.output: So go into the houses through their doors

src: dir unterliegt von der Angelegenheit nichts - oder ihnen vergibt oder sie peinigt.
ref: It is no concern of yours whether He redeems them or punishes them.

result.output: you are not subject to anything in the matter - either it forgives you or punishes you.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH vergibt die Verfehlungen - allesamt.
ref: Surely God forgives all sins.

result.output: Indeed, ALLAH forgives the transgressions - all of them.

src: Wer das tut, hat keine Gemeinschaft mit Gott, es sei denn, ihr hütet euch wirklich vor ihnen.
ref: Whoever does that has nothing to do with God, unless it is to protect your own selves against them.

result.output: Whoever does that has no fellowship with God unless you really guard against them.

src: Allah gebietet Gerechtigkeit, gütig zu sein und den Verwandten zu geben; Er verbietet das Schändliche, das Verwerfliche und die Gewalttätigkeit.
ref: Verily God has enjoined justice, the doing of good, and the giving of gifts to your relatives; and forbidden indecency, impropriety and oppression.

result.output: Allah commands justice, kindness, and giving to relatives; He forbids shameful, evil, and violent deeds.

src: Und ALLAH ist allwissend über die Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: And Allah is the Knower of he wrong-doers.

result.output: And Allah is all-knowing about those who commit injustice.

src: Sag: Was meint ihr, wenn er doch von Allah stammt und ihr ihn hierauf verleugnet?
ref: Say: "See ye if the (Revelation) is (really) from Allah, and yet do ye reject it?

result.output: Say: What do you mean if he comes from Allah and you deny him?

src: ALLAH hat für sie Dschannat vorbereitet, die von Flüssen durchflossen werden. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben. Dies ist der unermeßliche Gewinn.
ref: Allah has kept ready for them Gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding in it forever; this is the greatest success.

result.output: ALLAH has prepared Jannah (paradise) for them, which will be traversed by rivers. In it, they will remain eternally. This is the immense gain.

src: Als (der Überbringer) zu Salomo kam, sagte (dieser): "Schüttet ihr Reichtümer über mich aus?
ref: So, when the envoys came to Solomon he said: "Do you wish to increase my wealth?

result.output: When (the messenger) came to Solomon, he said: Are you pouring your wealth over me?.

src: Gewiß, ALLAHs Androhung ist wahr. So lasst das diesseitige Leben euch nicht täuschen, und lasst keineswegs das Täuschende euch in ALLAH täuschen!
ref: Surely God's promise is true; so let not the present life delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning God.

result.output: Indeed, Allah's threat is true. So don't let this worldly life deceive you, and don't let the Deceiver deceive you about Allah!

src: Und als ihnen Unsere Ayat verdeutlicht vorgetragen wurden, haben diejenigen, die Unsere Begegnung nicht erhoffen, gesagt: "Bringe einen Quran außer diesem oder forme ihn um!" Sag: "Mir steht es nicht zu, ihn nach meinem Gutdünken umzuformen. Ich folge nur dem, was mir an Wahy zuteil wird! Ich fürchte, sollte ich meinem HERRN widersprechen, die Peinigung eines gewaltigen Tages!"
ref: And when Our clear verses are recited to them, the people who do not expect to meet Us say, “Bring a Qur’an other than this one, or change it”; say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I do not have the right to change it on my own; I only follow what is divinely revealed to me; if I were to disobey my Lord*, then I fear the punishment of the Great Day (of Resurrection). (* Which is impossible.)

result.output: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, Bring us a Qur'an other than this or change it. Say, [O Muhammad], It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day.

src: Und WIR erschufen den Himmel, die Erde und das, was zwischen ihnen ist, doch nicht aus sinnlosem Treiben.
ref: We have not created the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, out of fun.

result.output: And WE created the heaven and the earth and that which is between them not in vain.

src: Wäre nicht zuvor ein Wort von deinem Herrn ergangen, wäre gewiß zwischen ihnen entschieden worden; aber wahrhaftig, sie befinden sich in beunruhigendem Zweifel über ihn (den Quran)
ref: If the Word of your Lord had not preceded it the matter would have been settled between them. They are still in doubt about it and uneasy.

result.output: Had there not been a word from your Lord that preceded it, the matter would have been settled between them. And indeed, they are in disquieting doubt about it (Quran).

src: Als die Zauberer kamen, sagte Mose zu ihnen: «Werft, was ihr werfen wollt.»
ref: So when the magicians arrived, Moses said to them: "Cast whatever (spell) you have to cast."

result.output: When the wizards came, Moses said to them: 'Throw whatever you want to throw.'

src: Hat sie nicht die Kunde von denen erreicht, die vor ihnen waren vom Volke Noahs, von `Ad und Tamud und vom Volke Abrahams und den Bewohnern Madyans und der zusammengestürzten Städte? Ihre Gesandten kamen mit deutlichen Zeichen zu ihnen. Allah also wollte ihnen kein Unrecht tun, doch sie taten sich selber Unrecht.
ref: Has not the news of those before them come to them; of the people of Nuh and Ad and Samood, and the people of Ibrahim and the dwellers of Madyan and the overthrown cities; their apostles came to them with clear arguments; so it was not Allah Who should do them injustice, but they were unjust to themselves.

result.output: Did she not receive the news of those who came before them from among the people of Noah, 'Ad and Thamud and the people of Abraham and the inhabitants of Midian and the overturned cities? Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. Allah would not wrong them, but they used to wrong themselves.

src: Sie haben ja kein Wissen darüber. Sie stellen nur Schätzungen an.
ref: They do not know its truth at all; they only make guesses.

result.output: You have no knowledge about it. You can only make guesses.

src: Mir wird offenbart, daß euer Gott ein Einziger Gott ist; so seid aufrichtig gegen Ihn und bittet Ihn um Vergebung." Und wehe den Götzendienern
ref: To me it has been revealed that your God is One God; so go straight with Him, and ask for His forgiveness; and woe to the idolaters

result.output: I am revealed that your God is One God; so be sincere towards Him and ask Him for forgiveness. And woe to the idolaters.

src: Er warf die Tafeln hin und ergriff seinen Bruder beim Kopf, indem er ihn an sich zog.
ref: And he cast aside the tablets, and pulled his brother by the hair.

result.output: He threw down the tablets and grabbed his brother by the head, pulling him towards himself.

src: Allahs Gesandter sagte zu ihnen: "(Achtet auf) Allahs Kamelstute und ihre Trinkzeit."
ref: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God's she-camel, let her drink."

result.output: Allah's messenger said to them: (Pay attention to) Allah's she-camel and its drinking time.

src: Und so haben Wir euch zu einer Gemeinschaft der Mitte gemacht, damit ihr Zeugen über die (anderen) Menschen seiet und damit der Gesandte über euch Zeuge sei. Wir hatten die Gebetsrichtung, die du einhieltest, nur bestimmt, um zu wissen, wer dem Gesandten folgt und wer sich auf den Fersen umkehrt.
ref: Thus, have We made of you an Ummat justly balanced, that ye might be witnesses over the nations, and the Messenger a witness over yourselves; and We appointed the Qibla to which thou wast used, only to test those who followed the Messenger from those who would turn on their heels (From the Faith).

result.output: Thus, We have made you a just community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you. And We did not make the qiblah which you used to face except that We might make evident who would follow the Messenger from who would turn back on his heels.

src: Nein! Vielmehr sind sie lebendig; aber ihr nehmt es nicht wahr.
ref: In fact, they are alive but you do not perceive that life.

result.output: No! Rather, they are alive; but you do not perceive it.

src: Sag: Jeder handelt nach seiner Weise.
ref: Say, “Each does according to his disposition.

result.output: Say: Everyone acts in their own way.

src: Und des Abraham, der (seine Pflichten) erfüllte?
ref: And of Abraham who fulfilled his trust? --

result.output: Und what about Abraham who fulfilled (his obligations)?

src: Gewiß, diejenigen, denen ihr anstelle von ALLAH dient, haben für euch kein Rizq, so strebt das Rizq bei ALLAH an, dient Ihm und erweist euch Ihm gegenüber dankbar!
ref: Surely those you worship other than God have no power over your means of livelihood. So seek your sustenance from God, and worship Him and give Him thanks.

result.output: Assuredly, those whom you worship instead of Allah shall not provide you with sustenance. Seek, then, sustenance from Allah, and worship Him, and be grateful to Him: for it is to Him that you shall be brought back.

src: Doch wahrlich, er (Jesus) ist ein Vorzeichen der Stunde. So bezweifelt sie nicht, sondern folgt Mir. Das ist ein gerader Weg.
ref: And indeed Eisa is a sign* of the Last Day, therefore do not ever doubt in the Last Day, and obey Me**; this is the Straight Path. (* The advent of Prophet Eisa to earth for the second time. ** By obeying the Noble Messenger.)

result.output: But truly, he (Jesus) is a sign of the Hour. So do not doubt it, but follow Me. This is a straight path.

src: (Es gibt) keine Zuflucht.
ref: There is no refuge!

result.output: There's no refuge.

src: Darin sind wahrlich Zeichen für die Betrachtenden.
ref: Herein are really signs for those who discern.

result.output: There are truly signs in it for those who contemplate.

src: Die Frau Fir'auns sagte: "(Er wird) für mich und dich ein Grund zur Freude sein. Tötet ihn nicht. Vielleicht nützt er uns oder wir nehmen ihn als Kind an." Dabei merkten sie nicht (, was sie taten).
ref: And the wife of Fir'awn said: a comfort unto me and thee slay him not; belike he shall be of benefit to us or we might like him for a son; and they perceived not.

result.output: The wife of Pharaoh said, '(He will) be a source of joy for me and you. Do not kill him. Maybe he will benefit us or we will take him as a child.' They didn't realize what they were doing.

src: An ihnen habt ihr sonst allerlei Nutzen.
ref: You may also obtain other benefits from them.

result.output: You usually have all sorts of benefits from them.

src: Und Wir gaben ihm solche Schätze, daß deren Schlüssel wahrlich eine schwere Last für eine (ganze) Schar kräftiger Männer gewesen wären.
ref: We had given him treasures, so many that a team of wrestlers could hardly lift their keys.

result.output: And We gave him such treasures that the keys to them would have been a burden for a group of strong men.

src: Ihr sollt Gott allein dienen. Ich fürchte für euch die Pein eines schmerzvollen Tages.»
ref: Do not worship anyone but God; for I fear the punishment of a dreadful day for you."

result.output: You should serve God alone. I fear for you the torment of a painful day.

src: Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben und zu ihren Brüdern sagten, als diese sich auf Handelsreisen oder Feldzügen befanden: "Wären sie bei uns geblieben, wären sie weder gestorben, noch getötet worden." (Sagt es nicht), damit ALLAH dies als Bitterkeit (nur) in ihren Herzen bleiben läßt.
ref: Be not like those who disbelieve (hypocrites) and who say to their brethren when they travel through the earth or go out to fight: "If they had stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed," so that Allah may make it a cause of regret in their hearts.

result.output: Be not like those who committed Kufr and said to their brothers when they went abroad or on military expeditions, 'If they had stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed.' (Don't say that) so that Allah may make it a cause of regret in their hearts.

src: Und Er hat euch in der Religion keine Bedrängnis auferlegt; so ist die Glaubensrichtung eures Vaters Abraham. Er hat euch Muslime genannt, früher und (nunmehr) in diesem (Buch), auf daß der Gesandte Zeuge über euch sei und ihr Zeugen über die Menschen seid.
ref: He has chosen you (to convey His Message of Islamic Monotheism to mankind by inviting them to His religion, Islam), and has not laid upon you in religion any hardship, it is the religion of your father Ibrahim (Abraham) (Islamic Monotheism).

result.output: And He has not laid upon you in religion any hardship; [it is] the faith of your father Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people.

src: Sag: Wollt ihr denn Allah kundtun, was Er nicht kennt, weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde? Preis sei Ihm!
ref: You inform Allah of something which in His knowledge does not exist in the heavens or in the earth?” Purity and Supremacy are to Him, above their association. (* Some things like the sun, stars, trees are useful but they too are created by Allah.

result.output: Say, 'Do you wish to inform Allah of that which He does not know in the heavens or on the earth?' Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him!

src: Habe Ich euch, ihr Kinder Adams, nicht geboten, nicht Satan zu dienen - denn er ist euer offenkundiger Feind -
ref: Did I not commit you, O children of Adam, not to worship Satan who is your acknowledged foe,

result.output: I have commanded you, the children of Adam, not to serve Satan - for he is your open enemy.

src: Was aber diejenigen angeht, die ungläubig sind, so sagen sie: "Was will denn Allah damit als Gleichnis?" Er läßt damit viele in die Irre gehen und leitet viele damit recht, doch läßt Er damit nur die Frevler in die Irre gehen,
ref: He misleads many thereby, and He guides many thereby; and with it He misleads only those who are rebellious.

result.output: As for those who are unbelievers, they say: What does Allah mean by this parable? He thereby leads many astray and guides many aright. But He misleads only the evildoers thereby.

src: Und als ihm Unsere Ayat vorgetragen wurden, kehrte er den Rücken in Arroganz um, als ob er sie nicht hörte, als ob in seinen Ohren Schwerhörigkeit wäre.
ref: When Our verses are recited before them they turn away haughtily as though they did not hear them, as if a deafness had come into their ears.

result.output: And when Our verses were recited to him, he turned his back in arrogance as if he had not heard them, as if there was deafness in his ears.

src: Tragen werden sie aber nichts von ihren Verfehlungen, denn sie sind fürwahr Lügner.
ref: Surely, they are liars.

result.output: But they will not bear anything from their misdeeds, for they are truly liars.

src: Aber ihr liebt die nicht, die gut raten.»
ref: (The people in the graves can hear the speech of those who are on earth.)

result.output: But you do not love those who give good advice.

src: Bereits war es eine Aya für euch in zwei Gruppierungen, die aufeinander trafen, eine Gruppe kämpfte fi-sabilillah, und eine andere war kufr-betreibend. (Die Mumin) sahen sie augenscheinlich in doppelter Anzahl.
ref: There was a token for you in the two armies which clashed (in the battle of Badr), one fighting for God, the other of unbelievers who saw with their own eyes the faithful to be two times as many as they, for God reinforces with His help whomsoever He will.

result.output: It was already a sign for you when two groups met, one group fought fi-sabilillah, and another was engaged in kufr. (The believers) saw them apparently in double number.

src: Was ist mit euch, daß ihr Allah nicht (in der Ihm gebührenden Weise) ehrt
ref: What has come upon you that you do not fear the majesty of God,

result.output: What's wrong with you that you do not honor Allah (in the way He deserves)

src: Der Satan droht euch Armut an und befiehlt euch Schändliches. Gott verheißt euch Vergebung von seiner Seite und Huld. Gott umfaßt und weiß alles.
ref: The devil scares you of poverty and bids you to the shameful; and Allah promises you forgiveness from Him, and munificence; and Allah is Most Capable, All Knowing.

result.output: Satan threatens you with poverty and commands you to indecency. God promises you forgiveness from His side and grace. God encompasses and knows everything.

src: Beinahe werde ICH sie enthüllen, damit jeder Seele nach ihrem Bestreben vergolten wird.
ref: I keep it secret that every soul may be rewarded for its endeavour.

result.output: Almost I will reveal them, so that every soul will be rewarded according to their aspiration.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Madyan ihren Bruder Shuayb.
ref: Remember, We sent to Midian their brother Shu'aib.

result.output: And (We sent) their brother Shuayb to Madyan.

src: Mache Da"wa zum Weg deines HERRN mit Weisheit und schöner Ermahnung, und disputiere mit ihnen auf die beste Art. Gewiß, dein HERR ist es, der Wissen darüber hat, wer von Seinem Weg abgekommen ist.
ref: Call them unto the way of thy Lord with Wisdom and goodly exhortation, and argue with them with that which is best. Verily thy Lord!

result.output: Make Da'wah to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good advice, and argue with them in the best way. Surely, your Lord knows best who has drifted away from His way.

src: Und da gibt es bei ihnen Werke, die anders sind als diese, und die sie vollbringen.
ref: Moreover, there are other deeds besides this which they do.

result.output: And there are works among them that are different from these and which they accomplish.

src: Weiß er denn nicht?
ref: So does he not know?

result.output: Doesn't he know?

src: Und Wir haben einige der Propheten vor den anderen bevorzugt. Und Wir haben David eine Schrift zukommen lassen.
ref: We exalted some of the prophets over the others; and to David We gave the Book of Psalms.

result.output: And We have preferred some of the prophets over others. And We gave David a scripture.

src: Und wenn eine jede Seele, die Unrecht begangen hat, alles besäße, was auf Erden ist, würde sie versuchen, sich damit (von der Strafe) loszukaufen. Und sie werden Reue empfinden, wenn sie sehen, wie die Strafe (über sie) kommt.
ref: Even if every soul that has sinned possessed whatever is on the earth, it would surely offer it to ransom itself, and feel repentant on seeing the punishment.

result.output: And if every soul that has committed injustice had everything that is on earth, it would seek to ransom itself with it. And they will feel remorse when they see the punishment (falling) upon them.

src: Würden sie doch, wenn sie euch besiegten, weder Bindungen noch Verpflichtungen euch gegenüber einhalten! Sie würden euch mit dem Munde gefällig sein, indes ihre Herzen sich weigerten; und die meisten von ihnen sind Frevler.
ref: If they get the better of you, they will not observe towards you any bond or treaty, giving you satisfaction with their mouths but in their hearts refusing; and the most of them are ungodly.

result.output: If they were to defeat you, they would not observe any ties or obligations towards you! They would please you with their mouths, while their hearts refused [compliance], and most of them are iniquitous.

src: (Sie sind) verflucht. Wo immer sie (im Kampf) angetroffen werden, werden sie ergriffen und allesamt getötet.
ref: Accursed, they would be seized wherever found, and slain mercilessly.

result.output: Cursed. Wherever they are encountered in battle, they are seized and all killed.

src: Und es hielt Uns nichts zurück, Gesandte mit den Ayat zu entsenden, außer daß die Früheren sie als Lüge erklärten. Und WIR ließen Thamud das Kamelweibchen als Erläuterung zuteil werden, so begingen sie mit ihm Unrecht.
ref: Naught prevented Us from sending the signs but that the ancients cried lies to them; and We brought Thamood the She-camel visible, but they did her wrong.

result.output: And nothing held us back from sending messengers with the verses, except that those who came before denied them as lies. And we made the she-camel a clear sign for Thamud, but they wronged her.

src: Vielmehr hat Allah ihn zu Sich erhoben. Allah ist Allmächtig und Allweise.
ref: Allah took him up to Himself; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.

result.output: Rather, Allah has raised him to Himself. Allah is Almighty and All-Wise.

src: (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los.
ref: We led them astray, as we were astray ourselves. We declare our innocence (from them) before You.

result.output: We say goodbye to each other in front of you.

src: Nicht Wir taten ihnen Unrecht, sondern sie taten sich selber Unrecht an; und ihre Götter, die sie statt Allah anriefen, nützten ihnen überhaupt nichts, als der Befehl deines Herrn eintraf; sie stürzten sie nur noch mehr ins Verderben.
ref: We did not wrong them; they wronged themselves. When your Lord's chastisement descended upon them, their gods, on whom they called apart from God, were not of the least avail, and all they did was only to add to their destruction.

result.output: It was not us who wronged them, but they wronged themselves. And their gods, whom they invoked instead of Allah, did not benefit them at all when the command of your Lord came; they only increased their ruin.

src: Wahrlich, Allah hat Macht über alle Dinge.
ref: Indeed God has power over everything.

result.output: Truly, Allah has power over all things.

src: Und es dann zu grauer Spreu macht.
ref: Then reduces them to rusty rubbish.

result.output: And then turns it into gray chaff.

src: Ihr werdet doch, inscha-allah, Almasdschidil-haram betreten, sicher mit rasierten Häuptern oder mit kurzgeschnittenen (Haaren).
ref: If Allah so wills you shall certainly enter the Inviolable Mosque, in full security, you will shave your heads and cut your hair short, and do so without any fear.

result.output: Inscha-allah, you will enter Almasdschidil-haram, certainly with shaved heads or with short-cut hair.

src: Diese werden freigesprochen von dem, was man (über sie) redet.
ref: Those are acquitted of what they say.

result.output: They are acquitted of what is being said about them.

src: Und wenn das Wort über sie fällig wird, bringen Wir ihnen ein Tier aus der Erde hervor, das zu ihnen spricht; (dies), weil die Menschen von Unseren Zeichen nicht überzeugt sind.
ref: When the sentence will have been passed against them, We shall bring forth beastly brutes from the earth who will torment them, for men certainly do not believe Our signs.

result.output: And when the word falls upon them, We will bring forth for them a creature from the earth speaking to them, (saying) that mankind had no faith in Our signs.

src: Und ich bin nicht Diener Dessen, was ihr gedient habt,
ref: Nor will I worship what you worship,

result.output: And I am not a servant of what you have served

src: ALLAH hat für sie Dschannat vorbereitet, die von Flüssen durchflossen werden.
ref: Allah has prepared for them Gardens beneath which rivers flow.

result.output: Allah has prepared Paradise for them, which are flowing with rivers.,

src: Bei dem Morgen
ref: I CALL TO witness the early hours of morning,

result.output: At the morning.

src: Aber die Antwort seines Volkes war nur, daß sie sagten: "Tötet ihn oder verbrennt ihn." Da rettete Allah ihn aus dem Feuer.
ref: The people (of Abraham) had no answer except: "Kill him or burn him;" but God saved him from the fire.

result.output: But the answer of his people was only that they said: Kill him or burn him. Then Allah saved him from the fire.

src: Und ein Zauberer soll keinen Erfolg haben, woher er auch kommen mag."
ref: That which they have made is only a magician's trick, and the magician will never be successful, no matter whatever amount (of skill) he may attain."

result.output: And a wizard shall have no success, wherever he may come from.

src: Vortreffliche, die (alles) aufschreiben,
ref: Illustrious scribes

result.output: Excellent ones who write down (everything)

src: Er sagte: "Es (die Schätze) wurde mir nur um des Wissens willen, das ich besitze, gegeben."
ref: He said: "This has come to me through my own acumen."

result.output: He said: It (the treasures) was given to me only for the sake of the knowledge that I possess.

src: Das Verschieben (eines Haram-Monats) ist eine Steigerung von Kufr. Damit werden diejenigen irregeleitet, die Kufr betrieben haben. Sie erklären ihn in einem Jahr für einen Nicht-Haram-Monat und in einem anderen Jahr für einen Haram-Monat, um der Anzahl der von ALLAH festgelegten Haram-Monate zu entsprechen und dann für halal zu erklären, was ALLAH für haram erklärte. Ihnen wurde das Schlechte ihrer Handlungen als schön dargeboten. ALLAH leitet die Kafir-Leute nicht recht.
ref: Their postponing of the months is nothing but furtherance in disbelief – the disbelievers are misled by it – they decree it lawful in one year and regard it forbidden in another year, in order to equate to the number of the months which Allah has made sacred, and to make lawful what Allah has forbidden; their evil deeds seem good in their sight; and Allah does not guide the disbelievers.

result.output: The postponing (of a Haram month) is an increase of Kufr. Those who commit Kufr are misguided by it. They declare it to be a non-Haram month in one year and a Haram month in another year in order to correspond to the number of Haram months set by ALLAH, and then declare as halal what ALLAH declared as haram. The evil of their actions has been made beautiful to them. ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving people aright.

src: Er sprach: "O mein Volk, (ihr) seht nicht ein, daß ich einen klaren Beweis von meinem Herrn habe; und Er hat mir Seine Barmherzigkeit gewährt, die euch aber verborgen geblieben ist.
ref: He said: "O my people! Tell me, if I have a clear proof from my Lord, and a Mercy (Prophethood, etc.) has come to me from Him, but that (Mercy) has been obscured from your sight.

result.output: He spoke: \Oh my people, you do not realize that I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has granted me His mercy, which has remained hidden from you.\,

src: Gewiß, WIR entsandten dich mit der Wahrheit als Überbringer froher Botschaft und als Warner.
ref: We have sent you with the truth, to give glad tidings and to warn.

result.output: Certainly, WE sent you with the truth as a herald of good tidings and as a warner.

src: Selbst wenn ich zu meinem Herrn zurückgebracht werde, so werde ich ganz gewiß einen besseren Aufenthalt als diesen finden."
ref: And even if I am returned to my Lord, I will find something better than this in return.”

result.output: Even if I am returned to my Lord, I will certainly find a better place to stay than this.

src: Und Allahs ist, was in den Himmeln und was auf der Erde ist; Er verzeiht, wem Er will, und straft, wen Er will, und Allah ist Allverzeihend und Barmherzig.
ref: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth: He may pardon whom He please and punish whom He will. Yet God is forgiving and kind.

result.output: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Dabei hatten sie sich vorher Gott gegenüber verpflichtet, sie würden nicht den Rücken kehren. Über die Verpflichtung Gott gegenüber wird Rechenschaft gefordert.
ref: Whereas earlier they had made a promise to God that they would never turn their backs; and a promise made to God is answerable.

result.output: They had previously pledged to God that they would not turn their backs. Accountability is demanded for the obligation to God.,

src: Bereits haben sie doch Musa um Größeres als dieses gebeten, sie sagten: "Zeige uns ALLAH offenkundig!" Dann erschlug sie der Blitz wegen ihrer Übertretung, dann nahmen sie sich das Kalb (als Götzen), nachdem zu ihnen die deutlichen Zeichen gekommen waren, dann haben WIR ihnen dies vergeben und ließen Musa einen eindeutigen Beweis zuteil werden.
ref: Of Moses they asked greater than that, they said to him: 'Show us Allah openly' And a thunderbolt took them for their evil doing. Then they took to themselves the calf, after the clear proofs had come to them, yet We forgave that and We gave Moses clear authority.

result.output: They have already asked Musa (Moses) for something greater than this, they said: Show us ALLAH (God) clearly! Then the lightning struck them because of their transgression, then they took the calf (as an idol), after the clear signs came to them, then WE forgave them for this and let Musa be shown a clear proof.

src: Und so erweckten Wir sie auf, damit sie sich gegenseitig fragten.
ref: Even so We roused them that they may question one another.

result.output: And so We awakened them, so that they could ask each other.

src: Was ist Al-Haqqa?
ref: What is the concrete reality?

result.output: What is Al-Haqqa?

src: ER sagte: "In Kürze werden sie es doch noch bereuen."
ref: Answered (the Lord): "They shall wake up repenting soon."

result.output: He said, Soon they will regret it after all.

src: Und wenn ein Teil von euch an das glauben sollte, womit ich gesandt worden bin, ein anderer Teil aber nicht glauben sollte, so geduldet euch, bis Allah zwischen uns richtet. Er ist der Beste derer, die richten."
ref: If some of you believe what has been sent through me, and some of you do not, have patience until God decide between us, for He is the best of all judges."

result.output: And if a part of you should believe in what I have been sent with, and another part should not believe, then be patient until Allah judges between us. He is the Best of Judges.

src: Verkündet ihr mir daß ich auferstehen soll, obwohl schon vor mir Geschlechter dahingegangen sind?" und (der ihnen, wenn) sie beide Allah zu Hilfe rufen (und zu ihm sagen): "Wehe dir, glaube!
ref: You promise me that I will be raised again whereas generations have passed away before me?” And they both seek Allah’s help and say to him, “May you be ruined, accept faith!

result.output: Do you announce to me that I should rise again, whereas already before me many generations have passed away? And when they both, she and her husband, cry for help to Allah, he will say, ‘I am there for you, a Repeller of Evil, helping out’.

src: Es gibt für den Blinden keinen Grund zur Bedrängnis, es gibt für den Hinkenden keinen Grund zur Bedrängnis, es gibt für den Kranken keinen Grund zur Bedrängnis, sowie auch für euch nicht, in euren (eigenen) Häusern zu essen oder in den Häusern eurer Väter, den Häusern eurer Mütter, den Häusern eurer Brüder, den Häusern eurer Schwestern, den Häusern eurer Onkel väterlicherseits, den Häusern eurer Tanten väterlicherseits, den Häusern eurer Onkel mütterlicherseits, den Häusern eurer Tanten mütterlicherseits, (in einem Haus,) dessen Schlüssel ihr besitzt, oder (im Haus) eures Freundes.
ref: No restriction is there upon the blind, nor is there the restriction upon a lame, nor is there a restriction upon the sick. nor upon yourselves that ye eat in your houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your fathers brothers or the houses of your fathers sisters or the houses of your mothers brothers or the houses of your mothers sisters or from that house where of ye own the keys or from the house of a friend.

result.output: There is no reason for the blind to be distressed, there is no reason for the lame to be distressed, there is no reason for the sick to be distressed, nor for you to eat in your (own) houses, or in the houses of your fathers, the houses of your mothers, the houses of your brothers, the houses of your sisters, the houses of your paternal uncles, the houses of your paternal aunts, the houses of your maternal uncles, the houses of your maternal aunts, (in a house) whose key you possess, or (in the house) of your friend.

src: Gewiß, WIR sandten dir die Schrift für die Menschen der Wahrheit gemäß hinab. Wer also Rechtleitung findet, (tut es allein) für sich selbst, und wer irregeht, (tut es ausschließlich) gegen sich selbst. Und du bist über sie kein Wakil.
ref: We have indeed sent down this Book to you with the truth, in order to guide mankind; so whoever attains guidance has attained it is for his own good, and whoever strays, has strayed for his own harm; and you are not at all responsible for them.

result.output: Verily, We have sent down the Scripture unto thee (Muhammad) with the truth for mankind. So whosoever goeth right it is for his soul, and whosoever strayeth, strayeth only to its hurt. And thou art not a warder over them.

src: Doch wenn sie sich abkehren, so wisse, daß Allah sie für einen Teil ihrer Sünden treffen will. Viele von den Menschen sind fürwahr Frevler.
ref: If they turn away, then know that God is sure to punish them for some of their sins; and many of them are transgressors.

result.output: But if they turn away, know that Allah wants to punish them for a part of their sins. Truly, many of the people are wrongdoers.

src: Darin lag wahrhaftig eine schwere Prüfung von eurem HERRN!
ref: In this was a great trial from your Lord."

result.output: Verily, therein lay a great trial from your Lord!

src: Dein Herr ist schnell im Bestrafen, und Er ist voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: Indeed your Lord's retribution is swift, yet He is forgiving and kind.

result.output: Your Lord is quick to punish, and He is full of forgiveness and mercy.

src: Hätte es doch aus den Generationen vor euch manche gegeben, die einsichtig waren, welche Verderben auf Erden verboten! Ausgenommen davon sind die Wenigen aus denen, die WIR erretteten.
ref: If only there had been men endued with virtue in the ages before you, who could preserve men from doing evil in the world, other than the few We saved from among them.

result.output: If only there had been some of the generations before you who had insight and who had forbade corruption on earth! Except for the few we saved, they are an exception.

src: Und Allah gehört die Herrschaft der Himmel und der Erde und dessen, was dazwischen ist, und zu Ihm ist der Ausgang.
ref: For to God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and of the earth, and all that is between them; to Him is the homecoming.

result.output: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, and to Him is the [final] destination.

src: Wenn sie es aber aus der Nähe sehen, dann werden die Gesichter derer, die ungläubig sind, schlimm betroffen. Und es wird gesprochen: «Das ist das, was ihr herbeizurufen suchtet.»
ref: So when they will see it close, the faces of the disbelievers will become ghastly, and it will be declared, “This is what you were demanding.”

result.output: If they see it up close, then the faces of those who are unbelievers will be badly affected. And it will be said: 'This is what you sought to bring about.'

src: Und gewiß, bereits schickten WIR vor dir Gesandte zu ihren Leuten, dann kamen sie zu ihnen mit den klaren Zeichen, dann übten WIR Vergeltung an denjenigen, die schwere Verfehlungen begingen.
ref: Verily We sent many apostles before you to their people, who brought clear signs with them. Then We retributed those who were sinful.

result.output: And surely, We sent messengers before you to their people, and they brought them clear evidences. Then We took retribution from those who committed crimes, and it was incumbent upon Us to support the believers.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, erdichten Lügen gegen Gott, und die meisten von ihnen haben keinen Verstand.
ref: The unbelievers fabricate lies of God, for many of them are devoid of sense.

result.output: But those who disbelieve invent lies against Allah, and most of them have no understanding.

src: Er (Moses) sagte: " Er ist euer Herr und der Herr eurer Vorväter."
ref: (Moses continued): "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers before you."

result.output: He (Moses) said: He is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers.

src: Sag: "Sterbt mit eurer Wut."
ref: Say: "Die of your rage.

result.output: Say, 'Die with your anger.'

src: Doch ihr seid selten dankbar.
ref: Little thanks you give.

result.output: But you are seldom grateful.

src: Es hielt auf dem Djudi an. Und es wurde gesprochen: «Weg mit den Leuten, die Unrecht tun!»
ref: The ark came to rest on Judi (Mount Ararat), and it was said: "Away with the cursed people!"

result.output: It stopped at the Djudi. And it was said: "Away with the people who do wrong!"

src: Dazu hat Er sie erschaffen. Und so erfüllt sich das Wort deines Herrn: "Ich werde die Hölle ganz gewiß mit den Ginn und den Menschen allesamt füllen."
ref: To that end He created them, and perfectly is fulfilled the word of thy Lord: 'I shall assuredly fill Gehenna with jinn and men all together.'

result.output: To this He has created her. And thus is fulfilled the word of your Lord: I will surely fill Hell with jinn and mankind all together.

src: Die Sonne und der Mond (laufen) nach Berechnung.
ref: The sun and moon revolve to a computation;

result.output: The sun and the moon (run) according to calculation.

src: Und wer (dies) nicht aufbringen kann, fastet an zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Monaten als Reue vor ALLAH.
ref: Then whosoever findeth not the wherewithal, on him is the fasting for two months in succession: a penance from Allah.

result.output: And whoever cannot do this, then he should fast for two consecutive months as atonement before Allah.

src: Und Wir ließen die Kinder Israels das Meer überqueren.
ref: And We led the Children of Isra'il across the sea.

result.output: And we let the children of Israel cross the sea.

src: Allah weiß, daß ihr an sie denken werdet.
ref: God knows that you will be thinking about them.

result.output: Allah knows that you will think of them.

src: Darin werden sie auf ewig weilen.
ref: They will abide in them for ever.

result.output: They will dwell there forever.

src: Unzweifelhaft kennt Allah, was sie verbergen und was sie kundtun. Wahrlich, Er liebt die Hochmütigen nicht.
ref: Certainly Allah knows what they hide and what they disclose; indeed He does not like the proud.

result.output: Undoubtedly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal. Indeed, He does not love the haughty ones.

src: Meint ihr etwa, ihr würdet verlassen sein, wo Allah doch noch nicht jene von euch gezeichnet hat, die (in Seiner Sache) kämpfen und sich keinen zum Vertrauten nehmen außer Allah und Seinen Gesandten und die Gläubigen?
ref: Do you think you will get away before God knows who among you fought and did not take anyone but God, His Apostle and the faithful, as their friends?

result.output: Do you think that you would be abandoned when Allah has not yet singled out among you those who strive in His cause and do not take anyone as an intimate friend except Allah and His Messenger and the believers?

src: Als das Land dann trotz seiner Weite ihnen eng erschien, ihre Seelen unter Beklemmung litten und sie wußten, daß es keine Zuflucht vor ALLAH gibt außer (der reuigen Umkehr) zu Ihm, dann verhalf ER ihnen zur Reue, damit sie bereuen.
ref: Then, when the earth, as vast as it is, closed in on them, and their very souls closed in on them, and they realized that there was no refuge from God, except in Him, He redeemed them, so that they may repent.

result.output: When the country then seemed narrow to them despite its vastness, their souls suffered from discomfort, and they knew that there was no refuge from Allah except to repent to Him, then HE helped them to repent so that they may repent.

src: ER gewährt Weisheit, wem ER will.
ref: He gives wisdom to whomever He wills.

result.output: He grants wisdom to whom He wills.

src: Die Entscheidung liegt nur bei Allah. Er legt die Wahrheit dar, und Er ist der beste Richter."
ref: He relates the truth, and He is the Best of deciders.'

result.output: The decision lies only with Allah. He reveals the truth, and He is the best judge.

src: Das ist eine Erinnerung für die, die (Gottes) gedenken.
ref: This is a reminder for those who are observant.

result.output: This is a reminder for those who remember (God)

src: Also erbärmlich ist die Bleibe der Arroganten."
ref: How grievous a destination for the haughty!

result.output: So miserable is the dwelling of the arrogant.

src: Und Wir ließen einen Regen auf sie niedergehen; wie böse war der Regen für diejenigen, die gewarnt worden waren!
ref: And rained on them a shower (of Stones). How terrible was the rain (that fell) on those who had been warned!

result.output: And We caused rain to descend upon them; how evil was the rain of those who had been warned!

src: Keineswegs! Beim Mond
ref: I say the truth, and call the moon to witness,

result.output: Not at all! By the moon.

src: Hast du nicht gesehen, daß Allah Wasser vom Himmel herniedersendet?
ref: Have you not seen that it is Allah Who causes the water to descend from the sky?

result.output: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from the sky?

src: Dann verbarg er Furcht vor ihnen. Sie sagten: "Fürchte dich nicht!"
ref: (When they did not eat), He conceived a fear of them.

result.output: Then he concealed fear of them. They said, 'Do not be afraid!'

src: Nennt sie nach ihren Vätern; das ist gerechter vor Allah.
ref: Call them by the names of their fathers. This is the right course in the sight of God.

result.output: Call them by [the names of] their fathers; it is more just in the sight of Allah.

src: Ich habe ihnen nichts gesagt außer dem, womit DU mich beauftragt hast: Dient ALLAH, meinem HERRN und eurem HERRN. Und ich war Zeuge über sie, solange ich unter ihnen weilte.
ref: I only said to them what Thou didst command me: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord."

result.output: I did not tell them anything except what YOU entrusted me with: Serve ALLAH, my Lord and your Lord. And I was a witness over them as long as I lived among them.

src: Auch wenn ein Koran käme, mit dem die Berge versetzt oder die Erde zerstückelt oder zu den Toten gesprochen werden könnte... Nein, bei der ganzen Angelegenheit hat Gott allein zu entscheiden. Wissen denn diejenigen, die glauben, nicht, daß Gott, wenn Er wollte, die Menschen alle rechtleiten würde? Diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, wird immer eine Katastrophe treffen für das, was sie gemacht haben, oder sie wird in der Nähe ihrer Wohnstätten niedergehen, bis das Versprechen Gottes eintrifft. Und Gott bricht das Versprechen nicht.
ref: And were such a Qur’an to come that would cause the mountains to move, or the earth to split asunder, or the dead to speak, even then these disbelievers would not believe; in fact, all matters are only at Allah’s discretion; so have not the Muslims despaired in that, had Allah willed, He would have guided all mankind? Disasters shall continue to strike the disbelievers on account of their deeds, or descend near their homes until Allah’s promise comes; indeed Allah does not break the promise.

result.output: Even if a Quran came with which the mountains could be moved or the earth could be split or the dead could be spoken to... No, in this matter, God alone decides. Do those who believe not know that if God wanted to, He could guide all people? Those who are unbelievers will always be hit by a disaster for what they have done, or it will fall near their homes until God's promise is fulfilled. And God does not break the promise.

src: Und (eines Tages) trat er in die Stadt, ohne von ihren Einwohnern bemerkt zu werden, dann fand er zwei Männer, die gegeneinander kämpften, dieser gehörte seiner Partei an und jener war von seinen Feinden, dann bat ihn derjenige, der seiner Partei angehörte, um Hilfe gegen denjenigen, der von seinen Feinden war, dann schlug Musa mit der Faust auf ihn, dann tötete er ihn. Er sagte: "Dies ist vom Werk des Satans, gewiß, er ist ein verleitender, entschiedener Feind."
ref: And he entered the city when its inhabitants were sleeping unaware in the afternoon – he therefore found two men fighting; one was from Moosa’s group, and the other from among his enemies; so the one who was of Moosa’s group pleaded to Moosa for help against him who was of his enemies – therefore Moosa punched him thereby finishing him; he said, “This act was from the devil*; indeed he is an open enemy, a misleader.” (* The act of oppressing the man from Bani Israel).

result.output: And (one day) he entered the city unnoticed by its inhabitants, then he found two men fighting against each other, one belonging to his party and the other from his adversaries, then the one who belonged to his party asked him for help against the one who was from his enemies, then Musa punched him and killed him. He said, 'This is from the work of Satan, indeed he is a misguiding, determined enemy.'

src: Da wurden ihre Herzen versiegelt, so daß sie nicht begreifen.
ref: So their hearts were sealed; and now they do not understand.

result.output: There their hearts were sealed so that they do not understand.

src: Dies sind Allahs Zeichen, die Wir dir der Wahrheit entsprechend verlesen. Und du bist wahrlich einer der Gesandten.
ref: These are the messages of God. We recite them to you in all truth, as indeed you are one of the apostles.

result.output: These are the signs of Allah which We recite to you in truth. And, indeed, you are among the messengers.

src: Und keiner ist unter euch, der nicht daran vorbeikommen wird das ist eine von deinem Herrn beschlossene Fügung.
ref: There is not one among you who will not reach it. Your Lord has made this incumbent on Himself.

result.output: And there is none of you who will not pass over it; this is with your Lord a decree which is already ordained.

src: Viele von den Besitzern des Buches möchten euch, nachdem ihr gläubig geworden seid, gern wieder zu Ungläubigen machen, aus Neid in ihren Seelen, nachdem ihnen die Wahrheit klar gemacht wurde. Doch vergebt und seid nachsichtig, bis Allah Seine Entscheidung ergehen läßt. Wahrlich, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: Many among People given the Book(s) wished to turn you to disbelief after you had accepted faith; out of hearts’ envy, after the truth has become very clear to them; so leave them and be tolerant, until Allah brings His command; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.

result.output: Many of the owners of the book would like to turn you back into unbelievers after you have become believers, out of envy in their souls, after the truth has been made clear to them. But forgive and be patient, until Allah passes His judgement. Truly, Allah has power over all things.

src: Dir steht es nicht zu, dich darin hochmütig zu verhalten.
ref: You have no right to be insolent here.

result.output: It is not up to you to behave arrogantly about it.

src: Und das Herz der Mutter Musas wurde leer.
ref: The mother of Moses was perturbed in the morning.

result.output: And the heart of Mother Musa became empty.

src: (Es ist) der durchbohrend helle Stem.
ref: It is the star that shines with a piercing brightness --

result.output: The piercingly bright Stamen.

src: Sie beide unterstanden zwei rechtschaffenen (Dienern) von Unseren Dienern, doch handelten sie verräterisch an ihnen, und so haben ihnen diese vor Allah nichts genützt.
ref: They were under two of Our righteous servants, but they betrayed them.

result.output: Both of them were under two righteous servants of Our servants, but they acted treacherously towards them, and so they were of no avail to them before Allah.

src: Und die den Tag des Gerichtes für wahr halten,
ref: And those who believe in the Day of Judgement,

result.output: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment as true

src: Habt ihr betrachtet, was euch an Sperma entfließt?
ref: Just consider (the semen) that you emit,

result.output: Have you considered what flows from you as semen?

src: Gewiß, bereits erwies ALLAH den Mumin Gutes, als ER ihnen einen Gesandten schickte, der zu ihnen gehört, der ihnen Seine Ayat vorträgt, sie läutert und ihnen die Schrift und die Weisheit lehrt.
ref: Allah has indeed bestowed a great favour upon the Muslims, in that He sent to them a Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) from among them, who recites to them His verses, and purifies them, and teaches them the Book and wisdom; and before it, they were definitely in open error.

result.output: Certainly, Allah has already done good to the believers when He sent them a Messenger from themselves, who recites to them His verses, purifies them, and teaches them the Book and wisdom.

src: Wo geht ihr denn hin?
ref: So whither do you stray?

result.output: Where are you going?

src: Fügt sie sich, so stiftet in Ge rechtigkeit Frieden zwischen ihnen und seid gerecht. Wahrlich, Allah liebt die Gerechten.
ref: And if it does revert, make peace between them with justice, and be equitable for Allah loves the equitable.

result.output: If they submit themselves, then make peace between them with justice and be fair. Truly, Allah loves the just.

src: So ist die Pein. Doch die Pein des Jenseits ist größer, wenn sie es nur wüßten!
ref: Such is Our chastisement; and the punishment of the Hereafter will be greater, if only they knew!

result.output: Thus is the pain. However, the pain of the afterlife is greater, if only they knew!

src: Gewiß, im Aufeinanderfolgen von Nacht und Tag und was ALLAH in den Himmeln und der Erde erschaffen hat, gibt es sicherlich Ayat für Menschen, die Taqwa gemäß handeln.
ref: In the alternation of night and day, and all that He has created in the heavens and the earth, are certainly signs for people who fear God.

result.output: Certainly, in the succession of night and day and in what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth, there are surely signs for people who act according to Taqwa.

src: Unser HERR umfaßt alles mit Wissen.
ref: Our Lord embraces all things in His knowledge.

result.output: Our LORD encompasses everything with knowledge.

src: Dieser ist Der Allwissende über das Verborgene und das Sichtbare, Der Allwürdige, Der Allgnädige.
ref: Such is (He) the knower of the unknown and the known, the mighty and the merciful,

result.output: He is The All-Knowing of the hidden and the visible, The Most Worthy, The Most Merciful.

src: Das ist etwas von dem, was mich mein Herr gelehrt hat.
ref: This knowledge is one of the things my Lord has taught me.

result.output: That is something my Lord taught me.

src: Gewiß, WIR umhüllten ihre Herzen doch mit Bedeckung, damit sie ihn (den Quran) nicht begreifen, und machten ihre Ohren schwerhörig. Selbst dann, wenn du sie zur Rechtleitung einladen würdest, werden sie nie einer Rechtleitung folgen.
ref: Verily We have placed a covering on their hearts so that they do not understand, and a deafness in their ears so that however you may call them to guidance they will never be guided aright.

result.output: Certainly, WE have enveloped their hearts with coverings, lest they should understand it (the Quran), and made their ears heavy. Even if you were to invite them to guidance, they would never follow guidance.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, ich bin dein Bruder. So sei nicht bekümmert wegen dessen, was sie getan haben."
ref: He said, "I am your brother, so do not feel distressed about whatever they have been doing."

result.output: He said, Certainly, I am your brother. So do not worry about what they have done.

src: (WIR offenbarten dir) wie WIR (den Gesandten) derjenigen Einteilenden hinabsandten,
ref: Like (those) We had sent to those schismatics who slandered their Books

result.output: We revealed to you how We sent down the Messenger to those who divide,

src: Immer wieder, wenn ihre Häute gargekocht sein werden, werden WIR sie ihnen gegen andere Häute austauschen, damit sie die Peinigung (richtig) erfahren.
ref: We shall burn them in Fire. As often as their skins are roasted through, We shall change them for other skins that they may taste the punishment.

result.output: Again and again, when their skins are boiled, we will exchange them for other skins so that they can experience the torment (correctly).

src: Erhebe dich und warne
ref: Arise and warn,

result.output: Rise and warn

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allwissend, allkundig.
