ref: Surely God knows and is cognisant.

result.output: Certainly, ALLAH is omniscient and all-knowing.

src: Allah ist mit den Standhaften."
ref: God is with those who are patient (and persevere)."

result.output: Allah is with the steadfast.

src: Aber nein! Wenn ihr es sicher wüßtet!
ref: And yet if you knew with positive knowledge

result.output: But no! If only you knew for sure!

src: Und sie fragen dich nach den Felsenbergen, dann sag: "Mein HERR wird sie in (kleinste) Teilchen zerkleinern.
ref: They will ask you about the mountains. Tell them: "My Lord will uproot them from the base,

result.output: And if they ask you about the rocky mountains, then say, "My Lord will crumble them into (small) pieces."

src: Und diejenigen von euch, die abberufen werden und Gattinnen hinterlassen - so sollen diese (mit sich) selbst vier Monate und zehn (Tage) abwarten. Wenn sie dann ihre festgesetzte Zeit erreicht haben, so ist für euch keine Sünde in dem, was sie in rechtlicher Weise mit sich selbst unternehmen. Allah ist dessen, was ihr tut, Kundig.
ref: Wives of men who die among you should wait (after their husbands death) for four months and ten days; and when the term is over there is no sin if they do what they like with themselves honourably, for God is aware of all that you do.

result.output: And those of you who are called to die and leave wives behind - they shall wait four months and ten (days) for themselves. Then, when their prescribed time is fulfilled, there shall be no blame upon you for what they do with themselves in a reasonable manner. Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Behaltet sie aber nicht aus Schadenslust, um Übertretungen zu begehen. Wer dies tut, der hat sich selbst Unrecht getan.
ref: It is transgression to retain them merely for harassment; and whoever' does that indeed wrongs his own self.

result.output: But do not keep them out of malice, to commit transgressions. Anyone who does this has done wrong to himself.

src: Und diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sagen: "Würde ihm doch eine Aya von seinem HERRN hinabgesandt!" Sag: "Gewiß ALLAH läßt abirren, wen ER will, und leitet zu Sich denjenigen recht, der sich reumütig besinnt.
ref: And those who disbelieve say: 'Why has no sign been sent down to him by his Lord' Say: 'Allah leads astray whom He will, and guides those who repent,

result.output: And those who commit disbelief say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] in repentance."

src: Als er sie nun mit ihrem Bedarf ausgestattet hatte, sagte er: "Bringt mir einen (Halb)bruder von euch väterlicherseits. Seht ihr denn nicht, daß ich volles Maß gebe und daß ich der beste Obdachgeber bin?
ref: And when he provided them with their provisions he said, “Bring your step-brother to me; do you not see that I measure in full and that I am the best host?”

result.output: After he had equipped her with her needs, he said: "Bring me a (half)brother of yours from your father's side. Don't you see that I am giving you full measure and that I am the best provider of shelter?"

src: Schlecht ist, was sie erkaufen.
ref: Vile is that wherewith they have bartered.

result.output: Bad is what they buy.

src: Was für eine erfreuliche Belohnung nach dem Diesseits!"
ref: How excellent the recompense of Paradise!

result.output: What a delightful reward after this life!

src: Und sie sagen: "Der Allerbarmer hat Sich Kinder genommen." Preis sei Ihm!
ref: And they said, “The Most Gracious has chosen a son – Purity is to Him!

result.output: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken for Himself a son." Exalted is He!

src: Meidet darum den Greuel der Götzen und meidet das Wort der Lüge.
ref: Avoid the repugnance of idols, and false and frivolous talk.

result.output: Therefore, avoid the abomination of idols and avoid the word of lies.

src: Und weshalb speist ihr nicht von dem, worauf ALLAHs Name (beim Schächten) erwähnt wurde, nachdem ER euch deutlich das vorgetragen hat, was ER euch für haram erklärte - außer dem, wozu ihr gezwungen werdet?!
ref: And why should you not eat of that over which the name of God has been pronounced, when He has made it distinctly clear what is forbidden, unless you are constrained to do so.

result.output: And why do you not eat of that upon which Allah's name has been mentioned, when He has explained in detail to you what He has forbidden you, excepting that to which you are compelled. And indeed do many lead [others] astray through their [own] inclinations without knowledge. Indeed, your Lord - He is most knowing of the transgressors.

src: Sag: "Egal ob ihr das, was ihr in euren Brüsten tragt, verheimlicht oder offenbart, ALLAH weiß darüber Bescheid, und ER weiß, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist. Und ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal whatsoever is in your hearts it is all known to God, as is known to Him all that is in the heavens and the earth; and God has the power over all things."

result.output: Say, "Whether you conceal what you have in your breasts or reveal it, Allah knows it, and He knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And Allah is over all things competent."

src: Esset von dem, was Allah euch gegeben hat und folgt nicht die Fußstapfen des Satans.
ref: Eat of what Allah has provided for you, and follow not the footsteps of Shaitan (Satan).

result.output: Eat of what Allah has provided for you and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.

src: Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: If you are suffering, they are also suffering like you, but you expect from Allah what they do not expect, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.

result.output: When you suffer, they suffer as you suffer; but you hope for from God what they do not hope for. God is aware and wise.

src: Und sollte ER dir Gutes bestimmen, so kann niemand Seine Gunst abwenden.
ref: And if He wants good for you, none can repel His grace.

result.output: And if HE determines good things for you, no one can turn away His favor.

src: Sie befragen dich über Berauschendes und Glücksspiel. Sprich: "In beiden liegt großes Übel und Nutzen für die Menschen.
ref: They ask you about drinking and gambling.

result.output: They are asking you about intoxicants and gambling. Say: Both carry great harm and benefit for people.

src: über den Sieg von ALLAH. ER verhilft zum Sieg, wem ER will.
ref: He helps whomever He wants.

result.output: About the victory of ALLAH. HE grants victory to whomever HE wills.

src: Sie sagten: "Halte ihn mit seinem Bruder hin, und schicke in die Städte Boten,
ref: They said: "Put him and his brother off (awhile) and send out heralds to the cities

result.output: They said, Keep him busy with his brother, and send messengers to the cities.

src: Du meinst, sie bilden eine Einheit, aber ihre Herzen sind geteilt. Dies, weil sie Leute sind, die keinen Verstand haben.
ref: Their valour is great, among themselves; you think of them as a host; but their hearts are scattered; that is because they are a people who have no sense.

result.output: You think they are a unity, but their hearts are divided. This is because they are people who have no understanding.

src: Am Tag, da Wir mit der größten Gewalt zupacken werden, gewiß, da werden Wir Vergeltung üben.
ref: The day that We shall seize them with a grievous hold, We will indeed castigate them.

result.output: On the day when we will seize with the greatest force, yes, then we will take revenge.

src: Und ihr seid die Überlegenen!
ref: You shall prevail.

result.output: And you are the superior ones!

src: Frag die Kinder Israels, wie viele deutliche Zeichen Wir ihnen zukommen ließen. Wenn aber einer die Gnade Gottes eintauscht, nachdem sie zu ihm gekommen ist, so verhängt Gott eine harte Strafe.
ref: Ask the Descendants of Israel how many clear signs We gave them; and whoever alters Allah’s favour which came to him, then indeed Allah’s punishment is severe.

result.output: Ask the children of Israel how many clear signs we have given them. But if one exchanges the grace of God after it has come to him, then God imposes a harsh punishment.

src: Gewiß, WIR sind es, Der belebt und sterben läßt, und zu Uns ist das Werden,
ref: We are the one who give life and death, and to Us will be the destination.

result.output: Surely, it is WE who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

src: Da schmetterte ihr Herr sie für ihre Sünde nieder, und so ebnete Er über ihnen die Erde ein.
ref: So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.

result.output: Then her lord struck her down for her sin, and thus He leveled the earth over them.

src: Da brachen aus ihm zwölf Quellen hervor, so daß jede Menschengruppe wußte, wo ihre Trinkstelle war. - «Eßt und trinkt von dem, was Gott beschert hat, und verbreitet nicht Unheil auf der Erde.»
ref: 'Eat and drink of God's providing, and mischief not in the earth, doing corruption.'

result.output: From him broke forth twelve springs, so that each group of people knew where their watering place was. "Eat and drink from what God has provided, and do not spread mischief on the earth."

src: Und wenn du sie fragst, wer Wasser vom Himmel herabkommen läßt und die Erde damit nach ihrem Absterben belebt, sagen sie bestimmt: «Gott.» Sprich: Lob sei Gott!
ref: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah."

result.output: And if you ask them who makes water come down from the sky and thereby revives the earth after its death, they will definitely say: 'God'. Say: Praise be to God!

src: Und übereile dich nicht mit dem Koran, bevor er dir zu Ende offenbart worden ist.
ref: And be not in haste (O Muhammad SAW) with the Quran before its revelation is completed to you, and say: "My Lord!

result.output: And do not hasten with the Qur'an before it has been revealed to you completely.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH wird die Nifaq- und die Kufr-Betreibenden in Dschahannam versammeln, allesamt.
ref: Indeed God will put the hypocrites and infidels together in Hell.

result.output: Surely, Allah will gather the hypocrites and the disbelievers in Jahannam (Hell), all of them.

src: Wenn Gott für mich Schaden will, können sie denn seinen Schaden beheben?
ref: If God willed any harm for me, can they lift His harm?

result.output: If God wants to harm me, can they fix his damage?

src: Nein, es ist schlechter für sie. Am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen das, womit sie gegeizt haben, als Halskette umgelegt werden.
ref: In fact, it is worse; for what they grudged will be hung around their necks on the Day of Resurrection.

result.output: No, it is worse for them. On the Day of Resurrection, what they have been stingy with will be hung around their necks as a necklace.

src: Und ihr werdet befragt werden.
ref: You will surely be questioned about it.

result.output: And you will be questioned.

src: Unser Herr umfaßt alle Dinge in seinem Wissen. Auf Gott vertrauen wir.
ref: For our Lord has embraced everything with knowledge, and in Allah we have put our trust.

result.output: Our Lord encompasses all things in his knowledge. We trust in God.

src: Und führe ihnen als Gleichnis zwei Männer an.
ref: Tell them the parable of two men.

result.output: And set before them an example of two men.

src: Diese sind wie die An'am, nein, sondern sie sind noch abirrender! Diese sind die wirklichen Achtlosen.
ref: They are people unconcerned.

result.output: These are like the An'am, no, but they are even more misguided! These are the real heedless ones.

src: "Mein Söhnchen! Sollte es sich auch nur um das Gewicht eines Senfkorns handeln, das sich in einem Stein, in den Himmeln oder auf Erden befinden sollte, ALLAH bringt sie.
ref: "O my son, whatsoever it may be, even though equal to a mustard seed in weight, or within a rock or in the sky or in the earth, God will bring it forth.

result.output: My dear son! Even if it were the weight of a mustard seed, whether it be in a rock or in the heavens or on the earth, Allah will bring it forth.

src: Sie werden aber (seiner) nicht gedenken, außer daß Allah es will.
ref: And what advice will they heed, except if Allah wills?

result.output: But they will not remember him except (that) Allah wills.

src: Und WIR haben dir die Schrift mit der Wahrheit hinabgesandt als Bestätigung dessen, was ihr von der Schrift voranging, und als Hüter über sie.
ref: And to you We have revealed the Book containing the truth, confirming the earlier revelations, and preserving them (from change and corruption).

result.output: And WE have sent down to you the Book with truth, confirming what was before it of the Scripture and as a guardian over it.

src: Und sollten sie dem Salam zugeneigt sein, dann sei ihm ebenfalls zugeneigt und übe ALLAH gegenüber Tawakkul!
ref: But if they incline to peace, you also incline to it, and (put your) trust in Allah.

result.output: And if you should be inclined towards Salam, then also be inclined to him and exercise Tawakkul towards ALLAH!

src: Und erzähle von der Gnade deines Herrn.
ref: And keep recounting the favours of your Lord.

result.output: And speak of the mercy of your Lord.

src: Und jedes Volk hat einen, der es rechtleitet.
ref: You are only a warner, and every people has its guide.

result.output: And every nation has one who guides it.

src: Und Saatfelder und eine treffliche Stätte,
ref: And fields and stately mansions,

result.output: And fields of seeds and an excellent place,,

src: Danach werdet ihr zu eurem Herrn heimkehren; und Er wird euch verkünden, was ihr zu tun pflegtet. Wahrlich, Er weiß wohl, was in den Herzen ist.
ref: You will return to your Lord in the end and He will declare to you what you have done: He knows well what is in the hearts of men.

result.output: Then you will return to your Lord, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He knows well what is in the hearts.

src: Dann ließen Wir Unsere Gesandten ihren Spuren folgen; und Wir ließen (ihnen) Jesus, den Sohn der Maria, folgen, und Wir gaben ihm das Evangelium. Und in die Herzen derer, die ihm folgten, legten Wir Güte und Barmherzigkeit.
ref: Thereafter in their footsteps We caused Our apostles to follow, and We caused lsa, son Of Maryam, to follow them, and We vouchsafed Unto him the Injil, and We placed In the hearts of those who followed him tenderness and mercy.

result.output: Then We made Our messengers follow in their footsteps, and We sent Jesus, son of Mary, afterwards, and bestowed upon him the Gospel, and We ordained compassion and mercy in the hearts of those who followed him.

src: Gewiß, Pharao erhob sich in Arroganz im Lande und machte dessen Bewohner zu Parteien.
ref: Pharaoh exalted himself in the land, and divided its people into factions.

result.output: Surely, Pharaoh arose in arrogance in the land and made its inhabitants into factions.

src: - Am Tag, da die Erde, sie freilassend, sich ihnen aufspalten wird und sie eilig (hervorkommen).
ref: The day the earth will split asunder they will come out hurriedly.

result.output: On the day when the earth will split open for them, letting them rush out quickly.

src: Dann tut Er ihnen am Tag der Auferstehung kund, was sie getan haben.
ref: And on the Day of Judgement He will announce their deeds to them.

result.output: Then on the Day of Resurrection, He will declare to them what they have done.

src: Er (Zakariyya) sagte: "Mein Herr, setze mir ein Zeichen." Er sagte: "Dein Zeichen ist, daß du drei Tage lang nicht zu den Menschen sprechen wirst außer durch Gebärden. Und gedenke deines Herrn häufig und preise (Ihn) am Abend und am frühen Morgen!"
ref: He said: 'Lord, appoint for me a sign' He said: 'Your sign is that you shall not speak to people except by signs for three days' And remember your Lord abundantly, exalt Him in the evening and at the dawn'

result.output: He (Zakariya) said, “My Lord, give me a sign.” He said, “Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three consecutive days except by gestures. And remember your Lord often and exalt [Him] in the evening and in the early morning.”

src: Und Salomo (machten Wir) den Wind (dienstbar), der in seinem Auftrage in das Land blies, das Wir gesegnet hatten.
ref: We made tempestuous winds obedient to Solomon which blew swiftly to sail at his bidding (with his ships) to the land We had blessed.

result.output: And We made the wind subservient to Solomon, which blew forcefully according to his command to the land which We had blessed.

src: Meine Macht hat mich verlassen."
ref: Vanished has my power from me."

result.output: My power has left me.

src: Und subhanallah, Der HERR aller Schöpfung.
ref: Praised be God, the Lord of all the worlds.

result.output: And Subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.

src: Dann sagten WIR: "Adam!
ref: Then We said: "O Adam!

result.output: Then WE said: Adam!.

src: Sag: "ALLAH leitet die Erschaffung ein, dann wiederholt ER sie!"
ref: Say: "It is God alone who first creates and then reverts it.

result.output: Say, "ALLAH initiates creation, and then He repeats it!"

src: Und in die Herzen derer, die ihm folgten, legten Wir Güte und Barmherzigkeit.
ref: And We set in the hearts of those who followed him tenderness and mercy.

result.output: And in the hearts of those who followed him, we placed kindness and mercy.

src: Und (mir wurde befohlen): "Richte dein Antlitz auf die einzig wahre Religion, und sei nicht einer der Götzendiener.
ref: And to set my face toward the way, as one upright, and not be one of those who associate others with God.

result.output: And (I was commanded): "Direct your face to the only true religion and do not be one of the idolaters."

src: Mose sagte zu ihm: «Darf ich dir folgen, auf daß du mich von dem lehrst, was du über den rechten Weg belehrt worden bist?»
ref: Moses said to him: "May I attend upon you that you may instruct me in the knowledge you have been taught of the right way?"

result.output: Moses said to him, “May I follow you, so that you may teach me some of the guidance that has been imparted to you?”

src: Dann haben Wir das Zeichen der Nacht ausgelöscht und das Zeichen des Tages hell gemacht, damit ihr nach Huld von eurem Herrn trachtet und damit ihr die Zahl der Jahre und die (Zeit)rechnung wißt. Und alles haben Wir ganz ausführlich dargelegt.
ref: Then We make dark the portent of the night, and We make the portent of the day sight-giving, that ye may seek bounty from your Lord, and that ye may know the computation of the years, and the reckoning; and everything have We expounded with a clear expounding.

result.output: Then We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day illuminating, so that you may seek bounty from your Lord, and may know the count of years and the calculation [of time]. And everything We have explained in detail.

src: Also Niedergang ist für diejenigen, die Unrecht begingen, bei der Peinigung eines qualvollen Tages bestimmt.
ref: Woe alas to the sinners for the torment of the grievous Day!

result.output: Likewise downfall is determined for those who committed injustice, in the torment of a painful day.,

src: Hat er Brüder, so steht seiner Mutter ein Sechstel zu. (Dies gilt) nach Berücksichtigung eines Testamentes, das er etwa gemacht hat, oder einer (bestehenden) Schuld. - Eure Väter und eure Söhne: Ihr wißt nicht, wer von ihnen euch im Nutzen nähersteht. - (Dies ist) eine Pflicht von seiten Gottes.
ref: Your fathers and your sons -- you know not which out of them is nearer in profit to you.

result.output: If he has brothers, his mother is entitled to one-sixth. This applies after considering a will he may have made or an existing debt. Your fathers and your sons: you do not know which of them is closer to you in benefit. This is an obligation from God's side.

src: Dachten die Menschen etwa, daß sie in Ruhe gelassen werden, zu sagen: "Wir verinnerlichten den Iman", ohne daß sie einer Fitna unterzogen werden?!
ref: Do men think they will get away by saying: "We believe," and will not be tried?

result.output: Did people really think they could say "We internalized the imam" without being subjected to a Fitna?

src: O die ihr glaubt, entweiht nicht die Kultzeichen Allahs, noch den Schutzmonat, noch die Opfertiere, noch die Halsgehänge, noch die, die das geschützte Haus aufsuchen, indem sie nach Huld von ihrem Herrn trachten und nach Wohlgefallen. - Wenn ihr den Weihezustand abgelegt habt, dann dürft ihr jagen. - Und der Haß, den ihr gegen (bestimmte) Leute hegt, weil sie euch von der geschützten Gebetsstätte abgehalten haben, soll euch ja nicht dazu bringen zu übertreten.
ref: O you who believe, do not violate the (sanctity of) offerings to God, nor the rites of the holy month, nor sacrificial cattle with garlands (that are brought to the Ka'bah), nor of the people who flock to the Holy House seeking the bounties of their Lord, and His pleasure. Hunt when you have laid aside the robe of the pilgrim.

result.output: O you who believe! do not violate the signs appointed by Allah nor the sacred month, nor interfere with the offerings, nor the sacrificial animals with garlands nor those going to the sacred house seeking the grace and pleasure of their Lord. But when you are free from the sacred restrictions and obligations, then you may hunt. And let not the hatred of some people in (once) stopping you from going to the Sacred Mosque lead you to transgression.

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Und Gott genügt als der, der Bescheid weiß.
ref: This is a favour from God; and sufficient is God, the all-knowing.

result.output: That is the grace of God. And God is sufficient as the One who knows best.

src: Sag: "Sollen wir euch eine Mitteilung über die Erfolglosesten beim Handeln machen?!"
ref: Say: "Shall I tell you whose labour will be wasted?

result.output: Say: 'Should we give you a report about the most unsuccessful ones in trading?!'

src: Doch ALLAH leitet recht, wen ER will.
ref: Allah guides whom He will.

result.output: But Allah guides aright whom He wills.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH bleibt nichts verborgen, weder auf Erden noch im Himmel.
ref: There is nothing in the earth and the heavens that is hidden from God.

result.output: Certainly, Allah does not keep anything hidden, neither on Earth nor in Heaven.

src: Euch werden weder eure Verwandten noch eure Kinder nützen. Am Tag der Auferstehung richtet ALLAH unter euch. Und ALLAH ist dessen, was ihr tut, allsehend.
ref: Neither your relations nor your offspring will in the least benefit you, on the Day of Resurrection; He will separate you from them; and Allah is seeing your deeds.

result.output: Neither your relatives nor your children will benefit you. On the Day of Resurrection, Allah will judge among you. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

src: Und dein HERR ist Der Allvergebende, mit der Allgnade. Würde ER sie belangen für das, was sie sich erworben haben, hätte ER ihnen die Peinigung beschleunigt. Nein, sondern für sie ist ein Termin bestimmt, vor dem sie keine Zuflucht finden werden.
ref: And your Lord is the Oft Forgiver, the Merciful; if He seized them for their deeds, He would soon send the punishment upon them; but for them is an appointed time from which they will not find any refuge.

result.output: And your Lord is the All-Forgiving, full of Mercy. If He were to impose blame on them for what they have earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. Rather, for them is an appointed time from which they will find no refuge.

src: Aber sie schnitten ihr die Sehnen durch. Da sagte er: "Genießt (euer Leben) in eurer Wohnstätte noch drei Tage lang.
ref: But they hamstrung her, and so He said, “Enjoy yourselves in your homes for three days.

result.output: But they cut her tendons. Then he said: 'Enjoy (your life) in your dwelling for three more days.'

src: Wenn ihr sie anruft, hören sie euer Bittgebet nicht, und wenn sie (es) auch hörten, würden sie euch doch nicht erhören. Und am Tag der Auferstehung verleugnen sie, daß ihr (sie Allah) beigesellt habt. Keiner kann dir kundtun wie Einer, der Kenntnis von allem hat.
ref: If you call them, they do not hear your call; and supposedly if they heard it, they cannot fulfil your needs; and on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your ascribed partnership; and none will inform you like Him Who informs.

result.output: If you call upon them, they do not hear your supplication; and even if they heard, they would not [be able to] respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your association. And none can inform you like [one] Acquainted [with all matters].

src: ER ist Der absolut Autarke!
ref: He is Rich (Free of all wants).

result.output: HE is The absolutely autonomous!

src: O mein Volk, erfleht Vergebung von eurem Herrn, dann bekehrt euch reumütig zu Ihm; Er wird (den Segen) in reichlicher Weise vom Himmel über euch schicken und wird euch Kraft zu eurer Kraft hinzugeben. So wendet euch nicht als Schuldige ab."
ref: “And O my people! Seek forgiveness from your Lord, then incline towards Him in repentance – He will send abundant rain from the sky upon you and will give you much more strength than you have – and do not turn away committing crimes!”

result.output: O my people, ask for forgiveness from your Lord, and then turn to Him in repentance: He will send rain down to you in abundant measure, and will add strength to your strength. Do not turn away from Him in guilt.

src: Und wir erwarten für euch, daß ALLAH euch mit einer Peinigung trifft entweder (direkt) von Sich oder durch uns.
ref: Yet what we are waiting for you is the punishment of God, direct or through us.

result.output: And we expect for you that ALLAH will afflict you with a punishment either directly from Himself or through us.

src: Diejenige, in deren Haus er war, suchte ihn dann gegen seine Neigung zu verführen.
ref: Now the woman in whose house he was solicited him, and closed the doors on them.

result.output: The one in whose house he was, then tried to seduce him against his will.,

src: über diese Welt und das Jenseits. Sie befragen dich über die Waisen.
ref: (Their bearings) on this life and the Hereafter.

result.output: about this world and the afterlife. They are asking you about the orphans.,

src: Ihre Angelegenheit steht (allein) bei Allah. Hierauf wird Er ihnen kundtun, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: Their case rests with God; then He will inform them of what they used to do.

result.output: Your matter is (solely) with Allah. Then He will inform them about what they used to do,

src: Warum verbietest du das, was Allah dir erlaubt hat, um nach der Zufriedenheit deiner Frauen zu trachten?
ref: Why do you ban (for yourself) that which Allah has made lawful to you, seeking to please your wives?

result.output: Why do you forbid what Allah has allowed you to pursue the satisfaction of your wives?

src: (Das sind) diejenigen, die zu ihren Brüdern sagten, während sie daheim blieben: "Hätten sie uns gehorcht, wären sie nicht erschlagen worden."
ref: who said of their brothers (and they themselves held back), 'Had they obeyed us, they would not have been slain.'

result.output: Those are the ones who, while they stayed at home, said to their brothers, 'Had they obeyed us, they would not have been killed.'

src: damit ihr euch auf ihren Rücken/Decks zurechtsetzt, dann euch an die Wohltat eures HERRN erinnert, wenn ihr euch darauf zurechtgesetzt habt, und sagt: "subhanal-ladhi sach-chara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muqrinin
ref: So that when you sit astride of them and think of the bounties of your Lord, you may say: "All glory to Him who subjugated these for us. We were incapable of doing so.

result.output: So that you may sit firm on their backs/decks, then remember the favour of your Lord when you have settled yourselves upon them, and say: Glory be to Him who has subjected these to us, and we could not have attained this by ourselves.

src: ER ließ beide Meere aufeinandertreffen,
ref: He has set two seas in motion that flow side by side together,

result.output: He caused both seas to meet each other,

src: Sind sie dir dann aber ungehorsam, so sprich: "lch bin schuldlos an dem, was ihr tut."
ref: If they do not obey you, tell them: "I am not responsible for what you do."

result.output: But if they are disobedient to you, say: "I am not responsible for what you do."

src: Und (auch) mit denen, die sagen: "Wir sind Christen'" haben Wir ihr Abkommen getroffen. Aber dann vergaßen sie einen Teil von dem, womit sie ermahnt worden waren.
ref: And with those who say 'We are Christians' We took compact; and they have forgotten a portion of that they were reminded of.

result.output: And (also) with those who say: 'We are Christians' we have made their agreement. But then they forgot a part of what they had been reminded of.

src: Und sie können es nicht vereiteln.
ref: They cannot get the better (of Us).

result.output: And they can't foil it.

src: Du bist ja der Steinigung würdig.
ref: [Tafsir At-Tabari]

result.output: You are worthy of stoning

src: Gibt es denn einen (anderen) Gott neben Allah? Nein!
ref: Is there another god with God?

result.output: Is there any (other) god beside Allah? No!

src: "Wurde den Kafir vergolten, was sie zu machen pflegten?"
ref: Will not the infidels pay for what they had done?

result.output: Was the infidel avenged for what they used to do?

src: Sind diese gleich? Preis sei Allah!
ref: Are they equal in comparison?

result.output: Are these the same? Price be upon Allah!

src: Also hinsichtlich derjenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht und gottgefällig Gutes getan haben, diese sind in einem Garten, sie freuen sich.
ref: Those who believed and did the right will be feasted in a rich, well-watered meadow.

result.output: Regarding those who have internalized faith and done good in a way that is pleasing to God, they are in a garden, and they rejoice.,

src: Dann nachdem von ihren Herzen der Schrecken weggenommen worden war, sagten sie: "Was sagte denn euer HERR?" Sie sagten: "Die Wahrheit!"
ref: When terror is lifted from their hearts, they shall say: 'What did your Lord say' 'The truth' they shall answer.

result.output: Then, after the terror was taken away from their hearts, they said, 'What did your Lord say?' They said, 'The truth!'

src: Sag: "Ich bin über euch kein Wakil."
ref: Say: "I am not a warden over you."

result.output: Say, "I am not a Wakil over you."

src: Dann gewiß, sie werden doch in Dschahannam hineingeworfen.
ref: Then they will indeed burn in Hell.

result.output: Then certainly they will be thrown into Jahannam (Hell).

src: Es gibt keinen Platz für euch hier, so kehrt um!"
ref: There is no stand (possible) for you (against the enemy attack!)

result.output: There is no room for you here, so turn around!

src: Sie sagten: "O unser Vater, wir gingen, um einen Wettlauf zu machen, und ließen Yusuf bei unseren Sachen zurück. Da fraß ihn der Wolf.
ref: And said: "We went racing with one another and left Joseph to guard our things when a wolf devoured him.

result.output: They said: Oh our father, we went to race and left Joseph with our things. Then the wolf ate him.

src: Doch wenn eine entscheidende Sura herabgesandt wird und darin von Kampf die Rede ist, dann siehst du die, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, dich mit dem Blick eines (Menschen) anschauen, der im Sterben von Ohnmacht befallen wird; also wehe ihnen!
ref: But when a categorical Surah is revealed that mentions war, you should see those who are sceptical staring at you like a man in the swoon of death. Alas the woe for them!

result.output: But when a decisive Surah is revealed and it speaks of fighting, you see those in whose hearts there is sickness casting a glance at you like the one of someone fainting out of death, so woe to them!

src: Zweifellos sind sie es, die im Jenseits die Verlierenden sein werden.
ref: They will surely be losers in the life to come,

result.output: Undoubtedly, they will be the losers in the afterlife.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der diejenigen von den Schriftbesitzern, die Kufr betrieben haben, von ihren Wohnstätten zur ersten Vertreibung heraustreiben ließ. Ihr dachtet nicht, daß sie herauskommen werden, und sie dachten, daß ihre Burgen sie vor ALLAH schützen würden. Dann kam ALLAH zu ihnen von da, womit sie nicht rechneten, und warf in ihre Herzen den Schrecken. Sie zerstörten ihre Häuser mit ihren eigenen Händen und den Händen der Mumin. So zieht (daraus) eine Lehre, ihr mit Einblick!
ref: It is He Who expelled the disbelievers among the People given the Book(s) from their homes, for their first gathering; you did not expect them to leave, whereas they assumed that their fortresses would save them from Allah, so Allah’s command came to them from a place they had not imagined; and He instilled awe in their hearts, so they ruin their own houses by their own hands and at the hands of the Muslims; therefore learn a lesson, O those who can perceive!

result.output: HE is the One Who drove those among the people of the Scripture who disbelieved out of their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and cast terror into their hearts. They destroyed their homes with their own hands, and the hands of the believers. So take a lesson, O you with insight!

src: Einer Seele wird nicht auferlegt, außer was sie vermag.
ref: No person shall have a burden laid on him greater than he can bear.

result.output: A soul is not burdened with more than it can bear.

src: So handelten (auch) diejenigen, die vor ihnen waren. Obliegt denn den Gesandten etwas anderes als die deutliche Übermittlung (der Botschaft)?
ref: So did those before them; yet is aught for the Messengers, but to deliver the manifest Message?

result.output: Also acted (also) those who were before them. Do messengers have any other responsibility than the clear transmission of the message?

src: Gewiß, die Stunde wird sicher eintreffen. So übe schöne Nachsicht.
ref: Surely the Hour is coming; so pardon thou, with a gracious pardoning.

result.output: Certainly, the hour will surely come. So exercise beautiful patience.

src: Doch sie folgten ihren Neigungen.
ref: And they follow their own desires?

result.output: But they followed their inclinations.

src: Und unter den Menschen gibt es auch manch einen, der sich selbst veräußern würde im Streben nach dem Wohlwollen Gottes.
ref: And of mankind is he who would sell himself, seeking the Pleasure of Allah.

result.output: And among people there are also some who would sell themselves in striving for the favor of God.

src: Bereits ist zu euch doch eine Bestätigung von eurem HERRN gekommen. Und WIR haben euch ein klares Licht hinabgesandt.
ref: Verily, there has come to you a convincing proof (Prophet Muhammad SAW) from your Lord, and We sent down to you a manifest light (this Quran).

result.output: Already a confirmation has come to you from your Lord. And We have sent down to you a clear light.

src: Und wenn ihr zum Gebet ruft, treiben sie damit ihren Spott und Scherz. Dies (ist so), weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: (Nor make friends with) those who, when you call (the faithful) to prayer, make mock of it and jest, because they do not understand.

result.output: And when they are called to prayer, they take it in mockery and jest. That is because they are people who do not understand.

src: Nein, ihre Herzen befinden sich davor in abgründiger Achtlosigkeit.
ref: But their hearts are heedless of this.

result.output: No, their hearts are in profound carelessness beforehand.

src: Dann lege auf jeden Berg ein Stück von ihnen, und dann rufe sie.
ref: Scatter them over the mountain-tops, then call them back.

result.output: Then put a piece of them on each mountain, and then call them.

src: Und wenn sie (die Mumin-Dienerinnen) verheiratet sind und dann Unzucht begehen, dann ist ihnen die Hälfte des Strafmaßes auferlegt, das für freie Frauen vorgesehen ist.
ref: But if they are married and guilty of adultery, inflict on them half the punishment (enjoined) for gentlewomen.

result.output: And if they (the Moomin servants) are married and then commit adultery, then half of the punishment that is intended for free women is imposed on them.

src: Aber Allah ist Erhaben über das, was sie (Ihm) beigesellen.
ref: But God is above what they ascribe to Him.

result.output: But Allah is exalted above what they associate with Him.

src: Darum übe Vergebung in schöner Weise.
ref: So turn away (from them) with a grace.

result.output: Therefore, practice forgiveness in a beautiful way.

src: Und betört hat euch in bezug auf Gott der Betörer.
ref: And the chief deceiver (Satan) deceived you in respect of Allah."

result.output: And the deceiver has seduced you in regard to God.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch nach einer (langen) Zeit, in der Gesandte ausgeblieben sind, (die Schrift) zu erklären, damit ihr nicht sagt: "Zu uns kam weder ein Überbringer froher Botschaft, noch ein Ermahner." So kam zu euch bereits sowohl ein Überbringer froher Botschaft als auch ein Ermahner.
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you Our commands, after the Noble Messengers had stopped arriving for ages, for you might claim, “Never did any Harbinger of Glad Tidings or Herald of Warning come to us” – so this Harbinger of Glad Tidings and Herald of Warning has come to you; and Allah is Able to do all things.

result.output: Our Messenger has already come to you to explain the scripture to you after a (long) period when messengers were absent, so that you will not say: "No bearer of good news or warner has come to us." In fact, a bearer of good news and a warner has already come to you.

src: Und ich erkläre mich nicht selbst für unschuldig.
ref: "And I free not myself (from the blame).

result.output: And I do not declare myself innocent.

src: (O Du) Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde, Du bist mein Schutzherr im Diesseits und Jenseits. Berufe mich als (Dir) ergeben ab und nimm mich unter die Rechtschaffenen auf."
ref: You are my Wali (Protector, Helper, Supporter, Guardian, etc.) in this world and in the Hereafter, cause me to die as a Muslim (the one submitting to Your Will), and join me with the righteous."

result.output: (O You) Creator of the heavens and the earth, You are my protector in this world and the Hereafter. Call me to submit (to You) and include me among the righteous.

src: Weshalb haltet ihr diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, von dem Gebotenen von ALLAH ab, im Streben danach, es zu verfälschen, während ihr wißt?"
ref: Why do you stop those who have believed, from the Path of Allah, seeking to make it seem crooked, while you (yourselves) are witnesses [to Muhammad SAW as a Messenger of Allah and Islam (Allah's Religion, i.e. to worship none but Him Alone)]?

result.output: Why do you prevent those who have internalized the faith from obeying what Allah has commanded and strive to distort it, while you know?

src: Ein solcher (Gott) kann wahrlich (auch) die Toten wieder lebendig machen. Und Er hat Macht zu allen Dingen.
ref: Verily. He is the Quickener of the dead, and He is over every-thing potent.

result.output: Truly, such (God) can also bring the dead back to life. And He has power over all things.

src: Allah liebt nicht, wer eingebildet und prahlerisch ist,
ref: God does not surely love those who are arrogant and boastful,

result.output: Allah does not love those who are conceited and boastful.

src: Fast hätten sie dich verführt (und) von dem (abgebracht), was Wir dir offenbart haben, damit du gegen Uns etwas anderes erdichtest.
ref: They almost lured you away from what We have revealed to you, so that you would invent something else in Our name.

result.output: They almost seduced you and diverted you from what We have revealed to you so that you would invent something else against Us.

src: Und kommt dem Besitz der Waise nicht nahe, es sei denn zu ihrem Besten, bis sie ihre Volljährigkeit erreicht hat.
ref: And that you approach not the property of the orphan, save in the fairer manner, until he is of age.

result.output: And do not approach the property of the orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity.

src: Sollten sie über euch die Oberhand gewinnen, werden sie euch steinigen oder euch in ihre Gemeinschaft umkehren lassen.
ref: For, if they appear in front of you, they will stone you to death or restore you to their religion.

result.output: Should they gain the upper hand over you, they will stone you or convert you to their community.

src: Diejenigen von den Kindern Israils, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurden aus dem Munde von Dawud und von 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam verflucht. Dies war wegen dem, was sie sich widersetzt haben, und dem, was sie zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Cursed were disbelievers among the children of Israel by David and Jesus, son of Mary, because they rebelled and transgressed the bounds.

result.output: Those of the Children of Israel who committed Kufr were cursed by the mouths of Dawud and 'Isa ibn-Maryam. This was because of what they opposed and what they used to transgress.

src: Und ALLAH macht gewiß kenntlich diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, und ER macht gewiß kenntlich die Munafiq.
ref: God will surely know the believers and know the hypocrites.

result.output: And Allah certainly makes evident those who have internalized Iman, and He certainly makes evident the hypocrites.

src: Aber wir werden dir ganz gewiß Zauberei gleicher Art bringen. So setze zwischen uns und dir eine Verabredung(szeit) fest, die weder wir noch du verfehlen werden, an einem Ort, der (uns allen) gleichermaßen recht ist."
ref: “So we will also produce before you a similar magic, therefore set up an agreed time between us and you, from which neither we nor you shall turn away, at a level place.”

result.output: But we will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So set a time and place of meeting between us and you, which neither we nor you will miss, in a location that is convenient for all of us.

src: Bitte für uns um die Vergebung unserer Verfehlungen, denn wir waren gewiß Verfehlende."
ref: Seek forgiveness for our sins, for we were indeed guilty.”

result.output: Please ask for forgiveness for us for our wrongdoings, because we were certainly wrongdoers.

src: Dann werden sie bereuen, was sie in ihren Herzen verbargen.
ref: Then will they be repentant of what they had concealed in their hearts.

result.output: Then they will regret what they concealed in their hearts.

src: Emporgehoben und rein gehalten,
ref: Exalted and holy,

result.output: Lifted up and held in

src: ER verhilft zum Sieg, wem ER will.
ref: He supports whomever He wills.

result.output: He grants victory to whomever He wills.

src: Unser HERR! Ich ließ von meiner Nachkommenschaft in einem unfruchtbaren Tal nieder - bei Deinem Muharram-Haus, unser HERR! - damit sie das rituelle Gebet ordnungsgemäß verrichten.
ref: I have settled some of my children, O Lord, in a barren valley near Your sacred House, so that, O our Lord, they may be constant in devotion.

result.output: Our Lord! I have settled some of my descendants in a barren valley, near Your sacred House of Muharram, our Lord, so that they may establish proper prayer.

src: Und WIR gaben 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam, die Wunderzeichen und unterstützten ihn mit Ruhhul-qudus.
ref: And We gave 'Iesa (Jesus), the son of Maryam (Mary), clear signs and supported him with Ruh-ul-Qudus [Jibrael (Gabriel)].

result.output: And WE gave 'Isa ibn Maryam the miracles and supported him with the Holy Spirit.

src: Sie haben doch das, was darin steht, erforscht.
ref: And they have read this in it.

result.output: You have explored what is written in it.

src: Als ihr es mit euren Zungen übernahmt und ihr mit eurem Mund das ausspracht, wovon ihr keine Kenntnis hattet, da hieltet ihr es für eine geringe Sache, während es vor Allah eine große war.
ref: When you talked about it and said what you did not know, and took it lightly -- though in the sight of God it was serious --

result.output: When you took it up with your tongues, uttering with your mouths things you had no knowledge of, you counted it as a trivial matter. But in God's sight, it is very serious.

src: Sie durch andere zu ersetzen, die besser sind als sie. Und niemand kann Uns voraus sein.
ref: To bring better people than they in their place; and they will not be able to thwart Us.

result.output: To replace them with others who are better than them. And no one can be ahead of us.

src: Am Tage, wenn die Heuchler und die Heuchlerinnen zu den Gläubigen sagen werden: "Wartet auf uns!
ref: On the Day when the hypocrites men and women will say to the believers: "Wait for us!

result.output: At the day when the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to the believers: Wait for us!

src: (Es wird ihnen) wie den Leuten Pharaos und denen (ergehen), die vor ihnen waren: Sie hielten die Zeichen ihres Herrn für eine Lüge, darum ließen Wir sie zugrunde gehen um ihrer Sünden willen, und Wir ertränkten die Leute Pharaos; sie alle waren Frevler.
ref: This was the case with the people of Pharaoh and those before them, who rejected the signs of their Lord and were destroyed for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh as they were oppressors.

result.output: They will beget the same fate as the people of Pharaoh and those who lived before them. They denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them on account of their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh; all of them were wrongdoers.

src: Und sie freuen sich dabei über das, was Gott ihnen von seiner Huld zukommen ließ.
ref: Exulting in that which Allah hath vouchsafed them of His grace.

result.output: And they rejoice in what God has brought them of His grace.

src: Sag: "Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, ich handle auch.
ref: Tell them: "O my people, go on acting on your part, I am acting on mine.

result.output: Say: "My people! Act according to your positions, I will act as well."

src: Genügt es ihnen denn nicht, daß Wir das Buch auf dich hinabgesandt haben, das ihnen verlesen wird?
ref: Is it not sufficient for them that We have revealed the Book to you which is read out to them?

result.output: Is it not enough for them that We have sent down to you the Book that is recited to them?

src: Und hätte ALLAH ihnen die Deportation nicht bestimmt, hätte ER sie doch im Diesseits gepeinigt.
ref: Had God not decreed exile for them, He would have punished them in this life.

result.output: And if Allah had not decreed their deportation, he would certainly have punished them in this life

src: Ihm gehören die Schönsten Namen.
ref: His are all the names beautiful.

result.output: He has the most beautiful names

src: Und es gibt nichts, was kleiner ist als dies oder größer, das nicht in einem deutlichen Buch stünde.
ref: Not what is less than that or what is greater than that but is (written) in a Clear Record. (Tafsir At-Tabari.

result.output: And there is nothing smaller than this or greater that is not stated in a clear book.

src: Wer aber jetzt horcht, der findet, daß eine Sternschnuppe auf ihn lauert.
ref: But he who listeneth now findeth a flame in wait for him;

result.output: But whoever listens now, finds that a shooting star is lurking for him.

src: Dann wird ihre Heimstätte die Hölle sein - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: What a miserable resort.

result.output: Then their homeland will be hell - what a terrible resting place!

src: Einem jeden von ihnen wird zuteil, was er an Schuld erworben hat.
ref: Each person among them bears his share in the sin.

result.output: Each of them receives what he has earned in guilt.

src: "Am Tag, wenn sie im Feuer der Fitna unterzogen werden."
ref: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,

result.output: On the day when they are exposed to the turmoil of the Fire

src: Und dem Berg Sinai,
ref: The Mount Sinai,

result.output: And Mount Sinai

src: Sprich: "Allah weiß am besten wie lange sie verweilten." Ihm gehören das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde. Wie sehend ist Er! Und wie hörend! Sie haben keinen Helfer außer Ihm, und Er teilt Seine Befehlsgewalt mit keinem.
ref: Say, “Allah well knows how long they stayed; for Him only are the hidden of the heavens and the earth; how well He sees and hears! They do not have any supporter besides Him; and He does not associate anyone in His command.”

result.output: Say, "Allah knows best how long they stayed." He owns the secrets of the heavens and the earth. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper except Him, and He shares His authority with none.

src: So rächten Wir uns an ihnen.
ref: So We punished them too.

result.output: So we took revenge on them.

src: "Dies ist so, weil ihr ungläubig bliebt, als Allah allein angerufen wurde; doch als Ihm Götter zur Seite gesetzt wurden, da glaubtet ihr.
ref: This has come upon you because when God alone was invoked you disbelieved; but when partners were associated with Him, you believed.

result.output: This is so, because you remained unbelieving when Allah was called upon alone; but when gods were associated with Him, then you believed.

src: Und Wir werden euch ganz gewiß mit ein wenig Furcht und Hunger und Mangel an Besitz, Seelen und Früchten prüfen.
ref: We will certainly test you with some fear and hunger, and some loss of possessions and lives and crops.

result.output: And We will certainly test you with a little fear and hunger and a shortage of possessions, souls, and fruits.

src: Und zwischen uns und euch sind Feindschaft und Haß auf immer sichtbar geworden, bis ihr an Gott allein glaubt.»
ref: Enmity and hatred has surfaced between us and you, forever, until you believe in God alone.”

result.output: And enmity and hatred have become visible between us and you forever, until you believe in God alone.

src: Und was wäre dabei, wenn sie den Iman an ALLAH und an den Jüngsten Tag verinnerlicht und vom Rizq gegeben hätten, das ALLAH ihnen gewährte?! Und ALLAH ist immer über sie allwissend.
ref: What have they (to fear) if they believe in Allah and the Last Day and spend (aright) of that which Allah hath bestowed upon them, when Allah is ever Aware of them (and all they do)?

result.output: And what would it matter if they had internalized the imam to Allah and the Last Day and given from the rizq which Allah granted them?! And Allah is always all-knowing about them.

src: ICH will von ihnen keinerlei Rizq, und ICH will nicht, daß sie Mich speisen.
ref: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.

result.output: I want no sustenance from them, and I do not want them to feed me.

src: Wahrhaftig!
ref: By your life!

result.output: Truly!,

src: Mein Besitz hat mir nichts genützt.
ref: Of no use was even my wealth.

result.output: My possession has not benefited me.

src: Sie (, die anderen,) sagten: "O Musa, gewiß werden wir es niemals betreten, solange sie darin sind.
ref: They said: "O Moses, we shall never, never enter so long as they are there.

result.output: They (the others) said: 'O Musa, we will surely not enter it, as long as they are in it.'

src: Und du siehst die Schiffe es durchspalten, damit ihr nach etwas von seiner Huld strebt und auf daß ihr dankbar werdet.
ref: And thou seest therein ships cleaving the water, that ye may seek of His graCe, and that haply ye may give thanks.

result.output: And you see the ships splitting through it so that you strive for something of his grace and so that you become grateful.

src: Oder wer ist anstelle des Erbarmers derjenige, der euch eine Heerschar wäre, die euch unterstützen könnte?
ref: What other army do you have to help you apart from Ar-Rahman?

result.output: Or who, besides the Merciful, could be the one to provide you with an army that could support you?

src: Und ER ist Der Allgnädige, Der Allvergebende.
ref: He is all-merciful, all-forgiving.

result.output: And HE is The Most Merciful, The Most Forgiving.

src: Und WIR ließen vom Himmel Wasser in Abgewogenheit fallen, dann ließen WIR es in der Erde unterbringen. Und WIR sind, um es vergehen zu lassen, doch allmächtig.
ref: We send down water from the sky in determined measure, and store it up in the earth; and We have power to drain it away.

result.output: And We sent down from the sky water in measure and We lodged it in the earth, and indeed, We are capable of taking it away.

src: Und so haben wir euch in Verirrung fallen lassen, denn wir waren ja selbst in Verirrung gefallen."
ref: For we had led you astray. In fact we ourselves were astray."

result.output: And so we let you fall into error, for we ourselves had fallen into error.

src: Und, o mein Volk, dies ist die Kamelstute Gottes, euch zum Zeichen. Laßt sie auf Gottes Erde weiden und rührt sie nicht mit etwas Bösem an. Sonst ergreift euch eine baldige Pein.»
ref: And O my people! yonder is the she-camel of Allah: a sign unto you; so let her alone, feeding in Allah's land, and touch her not with evil, lest there may overtake you a torment nigh.

result.output: And, O my people, this is the camel of God, a sign for you. Let her graze on God's earth and do not touch her with anything evil. Otherwise, a swift punishment will seize you.

src: An jenem Tage werden Wir die einen von ihnen wie Wogen gegen die anderen anstürmen lassen, und es wird in den Sur gestoßen.
ref: On that Day, We will leave them surging upon one another.

result.output: On that day, We will let one group of them surge against the other like waves, and the trumpet will be blown. And We will gather them together in one place.

src: Allah hatte ja Wohlgefallen an den Gläubigen, als sie dir unter dem Baum den Treueid leisteten.
ref: God was pleased with the believers, when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.

result.output: : Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.

src: Schauen sie denn nicht zu den Kamelen, wie sie erschaffen sind
ref: Do they not then ponder how the clouds were formed;

result.output: Do they not look at the camels, how they are created.

src: Er ging daran, das Schiff zu verfertigen. Und sooft Vornehme aus seinem Volk an ihm vorbeikamen, verhöhnten sie ihn.
ref: So he built the ark; and when groups of his people passed by him, they scoffed at him.

result.output: He started to build the ship. And every time nobles from his people passed by him, they mocked him.

src: Fürchtet ihr sie etwa?
ref: Are you afraid of them?

result.output: Are you afraid of her?

src: Ihr hättet unmöglich deren Bäume wachsen lassen können.
ref: It was not in your power to make trees germinate.

result.output: You could not possibly have let their trees grow.

src: Begehren sie (etwa) Macht bei ihnen (zu finden)? Gewiß, alle Macht gehört Allah.
ref: Then (know that) undoubtedly all honour is for Allah.

result.output: Do they desire power to be found with them? Surely, all power belongs to Allah.

src: An jenem Tag werden sie an derselben Pein teilhaben.
ref: So, they will become partners in punishment.

result.output: On that day, they will share in the same pain.

src: Das Gute verweigert, Übertretungen begeht und Zweifel hegt,
ref: "Every obstructor of good, transgressor, and the sceptic,

result.output: The good refuses, commits transgressions, and harbors doubts.

src: Als ihnen aber vorgeschrieben wurde zu kämpfen, kehrten sie sich ab bis auf wenige von ihnen. Und Gott weiß Bescheid über die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: But when they were ordered to fight they turned away, except for a few; yet God knows the sinners.

result.output: As they were ordered to fight, they turned away except for a few of them. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.

src: Das ist der Lohn der Feinde Allahs: das (Höllen)feuer, in dem sie die ewige Wohnstätte haben, als Vergeltung dafür, daß sie Unsere Zeichen zu verleugnen pflegten.
ref: This is the requital for God's enemies: Hell, where they will have their lasting home, as punishment for denying Our revelations.

result.output: This is the recompense of the enemies of Allah: the Hellfire wherein they will have the eternal abode as a retribution for their disbelief in Our signs.

src: Und wenn ALLAH dich zu einer Gruppe von ihnen wiederkehren läßt und diese dich um Erlaubnis (zur Teilnahme) am Aufbruch bitten, dann sag: "Ihr werdet mit mir nie und nimmer aufbrechen und den bewaffneten Kampf gegen keinen Feind mit mir aufnehmen.
ref: If you come back to them by (the grace of) God, and they seek your permission to go (to fight), you should tell them: "You will never go out nor fight the enemy with me any more.

result.output: And if ALLAH allows you to return to a group of them and they ask you for permission (to join) the departure, then say, 'You will never leave with me and never engage in armed combat with any enemy with me.'

src: Ich fürchte, daß sie mich der Lüge bezichtigen."
ref: Verily! I fear that they will belie me."

result.output: I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying.

src: Sie schmiedeten Ränke, und Wir schmiedeten Ränke, ohne daß sie es merkten.
ref: They hatched up the plot; We also planned without their knowledge.

result.output: They were plotting and We were plotting without their knowledge.

src: Und wende dich nicht in Arroganz von den Leuten ab! Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt!
ref: Do not hold men in contempt, and do not walk with hauteur on the earth.

result.output: And do not turn away from people in arrogance! And do not walk on the earth exultantly!

src: Sag: "Weder Ihr wer-det nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was wir schwer verfehlten, noch wir werden nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was ihr tut."
ref: Say: "You will not be questioned about the sins that we have committed, nor shall we be questioned about your deeds."

result.output: Say, neither will you be held accountable for what we greatly missed, nor will we be held accountable for what you do.

src: Bis zum Tag der bestimmten Zeit.»
ref: Till the appointed day."

result.output: Until the day of the specified time.

src: Und an dem Tage, wo die Stunde herankommt, werden die Schuldigen schwören, daß sie nicht länger als eine Stunde (auf Erden) weilten - so sehr sind sie an (Selbsttäuschung gewöhnt.
ref: The day Resurrection is set the sinners will swear: "We did not tarry more than an hour (and cannot be guilty)." That is how they have always been deceived.

result.output: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty will swear that they did not stay on earth for more than an hour - such is their habit of self-deception.

src: Sie hatten eine stärkere Kraft als ihr und mehr Vermögen und Kinder.
ref: They were more powerful than you, and had more wealth and children.

result.output: They had a stronger power than her and more wealth and children.

src: Und die Aussöhnung ist besser. Doch die Seelen sind der Habsucht zugeneigt.
ref: Reconciliation is good even though men's souls are swayed by greed.

result.output: And reconciliation is better. But the souls are inclined to greed.

src: Steh auf (zum Gebet) die ganze Nacht, bis auf einen kleinen Teil,
ref: Keep watch all the night except some,

result.output: Stand up (for prayer) the whole night, except for a small part

src: (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los. Nicht uns dienten sie ja."
ref: We clear ourselves before You: They never worshipped us."

result.output: We separate ourselves from them before you. After all, they did not serve us.

src: Der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt ist der Tagesanbruch. Ist nicht der Tagesanbruch schon nahe?"
ref: Their hour of doom is in the morning: Is not the morning nigh?"

result.output: The promised time to them is daybreak. Isn't daybreak already near?

src: Und sag: Wirkt! Allah wird euer Tun sehen, und (auch) Sein Gesandter und die Gläubigen.
ref: And say, "Do [as you will], for Allah will see your deeds, and [so, will] His Messenger and the believers.

result.output: And say: It works! Allah will see your actions, and (also) His messenger and the believers.

src: (Sie treten ein in) Dschannat von 'Adn, die Der Allgnade Erweisende Seinen Dienern von der Welt des Verborgenen versprochen hat.
ref: In the gardens of Eden promised by Ar-Rahman to His creatures in the unknown (future).

result.output: They enter the Jannah of 'Adn, which the Most Merciful has promised to His servants from the world of the Unseen.

src: Und WIR lehrten ihn nicht das Dichten und dies gebührt ihm nicht! Er ist doch nichts anderes außer Ermahnung und ein klarer Quran,
ref: And We have not taught him (Prophet Mohammed- peace and blessings be upon him) to recite poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but an advice and the bright Qur’an.

result.output: And WE did not teach him poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.

src: Und der Satan sagt, nachdem die Angelegenheit entschieden ist: "Gewiß, Allah hat euch ein wahres Versprechen gegeben, und ich habe euch (etwas) versprochen, es aber dann gebrochen. Und ich hatte keine Macht über euch, außer daß ich euch gerufen habe und ihr auf mich gehört habt. So tadelt mich nicht, sondern tadelt euch selbst. Ich kann euch nicht zu Hilfe kommen, und ihr könnt mir nicht zu Hilfe kommen. Ich weise es ja von mir, daß ihr mich zuvor (Allah) beigesellt habt." Gewiß, für die Ungerechten gibt es schmerzhafte Strafe.
ref: And Satan will say when the matter has been decided, “Indeed Allah had given you a true promise – and the promise I gave you, I made it untrue to you; and I had no control over you except that I called you and you obeyed me; so do not accuse me, blame only yourselves; neither can I help you, nor can you help me; I have no concern with your ascribing me as a partner (to Allah); indeed for the unjust is a painful punishment.”

result.output: And Satan says, after the matter has been decided: "Certainly, Allah has given you a true promise, and I promised you, but then broke it. And I had no power over you except that I called you, and you listened to me. So do not blame me, but blame yourselves. I cannot come to your aid, nor can you come to mine. Indeed, I reject your former association of me with Allah." Certainly, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment.

src: Allah hat auf dich das Buch und die Weisheit herabgesandt und dich gelehrt, was du (vorher) nicht wußtest.
ref: God has revealed to you the Scripture and wisdom, and has taught you what you did not know.

result.output: Allah has sent down to you the Book and wisdom and has taught you what you did not know before.

src: Gewiß, wir werden ihn und die Seinen erretten, bis auf seine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen."
ref: We are to save him and his family except his wife, for she is one of those who will stay behind."

result.output: Surely, we will save him and his family, except for his wife, who belongs to those who should remain behind.

src: Und sie lernten, was ihnen schadete und nicht nützte. Und sie wußten, daß derjenige, der dies erkauft, im Jenseits keinen Anteil hat.
ref: Indeed, they learned what harms them and does not profit them, yet they knew that anyone who buys it would have no share in the Everlasting Life.

result.output: And they learned what harmed them and was of no use to them. And they knew that whoever buys this has no share in the hereafter.

src: Ich will, daß du die Last meiner Sünde und deiner Sünde trägst und so unter den Bewohnern des Feuers bist, und dies ist der Lohn der Frevler."
ref: I would rather you suffered the punishment for sinning against me, and for your own sin, and became an inmate of Hell. And that is the requital for the unjust."

result.output: I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin and thus be among the inhabitants of the Fire, and this is the reward of the wicked.

src: Und ER machte euch die Nacht, das Tageslicht, die Sonne und den Mond gratis fügbar.
ref: He has subjected to you the night, the day, the sun and the moon.

result.output: And HE made the night, the daylight, the sun and the moon freely available to you.

src: Mein HERR! Laß mich des rituellen Gebets ordnungsgemäßer Verrichtender sein sowie von meiner Nachkommenschaft. Mein HERR! Und erfülle mein Bittgebet!
ref: My Lord! make me establisher of prayer and also from my progeny, our Lord! and accept Thou my supplication.

result.output: My Lord! Let me be one who performs the ritual prayer properly, and also my offspring. My Lord! And fulfill my supplication!

src: Und was für ein erbärmlicher Aufenthaltsort!
ref: Their dwelling place will be Hell; - and worst indeed is that place for rest.

result.output: And what a miserable place to stay!

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

result.output: And Allah is indeed All-forgiving, Merciful.

src: (Er ist) der Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde in ihrer schönsten Form. Wie soll Er Kinder haben, wo Er doch keine Gefährtin hat und Er (sonst) alles erschaffen hat?
ref: Creator of the heavens and the earth from nothingness, how could He have a son when He has no mate?

result.output: He is the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can He have children when He has no mate and He has created everything else?

src: Heute habe Ich euch eure Religion vervollkommnet und Meine Gunst an euch vollendet, und Ich bin mit dem Islam als Religion für euch zufrieden. - Und wer sich aus Hunger in einer Zwangslage befindet, ohne zu einer Sünde hinzuneigen, so ist Allah Allvergebend und Barmherzig.
ref: This day, I have perfected your religion for you, completed My Favour upon you, and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. But as for him who is forced by severe hunger, with no inclination to sin (such can eat these above-mentioned meats), then surely, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

result.output: Today, I have perfected your religion for you, completed My favor upon you, and have chosen Islam as your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Sie sagen: "Aber nein!
ref: They will say, "No!

result.output: They say: "But no!"

src: ER sagte: "Deine Aya sei, daß du mit den Menschen drei volle Nächte nicht reden kannst."
ref: "Though sound," He answered, "you will not talk to any one for three nights running."

result.output: He said: Your ordeal is that you cannot speak to people for three full nights.

src: Darum rufe du auf und verhalte dich recht, wie dir befohlen worden ist. Und folge nicht ihren Neigungen, sondern sprich: Ich glaube an das, was Gott an Büchern herabgesandt hat, und mir ist befohlen worden, unter euch Gerechtigkeit zu üben.
ref: Therefore call thou, and go straight as thou hast been commanded; do not follow their caprices.

result.output: Therefore, you should call (them) and behave justly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say, 'I believe in what God has sent down in the form of books, and I am commanded to perform justice among you.'

src: Ich kann euch nicht retten, noch könnt ihr mich retten.
ref: Neither can I help you nor can you give me help.

result.output: I can't save you, nor can you save me.

src: Und gehe auf Erden nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, dabei wirst du weder die Erde zerlöchern können, noch wirst du die Berghöhen an Höhe erreichen.
ref: And do not strut about the land with insolence: Surely you cannot cleave the earth, nor attain the height of mountains in stature.

result.output: And do not walk on earth exhilaratingly! Surely, you will neither be able to puncture the earth nor will you reach the mountain heights in height.

src: Sehen sie denn nicht, daß Allah, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht hat, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Und Er hat ihnen eine Frist gesetzt, an der es keinen Zweifel gibt, doch die Ungerechten weigern sich (und wollen nichts) außer dem Unglauben.
ref: Do they not see that Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth is Able to create people similar to them, and has set a term for them in which there is no doubt? So the unjust do not accept without being ungrateful.

result.output: Do they not see that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, has the power to create the like of them? And He has appointed for them a term about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse (to accept anything) except disbelief.

src: Ihm gereicht zum Vorteil, was er erworben hat, und ihm gereicht zum Schaden, was er begangen hat.
ref: Each will enjoy what (good) he earns, as indeed each will suffer from (the wrong) he does.

result.output: What he has acquired benefits him and what he has committed harms him.

src: Ihr macht sie zu Schreibblättern, die ihr offenlegt, aber auch vieles davon verheimlicht.
ref: Some of it ye disclose and much thereof ye conceal.

result.output: Your turn them into writing sheets, which you reveal, but also keep much of it secret.

src: (So war) Allahs Gesetzmäßigkeit mit denjenigen, die zuvor dahingegangen sind - und Allahs Anordnung ist ein fest gefaßter Beschluß
ref: This has been the way of God with (apostles) who have gone before you, and God's command is a determined act.

result.output: (Thus was) Allah's regulation with those who have passed before - and Allah's command is a firm decree.

src: Und Wir ließen dem Mose das Buch zukommen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture, but dispute arose therein.

result.output: And We gave the Book to Moses.

src: Derjenige, Der mich erschuf.
ref: who created me.

result.output: The one who created me

src: Aber Taube hören nicht den Ruf, wenn sie gewarnt werden.
ref: But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.

result.output: But pigeons do not hear the call when they are warned.

src: Aber ihr seid ja Leute, die der Versuchung ausgesetzt sind.»
ref: In reality you are a people under trial (for your own inauspiciousness)."

result.output: But you are people who are susceptible to temptation.

src: Was Allah den Menschen an Barmherzigkeit gewährt, das kann keiner zurückhalten; und was Er zurückhält, das kann nach Ihm keiner freigeben; und Er ist der Allmächtige, der Allweise.
ref: There is none who can take away the favours He bestows on man; and there is none apart from Him to restore what He has withheld. He is all-mighty and all-wise.

result.output: Whatsoever mercy Allah may grant to mankind, none can withhold it; and whatsoever He may withhold, none can grant it thereafter. And He is the Mighty, the Wise.

src: Ich folge ausschließlich dem, was mir als Wahy zuteil wird. Und ich bin doch nichts anderes als ein deutlicher Warner."
ref: I only follow what is revealed to me; I am only a clear warner.'

result.output: I follow exclusively that which is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing more than a clear warner.

src: Das sind die, die Gott rechtgeleitet hat.
ref: They are those whom Allah had guided.

result.output: These are the ones whom God has guided.

src: Das sind die, die das diesseitige Leben gegen das Jenseits erkauft haben.
ref: Those are they who have bought the life of this world at the price of the Hereafter.

result.output: These are the ones who have bought the worldly life at the cost of the Hereafter.

src: Und gewähre ihnen noch eine kurze Frist.
ref: And give them respite for a little while.

result.output: And grant them a short respite.

src: Sprich: Das ist mein Weg.
ref: Say: 'This is my way.

result.output: Speak: That is my way.

src: Oder sagen sie: "Er hat es ersonnen"? Nein!
ref: What! They dare say that, “He has fabricated it”?

result.output: Do they say, 'He invented it?'No!,

src: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Dem alles gehört, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist.
ref: Praise belongs to God to whom belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth.

result.output: All praise belongs to Allah, to whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and on the earth.

src: Gewiß, mir wurde vom Wissen das zuteil, was dir nicht zuteil wurde, so folge mir, dann leite ich dich recht auf einen geraden Weg!
ref: There has come to me of knowledge that which came not unto you. So follow me.

result.output: Certainly, I was granted knowledge that was not granted to you, so follow me and I will lead you straight on a straight path!

src: Und WIR entsandten dich nur als Überbringer froher Botschaft und als Warner.
ref: Yet We have not sent you but to give good tidings and to warn.

result.output: And We sent you only as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.

src: O ihr Menschen, ein Gleichnis ist geprägt, so hört darauf: Gewiß, jene, die ihr an Allahs Statt anruft, werden in keiner Weise vermögen, eine Fliege zu erschaffen, auch dann nicht, wenn sie sich dazu zusammentäten. Und wenn die Fliege ihnen etwas raubte, könnten sie es ihr nicht entreißen.
ref: O men, give ear to this parable: Those you worship other than God can never create as much as a fly, even if they get together to do so; and if the fly were to rob them of a thing they would not be able to snatch it away from it.

result.output: O mankind, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never be able to create a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal something from them, they could not recover it from it.

src: Aber er vergaß (sie). Und wir fanden bei ihm keine Entschlossenheit.
ref: He forgot Our commandment and We did not find in him the determination to fulfil Our commandments.

result.output: But he forgot (her). And we found no determination in him.

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig sind und Unsere Zeichen für Lüge erklären, für sie wird es schmachvolle Strafe geben.
ref: But those who did not believe and called Our revelations lies, will be given disgraceful punishment.

result.output: The unbelievers who reject Our signs, for them there will be a shameful punishment.

src: ER sagte: "Das ist ein Mir verbindlicher, geradliniger Weg:
ref: (To which God) said: "This way is right by Me.

result.output: He said: This is a straightforward and binding way for me.

src: "Gaben Wir euch nicht ein genügend langes Leben, so daß ein jeder, der sich besinnen wollte, sich darin hätte besinnen können?
ref: Did We not give you a long enough span of life so that he who remembered may reflect? And did not the warner come to you?

result.output: We didn't give you a long enough life so that everyone who wanted to reflect could have reflected in it?,

src: Auch sollst du Mitteilung machen über denjenigen, der Unseren Ayat gegenüber Kufr betrieben und gesagt hat: "Ganz gewiß werden mir Vermögen und Kinder zuteil!"
ref: Have you seen him who denies Our revelations, and says: "I will certainly be given wealth and children."

result.output: Also, you should inform about the one who committed disbelief towards Our Ayat and said: 'Certainly, I will be given wealth and children!'

src: (dies) als Ermahnung. Und nie sind Wir ungerecht.
ref: To advise; and We never oppress.

result.output: as a reminder. And never are We unjust.

src: Sind die beiden im Gleichnis etwa gleich? Lob sei Gott!
ref: All praise belongs to Allah!

result.output: Are the two in the parable equal? Praise be to God!

src: Und wenn sie den bewaffneten Kampf gegen euch aufnahmen, dann tötet sie.
ref: But if they attack you, then kill them.

result.output: And if they take up armed struggle against you, then kill them.

src: Und als ihnen gesagt wurde: "Verinnerlicht den Iman, wie die (anderen) Menschen den Iman verinnerlicht haben", sagten sie: "Sollen wir etwa den Iman verinnerlichen, wie die Beschränkten den Iman verinnerlicht haben?"
ref: When asked to believe as others do, they say: "Should we believe like fools?"

result.output: And when they were told, 'Internalize faith as other people have internalized faith.', they said, 'Should we internalize faith as the narrow-minded have internalized faith?'

src: Gewiß, ALLAH macht, was ER will.
ref: Verily God does as He pleases.

result.output: Surely, Allah does what He wants.

src: Und wenn einer ungläubig ist, so ist Gott auf die Weltenbewohner nicht angewiesen.
ref: Whosoever denies, should remember that God is independent of the peoples of the world.

result.output: And if one is unbelieving, God is not dependent on the inhabitants of the worlds.

src: Diejenigen, denen das Buch zugekommen ist, sind erst uneins geworden, nachdem das Wissen zu ihnen gekommen war, dies aus ungerechter Auflehnung untereinander.
ref: Those who were given the Book were not at variance except after the knowledge came to them, being insolent one to another.

result.output: Those to whom the book had come became divided only after the knowledge had come to them, this from unjust rebellion against one another.

src: Und er hatte keine Schar, die ihm gegen Allah zu helfen vermöchte, und er konnte sich selbst nicht wehren.
ref: He had no body to help him other than God, nor was he able to save himself.

result.output: And he had no company to help him against Allah, nor could he defend himself.,

src: Über sie kommt eine Pein, die unabwendbar ist.»
ref: Verily, there will come a torment for them which cannot be turned back."

result.output: A pain comes over her that is unavoidable.

src: Also, dann sollen sie mit ihren Verbindungen hochsteigen!
ref: Then let them climb up the ladders (to the heavens).

result.output: So, then they should climb up with their connections!

src: Auf solche (Sünder) wird ein böses Unheil niederfallen; und Allah ist zornig auf sie; und Er hat sie verflucht und Gahannam für sie bereitet. Und das ist eine üble Bestimmung.
ref: God is wroth with them, and has cursed them, and has prepared for them Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!

result.output: Such (sinners) shall incur a wretched doom; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them. And that is a wretched destination.

src: Und vervollständigt die Hadsch und die 'Umra für ALLAH! Und solltet ihr daran gehindert werden, dann (opfert) das, was an Opfertieren verfügbar ist, und rasiert nicht eure Köpfe, bis das Opfertier seinen Opferplatz erreicht hat.
ref: Fulfil the Pilgrimage and the Visitation unto God; but if you are prevented, then such offering as may be feasible. And shave not your heads, till the offering reaches its place of sacrifice.

result.output: And complete the Hajj and Umrah for ALLAH! And if you are hindered, then offer whatever sacrificial offering is available, and do not shave your heads until the sacrificial offering has reached its place of sacrifice.

src: Hätte es doch aus den Generationen vor euch manche gegeben, die einsichtig waren, welche Verderben auf Erden verboten!
ref: Why were there not, out of the generations that passed away before you, righteous men who would forbid others from causing corruption on the earth?

result.output: Would that there had been some from the generations before you who were insightful and who knew what disasters are forbidden on earth!

src: (Er), der sieben Himmel in Schichten erschaffen hat.
ref: Who created the seven skies one above the other.

result.output: (He) who has created the seven heavens in layers.
