src: Sie haben Allah nicht eingeschätzt, wie es Ihm gebührt', wo die ganze Erde am Tag der Auferstehung in Seiner Hand gehalten wird und (auch) die Himmel in Seiner Rechten zusammengefaltet sein werden. Preis sei Ihm! Erhaben ist Er über das, was sie (Ihm) beigesellen.
ref: And they did not realise the importance of Allah as was His right; and on the Day of Resurrection, He will compress the lands and the heavens will be rolled up by His power; Purity and Supremacy are to Him, from all what they ascribe as partners.

result.output: They did not estimate Allah as He should be estimated, when the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Glory be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.

src: Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend und Allvergebend.
ref: Verily God is forgiving and kind.

result.output: Allah is truly All-Forgiving and All-Merciful.

src: Und den Himmel haben Wir mit Kraft aufgebaut.
ref: And the heaven!

result.output: And We have built the heavens with might.

src: Sollten sie jedoch Kinder haben, dann bekommt ihr das Viertel von dem, was sie hinterlassen haben, nach (der Vollstreckung) des Testaments, das sie hinterlegt haben, und nach (der Begleichung) der Schulden.
ref: If they had children, you get one-fourth of what they leave. After fulfilling any bequest and paying off debts.

result.output: However, if they have children, you will receive one-fourth of what they left behind after the execution of the will they deposited and after settling the debts.

src: Mit Sicherheit ist ALLAHs Versprechen wahr, doch die meisten wissen es nicht.
ref: Remember, the promise of God is true. But most of them do not know.

result.output: Certainly, Allah's promise is true, but most people do not know it

src: Dein Herr hat dich weder verlassen, noch verabscheut.
ref: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despises you.

result.output: Your master has neither abandoned you nor detested you.

src: Und auch manche von ihren Vätern, ihren Nachkommen und ihren Brüdern.
ref: as We did their fathers, their descendants, and their brothers.

result.output: And some of their fathers, offspring, and brothers as well.

src: Und als er dort ankam, wurde gerufen: "Baraka wurde verliehen dem, das im Feuer ist, sowie dem um es herum. Und subhanallah, Der HERR aller Schöpfung.
ref: So when he reached it, it was proclaimed, “Blessed is he who is in the location of the fire (Moosa) and those who are close to it (the angels); and Purity is to Allah, the Lord Of The Creation.”

result.output: And when he arrived there, it was proclaimed: \Baraka is granted to he who is in the fire as well as to those around it. And subhanallah, the LORD of all creation\.,

src: Als er dann (die Lücke) zwischen den beiden Wallabhängen auf gleicher Höhe zuschütten ließ, sagte er: "Blast!" Als er dann es (das Eisen) erhitzte, sagte er: "Bringt mir geschmolzenes Kupfer, das ich darüber gieße!"
ref: At length, when he had filled up the space between the two steep mountain-sides, He said, "Blow (with your bellows)" Then, when he had made it (red) as fire, he said: "Bring me, that I may pour over it, molten lead."

result.output: When he then had the gap filled in between the two walls at the same height, he said: 'Blow!' When he then heated it (the iron), he said: 'Bring me melted copper that I can pour over it!'

src: Und du hast eine Verabredung, die dir nicht gebrochen wird. Und schau auf deinen Gott, dessen Andacht du dich dauernd hingegeben hast.
ref: And thereafter a tryst awaits thee thou canst not fail to keep Behold thy god, to whom all the day thou wast cleaving!

result.output: And you have a date that will not be broken for you. And look at your God, whose devotion you have constantly devoted yourself to.

src: Und ER erschafft, was ihr nicht kennt.
ref: He created other things too which you do not know.

result.output: And HE creates what you do not know.

src: ER sagte: "Geh!
ref: (And God) said: "Away!

result.output: He said, 'Go!'.

src: Also diejenigen, die den Iman an ihn verinnerlicht, ihn geehrt, ihm zum Sieg verholfen haben und dem Licht (Quran) gefolgt sind, das ihm hinabgesandt wurde, diese sind die wirklichen Erfolgreichen.
ref: Those who believe and honour and help him, and follow the light sent with him, are those who will attain their goal."

result.output: So those who internalized the faith in him, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was sent down to him, these are the real successful ones.

src: Doch ich verfüge nicht über das, was ihr übereilt haben wollt.
ref: But what you wish to be hastened is not within my power.

result.output: But I do not have what you want to rush.

src: Gespottet wurde schon vor dir über Gesandte. Da umschloß diejenigen, die sie verhöhnt hatten, das, worüber sie spotteten.
ref: Surely the apostles have been mocked before you; but what they had mocked rebounded on the mockers themselves.

result.output: Mockery has already been made about messengers before you. Those who mocked them were already surrounded by what they were mocking.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt. Und fürchtet Allah; wahrlich, Allah ist dessen wohl kundig, was ihr tut.
ref: O People who Believe! Fear Allah, and every soul must see what it has sent ahead for tomorrow; and fear Allah; indeed Allah is Aware of your deeds.

result.output: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is acquainted with what you do.

src: Und für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: They will have a painful punishment.

result.output: And a painful torment is destined for them.

src: Und Fir'aun sagte: "O ihr führende Schar, keinen anderen Gott weiß ich für euch als mich (selbst). So entfache mir, o Haman, einen Brand auf Lehm, und mache mir einen Hochbau, auf daß ich zum Gott Musas emporsteige. Ich glaube fürwahr, daß er zu den Lügnern gehört."
ref: 'Assembly' said Pharaoh, 'I do not know that you have any god except me' 'O Haman, kindle a fire upon clay and make me a tower so that I can climb to see the God of Moses, I think that he is one of the liars'

result.output: And Pharaoh said: "O you eminent ones, I know of no other god for you besides myself. So kindle for me, O Haman, [a fire] upon the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses. And indeed, I do think he is among the liars."

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch Seine Ayat zeigt und euch Rizq vom Himmel nach und nach hinabsendet.
ref: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends you food from the heavens.

result.output: HE is the One who shows you His Ayat and sends down Rizq for you from the sky gradually.

src: Diese verinnerlichen den Iman an ihn. Und wer von Al-ahzab daran Kufr betreibt, dem ist das Feuer bestimmt.
ref: Such believe therein, and whoso disbelieveth therein of the clans, the Fire is his appointed place.

result.output: They internalize faith in him. And whoever commits disbelief about Al-ahzab, the Fire is intended for him.

src: Er sagte: "O wehe mir! War ich unfähig, zu sein wie dieser Rabe und die böse Tat an meinem Bruder zu verbergen?"
ref: He said: woe unto me was incapable of being like unto this raven so that I might cover the corpse of my brother!

result.output: He said, Oh woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and conceal the evil deed from my brother?

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Sagt nicht ra'ina, sondern sagt unzurna und hört zu! Und für die Kafir ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: O believers, do not say, 'Observe us,' but say, 'Regard us'; and give ear; for unbelievers awaits a painful chastisement.

result.output: You who have internalized the iman! Do not say ra'ina, but say unzurna and listen! And a painful torment is destined for the kafir.

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf.
ref: who has created all things well.

result.output: The one who did everything well with what He created.

src: Gewiß, Allah vergibt die Sünden alle. Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

result.output: Surely, Allah forgives all sins. He is indeed the Most Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Er ist es, der die Himmel und die Erde der Wahrheit entsprechend erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose.

result.output: He is the one who has created the heavens and the earth in accordance with the truth.

src: Und zu Seinen Ayat zählt euer Schlaf während der Nacht und am Tag und euer Anstreben nach Seiner Gunst. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: And among His signs is your sleeping during the night and day, and your seeking His munificence; indeed in this are signs for people who heed.

result.output: Among His signs is your sleep at night and during the day, as well as your pursuit of His bounty. Surely, in this there are signs for people who listen.

src: Oder dachten diejenigen, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, daß ALLAH ihren Groll nie hervorbringen wird?!
ref: Do they whose minds are filled with doubt, think that God will not expose their malice?

result.output: Or did those in whose hearts is sickness think that Allah would never bring forth their resentment?!

src: Sag: "Wer gewährt euch Rizq von den Himmeln und der Erde?" Sag: "ALLAH!
ref: Proclaim, “Who provides you sustenance from the sky and the earth?”

result.output: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah!"

src: Und WIR schenkten ihm Ishaq und Ya'qub, bestimmten die Prophetenschaft und die Schrift bei seiner Nachkommenschaft und ließen ihm seine Belohnung im Diesseits zuteil werden.
ref: And, We gave him (Abraham), Isaac and Jacob and appointed on his descendants the Prophethood and the Book.

result.output: And WE gave him Ishaq and Ya'qub and bestowed Prophethood and the Book upon his descendants, and in this world he was recompensed.

src: Aber nein! Die Ungerechten befinden sich in deutlichem Irrtum.
ref: Nay, but the evildoers are in manifest error.

result.output: But no! The unjust are clearly mistaken.

src: Diese erhoben sich jedoch in Arroganz und waren schwer verfehlende Leute.
ref: But they behaved arrogantly and were Mujrimun (disbelievers, sinners, polytheists, criminals, etc.) folk.

result.output: However, they rose in arrogance and were severely misguided people.

src: Und wenn sie als Gefangene zu euch kommen, so löst ihr sie aus.
ref: Although, should they come to you as captives, you would ransom them.

result.output: And if they come to you as prisoners, you shall ransom them.

src: Doch kooperiert nicht bei dem Verwerflichen und bei der Übertretung! Und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber.
ref: Assist each other to virtue and piety, and assist not each other to sin and transgression, Fear Allah: verily Allah is Severe in chastising.

result.output: But do not cooperate in sin and aggression! And act with Taqwa towards Allah.

src: (Fordert) dann hernach entweder Gnade oder Lösegeld, bis der Krieg seine Lasten (von euch) wegnimmt. Das ist so.
ref: Then, either free them by grace orransom until war shall lay down its loads, in this way, it shall be.

result.output: (Forces) then afterwards either mercy or ransom, until the war takes its burdens (away from you). That's how it is.

src: Davon sind diejenigen Götzendiener ausgenommen, mit denen ihr einen Vertrag eingegangen seid und die es euch an nichts haben fehlen lassen und die keine anderen gegen euch unterstützt haben.
ref: Except those idolaters with whom you have a treaty, who have not failed you in the least, nor helped anyone against you.

result.output: Those idolaters are exempted from that, with whom you have made a treaty and who have not subsequently failed you in anything nor aided anyone against you.

src: - denn gewiß, vor der Strafe ihres Herrn (kann) sich niemand sicher glauben,
ref: Surely no one can be secure from the punishment of his Lord, --

result.output: Because certainly, nobody can believe themselves to be safe from the punishment of their Lord.

src: Am Tag, da sie auf ihren Gesichtern ins (Höllen)feuer gezerrt werden: "Kostet die Berührung der Sengenden."
ref: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."

result.output: On the day when their faces are dragged through the Fire, they will be told, 'Feel the touch of Hellfire.'

src: Ob der eine reich oder arm ist, so ist Allah beiden näher; darum folgt nicht der persönlichen Neigung, auf daß ihr gerecht handeln könnt. Und wenn ihr aber (die Wahrheit) verdreht oder euch von (der Wahrheit) abwendet, so ist Allah eures Tuns kundig.
ref: Whether a man be rich or poor, God is his greater well-wisher than you. So follow not the behests of lust lest you swerve from justice; and if you prevaricate or avoid (giving evidence), God is cognisant of all that you do.

result.output: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; therefore do not follow personal inclination so that you may act justly. And if you distort truth or turn away from it, then Allah is indeed aware of what you do.

src: Und richte deine Wünsche auf deinen Herrn aus.
ref: And turn to your Lord with all your love.

result.output: And direct your wishes towards your Lord.

src: So ruft Ihn an, (wobei ihr) Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion (seid).
ref: Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.

result.output: So call him, (while you) are sincere to him in religion.

src: Aber viele von ihnen waren Frevler.
ref: But many of them are wicked.

result.output: But many of them were transgressors.

src: Eine Gruppe von meinen Dienern pflegte zu sagen: >Unser Herr, wir glauben, so vergib uns und erbarme dich unser.
ref: There was a section among My creatures that said: 'O Lord, we believe.

result.output: A group of my servants used to say: 'Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us.'

src: Und wenn Wir eine Stadt verderben wollen, befehlen Wir denen, die in ihr üppig leben, (zu freveln), und sie freveln in ihr.
ref: And when We decide to destroy a town (population), We (first) send a definite order (to obey Allah and be righteous) to those among them [or We (first) increase in number those of its population] who are given the good things of this life.

result.output: And if We want to destroy a city, We command those who live luxuriously in it (to commit evils), and they commit evils therein.

src: Soll die Ermahnung (ausgerechnet) auf ihn aus unserer Mitte herabgesandt worden sein?"
ref: Hath Unto him the admonition been sent down from amongst us!

result.output: Should the admonition have been (curiously) sent down on him from our midst?

src: Gewiß, wen DU ins Feuer eintreten läßt, den hast DU bereits mit Sicherheit erniedrigt.
ref: Whom Thou causest to enter the Fire: him indeed Thou hast confounded.

result.output: Surely, whomsoever you let enter into the fire, you have already degraded him with certainty.

src: Und sie sagten: "Unser HERR!
ref: And they said, “Our Lord!

result.output: And they said: "Our Lord!

src: Sie sagten: "Wir werden seinen Vater trotz seiner Zuneigung ihm gegenüber zu überreden suchen.
ref: They said, “We will solicit him from his father.

result.output: They said: We will try to persuade his father despite his fondness towards him.

src: Wenn WIR wollen, lassen WIR mit ihnen die Erde versinken oder lassen WIR über ihnen Bruchteile vom Himmel fallen. Gewiß, darin ist doch eine Aya für jeden umkehrenden Diener.
ref: If We will, We can bury them into the earth or cause a part of the sky to fall on them; indeed in this is a sign for every repentant bondman.

result.output: If WE want, WE can make the Earth swallow them up, or WE can let pieces of the sky fall on them. Surely, in this there is a sign for every servant who turns to Allah.

src: O meine Kinder, geht und erkundigt euch über Yusuf und seinen Bruder. Und gebt nicht die Hoffnung auf das Erbarmen Allahs auf.
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God.

result.output: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope in the mercy of Allah.

src: Der Ungläubige ist ein Helfer gegen seinen Herrn.
ref: The unbeliever has always been an auxiliary against his Lord.

result.output: The unbeliever is a helper against his lord.

src: Und sollten sie gegen euch den bewaffneten Kampf aufnehmen, werden sie euch den Rücken flüchtend kehren, dann wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: And if they fight you, they will turn around and flee, then they will not be helped.

result.output: And if they should take up armed struggle against you, they will flee from you with their backs turned, then no support will be given to them.,

src: Und was lehrt dich wissen, was At-Tariq ist?
ref: How will you comprehend what the night star is?

result.output: And what does knowledge teach you about what At-Tariq is?

src: Und solltest du sie um Rechtleitung bitten, hören sie bestimmt nicht.
ref: When you call upon them for guidance, they do not hear.

result.output: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.

src: Es wird (zu ihnen) gesagt werden: "Betretet die Tore der Hölle, ewig darin zu bleiben."
ref: "Enter the gates of Hell," they will be told, "and there abide for ever."

result.output: It will be said to them: 'Enter the gates of hell to stay there forever.'

src: Und WIR erhöhten die einen von ihnen über die anderen um Stellungen, damit die einen von ihnen die anderen zu Beschäftigten nehmen. Doch die Gnade deines HERRN ist besser als das, was sie anhäufen.
ref: We have distributed among them their comforts in the life of this world, and gave high status to some over others so that they mock at each other; and the mercy of your Lord is better than all what they hoard.

result.output: And WE raised some of them above others in ranks so that some might take others for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.

src: Doch nur diejenigen, die zuhören, hören auf dich, während die Toten ALLAH erweckt. Dann werden sie zu Ihm zurückgebracht.
ref: Only they will respond who can hear. As for the dead, raised they will be by God, then to Him they will be returned.

result.output: But only those who listen heed you, while the dead Allah awakens. Then they will be brought back to Him.

src: Und wenn ihnen gesagt wird: "Folgt dem, was ALLAH hinabsandte." Sagen sie: "Nein, sondern wir folgen dem, woran wir unsere Ahnen fanden."
ref: and when it is said to them, 'Follow what God has sent down,' they say, 'No; but we will follow such things as we found our fathers doing.' What?

result.output: And when it is said to them, 'Follow what Allah has sent down,' they say, 'We follow what we found our ancestors following.'

src: Und es wurde den Menschen gesagt: "Wollt ihr euch nicht versammeln,
ref: And the people were also asked to assemble.

result.output: And the people were told: "Don't you want to gather together

src: Ihr, die den Iman bekundet habt!
ref: O People who Believe!

result.output: Your, who have declared faith!

src: Das Bleibende (an Lohn) von Allah ist besser für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid. Und ich bin nicht Hüter über euch."
ref: That which is left to you by God is better, if you are true believers; yet I am not a warden over you."

result.output: The lasting reward from Allah is better for you, if you believe. And I am not a guardian over you.

src: (Er ist) der Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde.
ref: The Creator of the heavens and the earth.

result.output: He is the creator of the heavens and the Earth.

src: Und Frömmigkeit besteht nicht darin, daß ihr durch die Hinterseite in die Häuser geht. Frömmigkeit besteht darin, daß man gottesfürchtig ist.
ref: Piety does not lie in entering the house through the back door, for the pious man is he who follows the straight path.

result.output: And piety does not consist in entering houses through the back. Piety consists in being God-fearing.

src: Sie alle haben WIR vor den Menschen ausgezeichnet,
ref: And each one of them We favoured over all mankind.

result.output: They all have distiguished us in front of people.

src: Die Vornehmen seines Volkes, die nicht glaubten, sagten: "Wir sehen in dir nur einen Menschen unseresgleichen und wir sehen, daß dir keine als jene gefolgt sind, die aller äußeren Erscheinung nach die Niedrigsten unter uns sind, noch sehen wir in euch irgendeinen Vorzug vor uns; nein, wir erachten euch für Lügner."
ref: The leaders of the people who were unbelievers, replied: "We see that you are but a man like us, and see that none among us follows you but the meanest and immature of judgement, and do not see any excellence in you above us. In fact, we think you are a liar."

result.output: The nobles of his people who did not believe said: 'We only see in you a person like ourselves, and we see that no one has followed you except those who outwardly appear to be the lowest among us. Nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you a liar.'

src: Und das Wort wird über sie fällig werden dafür, daß sie Unrecht taten, und da werden sie nicht reden.
ref: When the sentence will have been passed upon them for their wickedness, they will not be able to say a word.

result.output: And the word will befall them for doing wrong, and they will not speak.

src: Er steht für die Gerechtigkeit ein. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm, dem Mächtigen, dem Weisen.
ref: He upholds justice there is no god except He, the Mighty, the Wise.

result.output: He stands for justice. There is no god but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.

src: Und WIR machten sie zu Imamen, die zum Feuer einladen. Und am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: We made them the leaders of those who call to Hell; and on the Day of Judgement they will not be helped.

result.output: And WE made them imams inviting to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.

src: Er sagte: «Doch. Aber mein Herz soll Ruhe finden.»
ref: Ibrahim said, “Surely yes, why not?

result.output: He said: "Yes. But my heart shall find peace."

src: Kinder Adams! Bereits haben WIR euch Kleidung hinabgesandt, die eure Schamteile bedeckt, auch schmückende Kleidung.
ref: O sons of Adam, We have revealed to you a dress that would both hide your nakedness and be an adornment, but the raiment of piety is best.

result.output: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothes that cover your private parts, as well as adornment clothing.

src: Sie werden sagen: "(All dies ist) Allahs." Sprich: "Wieso also seid ihr verblendet?"
ref: Thereupon they will say, “Such greatness is only that of Allah”; say, “Then by what magic are you deceived?”

result.output: You will say: '(All of this is) Allah's.' Say: 'So why are you deluded?'

src: Vielmehr (soll er sagen): "Seid Gottesgelehrte mit dem, was ihr gelehrt habt und mit dem, was ihr studiert habt."
ref: Rather, 'Be you masters in that you know the Book, and in that you study.'

result.output: Rather (he should say): be scholars of God with what you have taught and with what you have studied.

src: Ich folge nur dem, was mir eingegeben wird.
ref: I only follow what is sent down to me."

result.output: I only follow what is put into me.

src: Er (Moses) sagte: "lch tat es damals, als ich auf dem Irrweg war.
ref: (Moses) replied: "I did do that and I was in the wrong,

result.output: He (Moses) said, I did it at that time when I was on the wrong path.

src: Sie werden mit silbernen Spangen geschmückt sein. Und ihr Herr wird sie von einem reinen Trank trinken lassen.
ref: And adorned they shall be with bracelets of silver: and their Lord shall give them drink a beverage pure.

result.output: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their lord will allow them to drink a pure potion.

src: Die damit rechnen, daß sie ihrem Herrn begegnen und daß sie zu Ihm zurückkehren werden.
ref: Who are conscious that they have to meet their Lord, and to Him they have to return.

result.output: Those who count on meeting their Lord and returning to Him.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: They are the residents of Hell where they will live for ever.

result.output: And these are the companions of the fire, therein they will abide forever.

src: Dann verdorrt es, und du siehst es gelb werden. Dann macht Er es zu zermalmtem Zeug.
ref: Thereafter it wirhereth, and thou beholdest it turn yellow; then He maketh it chaff.

result.output: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.

src: Aber er wandte sich der Erde zu und folgte seiner Neigung. So ist es mit ihm wie mit einem Hund: Gehst du auf ihn los, hängt er die Zunge heraus; läßt du ihn in Ruhe, hängt er auch die Zunge heraus.
ref: if it had been Our will, We could have used these signs to exalt him, but instead he clung to the earth and followed his own desires, he was like a dog that pants whether you chase it away or leave it alone.

result.output: But he turned to the earth and followed his inclination. So it is with him like with a dog: If you approach him, he hangs out his tongue; if you leave him alone, he also hangs out his tongue.

src: Und erwähne den Bruder von 'Aad, als er seine Leute in Al-ahqaf warnte, und bereits vergingen die Warner vor ihm und hinter ihm: "Dient nichts anderes als ALLAH!
ref: And remember (Hud) the brother of 'Ad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf (the curved sand-hills in the southern part of Arabian Peninsula).

result.output: And mention the brother of 'Aad when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and already the warners had passed away before him and behind him: 'Serve none but Allah!'

src: Aber was für ihre Teilhaber ist, das erreicht Allah nicht, während das, was für Allah ist, ihre Teilhaber erreicht.
ref: So what is for their associates reaches not God; and what is for God reaches their associates.

result.output: But what is for their partners does not reach Allah, while what is for Allah reaches their partners.

src: Sag: Wenn ich ihn ersonnen haben sollte, so vermögt ihr für mich nichts gegen Allah (auszurichten). Er weiß sehr wohl, worüber ihr euch (ausgiebig) auslaßt.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “If I have fabricated it, then (I know that) you have no power to support me against Allah; He well knows the matters you are involved in; He is Sufficient as a Witness between me and you; and He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Most Merciful.”

result.output: Say: If I had invented it, you could not do anything for me against Allah. He knows very well what you are talking about.

src: Und Nuh rief Uns ja bereits zu - welch trefflicher Erhörer sind Wir fürwahr!
ref: Noah had verily called to Us. And how gracious was He who answered (him).

result.output: And Nuh already called out to Us - How excellent a Hearer are We, truly!

src: Und gib denen frohe Botschaft, die Gutes tun.
ref: So give glad tidings to those who are doers of good.

result.output: And give glad tidings to those who do good deeds.

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben. Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem ER will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: That God may reward them for the best of their deeds, and bestow more on them of His bounty, for God gives whom He please without measure.

result.output: Verily, Allah will give them in return [something] better than what they [have] done, and He will grant them with even more from His bounty. And Allah provides sustenance to whom He wills without measure.

src: Er macht sie deutlich für Leute, die Bescheid wissen.
ref: He manifesteth them for people who have knowledge.

result.output: He makes it clear for people who know what's going on.

src: Dann vertauschten es diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, mit einem Ausspruch, der anders war als das, was ihnen gesagt worden war. Da sandten Wir über diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, ein Zorngericht vom Himmel herab dafür, daß sie frevelten.
ref: But the wicked changed and perverted the word We had spoken to a word distorted, and We sent from heaven retribution on the wicked, for they disobeyed.

result.output: Then those who did wrong substituted one statement for another, so We sent down upon the wrongdoers a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.

src: Und wen ALLAH abirren läßt, für den gibt es keinen Weg (zur Rechtleitung).
ref: He whom God allows to go astray has no way.

result.output: And for those whom Allah leaves astray, there will be no path (to guidance).

src: Sie gebieten das Rechte und verbieten das Verwerfliche, verrichten das Gebet und entrichten die Abgabe und gehorchen Allah und Seinem Gesandten.
ref: They advocate virtue, forbid evil, perform the prayers, practice charity, and obey God and His Messenger.

result.output: They command the right and forbid the reprehensible, perform the prayer and pay the alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.

src: Die Bewohner von Medina und die arabischen Beduinen in ihrer Umgebung dürfen nicht hinter dem Gesandten Gottes zurückbleiben und sich selbst ihm vorziehen. Dies, weil sie weder auf dem Weg Gottes Durst oder Mühsal oder Hunger erleiden noch einen Schritt unternehmen, der die Ungläubigen in Groll versetzt, noch einem Feind etwas zufügen, ohne daß dadurch ein gutes Werk für sie aufgezeichnet würde.
ref: It was not worthy of the people of Madina, and the Arabs of the desert around them, to abandon the Prophet of God, and to care more for themselves than for him; for there is no hardship or thirst or hunger that they know in the service of God, and no place they walk on where walking provokes the unbelievers, and no harm they receive from the enemy, but is put down as a good deed in their favour.

result.output: The inhabitants of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their surroundings are not allowed to lag behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves to him. This is because they neither suffer thirst, hardship, or hunger on the path of God nor take a step that upsets the disbelievers or harm an enemy without it being recorded as a good deed for them.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allkräftig, allwürdig.
ref: Verily God is all-powerful and all-mighty.

result.output: Surely, Allah is omnipotent, all-worthy.

src: Doch selbst dann, wenn sie sich mit ihrer Kleidung verhüllen, ER kennt alles, was sie verheimlichen und was sie offenlegen.
ref: But when they cover themselves up with their garments, He knows what they hide and what they expose.

result.output: Yet even then, when they conceal themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they hide and what they reveal.

src: Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: The Ark came to rest on Mount Judi.

result.output: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Und rufe neben Allah keinen anderen Gott an. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: And call not upon another god with God; there is no god but He.

result.output: And do not invoke besides Allah another deity. There is no deity except Him.

src: Sag: "Diejenigen in den Himmeln und auf Erden kennen das Verborgene nicht, nur ALLAH (kennt es)!" Und sie merken nicht, wann sie erweckt werden.
ref: Say: "No one in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unknown except God, nor can they know when they will be raised again.

result.output: Say: "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, only ALLAH knows it!" And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.

src: Oder sagen sie etwa: "Er hat ihn sich selbst ausgedacht'"? Nein!
ref: What! They say, “He has invented the Qur'an”?

result.output: Or do they say: "He came up with it himself"? No!

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ändert nichts von dem worin Menschen sind, bis sie das ändern, was sie in sich tragen. Und wenn ALLAH für Menschen Übel bestimmt, so kann es nicht aufgehalten werden.
ref: Lo! Allah changeth not the condition of a folk until they (first) change that which is in their hearts; and if Allah willeth misfortune for a folk there is none that can repel it, nor have they a defender beside Him.

result.output: Indeed, ALLAH does not change the condition of a people until they change what is within themselves. And if ALLAH has decreed misfortune for a people, it cannot be averted.

src: Und unter ihnen ist eine Gruppe, die mit ihren Zungen die Schrift verdrehen, damit ihr denkt, dies gehöre zur Schrift, obwohl es nicht zur Schrift gehört, noch dazu sagen sie: "Es sei von ALLAH", doch es ist nicht von ALLAH. Und sie verbreiten Lügen im Namen ALLAHs, während sie es wissen.
ref: Among them is a section which distorts in reading the Scripture in a way that though it sounds like the Scripture, in fact it is not; yet they say it is from God, when they know it is not; and they lie about God, and knowingly.

result.output: And among them is a group who distort the Scripture with their tongues so you may think it is from the Scripture, but it is not from the Scripture. And they say, "This is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.

src: Und haltet sie an; denn sie sollen befragt werden."
ref: And detain them, for they will be questioned."

result.output: And arrest them; for they shall be questioned.

src: Und ER ist mit euch, wo ihr seid.
ref: And He is with you (by His Knowledge) wheresoever you may be.

result.output: And HE is with you, wherever you are.

src: Vielmehr ist Allah euer Schutzherr; und Er ist der beste Helfer.
ref: Allah is your Patron and He is the best of the helpers.

result.output: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist einer von dreien."
ref: They are unbelievers who say, 'God is the Third of Three.

result.output: For sure, unbelievers are those who say: Indeed, Allah is one of three.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Madyan ihren Bruder Shuayb. Er sagte: «O mein Volk, dienet Gott. Ihr habt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Ein deutliches Zeichen ist von eurem Herrn zu euch gekommen, so gebt volles Maß und Gewicht und zieht den Menschen nichts ab, was ihnen gehört, und stiftet nicht Unheil auf der Erde, nachdem sie in Ordnung gebracht worden ist. Das ist bestimmt besser für euch, so ihr gläubig seid.
ref: And We sent Shuaib to Madyan from their community; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah – you do not have any God except Him; indeed a clear proof has come to you from your Lord, so measure and weigh in full and do not give the people their goods diminished, and do not spread turmoil in the earth after it is organised; this is for your good, if you believe.”

result.output: And to Midian [We sent] their brother Shuayb. He said, "O my people, worship God; you have no deity other than Him. And do not decrease from the measure and the scale. Indeed, I see you in prosperity, but indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day. And O my people, give full measure and weight in justice and do not deprive the people of their due and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers.

src: Seine Blütenstände sind so, als wären sie Köpfe der Satane.
ref: Its spathes are like the prickly pear.

result.output: Its inflorescences are like heads of satans.,

src: (Geht also) mit unseren Zeichen. Ihr und diejenigen, die euch folgen, werden die Sieger sein.»
ref: By virtue of Our signs, you and those who follow you will be the triumphant.”

result.output: Thus use our signs. You and those who follow you will be the winners.

src: Und Sulaiman beerbte Dawud.
ref: And Sulaiman (Solomon) inherited (the knowledge of) Dawud (David).

result.output: And Sulaiman inherited Dawud.

src: Kein Anderer als der Allerbarmer hält sie zurück.
ref: Nothing holds them aloft but God.

result.output: No one but the Most Merciful holds her back.

src: So vergelten Wir den Ungerechten.
ref: That is how We requite the iniquitous.

result.output: So we repay the unjust.

src: Und Mein Fluch soll auf dir bis zum Tage des Gerichts lasten."
ref: Upon you will be My damnation till the Day of Doom."

result.output: And my curse shall rest upon thee until the day of judgment.

src: Entsinnt euch Meiner Gaben, die ICH euch gewährt habe, und daß ICH euch den Menschen gegenüber auszeichnete.
ref: Remember the favour of Mine, which I bestowed upon you and gave you superiority over others of your time. (by sending the Noble Messengers to your nation)

result.output: Remember my gifts that I have granted you, and that I have distinguished you from other people.,

src: Sprich: "Er ist es, Der euch ins Dasein rief und Der euch Ohren und Augen und Herzen gab; (aber) gering ist es, was ihr an Dank wißt!"
ref: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"

result.output: Say: "He is the One who called you into being and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. Yet little do you give thanks."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Wenn ihr zum rituellen Gebet aufstehen wollt, dann wascht (vorher) eure Gesichter, eure Hände und Arme bis zu den Ellenbogen, benetzt eure Köpfe und (wascht) eure Füße bis zu den Knöcheln.
ref: O believers, when you stand up for the service of prayer wash your faces and hands up to elbows, and also wipe your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.

result.output: O ye who believe! When ye prepare for prayer, wash your faces, and your hands (and arms) to the elbows; Rub your heads (with water); and (wash) your feet to the ankles.

src: Dies (geschieht), weil sie dem folgten, was Allah erzürnte, und das haßten, was ihm wohlgefällig war. So macht Er ihre Werke zunichte.
ref: This is because they followed the matter which displeases Allah, and they disliked what pleases Him – He therefore squandered away all their deeds.

result.output: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what was pleasing to Him. Thus, He renders their deeds null.

src: Und sag: "Die Wahrheit ist von eurem HERRN. Wer will, der soll den Iman verinnerlichen, und wer will, der soll Kufr betreiben."
ref: Say: "The truth is from your Lord: So believe if you like, or do not believe if you will."

result.output: And say: "The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wants to, let him internalize the Iman, and whoever wants to, let him commit kufr."

src: ALLAH gehört, was in den Himmeln und auf Erden ist. Gewiß, ALLAH ist Der absolut Autarke, Der Alllobenswürdige.
ref: To Allah only belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and in the earth; indeed Allah only is the Absolute, the Most Praiseworthy.

result.output: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. Indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

src: Und WIR ließen darin einen Fluß entspringen.
ref: And We made a river flow through them.

result.output: And we let a river spring forth in it.

src: Das, was Gott für euch an Lebensunterhalt herabgesandt hat und was ihr in Verbotenes und Erlaubtes eingeteilt habt, - sprich: Hat Gott es euch erlaubt, oder erdichtet ihr etwas gegen Gott?
ref: And you have made of it lawful and unlawful." Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Has Allah permitted you (to do so), or do you invent a lie against Allah?"

result.output: That which God has sent down for you as livelihood and what you have divided into forbidden and permitted - say: Has God permitted it, or are you inventing something against God?

src: Und jeder Seele wird in vollem Maß zukommen, was sie getan hat. Er weiß sehr wohl Bescheid über das, was sie tun.
ref: And every soul will be repaid for its deeds in full, and He knows very well what they used to do.

result.output: And each soul will be fully compensated for what it has done. He is well aware of what they do.

src: Diejenigen nun, die gottergeben sind, bemühen sich um den rechten Wandel.
ref: Those who have submitted have taken the right course;

result.output: Now those who are devoted to God seek to live a righteous life.

src: Und viel Beute, die sie nehmen würden.
ref: And the many spoils that they were to take.

result.output: And a lot of loot they would take.

src: ALLAH richtet zwischen euch am Tag der Auferstehung in dem, worüber ihr uneins zu sein pflegtet."
ref: God will judge between you on the Day of Judgement in what you are at variance."

result.output: ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding that over which you used to differ.

src: Nein! Vielmehr ist die Stunde (des Gerichts) der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt. Und die Stunde ist noch schrecklicher und bitterer.
ref: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.

result.output: No! Rather, the hour (of judgment) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.

src: angelehnt darin auf Liegen.
ref: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches.

result.output: leaning on it on loungers

src: Für diejenigen, die Gutes tun, gibt es hier im Diesseits Gutes.
ref: For those who do good in this world, is goodness.

result.output: For those who do good, there is good in this world.

src: Dann sprachen Wir: "Geht beide zum Volk, das Unsere Zeichen verworfen hat": dann zerstörten Wir sie alle vollständig.
ref: Then We told them: "Go to the people who have rejected Our signs." Then We annihilated them completely.

result.output: Then We said, Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs. And We destroyed them completely.

src: Doch wenn ihr in Furcht seid, dann betet zu Fuß oder im Reiten. Und wenn ihr in Sicherheit seid, gedenkt Allahs, wie Er euch das gelehrt hat, was ihr nicht wußtet.
ref: If you fear (war or danger), pray while standing or on horseback; but when you have safety again remember God, for He taught you what you did not know.

result.output: But if you are afraid, then pray on foot or while riding. And when you are secure, remember Allah as He has taught you what you did not know.

src: Acht Paare: zwei von den Schafen und zwei von den Ziegen.
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats.

result.output: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.

src: Und Wir haben Mose das Buch zukommen lassen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)].

result.output: And We sent down to Moses the Book.

src: Und es werden sie dort ewig junge Knaben bedienen. Wenn du sie siehst, hältst du sie für verstreute Perlen.
ref: Immortal youths shall surround them, waiting upon them; when you see them, you would think they are scattered pearls.

result.output: And there will be eternal young boys serving them there. When you see them, you'll think they're scattered pearls.

src: Doch, mit Sicherheit! Gewiß, sein HERR war über ihn allsehend.
ref: Yes indeed; his Lord had sight of him.

result.output: But certainly! Surely, his LORD was all-seeing over him.

src: Und WIR ließen diejenigen Leute, die unterdrückt wurden, erben das Östliche und das Westliche des Landes, das WIR mit Baraka erfüllt haben. Und das gute Versprechen deines HERRN für die Kinder Israils wurde vollständig eingelöst als Belohnung für die Geduld, die sie aufbrachten. Und WIR vernichteten das, was Pharao und seine Leute bewerkstelligten, und das, was sie an Bauten errichteten.
ref: And We made the people who were oppressed, the inheritors of the eastern and western parts of the land in which We placed blessings; and the good promise of your Lord was fulfilled for the Descendants of Israel – the reward of their patience; and We destroyed whatever Firaun and his people built and whatever they had contrived.

result.output: We let those people who were suppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land that We have filled with Baraka. And the good promise of your Lord to the Children of Israel was fulfilled completely as a reward for the patience they showed. And We destroyed what Pharaoh and his people accomplished, and what they built.

src: Auch haben sie eine Schuldklage gegen mich erhoben, deshalb fürchte ich, daß sie mich umbringen."
ref: And they have a charge (of murder) against me. So I fear that they will kill me."

result.output: Also, they have filed a lawsuit against me, so I fear they will kill me.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt diejenigen, die euren Din zum Spott und zur Belustigung mißbrauchen von denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, und von den Kafir, nicht als Wali!
ref: O ye who believe! take not as friends those who make a mockery and fun of your religion from among those who have been vouchsafed the Book before you and other infidels.

result.output: O you who have internalized the Iman! Take not for friends and protectors those who take your religion for a mockery or sport,- whether among those who received the Scripture before you, or among those who reject Faith; but fear Allah, if ye have faith (indeed).

src: Nimm Almosen von ihrem Besitz, auf daß du sie dadurch reinigen und läutern mögest.
ref: Accept the offerings they make from their wealth in order to cleanse and purify them for progress, and invoke blessings upon them.

result.output: Take alms from their possessions, that you may thereby purify and purify them.

src: So gewähre den Ungläubigen noch eine Frist.
ref: So give a respite to the disbelievers.

result.output: So grant the unbelievers a respite.

src: Sie folgen einem bloßen Wahn und ihren persönlichen Neigungen, obwohl doch die Weisung ihres Herrn zu ihnen kam.
ref: They only follow conjecture and wish-fulfilment, even though guidance had come to them already from their Lord.

result.output: They follow mere delusions and their personal inclinations, even though the guidance of their Lord has come to them.

src: ER sagte: "Das von Mir Versprochene umfaßt nicht die Unrecht-Begehenden."
ref: He said 'My covenant shall not reach the evildoers.'

result.output: He said, "What I promised does not include those who commit injustices."

src: Das Wasser nahm ab, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Es hielt auf dem Djudi an.
ref: And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).

result.output: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.

src: Doch WIR sehen mit euch nicht eure Fürbittenden, die ihr unter euch als Partner (für ALLAH) angenommen habt. Gewiß, bereits ist (die Bindung) zwischen euch unterbrochen und euch ist das abhanden gekommen, was ihr angenommen habt.
ref: We do not see with you your intercessors, those you asserted to be associates in you; the bond between you is now broken; that which you ever asserted has now gone astray from you.

result.output: But WE do not see with you your intercessors whom you have taken as partners (for ALLAH) among yourselves. Indeed, the bond between you has already been broken, and what you have taken has been lost to you.

src: Und hätten WIR ihnen geboten: "ihr sollt euch selbst töten oder eure Wohnstätten verlassen, würden dies nur wenige von ihnen tun." Und hätten sie doch das getan, womit sie ermahnt werden, wäre es besser für sie und würde sie noch mehr (im Iman) bestärken.
ref: If We had commanded them to lay down their lives and to go forth from their homes, only a few would have obeyed; though had they followed what they had been commanded it would surely have been good for them and the strengthening of their faith.

result.output: And if we had commanded them, "Kill yourselves or leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. And if they had done what they were advised to do, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them even more in faith.

src: Und (denke daran,) wenn sie (dereinst) im (Höllen)feuer miteinander streiten, dann sagen die Schwachen zu denjenigen, die sich hochmütig verhielten: "Wir waren doch eure Gefolgsleute; könnt ihr uns nun einen Teil des (Höllen)feuers abnehmen?"
ref: As they will noisily argue in the Fire, the weaker ones will say to the arrogant: "We were your followers, so will you take over some of our share of the fire?"

result.output: And (remember,) when they (eventually) argue with each other in the (Hell)fire, the weak ones say to those who acted arrogantly: 'We were indeed your followers, can you now relieve us a part of the (Hell)fire?'

src: Wenn ihr ALLAH (Seiner Sache) eine Hasan-Anleihe gebt, wird ER euch vervielfachen und euch vergeben.
ref: If you lend a goodly loan to God, He will double it for you, and forgive you.

result.output: If you lend Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you.

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il!
ref: Commemorate Ishmael in the Book.

result.output: And mention Ishmael in the scripture!

src: Da wandte Er sich euch wieder gnädig zu.
ref: Then He accepted your repentance.

result.output: Then He turned to you again in mercy.,

src: Erhaben ist Allah, der König, der Wahre!
ref: So high exalted be God, the true King!

result.output: Sublime is Allah, the king, the true!

src: Er (Fir'aun) sagte: "Ihr glaubt an ihn, bevor ich es euch erlaube?
ref: (The Pharaoh) said: "You have come to believe without my dispensation.

result.output: He (Pharaoh) said: You believe in him (Moses), before I give you permission for it?

src: Dann warf Moses seinen Stock hin, und siehe, er verschlang (all) das, was sie vorgetäuscht hatten.
ref: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it swallowed up their conjurations.

result.output: Then Moses threw his staff and behold, it swallowed up all their false devices.

src: Und sie haben Gott Teilhaber gegeben: die Djinn, wo Er sie doch erschaffen hat. Und sie haben Ihm Söhne und Töchter angedichtet, ohne (richtiges) Wissen.
ref: Yet they ascribe to jinns a partnership with God, although He created them; and they ascribe to Him sons and daughters, without possessing any knowledge.

result.output: And they have attributed partners to God: the jinn, although He created them. And they have fabricated for Him sons and daughters without knowledge.

src: Sag: "ALLAH genügt als Zeuge zwischen mir und euch!
ref: Say: "Sufficient is Allah for a witness between me and you.

result.output: Say: "ALLAH suffices as a witness between me and you!"

src: Sondern nur, wenn einer mit einem gesunden Herzen zu Gott kommt.»
ref: But to him who comes to God with a tranquil heart."

result.output: But only when one comes to God with a healthy heart.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir vermissen den Kelch des Königs.
ref: "We cannot find the master's goblet.

result.output: They said, We miss the king's chalice.

src: Für alle sind Rangstufen bestimmt für das, was sie getan haben, und dies, damit Er ihnen ihre Taten voll erstatte. Und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: Each will have a position in accordance with his deeds; and no wrong will be done to them.

result.output: There are ranks assigned for all they have done, that He might fully recompense them for their deeds; and they shall not be wronged.

src: Und Wir machen damit (manch) totes Land wieder lebendig; so wird auch das Herauskommen (erfolgen).
ref: And We give life therewith to a dead land. Thus will be the resurrection (of the dead).

result.output: And we make (some) dead land come back to life with it; thus the outcome (will be successful)

src: (Es sind) diejenigen, wenn WIR sie im Lande festigen, dann verrichten sie ordnungsgemäß das rituelle Gebet, entrichten die Zakat, rufen zum Gebilligten auf und raten vomMißbilligten ab. Und ALLAH gehört das Anschließende von den Angelegenheiten.
ref: The people who, if We give them control in the land, would keep the prayer established and pay charity and enjoin virtue and forbid from evil; and for Allah only is the result of all works.

result.output: Those, when WE establish them in the land, perform prayer and give zakat, and they enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of all matters.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch aus Erde erschuf, dann aus Nutfa, dann aus 'Alaqa, dann bringt ER euch als Kind heraus, dann damit ihr reif werdet, dann damit ihr Alte werdet - und von euch gibt es manche, deren (Seelen) vorher eingezogen werden - und damit ihr eine festgelegte Frist erreicht. Und damit ihr begreift.
ref: It is He who created you from dust, then a drop of semen, then the embryo; afterwards He brings you forth as a child; then you attain the age of manhood, and then reach old age. But some of you die before you reach the appointed term that you may haply understand.

result.output: HE is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your maturity, then [He allows you] that you become old. And among you is one who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.

src: Und es kamen die Brüder Yusufs und traten zu ihm ein; er erkannte sie, sie aber erkannten ihn nicht.
ref: The brothers of Joseph came (to Egypt) and visited him. He recognised them, though they did not recognise him.

result.output: And Joseph's brothers came and bowed down to him with their faces to the ground. Joseph recognized his brothers, but they did not recognize him.

src: Seid ihr darin also gleich (und) fürchtet sie, wie ihr einander fürchtet?
ref: Whom you fear as you fear each other?

result.output: So are you equal therein and fear them as you fear each other?

src: Dies sind (die Mittel) zur Aufklärung für die Menschheit und eine Führung und Barmherzigkeit für Leute, die einen festen Glauben haben.
ref: These are precepts of wisdom for men, and guidance and grace for people who believe with certainty.

result.output: These are the means of enlightenment for mankind and a guidance and mercy for people who have a firm faith.

src: Und zehrt nicht ihr Vermögen auf zu eurem Vermögen hinzu. Das wäre eine große Sünde.
ref: And do not consume their properties by combining them with yours, for that would be a serious sin.

result.output: And do not consume your wealth among yourselves unjustly or send it forth: verily, it will be ever heinous sending it forth for your own selves and it is unjust to consume the wealth of other people. Such people as do this shall have a grievous penalty.

src: Verderben auf den Menschen! Wie undankbar ist er!
ref: May man be slain – how ungrateful he is!

result.output: Ruin on people! How ungrateful he is!

src: Also und wer ALLAHs Hurumat hochachtet, dies ist gut für ihn bei seinem HERRN.
ref: Apart from this, whoever respects the sacred ordinances of God, will find a better reward for him with his Lord.

result.output: Also, whoever respects Allah's boundaries, it is good for him with his Lord.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran. Und WIR ermahnen sie, doch dies bestärkt sie nur zu einer noch größeren Übertretung.
ref: And when We proclaimed to you, “Indeed all mankind is within the control of your Lord”; and We did not create the spectacle* which We showed you except to try mankind, and the Tree** which is cursed in the Qur’an; and We warn them – so nothing increases for them except extreme rebellion. (* The Ascent of the Holy Prophet to the heavens and beyond, which the disbelievers denied as just a dream. ** The Zakkum tree which will grow in hell and be the food for its inhabitants.)

result.output: And (remember) when WE told you, Surely, your Lord will destroy the people. And WE made the vision which We showed you and the cursed tree in the Quran only as a trial for the people. And WE warn them, but it only increases their transgression.

src: Und er sprach: "O meine Söhne, zieht nicht durch ein einziges Tor ein, sondern zieht durch verschiedene Tore ein; ich kann euch nichts gegen Allah nützen. Die Entscheidung ruht bei Allah allein.
ref: (As they were leaving) their father said to them: "O my sons, do not seek one approach but employ different ways (of attaining your object). If anything should befall you from God I shall not be able to avert it, for all authority belongs to God.

result.output: And he said: 'O my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates; I cannot be of any benefit to you against Allah. The decision lies solely with Allah.'

src: Da sagte er: "O mein Volk, dient Allah, erwartet den Jüngsten Tag und richtet auf der Erde nicht unheilstiftend Verderben an."
ref: He said: "O people, worship God and be ready for the Day of Resurrection. Do no evil, and create no mischief in the land."

result.output: He said, 'O my people, worship Allah, expect the Day of Judgment, and do not cause mischief on the earth, causing corruption.'

src: Ist es denn für die Menschen verwunderlich, daß Wir einem Mann von ihnen (als Offenbarung) eingegeben haben: "Warne die Menschen und verkünde denen, die glauben, die frohe Botschaft, daß sie bei ihrem Herrn einen wahrhaftigen Stand haben"?
ref: Are the people astonished that a man who is one of them was commanded by Us to warn them and to bring glad tidings to those who believe that they have a true precedence with their Lord?

result.output: Is it surprising for people that We have revealed to a man from among themselves, 'Warn the people and give good news to those who believe that they will have a firm standing with their Lord'?

src: Als der Schrecken von Abraham gewichen und die frohe Botschaft zu ihm gekommen war, begann er mit Uns über das Volk von Lot zu streiten.
ref: When Abraham's fear was dispelled, and the good news had come to him, he pleaded for the people of Lot with Us.

result.output: As the terror had departed from Abraham and the good news had come to him, he started arguing with us about the people of Lot.

src: Das ist, was euch für den Tag der Abrechnung verheißen ist.
ref: This is what is promised you for the Day of Reckoning.

result.output: That is what is promised to you for the day of reckoning.

src: Da fanden sie in ihr eine Mauer, die einzustürzen drohte, und so richtete er sie auf.
ref: There they found a wall that was crumbling, which he repaired.

result.output: There they found a wall in her that was about to collapse, and so he straightened it up.

src: Das verursacht dem Propheten Ungelegenheit, und er ist scheu vor euch, jedoch Allah ist nicht scheu vor der Wahrheit.
ref: And when ye ask of them aught, ask it of them from behind a curtain.

result.output: This causes inconvenience to the Prophet, and he is shy towards you, but Allah is not shy towards the truth.

src: Sie machten für ihn, was er begehrte: Paläste und Bildwerke, Becken wie Teiche und feststehende Kochbottiche: "Wirkt ihr vom Hause Davids in Dankbarkeit." Und nur wenige von Meinen Dienern sind dankbar.
ref: fashioning for him whatsoever he would -- places of worship, statues, porringers like water-troughs, and anchored cooking-pots. 'Labour, O House of David, in thankfulness; for few indeed are those that are thankful among My servants.'

result.output: They made for him what he desired: palaces and sculptures, basins like ponds and fixed cooking tubs: "Perform your duty, you people of David's house, with gratitude." And only a few of My servants are grateful.

src: Sei geduldig.
ref: So be patient.

result.output: Be patient.

src: So wurde Fir'aun sein böses Tun ausgeschmückt, und er wurde vom (rechten) Weg abgehalten. Aber Fir'auns listige Tat wird nur zugrunde gehen.
ref: So the evil of his deeds was decked out fair to Pharaoh, and he was barred from the way, and Pharaoh's guile came only to ruin.

result.output: Thus, Pharaoh's evil deeds were embellished, and he was led astray from the (right) path. However, Pharaoh's cunning plot will only come to ruin.

src: (Schon) vor ihnen haben das Volk Nuhs und nach diesen die Gruppierungen (ihre Gesandten) der Lüge bezichtigt.
ref: The people of Noah had denied before them, and many factions after them.

result.output: Already before them, the people of Nuh accused (them) and after them the groups (their messengers) of lying.

src: Und wenn ihr euch mit ihnen zusammentut, so sind sie eure Brüder. Allah weiß den Unheilstifter vom Heilstifter (zu unterscheiden).
ref: Say: "The best thing to do is what is for their good; if ye mix their affairs with yours, they are your brethren; but Allah knows the man who means mischief from the man who means good.

result.output: And if you cooperate with them, then they are your brothers. Allah knows how to distinguish the mischief maker from the reformer.

src: Die Woge trennte sie beide, und so war er einer von denen, die ertränkt wurden.
ref: And a wave came between them, and he was among those who were drowned.

result.output: The wave separated both of them, and so he was one of those who drowned.

src: Dann sagten sie: "ALLAH gegenüber üben wir doch Tawakkul.
ref: They answered: "We have placed our trust in God.

result.output: Then they said: 'We practice Tawakkul towards Allah.'

src: Und wirf nur, was in deiner Rechten ist; es wird das verschlingen, was sie gemacht haben; denn das, was sie gemacht haben, ist nur die List eines Zauberers. Und ein Zauberer soll keinen Erfolg haben, woher er auch kommen mag."
ref: Throw down what is in your right hand: It will swallow up what they have conjured. For what they have fashioned is only a trick of the sorcerer; and a sorcerer does not succeed wherever he may come."

result.output: And throw only what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have made. What they have made is only the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is.”

src: Bitte also deinen Herrn für uns, daß Er uns (Speise) von dem hervorbringe, was die Erde wachsen läßt, (von) Kräutern, Gurken, Knoblauch, Linsen und Zwiebeln Da sagte er: "Wollt ihr etwa das, was geringer ist, in Tausch nehmen für das, was besser ist?
ref: We shall never put up with only one kind of food, so call upon your Lord to produce for us what the earth grows – some herbs, cucumbers, corn, lentils and onions”; he said, “What!

result.output: So pray to your Lord for us to bring forth for us from the earth its green herbs and its cucumbers, its garlic, its lentils, and its onions. He said, Would you exchange what is better for what is less? Ask in prayer from Allah what is better.,

src: Und wer mehr Gutes freiwillig gibt, so ist dies besser für ihn. Und wenn ihr fastet, ist es besser für euch, würdet ihr es nur wissen.
ref: Should anyone do good of his own accord, that is better for him, and to fast is better for you, should you know.

result.output: And whoever voluntarily gives more good, it is better for him. And if you fast, it is better for you, if you only knew.

src: Hast du nicht gesehen, wie dein Herr an den Aad gehandelt hat,
ref: Have you not seen what your Lord did to the 'Ad

result.output: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with Aad?

src: Sag: "Den Überschuß."
ref: Tell them: "The utmost you can spare."

result.output: Say: "The surplus."

src: Dies sind die Verse des Quran - eines deutlichen Buches.
ref: THESE are the verses of the Qur'an, and collection of explicit laws,

result.output: These are the verses of the Quran - a clear book.

src: O Prophet, Wir erlaubten dir deine Gattinnen, denen du ihre Brautgabe gegeben hast, und jene, die du von Rechts wegen aus (der Zahl) derer besitzt, die Allah dir als Kriegsbeute gegeben hat, und die Töchter deines Vaterbruders und die Töchter deiner Vaterschwestern und die Töchter deines Mutterbruders und die Töchter deiner Mutterschwestern, die mit dir ausgewandert sind, und jedwede gläubige Frau, die sich dem Propheten schenkt, vorausgesetzt, daß der Prophet sie zu heiraten wünscht; (dies gilt) nur für dich und nicht für die Gläubigen. Wir haben bereits bekanntgegeben, was Wir ihnen bezüglich ihrer Frauen und jener, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, verordnet haben, so daß sich (daraus) keine Verlegenheit für dich ergibt. Und Allah ist Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: O Prophet, We have made lawful for thee thy wives whom thou hast given their wages and what thy right hand owns, spoils of war that God has given thee, and the daughters of thy uncles paternal and aunts paternal, thy uncles maternal and aunts maternal, who have emigrated with thee, and any woman believer, if she give herself to the Prophet and if the Prophet desire to take her in marriage, for thee exclusively, apart from the believers -- We know what We have imposed upon them touching their wives and what their right hands own -- that there may be no fault in thee; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

result.output: O Prophet, We have made lawful for thee thy wives whom thou hast given their wages and what thy right hand owns, spoils of war that Allah has given thee, and the daughters of thy uncles paternal and aunts paternal, and the daughters of thy uncles maternal and aunts maternal, who have emigrated with thee, and any believing woman who gives herself to the Prophet and whom the Prophet wants to take in marriage. This is a privilege for thee, exclusive to thee, and not for other believers. We know what We have established for them regarding their wives and whom their right hands possess, that there should be no constraint upon thee. Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.

src: Sag: "Ich sage euch nicht, daß ich über dieMagazine von ALLAHs (Rizq) verfüge. Auch kenne ich das Verborgene nicht.
ref: Tell them: "I do not say that I possess the treasures of God, or have knowledge of the Unknown, or that I am an angel.

result.output: Say, I do not tell you that I have control over Allah's (Rizq) treasures. Nor do I know the unseen.

src: Wahrlich, der Messias, Jesus, Sohn der Maria, ist nur der Gesandte Allahs und Sein Wort, das Er Maria entboten hat, und von Seinem Geist. Darum glaubt an Allah und Seine Gesandten, und sagt nicht: "Drei."
ref: The Messiah 'Iesa (Jesus), son of Maryam (Mary), was (no more than) a Messenger of Allah and His Word, ("Be!" - and he was) which He bestowed on Maryam (Mary) and a spirit (Ruh) created by Him; so believe in Allah and His Messengers.

result.output: Truly, the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, is only the messenger of Allah and His word which He conveyed to Mary, and a spirit [created] from Him. So believe in Allah and His messengers and do not say, "Three".

src: Wenn wir und unsere Väter zu Staub geworden sind, sollen wir dann wirklich wieder hervorgebracht werden?
ref: When we and our fathers have become dust shall we be raised [from the dead]?

result.output: If we and our fathers have turned into dust, will we really be brought forth again?,

src: Und sie sagen: "Sollen wir etwa, wenn wir (bereits) Knochen und Überreste geworden sind, denn wirklich als neue Schöpfung auferweckt werden?"
ref: Yet they say: "When we are turned to bones and bits, shall we be raised as a new creation?"

result.output: And they say, 'Shall we then, when we have become bones and debris, indeed be resurrected as a new creation?'

src: Die Barmherzigkeit Gottes ist den Rechtschaffenen nahe.
ref: The blessing of God is at hand for those who do good.

result.output: The mercy of God is close to the righteous.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Fügt euch ALLAH und dem Gesandten, wenn er euch zu dem aufruft, was euch lebendig macht. Und wisst, daß ALLAH gewiß dem Menschen die Verfügung über sein Inneres verwehren kann und daß ihr gewiß zu Ihm versammelt werdet.
ref: O believers, respond to God and the Messenger when He calls you unto that which will give you life; and know that God stands between a man and his heart, and that to Him you shall be mustered.

result.output: You who have internalized the imam! Obey Allah and the Messenger when he calls you to what gives you life. And know that Allah can certainly deny man control over his inner being and that you will certainly be gathered to Him.

src: Und sollten sie dem Salam zugeneigt sein, dann sei ihm ebenfalls zugeneigt und übe ALLAH gegenüber Tawakkul! ER ist gewiß Der Allhörende, Der Allwissende.
ref: But if they are inclined to peace, make peace with them, and have trust in God, for He hears all and knows everything.

result.output: And if you are inclined towards peace, then incline towards him as well, and exercise trust in Allah! He is indeed the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

src: Dann erfüllten WIR ihnen das Versprechen und erretteten sie und diejenigen, die WIR wollten, und richteten die Maßlosen zugrunde.
ref: Then We made Our promise good to them and delivered whomsoever We pleased, and destroyed the transgressors.

result.output: Then WE fulfilled our promise to them and saved them and those whom WE willed and destroyed the transgressors.,

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Gehorcht ALLAH und gehorcht dem Gesandten und laßt eure Handlungen nicht nichtig werden!
ref: O you who believe, obey God and the Prophet, and do not waste your deeds.

result.output: You who have internalized the imam! Obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not let your actions become in vain!

src: Heute versiegeln WIR ihnen ihre Münder, und zu Uns sprechen dann ihre Hände, auch ihre Beine legen Zeugnis ab für das, was sie zu erwerben pflegten.
ref: We shall seal their lips that day; and their hands will speak, their feet testify to what they had done.

result.output: Today, we seal their mouths and their hands speak to us, and even their legs bear witness to what they used to acquire.

src: Du bist nichts (anderes) als ein Mensch wie wir. So bringe ein Zeichen, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: “You are just a human like us; therefore bring some sign if you are truthful.”

result.output: You are nothing (else) but a human being like us. So bring a sign if you belong to the truthful ones.

src: Und derjenige, der zu seinen Eltern sagt: "Pfui über euch!
ref: And the one who said to his parents, “Uff – I am fed up with both of you! What!

result.output: And the one who says to his parents: "Shame on you!"

src: Und sei nicht laut beim Gebet, und auch nicht leise dabei.
ref: (Muhammad), do not be too loud or slow in your prayer.

result.output: And be not loud in your prayer or quiet therein.

src: Es wurde von dem einen angenommen und von dem anderen nicht angenommen. Der sagte: «Ich schlage dich tot.»
ref: God accepted the sacrifice of one of them (Abel) but not that of the other (Cain) who then said to his brother, "I shall certainly kill you."

result.output: It was accepted by one and not accepted by the other. The one said, 'I will beat you to death.'

src: Sie sind bei ALLAH nicht gleich!
ref: They are not equal before Allah.

result.output: You are not equal to Allah!

src: Und der, der zu seinen Eltern sagt: «Pfui über euch! Wollt ihr denn mir versprechen, ich würde hervorgebracht werden, wo vor mir Generationen dahingegangen sind?»...
ref: But he who says to his parents: "Shame on you: You intimidate me that I will be resurrected when many generations will have passed before me?"

result.output: And the one who says to his parents: 'Shame on you! Do you promise me that I will be born where generations have passed before me?'...

src: Das ist die Bedeutung dessen, was du nicht in Geduld zu ertragen vermöchtest."
ref: So, I did not do that of my own accord. This is the explanation of things you could not bear with patience."

result.output: That is the meaning of what you cannot bear with patience.

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich Allwissend und Nachsichtig.
ref: Verily God is all-knowing and forbearing.

result.output: And Allah is truly All-Knowing and Forbearing.

src: Und sie sagen: "Wir glauben an Allah und an den Gesandten, und wir gehorchen."
ref: They say, 'We believe in God and the Messenger, and we obey.'

result.output: And they say: "We believe in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey."

src: Er sagte: "Bei ALLAH!
ref: He said: "By Allah!

result.output: He said: By ALLAH!

src: Es gibt unter ihnen aber auch manche, die, wenn du ihnen (nur) einen Dinar anvertraust, ihn dir nicht (wieder) aushändigen, es sei denn, du bist ständig hinter ihnen her. Dies, weil sie sagen: "Gegen uns kann man der Schriftunkundigen wegen nicht vorgehen".
ref: 6 lbs.), will return it to you, and there are others, who, if you trust him with a dinar will not hand it back unless you stand over him, for they say: 'As for the common people, they have no recourse to us' They say lies against Allah while they know.

result.output: But among them are those who, if you entrust them with a single dinar, will not give it back to you unless you stand over them constantly, for they say, "It is not our obligation to act honorably towards the ignorant."

src: Diejenigen aber, die Widerwillen zeigen und sich hochmütig verhalten, wird Er mit einer schmerzhaften Pein peinigen. Und sie werden für sich anstelle Gottes weder Freund noch Helfer finden.
ref: He will bestow upon those who have been disdainful and arrogant a painful chastisement; and they will find for themselves neither a guardian nor a helper besides Allah.

result.output: But those who show reluctance and behave arrogantly, He will punish them with painful punishment. And they will find neither friend nor helper for themselves instead of God.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist mein HERR und euer HERR.
ref: Surely God is my Lord and your Lord; so serve Him.

result.output: Certainly, ALLAH is my Lord and your Lord.

src: Er läßt die Nacht in den Tag eindringen, und Er läßt den Tag in die Nacht eindringen. Und Er hat die Sonne und den Mond dienstbar gemacht - ein jedes läuft auf eine festgesetzte Frist zu. Dies ist doch Allah, euer Herr; Ihm gehört die Herrschaft. Diejenigen aber, die ihr anstatt Seiner anruft, verfügen nicht einmal über das Häutchen eines Dattelkerns.
ref: He brings the night in a part of the day and He brings the day in a part of the night; and He has subjected the sun and moon; each one runs to its fixed term; such is Allah, your Lord – only His is the kingship; and those whom you worship instead of Him do not own even the husk of a date-seed.

result.output: He lets the night penetrate into the day, and He lets the day penetrate into the night. And He has made the sun and the moon useful - each runs to an appointed term. This is indeed Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. But those whom you call upon instead of Him do not possess even the membrane of a date seed.

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt.
ref: But God does not grant a soul respite once its term has come to end.

result.output: Allah, however, will not postpone any soul when its time has come.

src: Und ER fand dich irrend, so leitete ER dich recht.
ref: Did He not find you perplexed, and show you the way?

result.output: And HE found you wandering, so HE guided you aright.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir haben zugehört und uns widersetzt." So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: They said, 'We hear, and rebel'; and they were made to drink the Calf in their hearts for their unbelief.

result.output: They said: We listened and rebelled. Thus in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted because of their disbelief.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der Lügen im Namen ALLAHs erfindet oder Seine Ayat ableugnet.
ref: Who could be more wicked than he who imputes lies to God or denies His revelations?

result.output: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies His signs.

src: Und von den Satanen gab es welche, die für ihn tauchten und andere Arbeit als diese verrichten.
ref: And of the devils were some that dived for him, and performed other, lesser tasks.

result.output: And there were some of the devils who dived for him and performed other work than this.

src: Erwarten Sie denn etwas anderes, als daß die Engel zu ihnen kommen, oder daß der Befehl deines Herrn eintrifft? So handelten auch diejenigen, die vor ihnen lebten.
ref: What! Do the (unbelievers) expect that the angels should descend, or the sentence of your Lord come to pass?

result.output: Do they expect anything but that the angels should come to them, or that the command of your Lord should come? As those before them did. And Allah did not wrong them, but it was themselves they were wronging.,

src: Er sagte: "Ja! Und gewiß, ihr werdet dann doch von den Vertrauten sein."
ref: He said, “Yes, and you will then become close to me.”

result.output: He said, Yes! And surely, you will then be among the trusted ones.

src: Das sind ja nichts als Fabeln der Früheren."
ref: This is only the tales of the ancients!"

result.output: These are nothing but the fables of the ancients.

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden in Scharen zu Gahannam geführt werden, bis daß, wenn sie sie erreichen, sich ihre Pforten öffnen und ihre Wächter zu ihnen sprechen: "Sind nicht Gesandte aus eurer Mitte zu euch gekommen, um euch die Verse eures Herrn zu verlesen und euch vor dem Eintreffen dieses euren Tages zu warnen?"
ref: The unbelievers will be driven into Hell in groups till, when they reach it and its doors are opened up, its keepers will say to them: "Did not apostles of your own come to you reciting your Lord's revelations, warning you of this your day of Doom?"

result.output: And the unbelievers will be led to Gahannam in droves until, when they reach it, its gates will open and its guards will say to them: "Have not messengers from among yourselves come to you, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the coming of your Day?"

src: Und Gott genügt als Freund, und Gott genügt als Helfer.
ref: Sufficieth Allah as a Friend and sufficieth Allah as a Helper.

result.output: And God suffices as a friend, and God suffices as a helper.

src: Beinahe hätte er uns doch von unseren Gottheiten abirren lassen, hätten wir uns nicht in Geduld ihnen gegenüber geübt!" Und sie werden wissen, wenn sie die Peinigung sehen, wer weiter vom Weg abgeirrt ist.
ref: “Possibly he would have misled us away from our Gods had we not been firm upon them”; soon they will know, when they see the punishment, who was astray from the path.

result.output: Almost he would have led us astray from our deities, if we had not practiced patience with them! And they will know, when they see the punishment, who has strayed further from the path.

src: Es ist für euch kein Vergehen, unbewohnte Häuser zu betreten, in denen sich eine Nutznießung für euch befindet. Und Gott weiß, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr verschweigt.
ref: There is no harm in going into uninhabited houses where there is some convenience for you, as God has knowledge of what you hide and what you disclose.

result.output: It is not a crime for you to enter uninhabited houses in which there is a benefit for you. And God knows what you reveal and what you conceal.

src: Die Zurückgebliebenen werden sagen: "Wenn ihr zu den Beutegütern aufbrecht, um sie einzunehmen, dann laßt uns euch folgen!" Sie wollen ALLAHs Worte ändern.
ref: The Bedouins who were left behind will say, when you set forth after spoils, to take them, 'Let us follow you,' desiring to change God's words.
