result.output: The remaining will say, 'When you go to the spoils to take them, then let us follow you!' They want to change the words of Allah.

src: Da ergriff sie Allah für ihre Sünden, und sie hatten vor Allah keinen Beschützer.
ref: Yet they were seized by God for their sins, and had none to protect them against God.

result.output: So Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector from Allah.

src: Eignet euch euer Vermögen untereinander nicht durch das für nichtig Erklärte an! Nicht verboten ist es, (es euch anzueignen) durch einen Handel, den ihr in gegenseitigem Einvernehmen abschließt.
ref: Eat not up your property among yourselves unjustly except it be a trade amongst you, by mutual consent.

result.output: Do not acquire your property among yourselves through what has been declared null and void! It is not prohibited to acquire it through a trade that you conclude by mutual agreement.

src: Ich wußte für euch von keinem anderen Gott außer mir! Also Haman behandle meinetwegen die Erde mit Feuer und lasse für mich einen Turm errichten!
ref: I know not that ye have a god other than me, so kindle for me (a fire), O Haman, to bake the mud; and set up for me a lofty tower in order that I may survey the god of Moses; and lo!

result.output: I knew for you of no other god except me! So let Haman burn the earth for my sake and have a tower built for me!

src: Und wisset, daß der Gesandte Allahs unter euch ist. Würde er sich in so vielen Dingen nach euren Wünschen richten, würdet ihr sicher in Bedrängnis kommen; jedoch Allah hat euch den Glauben lieb gemacht und sehr begehrenswert für eure Herzen; und Er hat euch Unglauben, Widersetzlichkeit und Ungehorsam verabscheuenswert gemacht.
ref: Know that the Apostle of God is among you: If he agreed with you in most matters you would surely come to grief. But God has made faith more desirable to you, and attractive to your hearts, and rendered disbelief and sin and disobedience repugnant.

result.output: And know that the Messenger of Allah is among you. If he followed your desires in much of what you do you would surely be in difficulty; but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience.

src: Sie werden nicht sprechen, ausgenommen der, dem der Erbarmer es erlaubt und der das Richtige sagt.
ref: None will speak except who is permitted by Ar-Rahman and says what is right.

result.output: They will not speak, except for whom the Merciful permits, and who speaks the right thing.

src: (sie), die auf Lügen horchen, und die darauf aus sind, unrechtmäßig Erworbenes zu verschlingen.
ref: Eavesdropping for telling lies, earning through unlawful means!

result.output: Those who listen to lies and aim to devour unlawfully acquired possessions.

src: Jede Seele wird den Tod kosten, und euch wird euer Lohn am Tag der Auferstehung vollständig gegeben; und wer da vom Feuer ferngehalten und ins Paradies geführt wird, der soll glücklich sein. Und das irdische Leben ist nichts als ein trügerischer Nießbrauch.
ref: Every soul must taste death; and only on the Day of Resurrection will you be fully recompensed; so the one who is saved from the fire and is admitted into Paradise – he is undoubtedly successful; and the life of this world is just counterfeit wealth.

result.output: Every soul shall taste death, and you will be fully paid your wages on the Day of Resurrection. Whoever is kept away from the Fire and admitted into Paradise, he indeed is successful. The life of this world is nothing but a deceiving enjoyment.

src: Also Vernichtung sei den Weggenossen der Gluthitze!
ref: Deprived (of all joys) will be the inmates of Hell.

result.output: : So destruction befall the comrades of the glowing heat!

src: Sie möchten Allah und diejenigen, die glauben, betrügen. Aber sie betrügen nur sich selbst, ohne zu merken.
ref: They (try to) deceive God and those who believe, yet deceive none but themselves although they do not know.

result.output: They want to deceive Allah and those who believe, but they only deceive themselves without realizing it.

src: Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem er will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: And Allah provideth whomsoever He listeth without reckoning.

result.output: And Allah provides sustenance to whom He wills, without measure.

src: In Gärten und an Quellen,
ref: In these gardens and these springs,

result.output: In gardens and at springs,

src: Unter ihnen gab es Rechtschaffene und solche, die dies nicht waren.
ref: Some of them righteous, and some of them short of that.

result.output: Among them there were righteous and those who were not.

src: Fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER mit euch die Erde versinkt, und daß sie gleich bebt?!
ref: Are you so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not open up the earth to swallow you, when it will begin to tremble?

result.output: Do you feel secure before Him, Whose instruction is in heaven that He may cause the earth to swallow you up when it shakes?

src: Unser HERR! Lasse in unseren Herzen keine Falschheit entstehen, nachdem DU uns rechtgeleitet hast, und schenke uns von Dir aus Gnade! Gewiß, DU bist zweifellos Der großzügigste Schenkende.
ref: Our Lord, make not our hearts to swerve after that Thou hast guided us; and give us mercy from Thee; Thou art the Giver.

result.output: Our Lord! Do not let any falsehood enter our hearts after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from Yourself. Indeed, You are the most giving Generous.

src: Hättest du alles, was auf der Erde ist, dafür ausgegeben, hättest du ihre Herzen nicht vereint!
ref: Had you given away all the riches of the earth you could not have joined their hearts, but it is Allah Who joined their hearts.

result.output: If you had spent everything on earth for it, you would not have united their hearts!

src: Wenn dem Menschen Unheil widerfährt, ruft er Uns an.
ref: When adversity touches the human being, he calls on Us.

result.output: If humans experience misfortune, they call upon Us.

src: (Dies ist) eine Verpflichtung von ALLAH, und ALLAH ist allwissend, allweise.
ref: God is all-knowing and all-wise.

result.output: (This is) an obligation of Allah, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.

src: Dies ist eine Erinnerung.
ref: This is indeed a reminder.

result.output: This is a reminder.

src: Für euch gibt es anstelle von Ihm weder Wali noch Fürbittenden. Wollt ihr euch etwa nicht entsinnen?!
ref: Apart from Him, you have no protector neither mediator; will you not remember?

result.output: For you, besides Him, there is neither a guardian nor an intercessor. Do you not then remember?

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es? Wenn ich über ein eindeutiges Zeichen von meinem HERRN verfüge und ER mir Gnade von Ihm erwies, die euch verborgen blieb, sollen wir diese euch etwa zur Pflicht machen, wenn ihr demgegenüber abgeneigt seid?
ref: He said: bethink ye, O my people! if I rested upon an evidence from my Lord, and a mercy hath come unto me from Him, and that hath been obscured unto you, Shall we make you adhere to it while ye are averse thereto?

result.output: He said, My people! What do you see? If I have a clear sign from my LORD and He has given me grace that is hidden from you, should we make it a duty for you if you are averse to it?

src: Oder wer wird ihr Beschützer sein?
ref: Or who will be their representative?

result.output: Or who will be her protector?

src: Kehrt zurück zu eurem Vater, dann sagt: "Unser Vater! Dein Sohn hat gestohlen, und wir haben nur das bezeugt, was wir wußten. Und wir hatten über das Verborgene keine Kenntnis.
ref: Return you all to your father, and say, "Father, thy son stole; we do not testify except that we know; we were no guardians of the Unseen.

result.output: Return to your father and say, 'Father, your son has stolen, and we have only testified to what we knew. And we had no knowledge of the hidden.'

src: Nein, sie leugnen die Stunde; und denen, welche die Stunde leugnen, haben Wir einen Höllenbrand bereitet.
ref: Yet they reject the Hour as untrue. We have prepared a Fire for those who deny the Resurrection.

result.output: No, they deny the Hour; and for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared a Blaze.

src: Doch nie war ich mit dem Bittgebet zu Dir - HERR!  erfolglos.
ref: And in calling on Thee, my Lord, I have never been hitherto unprosperous.

result.output: But I have never been unsuccessful with the prayer to you, LORD!

src: Er sagte: "Nein! Vielmehr habt ihr selbst euch etwas eingeredet.
ref: (Their father) said: "It is not so; you have made up the story.

result.output: He said: No! Rather, you have talked yourself into something.

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben.
ref: That Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds, and add even more for them out of His Grace.

result.output: ALLAH will certainly reward them with better than what they have done, and will give them even more of His grace.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir glauben an den Herrn der Welten
ref: And said: "We have come to believe in the Lord of all the worlds,

result.output: They said, "We believe in the Lord of the worlds."

src: So haben Wir bemessen.
ref: Then We facilitated (your birth).

result.output: So haben Wir bemessen.

src: Bereits sehen WIR das Schweifen deines Gesichts himmelwärts. So werden WIR dich gewiß eine Gebetsrichtung einnehmen lassen, an der du Wohlgefallen findest.
ref: We have seen thee turning thy face about in the heaven; now We will surely turn thee to a direction that shall satisfy thee.

result.output: We already see the drifting of your face upwards towards the sky. So we will surely guide you towards a direction of prayer that you find pleasing.

src: Die Gesandten unseres Herrn haben in der Tat die Wahrheit gebracht."
ref: The apostles of our Lord had indeed brought the truth."

result.output: The envoys of our Lord have truly brought the truth.

src: Und sollten sie für euch auf etwas davon freiwillig verzichten, dann nehmt es als Gutes Unschädliches an.
ref: But if they willingly forego some of it, then consume it with enjoyment and pleasure.

result.output: And if they waive something voluntarily for you, then accept it as something good and harmless.

src: Er sagte: "Nein, sondern euer Ego machte euch etwas leicht! (Ich übe mich) in klagloser Geduld.
ref: He said, ‘No, your souls have made a matter seem decorous to you.

result.output: He said, No, but your ego made things easy for you! (I'm practicing) in patient resignation.

src: Gott wollte feststellen, wer Ihn und seine Gesandten unterstützt, auch in Abwesenheit.
ref: That God may know who supports Him and His messengers invisibly.

result.output: : God wanted to determine who supports Him and His messengers, even in their absence.

src: Hätten sie doch dafür vier Zeugen gebracht! Und sollten sie nun die Zeugen nicht bringen, dann sind diese selbst bei ALLAH die wirklichen Lügner.
ref: Would that they had brought four witness to testify to their report. Since they brought none, they are liars before God.

result.output: If only they had brought four witnesses for this! And if they do not produce the witnesses, then they, in the sight of Allah, are the liars indeed.

src: Gewiß, bereits entsandten WIR (Gesandte) zu Umam vor dir, dann hat diesen der Satan ihre (schlechten) Taten schön erscheinen lassen, so ist er ihr Wali heute.
ref: We have sent messengers before you to other nations. But Satan made their [foul] deeds seem fair to them and today he is their patron.

result.output: Surely, we had already sent messengers to Umam before you, but Satan made their (bad) deeds appear beautiful to them, so he is their Wali today.

src: Mit denen, die ihr Vermögen spenden im Streben nach dem Wohlwollen Gottes und zur Festigung ihrer Seelen, ist es wie mit einem Garten auf einer Anhöhe.
ref: And the parable of those who spend their wealth seeking God’s approval, and to strengthen their souls, is that of a garden on a hillside.

result.output: With those who spend their wealth in the pursuit of the good pleasure of Allah and the strengthening of their souls, it is like a garden on a hill.

src: Gewiß, bereits waren sie vorher um Fitna bemüht und wollten deine Angelegenheiten (durch Intrigen) durcheinander bringen, bis dieWahrheit kam und die Sache ALLAHs siegte, während sie (diesem) abgeneigt sind.
ref: They had tried to create disorder before and intrigued against you, but truth came out in the end and God's will prevailed, even though they did not like it.

result.output: Indeed, they were already concerned about Fitna before and wanted to disrupt your affairs (through intrigues), until the truth came and the matter of Allah prevailed, while they (are averse to it).

src: Ergötzt euch denn (eine Weile), bald jedoch werdet ihr es wissen.
ref: Please yourselves for a time; you will come to know soon.

result.output: Enjoy yourselves for (a while), but soon you will know it.

src: Und wen ALLAH rechtleitet, ist zweifellos der Rechtgeleitete, und wen ER abirren läßt, für die findest du gewiß keine Wali anstelle von Ihm! Und WIR werden sie am Tag der Auferstehung auf ihren Gesichtern versammeln - blind, stumm und taub.
ref: Whomsoever God guides, he is rightly guided; and whom He leads astray -- thou wilt not find for them protectors, apart from Him.

result.output: And whom Allah guides, there is no doubt that he is the guided one, and whom He leads astray, you will find no protector for them besides Him! And We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf.

src: Da warfen sie sich nieder, außer Iblis. Er weigerte sich.
ref: They fell prostrate, but Iblis did not; he refused.

result.output: There they threw themselves down, except Iblis. He refused.

src: Und darin haben sie vollkommen gereinigte Gattinnen. Und ewig werden sie darin bleiben.
ref: And they shall have fair spouses there, and live there abidingly.

result.output: And therein they have purified spouses completely. And they will remain therein forever.

src: Nehmt euch daher keine Beschützer von ihnen, solange sie nicht auf Allahs Weg wandern. Und wenn sie sich abwenden, dann ergreift sie und tötet sie, wo immer ihr sie auffindet; und nehmt euch keinen von ihnen zum Beschützer oder zum Helfer
ref: Wherefore take not friends from among them until they migrate for the sake of Allah; and if they turn away, then lay hold of them and slay them, wheresoever ye find them, and take not from among them a friend or a helper.

result.output: Therefore, do not take protectors from among them unless they emigrate for the sake of Allah. And if they turn away, seize them and kill them wherever you find them, and do not take from among them any protector or helper.

src: So sollen sie Mich nicht um Beschleunigung bitten.
ref: So let them not ask Me to hasten (the punishment).

result.output: So they should not ask Me to speed things up,

src: Sie gehören nicht zu euch, und auch nicht zu ihnen.
ref: They are not of you, nor of them.

result.output: They do not belong to you, nor to them.

src: Und der Sünde der Juden wegen haben Wir ihnen gute Dinge verboten, die ihnen erlaubt waren, wie auch, weil sie viele Hindernisse in Allahs Weg legten
ref: Because of the wickedness of some among the Jews, and because they obstructed people from the way of God, We forbade them many things which were lawful for them;

result.output: And because of the sin of the Jews, We have forbidden them some good things which were previously permitted to them, and also because they hindered many from Allah's path.

src: Seine Leute kamen eilig zu ihm getrieben.
ref: His people came excited to him.

result.output: His people came hurriedly driven to him.

src: Hinsichtlich derjenigen, in deren Herzen Falschheit ist, so folgen sie dem, was darin mehrdeutig ist  in Bestrebung nach Fitna und in Bestrebung nach (irriger) Auslegung.
ref: As for those in whose hearts is swerving, they follow the ambiguous part, desiring dissension, and desiring its interpretation; and none knows its interpretation, save only God.

result.output: Regarding those in whose hearts there is falsehood, they follow what is ambiguous therein - in pursuit of discord and in pursuit of erroneous interpretation.

src: Vor dem Unheil dessen, was Er erschaffen hat,
ref: From the evil of what He has created,

result.output: Before the calamity of what He has created

src: Ist etwa derjenige, der ins Feuer geworfen wird, besser oder derjenige, der am Tage der Auferstehung sicher kommt?! Tut, was ihr wollt!
ref: Is he who is hurled into the Fire better? Or he who arrives safely on the Day of Resurrection?

result.output: Is the one who is thrown into the fire better or the one who comes safely on the Day of Resurrection? Do what you want!

src: Dies sind die Gesandten; einige von ihnen haben Wir vor anderen bevorzugt. Unter ihnen gibt es manche, zu denen Allah gesprochen hat, und einige, die Er um Rangstufen erhöht hat.
ref: Of those messengers, some of whom We have caused to excel others, and of whom there are some unto whom Allah spake, while some of them He exalted (above others) in degree; and We gave Jesus, son of Mary, clear proofs (of Allah's Sovereignty) and We supported him with the holy Spirit.

result.output: These are the messengers; We have preferred some of them over others. Among them are those whom Allah has spoken to, and some whom He has raised in ranks.

src: Dient ALLAH, meinem HERRN und eurem HERRN.
ref: Worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord."

result.output: Serve ALLAH, my Lord and your Lord.

src: Ehefrauen des Propheten! Ihr seid nicht wie irgendeine (Gruppe) der Frauen, wenn ihr Taqwa gemäß handelt.
ref: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like other women.

result.output: Wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women if you act according to Taqwa.

src: ALLAH möge ihnen vergeben. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: It may be that God will accept their repentance, for God is forgiving and kind.

result.output: May Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

src: "Es gibt nur unseren ersten Tod, und wir werden nicht wiedererweckt werden.
ref: "There is no dying for us but once; and we shall not be raised again.

result.output: There is only our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

src: Als er dort ankam, wurde ihm zugerufen: "Gesegnet ist wer im Feuer und wer in dessen Umgebung ist, und Preis sei Allah, dem Herrn der Weltenbewohner!
ref: But when he reached it, a voice called out: "Blessed is He who is in the fire and all around it. Praised be God, the Lord of all the worlds.

result.output: When he arrived there, he was called out to: "Blessed is he who is in the fire and he who is around it, and praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds!"

src: Als ihr fortlieft und euch nach niemandem umdrehtet, während der Gesandte euch von hinten her rief. Da belohnte Er euch mit Kummer für (den) Kummer (des Propheten), damit ihr weder traurig wäret über das, was euch entgangen war, noch über das, was euch getroffen hatte. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: Remember, as you were rushing up (the hill) without turning back to look, though the Prophet was calling you from the rear, He requited you with anguish for an anguish that you do not fret for missed opportunity and what befell you, for God is aware of all that you do,

result.output: As you left and did not turn to anyone while the messenger called you from behind. He rewarded you with sorrow for the sorrow (of the Prophet), so that you would not be sad about what you missed or what had befallen you. And Allah is knowledgeable about what you do.

src: Am Morgen war er in der Stadt furchtsam und hielt (immer wieder) Ausschau. Auf einmal schrie derjenige, der ihn am Tag zuvor um Hilfe gebeten hatte, zu ihm um Beistand. Musa sagte zu ihm: "Du bist offenkundig einer, der wahrlich (zu Gewalttaten) verleitet."
ref: So he was in the city at morning fearing, waiting to see what happens – thereupon he sighted the one who had appealed to him the day before, crying out to him for help; Moosa said to him, “Indeed you are clearly astray.”

result.output: In the morning he was anxious in the city and kept looking around (repeatedly). Suddenly, the person who had asked him for help the day before shouted to him for assistance. Musa said to him: "You are obviously someone who is truly prone to violence."

src: Und WIR senden nach und nach vom Quran hinab, was eine Heilung und Gnade für die Mumin ist. Doch er bestärkt die Unrecht-Begehenden nur noch im Fehlgehen.
ref: What We have sent down of the Qur'an is a healing and a grace for the faithful, and adds only loss for the sinners.

result.output: And WE send down of the Quran that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.

src: Solcherart erläutert ALLAH für euch Seine Ayat.
ref: Thus Allah makes clear His Ayat (Commandments and legal obligations) for you.

result.output: In this way Allah explains His verses to you.

src: Und gäbe es nicht das Wort des Richtens, würde bestimmt unter ihnen gerichtet.
ref: But for the decisive Word (of God) a sentence would have been passed amongst them.

result.output: And if there were no word of judgment, surely they would be judged among them.

src: Sollen wir etwa Sudschud zu dem vollziehen, den du uns anweist?!"
ref: Should we adore whoever you ask us to?"

result.output: : Are we supposed to execute Sudschud as you instruct us?!

src: Also richte deine Bittgebete an keinen anderen Gott neben ALLAH, sonst wirst du von den Gepeinigten.
ref: So call on no other god but God, lest you are condemned to torment;

result.output: So direct your supplications to no other god besides Allah, otherwise you will be among the tormented.

src: Nach dem Gesetz des Königs hätte es ihm nicht zugestanden, seinen Bruder (als Sklaven) zu nehmen, außer daß Allah es wollte. Wir erhöhen, wen Wir wollen, um Rangstufen.
ref: He could not take his brother by the law of the king (as a slave), except that Allah willed it. (So Allah made the brothers to bind themselves with their way of "punishment, i.e. enslaving of a thief.")

result.output: According to the law of the king, he would not have been allowed to take his brother (as a slave), except that Allah willed it. We raise whoever We want in ranks.

src: Diejenigen, die aus Furcht vor ihrem Herrn erschrecken,
ref: Surely those who live in awe of their Lord,

result.output: The ones who are afraid of their Lord

src: Gut wart ihr, so betretet es; darin werdet ihr ewig weilen.»...
ref: So enter here to live for ever."

result.output: Good were you, so enter it; therein you shall dwell eternally.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt.
ref: O you who believe, be fearful of God. Let each soul consider what it has sent (of good deeds) in advance for the morrow, and fear God.

result.output: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow.

src: Von Pharao. Er hatte hohe Gewalt und war einer der Maßlosen.
ref: From Firaun; he was indeed proud, among the transgressors.

result.output: From Pharaoh. He had great power and was one of the immoderate ones.

src: ALLAH erwählt aus den Engeln Gesandte und aus den Menschen. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allhörend, allsehend.
ref: Allah chooses the Noble Messengers from the angels, and from men; indeed Allah is All Hearing, All Seeing.

result.output: ALLAH chooses messengers from the angels and from humans. Indeed, ALLAH is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

src: Beide versorgen WIR, diese und diese mit den Gaben deines HERRN.
ref: To each these as well as those We bestow from the Bounties of your Lord.

result.output: Both of us provide these and those with the gifts of your LORD.

src: Und am Morgen war (der Garten) bereits verwüstet.
ref: So by the morning it seemed as though picked clean.

result.output: And in the morning (the garden) was already devastated.

src: Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm, so richtet an Ihn Bittgebete als Aufrichtiger im Din Ihm gegenüber.
ref: There is no god but He. Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.

result.output: There is no deity except Him, so direct prayer to Him as a sincere person in front of Him.

src: Er sagte: "Mein Vater! Tu, was dir geboten wurde.
ref: Do what you are commanded!

result.output: He said: My father! Do what you were commanded.

src: Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: Verily there are signs in this for those who pay heed.

result.output: Surely, in this there are verses for people who listen.

src: Die Gänge der Himmel, daß ich zum Gott des Mose emporsteige. Ich halte ihn ja für einen Lügner.» So wurde dem Pharao sein böses Tun verlockend gemacht, und er wurde vom (rechten) Weg abgewiesen. Die List Pharaos ist dem Verderben erlegen.
ref: “The routes of the heavens, in order to glance at the God of Moosa – and indeed I think he is a liar”; this is how the evil deeds of Firaun were made seeming good to him, and he was stopped from the path; and the evil scheme of Firaun was destined to be ruined.

result.output: The paths of heaven, so that I ascend to the God of Moses. I consider him a liar.' That was how Pharaoh's evil deeds were made tempting, and he was led astray from the (right) path. Pharaoh's cunning has succumbed to ruin.

src: Diejenigen, über die das Urteil gefällt wird, sagen: "Unser Herr, dies sind jene, die wir irreführten.
ref: Those about whom the Word will have come true (to be punished) will say: "Our Lord! These are they whom we led astray.

result.output: Those over whom judgment is passed, say: 'Our Lord, these are those whom we led astray.'

src: Sie fragen dich um Belehrung. Sag: "Allah belehrt euch über den Erbanteil seitlicher Verwandtschaft. Wenn ein Mann umkommt, der keine Kinder hat, aber eine Schwester, dann steht ihr die Hälfte dessen zu, was er hinterläßt. Und er beerbt sie, wenn sie keine Kinder hat. Und wenn es zwei (Schwestern) sind, stehen ihnen (beiden) zwei Drittel dessen zu, was er hinterläßt. Und wenn es Geschwister sind, Männer und Frauen, dann kommt einem männlichen Geschlechts ebensoviel zu wie der Anteil von zwei weiblichen Geschlechts. Allah gibt euch Klarheit, damit ihr (nicht) in die Irre geht. Allah weiß über alles Bescheid.
ref: O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), they ask you for a decree; say, “Allah decrees you concerning the solitary person (without parents or children); if a man dies childless and has a sister, for her is half the inheritance; and the man is his sister’s heir if the sister dies childless; and if there are two sisters, for them is two-thirds of the inheritance; so if there are brothers and sisters, both men and women, the male’s share is equal to that of two females; and Allah explains clearly to you, so that you do not go astray; and Allah knows all things.”

result.output: They ask you for instruction. Say: Allah instructs you about the share of inheritance for the lateral kindred. If a man dies and has no child but sister, she will receive half of what he leaves, and he will inherit her if she has no child. If there are two sisters, they will have two-thirds of what he leaves. And if there are brothers and sisters, the male will have the share equal to that of two females. Allah makes things clear to you, lest you go astray. Allah is All-Knowing.

src: O Prophet, wenn ihr euch von Frauen scheidet, dann scheidet euch von ihnen auf ihre Wartezeit hin, und berechnet die Wartezeit.
ref: O PROPHET WHEN you divorce women, divorce them at their appointed period, and calculate that period, and fear God, your Lord. Do not expel them from their houses, nor should they go away themselves, unless they are openly guilty of adultery.

result.output: O Prophet, if you divorce women, divorce them for their prescribed time, and calculate the period...

src: Und wer von euch es sich nicht leisten kann, freie Mumin-Frauen zu heiraten, dann (heiratet er) von den Mumin-Dienerinnen, die euch gehören. Und ALLAH kennt euren Iman besser - die einen von euch sind wie die anderen.
ref: Any one of you who has not the affluence to be able to marry believing freewomen in wedlock, let him take believing handmaids that your right hands own; God knows very well your faith; the one of you is as the other.

result.output: And whoever among you cannot afford to marry free believing women, then let him marry from those whom your right hands possess of believing slave girls. And Allah is most knowing about your faith. You are [sprung] from one another.

src: So komme ich zu euch mit einem Zeichen von eurem Herrn.
ref: I have brought you a miracle from your Lord.

result.output: So I come to you with a sign from your Lord.

src: Diese eilen zu den guten Dingen um die Wette und werden darin die Allerersten sein.
ref: Are the ones who hasten to goodness and outpace the others.

result.output: These rush to the good things in a race and will be the very first in them.

src: Sag: "Habt ihr irgendein Wissen darüber, das ihr uns offenlegt?" Doch ihr folgt nur dem Spekulieren, und ihr lügt ja nur.
ref: You follow only assumptions and only make guesses.”

result.output: Say: "Do you have any knowledge that you disclose to us?" But you only follow speculation, and you are only lying.

src: Und bittet ALLAH um etwas von Seiner Gunst!
ref: Ask God for His favours.

result.output: And ask ALLAH for something of His grace!

src: Und aus den Bergen hauet ihr euch Wohnungen geschickt aus.
ref: And dwellings hewed out of mountains ingeniously?

result.output: And from the mountains you have cleverly carved out your homes.

src: Und die Entscheidungsträger von ihnen gingen los: "Geht weiter so, und seid duldsam in eurer Gottheiten Sache! Gewiß, dies ist eine Sache, die doch erstrebt wird.
ref: The chiefs among them departed saying: go, and persevere in your gods; verily this is a thing designed.

result.output: And their decision-makers went off, saying: 'Keep going, and be patient in your gods' cause! Indeed, this is a cause that is sought after.'

src: So gibt es von euch keinen, der es von ihm zurückhält.
ref: And not one of you would have been able to stop (Us).

result.output: So there is none among you who withholds it from him.

src: Diejenigen, gegen die der Spruch zu Recht fällig geworden ist, sagen: «Unser Herr, diese, die wir haben abirren lassen, haben wir abirren lassen, wie wir selbst abgeirrt waren. (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los.
ref: Those against whom the Word will have proved true will say, “Our Lord! These are they whom we led astray; we led them astray the way we ourselves went astray; we are unconcerned with them and we incline towards You – they never worshipped us!”

result.output: Those against whom the judgment has been rightly passed say: 'Our Lord, these whom we have led astray, we led them astray as we ourselves were astray. We declare our innocence before You.'

src: ER sagte: "Verlasse es als ein Verachteter, Verfluchter.
ref: "Begone," said (God), "contemptible and rejected!

result.output: He said, Leave it as a despised, cursed one.

src: Hätte Gott bei ihnen etwas Gutes festgestellt, hätte Er sie hören lassen. Und wenn Er sie hätte hören lassen, so hätten sie sich (dennoch) abgekehrt und abgewandt.
ref: And had Allah found any goodness in them, He would have made them hear; and had He made them hear they would, in the end, have turned away and gone back.

result.output: If God had found anything good in them, He would have made them hear. And if He had made them hear, they would (still) have turned away and turned aside.

src: Doch nur die verständigen Menschen besinnen sich.
ref: They alone take warning who are wise,

result.output: However, only intelligent people reflect.

src: Als sie dann vor Yusuf traten, nahm er seine Eltern bei sich auf und sprach: "Zieht in Ägypten in Sicherheit ein, wie Allah es will."
ref: When they went back to Joseph he gave his father and mother a place of honour, and said: "Enter Egypt in peace by the will of God."

result.output: When they appeared before Yusuf, he welcomed his parents and said, "Enter Egypt, God willing, in safety."

src: ER läßt die Nacht den Tag überdecken.
ref: He brings the night as a cover over the day.

result.output: He lets the night cover the day.

src: Und haltet nicht die Kafir-Ehepartner!
ref: Do not retain your (marriage) ties with unbelieving women.

result.output: And do not hold on to the infidel spouses!

src: Dienet Ihm.
ref: So worship Him.

result.output: Serve Him.

src: 'Isa, der Sohn Maryams, sagte: "O Allah, unser Herr, sende zu uns einen Tisch (mit Speisen) vom Himmel herab, der für uns, für den ersten von uns und den letzten von uns, ein Fest sein soll und ein Zeichen von Dir. Und versorge uns.
ref: Eisa, the son of Maryam, said, “O Allah, O our Lord! Send down to us a table spread from heaven, so that it may become a day of celebration for us – for our former and latter people – and a sign from You; and give us sustenance – and You are the Best Provider Of Sustenance.”

result.output: Isa, the son of Maryam, said: "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table [spread with food] from the heaven to be for us a festival the first and last of us and a sign from You. And provide for us".

src: Diejenigen, denen WIR die Schrift zuteil werden ließen, tragen sie vor, wie es ihr gebührt. Diese verinnerlichen den Iman daran.
ref: Those (who embraced Islam from Bani Israel) to whom We gave the Book [the Taurat (Torah)] [or those (Muhammad's Peace be upon him companions) to whom We have given the Book (the Quran)] recite it (i.e. obey its orders and follow its teachings) as it should be recited (i.e. followed), they are the ones that believe therein.

result.output: Those to whom We have given the Scripture recite it with its true recital. They [are the ones who] believe in it.

src: Hierauf nahm Allah ihre Reue an. Dann aber wurden (wieder) viele von ihnen blind und taub.
ref: Thereafter Allah relented toward them, then they again blinded and deafened themselves.

result.output: Then Allah accepted their repentance. But after that, many of them became blind and deaf again.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, sind es, die der List erliegen.
ref: So the conspiracy will befall only upon the disbelievers.

result.output: But those who are unbelievers are the ones who succumb to deceit.

src: Also führe den bewaffneten Kampf fi-sabilillah!
ref: So fight on in the way of God (irrespective of the others).

result.output: So carry out the armed struggle fi-sabilillah!

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war. Und Gott weiß besser, was sie verschweigen.
ref: They that day were nearer to unbelief than to belief, saying with their mouths that which never was in their hearts; and God knows very well the things they hide;

result.output: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than belief. They said with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And God knows better what they conceal.

src: Nehmen sie etwa nicht wahr, daß WIR gewiß Uns der Erde zuwenden und sie von ihren Enden einengen?!
ref: Do they not see Us advancing into the land, reducing its frontiers?

result.output: Do they not notice that WE are certainly turning towards the earth and narrowing it from its ends?!

src: Und erbärmlich ist sie als (ihr) Werden.
ref: What a wretched retreat!

result.output: And pitiable is she in her becoming.

src: Wenn dann der Tod an einen von ihnen herantritt, sagt er: "Mein Herr, bringe mich zurück
ref: (But the unbelievers will persist) until when death comes to one of them he will say: "O Lord, send me back again

result.output: When death approaches one of them, he says: 'My Lord, take me back.'

src: Auf solche (Sünder) wird ein böses Unheil niederfallen; und Allah ist zornig auf sie; und Er hat sie verflucht und Gahannam für sie bereitet.
ref: They shall be afflicted with misfortune, Allah is wroth with them. He has laid His curse upon them and has prepared for them Hell.

result.output: On such sinners shall a bad doom descend; And Allah is wrathful against them; And He hath cursed them and prepared Gehenna for them.

src: Sag: Allah hat das überzeugende Beweismittel.
ref: Say: "To God belongs the consummate argument.

result.output: Say, Allah has the convincing evidence.

src: Das ist ein Warner nach Art der früheren Warner.
ref: He who warns you is one of the warners of old.

result.output: This is a warning similar to the previous warnings.

src: Sie sagen: «Sie sind uns entschwunden. Nein, wir riefen früher nichts an.»
ref: They will say: they have failed us: aye! we have not been calling upon aught afore.

result.output: They say, 'You have disappeared from us. No, we didn't used to call.'

src: (Sie ist) als Unterkunft von Einem Allvergebenden, Allgnädigen."
ref: As a gift from the forgiving, ever-merciful (God)."

result.output: As a shelter from an all-forgiving, all-merciful (God).

src: Und Wir hoben den Berg über sie bei (der Entgegennahme von) ihrem Abkommen empor.
ref: And We raised the Mount over them for their bond.

result.output: And We raised the mountain above them at the (time of) the covenant;

src: Als Freudenbote und Warner.
ref: Announcing happy news and warnings.

result.output: As a messenger of joy and warning.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde. Mit denen aber, die glauben und nicht ausgewandert sind, habt ihr keine Freundschaft zu pflegen, bis sie auswandern. Wenn sie euch jedoch um Unterstützung wegen der (euch gemeinsamen) Religion bitten, so habt ihr die Pflicht zur Unterstützung, außer gegen Leute, zwischen denen und euch eine Vertragspflicht besteht. Und Gott sieht wohl, was ihr tut.
ref: Indeed those who accepted faith and left their homes and belongings for Allah, and fought with their wealth and their lives in Allah's cause, and those who gave shelter and provided help, are the heirs of one another; and those who believed but did not leave their homes – you have no right in their estates until they migrate; and if they seek help from you in the matter of religion then it is your duty to provide help, except against the people between whom and you is a treaty; and Allah sees your deeds.

result.output: Those who believed and emigrated and strove with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah, and those who sheltered and aided them, they are truly the believers; they shall have forgiveness and honorable provision. And those who believed but did not emigrate, you have no obligation to support them until they emigrate. However, if they seek your help in religion, it is your duty to help them, except against a people with whom you have a treaty. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

src: Und Wir gaben bereits Dawud und Sulaiman Wissen. Und sie sagten: "(Alles) Lob gehört Allah, der uns vor vielen Seiner gläubigen Diener bevorzugt hat!"
ref: We gave David and Solomon knowledge; and they said: "All praise be to God who has favoured us over many of His creatures who believe."

result.output: And we gave knowledge to Dawud and Sulaiman. And they said: 'All praise belongs to Allah, who has preferred us over many of His believing servants!'

src: Dies sind die Ayat der Schrift und des erläuternden Quran.
ref: These are the verses of the Book and the perspicuous oration.

result.output: These are the verses of the Scripture and the Clear Quran.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde.
ref: Those who accepted the faith and set out of their homes, and fought in the way of God wealth and soul, and those who gave them shelter and helped them, are friends of one another.

result.output: Those who believed and migrated and with their wealth and person embarked on the path of God and those who provided shelter and support to them are friends among themselves.

src: Jede Trinkzeit soll (dann abwechselnd) wahrgenommen werden.
ref: Each one's right to drink being established (by turns).

result.output: Each drinking time should (then alternately) be perceived.

src: Und hütet euch vor einem Tag, an dem keine Seele etwas anstelle einer anderen übernehmen kann und von keiner Fürsprache noch Ersatz(leistung) angenommen wird und ihnen keine Hilfe zuteil wird!
ref: Take heed of the day when no man will be useful to man in the least, when no intercession matter nor ransom avail, nor help reach them.

result.output: And beware of a day when no soul can take the place of another and no intercession or substitute shall be accepted on their behalf, and no help will be given to them!

src: Doch WIR lassen es nur nach einem bekannten Maß nach und nach hinabsenden.
ref: And We send it not down except in a known measure.

result.output: But We only send it down according to a known measure.

src: Er wollte euch aber in alledem, was Er euch gegeben hat, auf die Probe stellen. Darum sollt ihr um die guten Dinge wetteifern.
ref: If Allah willed, He would have made you one nation, but that (He) may test you in what He has given you; so strive as in a race in good deeds.

result.output: He wanted to test you in everything he has given you. Therefore, you should strive for the good things.

src: Und Gottes Wille wird durch nichts vereitelt weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde. Er weiß Bescheid und ist mächtig.
ref: And Allah is not such that anything in the heavens or in the earth can break away from His control; indeed He is All Knowing, Able.

result.output: And God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in heaven nor on earth. He knows and is mighty.

src: Er ist ja eine Erinnerung.
ref: Verily this Qur'an is an Admonition.

result.output: He is a memory, indeed.

src: DU hast mich aus Feuer geschaffen, aber ihn hast DU aus Lehm geschaffen."
ref: "You created me from fire, and him from clay."

result.output: You created me out of fire, but you created him out of clay.

src: O die ihr glaubt, zehrt nicht euren Besitz untereinander auf nichtige Weise auf, es sei denn, daß es sich um einen Handel in gegenseitigem Einvernehmen handelt. Und tötet euch nicht selbst (gegenseitig). Allah ist gewiß Barmherzig gegen euch.
ref: O you who believe! do not devour your property among yourselves falsely, except that it be trading by your mutual consent; and do not kill your people; surely Allah is Merciful to you.

result.output: O you who believe, do not consume one another's wealth unjustly but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.

src: Diejenigen, die über ihn uneins sind, sind im Zweifel über ihn.
ref: Those who disagree in the matter are only lost in doubt.

result.output: Those who are divided about him are in doubt about him.

src: WIR werden ihnen doch noch Unsere Ayat in allen Bereichen zeigen und an ihnen selber, damit ihnen deutlich wird, daß er (der Quran) gewiß dieWahrheit ist.
ref: We will show Our signs to them in the horizons of the external world and within themselves, until it becomes clear to them that it's the truth.

result.output: We will surely show them Our Signs in every region of the earth and within themselves, until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. But is it not sufficient concerning your Lord that He is, over all things, a Witness?

src: Weshalb, wenn euch gesagt wird: "Brecht auf fi-sabilillah", werdet ihr träge an der Stelle haftend?!
ref: What is the matter with you, that when it is said to you, “Migrate in Allah's cause”, you sit on the ground with heaviness?

result.output: Why do you stay sluggish in one place when you are told to "set forth in the path of Allah"?

src: Und ER machte euch aus euren Partnerwesen Kinder und Enkel und gewährte euch Rizq von den Tay-yibat.
ref: He has created your sons and grandsons from your spouses and has given you pure things for your sustenance.

result.output: And HE made you children and grandchildren from your partners, and granted you Rizq from the Tay-yibat.

src: Wenn ihr einander eine Schuld für eine festgesetzte Frist gewährt, dann schreibt sie nieder!
ref: When you contract a debt for a fixed period, write it down.

result.output: If you grant each other a debt for a fixed period, then write it down!

src: Sie schwören euch, damit ihr mit ihnen zufrieden seid.
ref: They will plead on oath that you accept them.

result.output: They swear to you so that you are satisfied with them.

src: Dies, weil sie ALLAHs Ayat gegenüber Kufr zu betreiben und die Propheten zu Unrecht zu töten pflegten. Dies war für das, wie sie sich widersetzten und zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Therefore settle down in Egypt or any city, where you will get what you demand”; and disgrace and misery were destined for them; and they returned towards Allah’s wrath; that was because they disbelieved in Allah’s signs and wrongfully martyred the Prophets; that was for their disobedience and transgression.

result.output: This is because they used to commit Kufr against Allah's Ayat and kill the prophets unjustly. That was because of how they used to resist and transgress.

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN. Und Salam sei auf demjenigen, welcher der Rechtleitung folgt.
ref: We bring you a sign from your Lord, and peace be upon him who follows guidance.

result.output: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord. And peace be upon those who follow the guidance.

src: Und wenn sie darauf nicht reagieren, dann wisset, es ist mit Allahs Wissen offenbart worden; und es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: If they do not answer you, then know it has been revealed with the knowledge of God, and that there is no god but He.

result.output: And if they do not respond, know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.

src: Allah hat doch das Wort jener gehört, die mit dir wegen ihres Mannes stritt und sich vor Allah beklagte.
ref: God has heard the words of her that disputes with thee concerning her husband, and makes complaint unto God.

result.output: Allah has indeed heard the words of those who argued with you about their husbands and complained to Allah.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu "Ad ihren Bruder Hud.
ref: And We sent Hud, their brother, to the people of 'Ad.

result.output: And (We sent) to Ad her brother Hud.

src: Gib mir ein, daß ich mich Deiner Wohltat, die DU mir und meinen Eltern gewährt hast, dankbar erweise, und daß ich gottgefällig Gutes tue, woran DU Wohlgefallen findest.
ref: Help me to be grateful for Your favours which You have bestowed upon me, and upon both my parents, and to do good deeds that will please You.

result.output: Admit that I am grateful for your benevolence that you have granted to me and my parents, and that I do good pleasing to God, in which you find pleasure.

src: Gewiß, sie haben sehr viele von den Menschen in die Irre geführt.
ref: They have indeed led astray many among mankind.

result.output: Certainly, they have misled very many of the people.

src: Alhamdulillah: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen und die Finsternis und das Licht gemacht hat. Dann (trotzdem) stellen diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, ihrem HERRN etwas gleich.
ref: All praise is to Allah, Who has created the heavens and the earth, and has created darkness and light; yet the disbelievers appoint equals (false deities) to their Lord!

result.output: Alhamdulillah: All praise is due to ALLAH, Who created the heavens and the earth and made darkness and light. Yet, those who do kufr (disbelief) set up equals to their Lord.

src: Aber Gott läßt nicht unbeachtet, was ihr tut.
ref: God is not unaware of all you do.

result.output: But God does not overlook what you do.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch eure Eltern und eure Geschwister nicht als Wali, wenn sie den Kufr dem Iman vorziehen. Und wer von euch sie als Wali nimmt, diese sind die wirklichen Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: O you who believe, do not hold your fathers and brothers as friends if they hold disbelief more dear than faith; and those of you who do so are iniquitous.

result.output: Those of you who have internalized the iman! Do not take your parents and siblings as protectors if they prefer disbelief to faith. And whoever of you takes them as protectors - it is those who are the wrongdoers.

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der aus dem Wasser einen Menschen erschuf, dann machte ER ihn zur Abstammung und Verschwägerung. Und dein HERR ist immer allmächtig.
ref: And it is He Who created man from water, then appointed relatives and in-laws for him; and your Lord is All Able.

result.output: And HE is the One who created a human being from water, and made him kinship and affinity, and your Lord is always Almighty.

src: Und er betrat die Stadt um eine Zeit, da ihre Bewohner in einem Zustand der Unachtsamkeit waren; und er fand da zwei Männer, die miteinander kämpften.
ref: He came to the city when the people were in a care-free mood, and saw two men quarrelling, one belonging to his community, the other to his enemies.

result.output: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were in a state of carelessness; and he found there two men fighting with each other.

src: Als er dort ankam, wurde ihm vom rechten Ufer des Tales im gesegneten Fleck (Land) aus dem Baum zugerufen: "O Musa, gewiß, Ich bin Allah, der Herr der Weltenbewohner."
ref: When he drew near, a voice called out to him from the tree on the blessed spot on the right side of the valley: "O Moses, I am verily God, the Lord of all the worlds.

result.output: When he arrived there, he was called from the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley: \O Musa, surely I am Allah, the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds.\,

src: Bringt sie nicht heraus aus ihren Wohnstätten! Und sie gehen nicht weg, außer wenn sie eine bewiesene Abscheulichkeit begehen.
ref: Do not expel them from their houses, nor should they go away themselves, unless they are openly guilty of adultery.

result.output: Do not bring them out of their places of residence! And they do not leave, unless they commit a proven atrocity.

src: Allah hat Wohlgefallen an ihnen, und sie haben Wohlgefallen an Ihm. Jene sind Allahs Gruppierung.
ref: Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah.

result.output: Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. They are Allah's party.

src: Und haltet nicht am Eheband mit den ungläubigen Frauen fest, sondern verlangt das zurück, was ihr (für sie) ausgegeben habt, und lasset (die Ungläubigen) das zurückverlangen, was sie (für sie) ausgegeben haben.
ref: Do not retain your (marriage) ties with unbelieving women. Ask for the return of what you have spent (on them); and the unbelievers should ask for the return of what they have spent.

result.output: And do not hold on to the marital bond with unbelieving women, but demand the return of what you have spent (on them), and let the unbelievers demand the return of what they have spent (on them).

src: Da empfing Adam von seinem Herrn Worte, und darauf nahm Er seine Reue an. Er ist ja der Reue-Annehmende und Barmherzige.
ref: Then his Lord sent commands to Adam and turned towards him: Indeed He is compassionate and kind.

result.output: Then Adam received words from his Lord, and He accepted his repentance. Indeed, He is the Accepter of repentance, the Merciful.

src: Wahrlich, Wir haben dich mit der Wahrheit als Bringer froher Botschaft und als Warner entsandt; und es gibt kein Volk, in dem es nicht einmal schon Warner gegeben hätte.
ref: We have sent you with the truth, to give glad tidings and to warn. Never has there been a community to which an admonisher was not sent.

result.output: Indeed, We have sent you with the Truth as a bringer of good news and a warner, and there is no community where a warner has not passed before you.

src: Gott hat sich Abraham ja zum Vertrauten genommen.
ref: And God chose Abraham as friend.

result.output: God has taken Abraham as his confidant.

src: "Stelle Panzerhemden her und füge die Ringe nach Maß ineinander."
ref: Saying: Make thou long coats of mail and measure the links (thereof).

result.output: Produce armored shirts and connect the rings to measure.

src: Wie wog er ab!
ref: How moliciously he devised!

result.output: How he weighed it up!

src: Denen, die ungläubig sind, werden weder ihr Vermögen noch ihre Kinder vor Gott etwas nützen. Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers; sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: Indeed those who disbelieve – neither their wealth nor their offspring will help save them in the least, from Allah; and they are the people of fire; remaining in it forever.

result.output: Those who disbelieve will not benefit from their wealth or their children before Allah. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.

src: Allah hat ein Siegel auf ihre Herzen gelegt, so daß sie kein Wissen haben.
ref: Allah hath sealed up their hearts, so they know not.

result.output: Allah has set a seal on their hearts, so they know not.

src: Zeigt mir, was sie von der Erde erschaffen haben.
ref: What have they created of the earth?

result.output: Show me what they have created from the Earth.,

src: Oder denken sie etwa, daß WIR ihr Geheimnis und ihre heimliche Unterredung nicht hören?! Doch, mit Sicherheit!
ref: Or do they think that We do not hear what they conceal and their secret discourses?

result.output: Or do they perhaps think that we do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! We certainly do!

src: Und wenn sie den Weg der Besonnenheit sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich nicht zum Weg. Wenn sie aber den Weg der Verirrung sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich zum Weg.
ref: Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it; and if they see the path of rectitude, they will not adopt it for a path; and if they see the path of error, they will adopt it for a path.

result.output: And when they see the path of reason, they do not take it as their path. But when they see the path of error, they take it as their path.

src: Er sagte: «Wenn du gewollt hättest, hättest du dafür einen Lohn nehmen können.»
ref: He said, “If you wanted, you could have obtained a payment for it.”

result.output: He said, 'If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for that.'

src: (Gewähre uns) Deine Vergebung, unser Herr!
ref: Your forgiveness, our Lord.

result.output: Grant us your forgiveness, our Lord!

src: Gewiß, sie widersetzten sich mir und folgten demjenigen, dessen Vermögen und Kinder ihn nur am Verlust mehrten.
ref: They have disobeyed me, and they follow the one whose wealth and children increase nothing for him except ruin.”

result.output: Surely, they opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased with each loss.

src: So verlasse dich auf Allah, denn du verfährst nach der offenkundigen Wahrheit.
ref: So you place your trust in God. Certainly you stand on positive truth.

result.output: So rely on Allah, for you proceed by the manifest truth.

src: Gesandter! Verkünde, was dir von deinem HERRN hinabgesandt wurde! Und solltest du dies nicht tun, dann hast du Seine Botschaft nicht verkündet. Und ALLAH schützt dich vor den Menschen. Gewiß, ALLAH leitet die kufrbetreibende Gemeinschaft nicht recht.
ref: O Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)! Convey all what has been sent down upon you from your Lord; and if you do not, then you have not conveyed any of His messages; and Allah will protect you from the people; indeed Allah does not guide the disbelievers.

result.output: O messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your Lord. And if you do not do so, then you have not conveyed His message. And Allah will protect you from the people. Indeed, Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.

src: Da erhörte sie ihr Herr (und sprach): "Seht, Ich lasse kein Werk der Wirkenden unter euch verlorengehen, sei es von Mann oder Frau; die einen von euch sind von den anderen.
ref: The Lord heard their prayer and answered: "I suffer not the good deeds of any to go waste, be he a man or a woman: The one of you is of the other.

result.output: Then her Lord heard her (and said), 'I will not let the work of any worker among you be lost, whether male or female; you are one of another.'

src: Wo auch immer ihr seid, der Tod ereilt euch doch, und wäret ihr in hohen Burgen. Und wenn ihnen Gutes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von Allah"; und wenn ihnen Schlimmes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von dir."
ref: Wherever you are, death will overtake you, though you are in lofty towers, and if a benefit comes to them, they say: This is from Allah; and if a misfortune befalls them, they say: This is from you.

result.output: Wherever you are, death will reach you, even if you are in high towers. And if something good happens to them, they say, 'This is from Allah'; and if any harm befalls them, they say, 'This is from you.'

src: So waret ihr einst, dann aber hat Allah euch Seine Huld erwiesen; darum stellt erst gehörig Nachforschungen an. Seht, Allah ist eures Tuns wohl kundig.
ref: So you were aforetime; but God has been gracious to you. So be discriminating; surely God is aware of the things you do.

result.output: Thus you were before, but then Allah showed His grace to you. Therefore, investigate thoroughly first. Verily, Allah is well aware of what you do.

src: Da stritten sie untereinander über ihre Angelegenheit und führten insgeheim vertrauliche Gespräche.
ref: So they discussed their strategy among themselves and conferred privately,

result.output: They quarreled among themselves about their matter and had confidential conversations in secret.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du etwa zu uns gekommen, damit wir ALLAH alleine dienen und von dem ablassen, dem unsere Ahnen dienten?! Also lasse uns das zuteil werden, wovor du uns warnst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: They said: "Comest thou to us, that we may worship Allah alone, and give up the cult of our fathers? bring us what thou threatenest us with, if so be that thou tellest the truth!"

result.output: They said: 'Did you come to us so that we may worship Allah alone and abandon whom our ancestors worshiped? Then bring us what you threaten us with, if you are truthful.

src: Sie waren einverstanden, mit den Zurückgebliebenen zu sein.
ref: They are content to be with those (the women) who sit behind (at home).

result.output: They agreed to stay with the remaining people.

src: Und ich bin dafür einer der Zeugen.
ref: It was He who created them and I testify to this fact".

result.output: And I am one of the witnesses for that.

src: Sprich: Der Kampf in ihm ist schwerwiegend; aber (die Menschen) vom Wege Gottes abweisen, an Ihn nicht glauben, den Zugang zur heiligen Moschee verwehren und deren Anwohner daraus vertreiben, (all das) wiegt bei Gott schwerer. Verführen wiegt schwerer als Töten.
ref: Tell them: "To fight in that month is a great sin. But a greater sin in the eyes of God is to hinder people from the way of God, and not to believe in Him, and to bar access to the Holy Mosque and turn people out of its precincts; and oppression is worse than killing.

result.output: Speak: The struggle within him is significant; but turning people away from the path of God, not believing in Him, denying access to the Holy Mosque, and displacing its inhabitants, all weigh heavily with God. Misleading others weighs more than killing.,

src: Und würden sie die Tora und das Evangelium und das, was zu ihnen von ihrem Herrn herabgesandt wurde, einhalten, sie würden von oben und unter ihren Füßen zu essen bekommen. Unter ihnen gibt es eine Gemeinde mit maßvollem Wandel.
ref: Had the People of the Book observed the Torah and the Gospel, and all that had been revealed to them from their Lord, sustenance would have been showered over them from above and risen from beneath their feet.

result.output: And if they had upheld the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would have consumed [provision] from above them and from beneath their feet. Among them are a moderate community, but many of them - evil is that which they do.

src: Für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: For them there is painful punishment.

result.output: A painful punishment is determined for her.

src: Er ist der beste Versorger.
ref: He is the Best of providers.

result.output: He is the best provider.

src: ER fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was ER will. Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: He addeth in creation what soever He listeth Verily Allah is over everything Potent.

result.output: He adds to creation what He wills. Indeed, Allah is Almighty over all things.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch nicht Leute alsWali, über die ALLAH erzürnt ist.
ref: O ye who believe! befriend not a people against whom Allah is Wroth.

result.output: You who have internalized the iman! Do not take people as allies over whom Allah is angry.

src: Und wenn er ihnen verlesen wird, sagen sie: "Wir glauben an ihn.
ref: And when it is read out to them, say: "We believe in it.

result.output: And when it is recited to them, they say: 'We believe in it.'

src: Das sind Insassen des (Höllen)feuers.
ref: They are the dwellers of the Fire, therein they will abide.

result.output: These are inmates of the (Hell)fire.

src: Aber diejenigen, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, werden in Gärten geführt, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen, mit der Erlaubnis ihres Herrn.
ref: And those who believed (in the Oneness of Allah and His Messengers and whatever they brought) and did righteous deeds, will be made to enter Gardens under which rivers flow, - to dwell therein forever (i.e. in Paradise), with the permission of their Lord.

result.output: But those who believe and do righteous deeds will be led into gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will reside eternally, by permission of their Lord.

src: Wie lasset ihr euch da (von Ihm) abwenden?
ref: How then can you turn away?

result.output: How can you turn away (from Him) there?

src: Dabei sind sie demütig gegen Allah und verkaufen Seine Zeichen nicht gegen einen winzigen Preis. Jene haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn.
ref: They do not sell the Verses of Allah for a little price, for them is a reward with their Lord.

result.output: They are humble towards Allah and do not sell His signs for a tiny price. Their reward is with their Lord.

src: Sprich: "Mein Herr kennt ihre Zahl am besten.
ref: They will say, 'Seven; and their dog was the eighth of them.'

result.output: Speak: My lord knows your number best.

src: Dann machte Er seine Nachkommenschaft aus dem Erguß eines verächtlichen Wassers.
ref: Then made his offspring from the extract of base fluid,

result.output: Then He made His offspring from the ejaculation of a despicable water.

src: Abweisen werde Ich von meinen Zeichen diejenigen, die sich auf der Erde zu Unrecht hochmütig verhalten. Wenn sie auch jedes Zeichen sehen, glauben sie nicht daran.
ref: I will turn away from My revelations those who behave proudly on earth without justification.

result.output: I will reject those who behave unjustly arrogant on earth from my signs. Even if they see every sign, they don't believe in it.

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN.
ref: We have come to you with a token from your Lord.

result.output: We have already brought you an Aya from your LORD.

src: Euch wird nicht schaden, wer irregeht, wenn ihr der Rechtleitung folgt. Zu ALLAH ist eure Rückkehr allesamt, dann wird ER euch darüber in Kenntnis setzen, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: Fear for your own souls; he who has strayed cannot harm you in the least if you are on guidance; towards Allah only you will all return – He will then inform you of what you used to do.

result.output: No harm will come to you if you follow the right path, even if some lead you astray. Your return will be to Allah, and He will inform you regarding what you used to do.

src: Behaltet sie aber nicht aus Schadenslust, um Übertretungen zu begehen.
ref: But do not take them back to hurt them, and whoever does that, then he has wronged himself.

result.output: But don't keep them out of malice to commit transgressions.

src: ER erschuf die Himmel und die Erde in Gesetzmäßigkeit und gestaltete euch, dann machte eure Gestalten schön.
ref: He created the heavens and the earth with Truth and shaped you, giving you excellent shapes.

result.output: HE created the heavens and the earth in regularity and fashioned you, then made your forms beautiful.

src: Sag: "Ist dies besser oder die Dschanna der Ewigkeit, die den Muttaqi versprochen wurde?!"
ref: Ask them: "Is this better or a garden for everlasting abode which has been promised the pious and devout?

result.output: Say, "Is this better or the Garden of Eternity that has been promised to the righteous?!"

src: Allah will für euch Erleichterung; Er will für euch nicht Erschwernis, - damit ihr die Anzahl vollendet und Allah als den Größten preist, dafür, daß Er euch rechtgeleitet hat, auf daß ihr dankbar sein möget.
ref: Allah intendeth for you ease, and intendeth not for you hardship; so ye shall fulfil the number and shall magnify Allah for His having guided you, and haply ye may give thanks.

result.output: Allah wants ease for you; He does not want hardship for you - so that you may complete the number and glorify Allah for guiding you, and be grateful.

src: Ich habe Dir das gelobt, was ich in meinem Bauch trage - nur für den Gottesdienst (zu weihen), so nimm es von mir an!
ref: I have vowed to You what (the child that) is in my womb to be dedicated for Your services (free from all worldly work; to serve Your Place of worship), so accept this, from me.

result.output: I have promised you what I carry in my belly - only to consecrate it for the worship, so accept it from me!

src: Also welche von beiden Gruppen ist mehr berechtigt, sich sicher zu fühlen, solltet ihr es wissen?
ref: Tell me, whose way is the way of peace, if you have the knowledge?

result.output: Which of these two groups is more justified in feeling safe, should you know?

src: Dann bezichtigten sie ihn der Lüge, dann richteten WIR sie zugrunde.
ref: Then they accused him of lies; so We annihilated them.

result.output: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.

src: Und sie sagen: "O du, dem (angeblich) die Ermahnung offenbart worden ist, du bist ja fürwahr besessen.
ref: And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.

result.output: And they say: 'O you, to whom (allegedly) the admonition has been revealed, you are indeed possessed.'

src: Bereits sehen WIR das Schweifen deines Gesichts himmelwärts. So werden WIR dich gewiß eine Gebetsrichtung einnehmen lassen, an der du Wohlgefallen findest. So wende dich mit dem Gesicht in Richtung von Almasdschidil-haram, und allerorts, wo ihr seid, wendet euch mit dem Gesicht in seine Richtung! Auch sicher, diejenigen, denen die Schrift zuteil wurde, wissen zweifellos, daß es doch die Wahrheit von ihrem HERRN ist. Und ALLAH ist gewiß nicht achtlos dem gegenüber, was ihr tut.
ref: We observe you turning your face, several times towards heaven (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him); so We will definitely make you turn (for prayer) towards a qiblah which pleases you; therefore now turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque (in Mecca); and O Muslims, wherever you may be, turn your faces (for prayer) towards it only; and those who have received the Book surely know that this is the truth from their Lord; and Allah is not unaware of their deeds. (Allah seeks to please the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)

result.output: We already see your face turned upwards. We will certainly allow you to find a direction of prayer that you enjoy. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face towards it! Surely, those who have received the Scripture know for sure that this is the truth from their Lord. And Allah is certainly not unaware of what you do.

src: Schreit heute nicht um Hilfe!
ref: Invoke not loudly this day!

result.output: Do not scream for help today!

src: Es wurde befohlen: "O Noah, geh an Land, (und sei) mit Unserem Frieden begleitet!
ref: It was said, “O Nooh!

result.output: It was ordered: "O Noah, go ashore, and be accompanied by Our peace!

src: Sie sagten: "Al-'aziz! Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: They said: "O Minister, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place.

result.output: They said: Al-'aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place.

src: Wenn ihr das nicht tut, wird Verwirrung im Lande und gewaltiges Unheil entstehen.
ref: Unless you do the same there will be discord in the land and anarchy.

result.output: If you do not do this, confusion will arise in the country and great disaster will ensue.

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Er läßt sie zukommen, wem Er will. Und Gott besitzt große Huld.
ref: This is Allah’s munificence, which He may give to whomever He wills; and Allah is Extremely Munificent.

result.output: This is the grace of God. He bestows it upon whomever He wills. And God possesses great grace.

src: Ein Wohlgefallen von Gott ist aber größer.
ref: But the greatest bliss is the Good Pleasure of Allah.

result.output: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.

src: Begebt euch in einen Schatten mit drei Verzweigungen,
ref: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,

result.output: Go into a shadow with three branches

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du zu uns gekommen, um uns von unseren Göttern abwendig zu machen? So bring uns doch her, was du uns androhst, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: They said: art thou come Unto us that thou mayest turn us aside from our gods? then bring thou upon us that wherewith thou threatenest us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.

result.output: They said: "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then bring to us what you have promised, if indeed you are truthful."

src: Das ist der Lohn der Ungläubigen.
ref: This is the recompense of those who do not believe.

result.output: The wages of the unbelievers, this is.

src: So zieh mit deinen Angehörigen in einem Teil der Nacht fort, und folge du hinterdrein. Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Depart with your family in a part of the night and walk behind them and let none of you turn round.

result.output: So, move away with your relatives during a part of the night, and follow behind. And none of you shall turn around.

src: Und sie kamen vor ALLAH allesamt. Die Schwachen sagten dann zu denjenigen, die sich in Arroganz erhoben haben: "Wir waren doch Gefolgsleute von euch! Könnt ihr von uns (nicht) etwas von ALLAHs Peinigung abwehren?" Sie sagten: "Hätte ALLAH uns rechtleiten lassen, hätten wir euch gewiß rechtgeleitet. Es ist uns gleich, ob wir uns in Ungeduld oder in Geduld üben. Für uns gibt es kein Entrinnen mehr."
ref: They will all publicly come in the presence of Allah – then those who were weak will say to those who were the leaders, “We were your followers – is it possible for you to avert some of Allah’s punishment from us?” They will answer, “If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you; it is the same for us, whether we panic or patiently endure – we have no place of refuge.” (* This conversation will take place between the disbelievers and their leaders.)

result.output: And they all came before Allah. Then those who had shown arrogance said to those who were weak: 'Did we not follow you? Can you protect us from Allah's punishment?' They said: 'Had Allah guided us, we would have guided you. It makes no difference whether we show impatience or endurance, there is no escape for us.'

src: (Und ich bin zu euch gesandt worden, auf) daß ihr Vergebung von eurem Herrn erflehet und euch dann reumütig zu Ihm bekehret. Er wird euch dann bis zum Ende einer festgesetzten Frist reich versorgen.
ref: and: 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord, then repent to Him, and He will give you fair enjoyment unto a term stated, and He will give of His bounty to every man of grace.

result.output: And I have been sent to you so that you seek forgiveness from your Lord and then repent to Him in humility. He will then provide you with abundant provision until the end of a predetermined term.

src: Kein Volk kann seine Frist überschreiten; noch können sie dahinter zurückbleiben.
ref: No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.

result.output: No people can exceed their deadline; nor can they fall behind.

src: Sie belauschen nicht die hohen Angesehenen. Und sie werden von jeder Seite beworfen,
ref: So that they are not able to listen to the angels of higher (echelons), and are pelted from all sides

result.output: They do not eavesdrop on the highly respected. And they are being thrown at from every side.

src: Also Niedergang sei denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, an ihrem Tag, der ihnen angedroht wird.
ref: Alas the woe for those who refuse to believe in the Day which has been promised them.

result.output: So downfall be to those who committed disbelief on their day, which was promised to them.

src: Allah ist Gnädig zu den Menschen.
ref: God is Kind towards the servants.

result.output: Allah is merciful to people.

src: Aber die Heuchler wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But the hypocrites do not know.

result.output: But the hypocrites do not know what they are talking about.

src: Er sagte: "Nein! Vielmehr ist euer Herr der Herr der Himmel und der Erde, Der sie erschaffen hat. Und ich gehöre zu denjenigen, die euch darüber Zeugnis ablegen.
ref: He said: "In fact it was your Lord, the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them; and I bear witness to this.

result.output: He said, 'No! Rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them. And I am one of those who bear witness to that for you.'

src: Sie sagte: "Ach, wehe mir!
ref: She said: "Woe betide me!

result.output: She said: Oh, woe is me!

src: So darfst du nicht meinen, daß Gott sein Versprechen an die Gesandten bricht.
ref: Think not that God would go back on His promise (made) to the apostles.

result.output: You must not think that God breaks his promise to the messengers.

src: Ah sieh!
ref: Alas indeed!

result.output: Ah, I see!

src: Ich schwöre bei den sich Verbergenden,
ref: I swear by the slinkers,

result.output: I swear by those who hide themselves,

src: Und ich wurde angewiesen, von den Muslimen zu sein,
ref: And I have been commanded to be of those that surrender,

result.output: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.

src: ALLAH hat sie euch vergeben. Und ALLAH ist allvergebend, allnachsichtig.
ref: God has overlooked (your failings) in this (respect), for God is forgiving and forbearing.

result.output: ALLAH has forgiven you. And ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Nein, sondern ALLAH gehört die Bestimmung insgesamt. Wollen diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten, etwa nicht zur Kenntnis nehmen, daß wenn ALLAH wollte, ER alle Menschen rechtleitete?!
ref: So, do not the people of faith (still look forward to such a sign in response to the demand of the unbelievers and) despair as a result of knowing that had Allah so willed, He could have guided all to the Truth.

result.output: No, but the determination belongs to Allah altogether. Do those who have internalized faith not acknowledge that if Allah willed, He could have guided all people?

src: Auch gewähre ICH ihnen noch mehr Zeit. Doch Meine Bestrafung ist hart.
ref: And I will give them respite; indeed My secret plan is extremely solid.

result.output: I also grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.

src: Und der geraden und der ungeraden (Zahl),
ref: The multiple and the one,

result.output: And the even and the odd (number),

src: Da vergaben Wir ihm dies.
ref: So We forgave him.

result.output: We forgave him for this.

src: Da kehrte Er Sich ihnen mit Erbarmen zu, auf daß sie sich bekehren möchten. Wahrlich, Allah ist der Gnädige, der Barmherzige.
ref: So He softened towards them that they may repent; for God surely accepts repentance and is merciful.

result.output: And He turned to them in mercy so that they might repent. Truly, Allah is the Merciful, the Compassionate.

src: O die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr auf eine festgesetzte Frist, einer vom anderen, eine Geldschuld aufnehmt, dann schreibt es auf. Und ein Schreiber soll (es) für euch gerecht aufschreiben.
ref: O believers, when you negotiate a debt for a fixed term, draw up an agreement in writing, though better it would be to have a scribe write it faithfully down; and no scribe should refuse to write as God has taught him, and write what the borrower dictates, and have fear of God, his Lord, and not leave out a thing.

result.output: O you who believe! when you contract a debt one on the other for a stated time, write it down, and let a scribe write it down in justice between you.

src: Gärten und Beerengehege
ref: Orchards and vineyards,

result.output: Gardens and berry enclosures,

src: Habt ihr etwa keinen Einblick?!
ref: Can you still not comprehend?

result.output: Don't you have any insight?!

src: Und dein Herr wird dir wahrlich geben, und dann wirst du zufrieden sein.
ref: For your Lord will certainly give you, and you will be content.

result.output: And your Lord will surely give you, and then you will be satisfied.

src: Aber nein! Vielmehr sagen sie: "(Das ist) ein Bündel von wirren Träumen. Nein! Vielmehr hat er ihn ersonnen. Nein! Vielmehr ist er ein Dichter. So soll er uns ein Zeichen bringen, so wie die Früheren gesandt wurden."
ref: Yet they say: "These are only confused dreams," or rather: "He has invented them;" or: "He is only a poet. Let him therefore bring a miracle to us as the earlier (apostles) were sent with."

result.output: But no! Rather, they say: "(That is) a bundle of confusing dreams. No! Rather, he himself has conceived it. No! Rather, he is a poet. So he should bring us a sign, just as the ancients were sent."

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung.
ref: Give women their dowries graciously.

result.output: And give women their dowry as a gift.

src: Und bestimmt wirst du sie unter allen Menschen am gierigsten nach Leben finden, und mehr noch als diejenigen, die Götzen anbeten.
ref: You will see they are covetous of life more than other men, even more than those who practise idolatry.

result.output: And certainly you will find her among all people the most greedy for life, and even more so than those who worship idols.

src: "Mein Söhnchen! Sollte es sich auch nur um das Gewicht eines Senfkorns handeln, das sich in einem Stein, in den Himmeln oder auf Erden befinden sollte, ALLAH bringt sie. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allgütig, allkundig.
