ref: 'O my son, if it should be but the weight of one grain of mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, God shall bring it forth; surely God is All-subtle, All-aware.

result.output: My little son! Even if it were as small as a mustard seed, hidden in a rock, in the heavens or on earth, Allah will bring it forth. Surely, Allah is All-kind, All-knowing.

src: Ich will auch nicht (einfach) euch widersprechen im Hinblick auf das, was ich euch verbiete.
ref: I have no desire to do what I forbid you from doing.

result.output: I don't want to (simply) contradict you either with regard to what I forbid you.

src: Und die Berge wie Wolleflocken sein werden,
ref: The mountains like the tufts of (carded) wool,

result.output: And the mountains will be like wool flakes

src: Und ihre Zungen behaupten lügnerisch, daß für sie das Beste bestimmt ist.
ref: Their tongues utter falsehoods (when they say) the finest of wages shall be theirs.

result.output: And their tongues falsely claim that the best is destined for them.

src: Diejenigen aber, die sich um Unsertwillen abmühen, werden Wir ganz gewiß Unsere Wege leiten. Und Allah ist wahrlich mit den Gutes Tuenden.
ref: And those who strove in Our way – We shall surely show them Our paths; and indeed Allah is with the virtuous.

result.output: But those who strive for Our sake, We will surely guide them to Our ways. And Allah is truly with those who do good.

src: So diene Ihm und verlasse dich auf Ihn.
ref: So worship Him (O Muhammad SAW) and put your trust in Him.

result.output: So serve Him and rely on Him.

src: Und solltet ihr darin niemanden finden, dann betretet sie nicht, bis euch Erlaubnis gewährt wird.
ref: If you find that no one is in, then do not enter unless you have received permission.

result.output: And if you do not find anyone inside, do not enter until you are given permission.

src: Dann machte ich doch ihnen Da'wa öffentlich,
ref: Then I called them loudly and more openly,

result.output: Then I made their Da'wa public to them.

src: Doch wer ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten widerspricht und ALLAHs Richtlinien überschreitet, den wird ER ins Feuer eintreten lassen, darin wird er ewig bleiben. Und für ihn ist eine erniedrigende Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: Those who disobey God and the Prophet and exceed the bounds of law, will be taken to Hell and abide there for ever and shall suffer despicable punishment.

result.output: But whoever contradicts Allah and His Messenger and exceeds Allah's guidelines, He will cause him to enter the Fire, therein to abide eternally. And for him is a humiliating punishment determined.

src: Und Er hat eure Gattinnen, von denen ihr euch durch den Rückenschwur trennt, nicht (wirklich) zu euren Müttern gemacht. Und Er hat eure angenommenen Söhne nicht (wirklich) zu euren Söhnen gemacht.
ref: Neither has He made your wives whom you declare to be like your mothers' backs, your real mothers. [AzZihar is the saying of a husband to his wife, "You are to me like the back of my mother" i.e. You are unlawful for me to approach.], nor has He made your adopted sons your real sons.

result.output: And He has not really made your wives whom you divorce by zihar your mothers. And He has not made your adopted sons your [true] sons.

src: Und ALLAH genügt als Allwissender.
ref: God suffices as Knower.

result.output: And Allah suffices as All-Knowing.

src: Die Hölle, in der sie brennen. Welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: Hell; which they shall enter; what an evil resting-place!

result.output: The hell in which they burn. What a terrible place of storage!

src: Als er nun den Ort des Sonnenuntergangs erreichte, fand er, daß sie in einer verschlammten Quelle unterging.
ref: Until, when he reached the setting place of the sun, he found it setting in a spring of black muddy (or hot) water.

result.output: When he finally reached the place where the sun was setting, he found that it was sinking into a muddy spring.

src: Am Tag, da das Beben einsetzt
ref: The day the convulsive (first blast) shatters convulsively

result.output: On the day the earthquake starts,

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der vom Himmel Wasser hinabsenden ließ. So haben WIR damit Pflanzenwuchs jeder Art ermöglicht, so haben WIR daraus Grünes sprießen lassen, von dem WIR übereinander liegende Saatkörner hervorbrachten. Und aus den Dattelpalmen, aus ihrem Blütenstand (haben WIR hervorgebracht) herunterhängende Dattelbüschel und Dschannat mit Trauben, Oliven und Granatäpfeln - einander ähnelnd und nicht ähnelnd. Betrachtet ihre Früchte, wenn sie Früchte tragen und reif werden. Gewiß, darin sind zweifelsohne Ayat für Menschen, die den Iman verinnerlichen.
ref: And it is He Who sends down water from the sky; so with it We produced all things that grow; hence We produce from it vegetation from which We bring forth grains in clusters; and from the pollen of dates, dense bunches – and gardens of grapes and olives and pomegranates, similar in some ways and unlike in some; look at its fruit when it bears yield, and its ripening; indeed in it are signs for the people who believe.

result.output: And HE is the one Who sends down water from the sky, and thereby WE bring forth all kinds of plants, and from it WE bring forth greenery, from which WE bring forth a variety of grains, and from the date palm, from its pollen cluster, WE bring forth hanging clusters of dates, and gardens of grapes and olives and pomegranates, similar and dissimilar. Look at their fruit as it ripens and their ripening. In this are signs for the people who believe.

src: Und daß Er der Herr des Sirius ist.
ref: That He is the Lord of Sirius;

result.output: And that He is the Lord of Sirius.

src: Und da sie deinem Herrn in einer Reihe vorgeführt werden: «Ihr seid zu Uns gekommen, so wie Wir euch das erste Mal erschaffen haben.
ref: And they will be set before your Lord in (lines as) rows, (and Allah will say): "Now indeed, you have come to Us as We created you the first time.

result.output: And when they are presented before your Lord in a row, [He will say], You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time.

src: Da löschten Wir ihre Augen aus. "Kostet nun Meine Strafe und Meine Warnungen."
ref: So We blinded their eyes, "Then taste you My Torment and My Warnings."

result.output: Then We wiped out their eyes, 'Taste now my punishment and my warnings.'

src: Als zu ihnen die Gesandten von vor ihnen und von hinter ihnen kamen: "Dient niemandem außer ALLAH."
ref: Their apostles came to them one after the other (saying): "Do not worship any one but God."

result.output: When their messengers came to them from before them and from behind them, saying, 'Serve no one but Allah.'

src: ER wird sie mit Seiner Gnade umgeben. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: God will admit them into His mercy; God is indeed most forgiving and merciful.

result.output: He will surround her with His grace. Surely, ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Ist derjenige, der qanit während der Nacht sudschud- und qiyam-vollziehend ist, der sich vor dem Jenseits in Acht nimmt und der sich die Gnade seines HERRN erhofft, (etwa mit dem Kafir gleich)?!
ref: Can one who prays in the watches of the night, bowing in homage or standing attentive, fearful of the life to come, and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, (be like one who does not)?

result.output: Is the one who is qanit (devoutly obedient to Allah), performing sujud (prostration) and qiyaam (standing in prayer) during the night, and who guards himself against the Hereafter and hopes for the mercy of his Lord (equal to the disbeliever)?!

src: Ausgenommen der auserwählten Diener Gottes.
ref: Other than the chosen creatures of God.

result.output: Except for the chosen servants of God.

src: Wir werden es gewiß nicht betreten, bis sie aus ihm herausgehen.
ref: We will not enter it until they leave it.

result.output: We certainly will not enter it until they come out of it.

src: Allah verfährt barmherzig mit euch.
ref: Surely God is compassionate to you.

result.output: Allah deals mercifully with you.

src: Schau, wie Wir die einen von ihnen vor den anderen auszeichnen; aber das Jenseits ist wahrlich größer an Rangstufen und größer an Auszeichnungen.
ref: "See, how We favour one over the other; and in life to come are higher ranks and favours greater still.

result.output: Look how We single out some of them over others, but the Hereafter is indeed greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction.

src: Beide rannten dann zur Tür und sie zerriß sein Hemd von hinten, dann stießen beide auf ihren Ehemann an der Tür.
ref: Both of them raced to the door, and she (grabbed and) rent his shirt from behind.

result.output: Both then ran to the door and she tore his shirt from behind, then both bumped into her husband at the door.

src: DU bist Unser Maula, so leiste uns Beistand gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: And help us against the people of the unbelievers.

result.output: You are our Maula, so give us support against the kufr-promoting people!

src: Nein! Vielmehr haben Wir diesen da und ihren Vätern Nießbrauch gewährt, bis sie ein langes Leben geführt haben.
ref: We allowed them and their fathers time to enjoy till the very end of their lives.

result.output: No! Rather, We granted this one and their forefathers the right of usufruct until they led a long life.

src: Als die Karawane aufgebrochen war, sprach ihr Vater: "Wahrlich, ich spüre den Geruch Yusufs, auch wenn ihr mich für schwachsinnig haltet."
ref: The caravan departed (from Egypt) and Jacob said (at home): "Say not that I am in my dotage, but I get the smell of Joseph."

result.output: As the caravan set off, her father spoke: 'Truly, I can smell Joseph's scent, even if you think I'm crazy.'

src: So ließ der Satan sie diesbezüglich Fehler begehen, so brachte er sie hinaus von dem, wo sie sich befanden. Und WIR sagten: "Steigt ab!
ref: Then the Satan caused the twain to slip on account thereof, and drave them forth from that which the twain were in.

result.output: So Satan caused them to make mistakes in this regard and drove them out from where they were. And We said, "Go down!

src: Auch Musa wurde der Lüge bezichtigt, so gewährte ICH den Kafir noch längere Zeit, dann richtete ICH sie zugrunde.
ref: Moses was also accused of lies. So I allowed the infidels respite and then seized them.

result.output: Also Musa was accused of lying, so I granted the Kafir more time, then I destroyed them.

src: Aber sie verleugnen den Erbarmer.
ref: But they do not believe in Ar-Rahman.

result.output: But they deny the Merciful.

src: Soll ich etwa andere außer Ihm zu Göttern nehmen?
ref: “What! Shall I appoint Gods other than Allah?

result.output: Should I take other gods besides Him?

src: Und bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung, dann seid Ihm gegenüber reumütig!
ref: "Beg your Lord to forgive you, and turn to Him.

result.output: And ask your Lord for forgiveness, and then be repentant in front of Him!

src: Alles geschieht zu einem vorbestimmten Termin.
ref: For every age there is a law.

result.output: Everything happens at a predetermined time.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Bemüht euch eurer Verpflichtung ALLAH gegenüber nachzukommen und seid Zeugen in gerechter Weise!
ref: O you who believe, stand up as witnesses for God in all fairness, and do not let the hatred of a people deviate you from justice.

result.output: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Strive to fulfill your obligation to ALLAH and be witnesses in a just manner!

src: Darum wartet ab; seht, ich warte auch mit euch ab."
ref: So watch and wait (for the sign); I am waiting and expecting with you."

result.output: So wait; see, I am also waiting with you.

src: Dem Allvergebenden der Verfehlung und Dem Annehmenden der Reue, Dem Harten im Strafen, Dem mit den Wohltaten. Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm. Zu Ihm ist das Werden.
ref: The Forgiver of sin, and the Most Acceptor of Repentance, the Severe in Punishing, the Greatly Rewarding; there is no God except Him; towards Him only is the return.

result.output: To the All-Forgiving of faults and Accepter of repentance, to the Severe in punishment and the Bestower of blessings. There is no deity except Him. To Him is the destination.

src: Allah ist dessen, was ihr tut, Kundig.
ref: This will absolve you of some of your sins; and God is cognisant of all you do.

result.output: Allah is aware of what you do

src: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses. Sie haben bei ihrem Herrn, was sie wollen.
ref: And those who believe and work righteous works will be in meadows of the Gardens theirs will be whatsoever they list, in the presence of their Lord.

result.output: But those who believe and do good works are in the Gardens of Paradise; they will have whatever they desire from their Lord.

src: Derjenige, den Allah rechtleitet, ist auf dem rechten Weg. Diejenigen aber, die Er irreführt, sind wahrlich jene, die verloren haben.
ref: He alone is guided whom God shows the way; and whom He leads astray is surely lost.

result.output: The one whom Allah guides is on the right path. But those whom He leads astray - it is they who are the losers indeed.

src: Ihr wendet euch jedoch davon ab.
ref: To which you pay no heed.

result.output: However, you turn away from it.

src: Siehst du!
ref: What thinkest thou?

result.output: You see!

src: Und sie ziehen sich den Zorn Allahs zu, und für sie ist die Armut vorgeschrieben, weil sie Allahs Zeichen verleugneten und die Propheten ungerechterweise ermordeten.
ref: That is because they have been disbelieving in the signs of Allah, and slaying the prophets without justice.

result.output: And they draw upon themselves the wrath of Allah, and poverty is prescribed for them because they denied Allah's signs and unjustly killed the prophets.

src: Allah weiß, was ihr offen tut und was ihr heimlich tut.
ref: God knows what you reveal and what you hide.

result.output: Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.

src: Am Tag, da du siehst, wie den gläubigen Männern und den gläubigen Frauen ihr Licht vor ihnen und zu ihrer Rechten eilt: «Eine frohe Botschaft für euch heute: Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werdet ihr ewig weilen. Das ist der großartige Erfolg.»
ref: The day when you will see the believing men and believing women, that their light runs before them and on their right – it being said to them, “This day, the best tidings for you are the Gardens beneath which rivers flow – abide in it forever; this is the greatest success.”

result.output: On the day you see the faithful men and women, with their light advancing before them and to their right, [it will be said], 'Your good news today is gardens beneath which rivers flow, in which you will abide eternally.' That is the great success.

src: (Andere) sagten: "Euer Herr kennt die (Zeit), die ihr verbracht habt, am besten.
ref: "Your Lord knows best," they said, "how long you have stayed.

result.output: (Other) said: 'Your Lord knows best the time you have spent.'

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht einrichtete, um darin zu ruhen, sowie den Tag mit Licht.
ref: It is He who made the night for you to rest, and made the day enlightening.

result.output: HE is the One who appointed the night for you to rest in and the day with light.

src: Da erhörten Wir ihn und schenkten ihm Jahya und heilten seine Frau.
ref: So We heard him and gave him John, and cured his wife (of barrenness).

result.output: We heard him and gave him Yahya and healed his wife.

src: Esst von den Tay-yibat und tut gottgefällig Gutes!
ref: Eat of the Taiyibat [all kinds of Halal (legal) foods which Allah has made legal (meat of slaughtered eatable animals, milk products, fats, vegetables, fruits, etc.], and do righteous deeds.

result.output: Eat of the Tay-yibat and do good deeds that are pleasing to God!

src: Und sie sagen: «O weh uns! Das ist der Tag des Gerichtes!»
ref: And they will say: Ah! woe be Unto us! this is the Day of Requital.

result.output: And they say, 'Woe unto us! This is the Day of Judgment!'

src: Auf Ihn ver lassen sich diejenigen, die sich (überhaupt auf jemanden) verlassen.
ref: The trusting place their trust in Him."

result.output: On him rely those who rely (on anyone at all)

src: Und wen ALLAH irre gehen läßt, für den wirst du keinen Weg (zum Iman) finden.
ref: For them who are not given the guidance by God, you will never find a way.

result.output: And if ALLAH lets someone go astray, you will not find a way (to faith) for them.

src: Solcherart erwecken WIR die Toten, damit ihr euch entsinnt.
ref: Similarly, We shall raise up the dead, so that you may remember or take heed.

result.output: In this way, we awaken the dead so that you may remember.

src: ALLAH gehört alles, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist. Und gewiß, bereits haben WIR denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, sowie euch angewiesen: "Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber! Und solltet ihr Kufr betreiben, so gehört ALLAH gewiß alles, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist." Und ALLAH bleibt immer absolut autark, alllobenswürdig.
ref: And to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and indeed We have commanded those who received the Books before you, and commanded you, that keep fearing Allah; and if you disbelieve, undoubtedly to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and Allah is Independent, Worthy Of All Praise.

result.output: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And indeed, We have instructed those given the Scripture before you and yourselves to fear Allah. But if you disbelieve - then to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And ever is Allah Free of need and Praiseworthy.

src: Dann sing das Lob deines Herrn und bitte Ihn um Vergebung. Siehe, Er wendet sich gnädig wieder zu.
ref: Then proclaim the Purity of your Lord while praising Him, and seek forgiveness from Him; indeed He is the Most Acceptor of Repentance.

result.output: Then sing the praise of your Lord and ask Him for forgiveness. See, He turns back mercifully.

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist. Wende dich von ihnen ab, ermahne sie und sprich zu ihnen über sie selbst eindringliche Worte.
ref: The secrets of their hearts are well known to Allah; so avoid them and explain to them, and speak to them clearly in their affairs.

result.output: Those are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts. Turn away from them, admonish them, and speak to them with penetrating words about themselves.

src: Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: Verily, he has an old father (who will grieve for him); so take one of us in his place.

result.output: He does indeed have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place.

src: Aber nein, er ist mit der Wahrheit gekommen und hat die Gesandten bestätigt.
ref: Not in the least. He has brought the truth and confirmed the other messengers.

result.output: But no, he came with the truth and confirmed the messengers.

src: Und sie fragen dich nach Dhul-qarnain.
ref: They will question thee concerning Dhool Karnain.

result.output: And they ask you about Dhul-qarnain.

src: Fir'auns und der Tamud?
ref: Of Pharaoh and Thamud come to you?

result.output: Pharaoh's and the Thamud?

src: Also wenn die Augen strahlen,
ref: Yet when the eyes are dazzled,

result.output: So when the eyes sparkle

src: Diese haben ihre Belohnung bei ihrem HERRN. Gewiß, ALLAH ist schnell im Zur-Rechenschaft-Ziehen.
ref: Their reward is verily with their Lord; and swift is the reckoning of God!

result.output: These will have their reward with their Lord. Indeed, Allah is swift in account taking.

src: Sag: O ihr Menschen, wenn ihr über meine Religion im Zweifel seid, so diene ich nicht denjenigen, denen ihr anstatt Allahs dient, sondern ich diene Allah, Der euch abberuft.
ref: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "O you mankind! If you are in doubt as to my religion (Islam), then (know that) I will never worship those whom you worship, besides Allah.

result.output: Say: O people, if you are in doubt about my religion, then I do not serve those whom you serve instead of Allah, but I serve Allah who will cause you to die.

src: Und dies zum Schutz vor jedem rebellischen Satan.
ref: Protecting them against every wayward devil,

result.output: And this is to protect against any rebellious Satan.

src: Und WIR umhüllten ihre Herzen mit Bedeckung, damit sie ihn nicht begreifen, und machten ihre Ohren schwerhörig.
ref: And We put covers over their hearts and deafness in their ears that they should not understand it.

result.output: And WE enveloped their hearts with coverings, so they could not understand him, and made their ears heavy.

src: Als die Nacht über ihn hereinbrach, sah er einen Himmelskörper.
ref: Then when the night darkened on him, he beheld a star.

result.output: When the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body.

src: So machen Wir die Zeichen klar für ein Volk, das begreift.
ref: In this wise We detail the signs for a people who reflect.

result.output: So we make the signs clear for a people who understand.

src: Und die Berge, die du für fest hältst, wirst du wie Wolken dahingehen sehen: Das (ist das) Werk Allahs, Der alles vollendet hat.
ref: You will see the mountains and think they are firmly planted, but they will pass away like flying clouds: Artistry of God who perfected everything.

result.output: And the mountains that you think are firmly fixed, shall be moved away as the clouds: Such is the artistry of Allah, Who perfects all things.

src: Ist nicht zu ihnen der deutliche Beweis dessen gekommen, was in den früheren Blättern steht?
ref: Have not clear proofs come to them in what is contained in the earlier Books?

result.output: Has not the clear proof of what is written in the earlier pages come to them?

src: Als sie dann vor ihn (Yusuf) traten, da sagten sie: "O `Aziz, die Not hat uns und unsere Familie geschlagen, und wir haben Ware von geringem Wert mitgebracht; so gib uns das volle Maß und sei wohltätig gegen uns. Wahrlich, Allah belohnt die Wohltätigen."
ref: Then when they reached in the company of Yusuf they said, “O governor! Calamity has struck us and our household, and we have brought goods of little value, so give us the full measure and be generous to us; undoubtedly Allah rewards the generous.”

result.output: When they stood before him (Yusuf), they said, 'O Aziz, adversity has touched us and our family, and we have brought but scanty capital, so give us full measure and be charitable to us. Indeed, Allah rewards the charitable.'

src: Sie sagten: "Bitte für uns deinen Herrn, uns Klarheit zu geben, wie sie sein soll! Die Kühe erscheinen uns (alle) ähnlich.
ref: "Call on your Lord," they said, "to name its variety, as cows be all alike to us.

result.output: They said, "Ask your Lord to make clear to us what [kind of cow] she should be. Indeed, all cows look alike to us."

src: Der Tag der Entscheidung ist wahrlich die festgesetzte Zeit für sie alle
ref: The Day of Judgement is your promised day of meeting,

result.output: The day of decision is truly the appointed time for all of them.

src: (Es ist) die Befreiung eines Sklaven
ref: To free a neck (from the burden of debt or slavery),

result.output: the liberation of a slave.

src: Es ziemt dem Allerbarmer nicht, Sich Kinder zu nehmen.
ref: When it does not behove the Merciful to have a son.

result.output: It does not befit the Most Merciful to take children.

src: Aber niemals werden sie ihn sich wünschen wegen dessen, was ihre Hände vorausgeschickt haben.
ref: And they will never wish there for, because of that which their hands have sent forward.

result.output: But they will never long for him because of what their hands have sent ahead.

src: Ist es nur eine, soll sie die Hälfte haben.
ref: If there is only one, she gets one-half.

result.output: If it's only one, she should have half.

src: Und sollte eine Schwerbelastete um (die Entlastung von) ihrer Last rufen, der (Gerufene) wird (ihr) davon nichts abnehmen, und selbst dann nicht, wäre er von den Nahverwandten.
ref: Even if one weighted down calls for help with its burden, nothing can be lifted from it, even if they were related.

result.output: And if a heavily burdened person cries out for (relief from) their burden, the one who is called will not take anything away from them, not even if they were their close relative.

src: Allah ist Allhörend, Allsehend.
ref: Truly, Allah is Ever All-Hearer, All-Seer.

result.output: Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

src: Und wir haben bestimmt gesündigt.»
ref: We were definitely in the wrong.”

result.output: And we have certainly sinned.

src: Allah wird euer Tun sehen, und (auch) Sein Gesandter und die Gläubigen.
ref: Allah will see your deeds, and (so will) His Messenger and the believers.

result.output: Allah will see your deeds, and (also) His Messenger and the believers.

src: Und bestimme für uns im Diesseits Gutes, und auch im Jenseits.
ref: Enjoin for us good in the world, and good in the world to come.

result.output: And determine for us good in this world, and also in the hereafter.

src: Allah schämt Sich nicht, ein Gleichnis auch nur mit einer Mücke oder mit etwas darüber (hinaus) zu prägen. Was nun diejenigen angeht, die glauben, so wissen sie, daß es die Wahrheit von ihrem Herrn ist. Was aber diejenigen angeht, die ungläubig sind, so sagen sie: "Was will denn Allah damit als Gleichnis?" Er läßt damit viele in die Irre gehen und leitet viele damit recht, doch läßt Er damit nur die Frevler in die Irre gehen,
ref: Surely Allah is not ashamed to set forth any parable-- (that of) a gnat or any thing above that; then as for those who believe, they know that it is the truth from their Lord, and as for those who disbelieve, they say: What is it that Allah means by this parable: He causes many to err by it and many He leads aright by it! but He does not cause to err by it (any) except the transgressors,

result.output: Allah is not ashamed to set forth a parable even of a gnat or anything above it. As for those who believe, they know that it is the truth from their Lord, but as for those who disbelieve, they say: “What does Allah mean by this parable?” He causes many thereby to err and many thereby He leads aright. But He does not cause thereby to err except the defiantly disobedient,

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig waren, (bekommen zu hören): «Sind euch nicht meine Zeichen immer wieder verlesen worden?
ref: As for the infidels, (it will be said): "Were not My messages read out to you?

result.output: But those who disbelieved will say, "Have not our signs been recited to you repeatedly?"

src: Die, denen ihr anstelle Gottes dient, können euch keinen Lebensunterhalt bringen.
ref: Surely those you worship other than God have no power over your means of livelihood.

result.output: Those whom you serve instead of God cannot provide you with any livelihood.

src: Und den, dem Wir ein langes Leben geben, setzen wir körperlichem Verfall aus.
ref: Whoever reaches old age, We reverse in natural disposition.

result.output: And those to whom We grant long life, We let them weaken in constitution

src: Diejenigen, die den ehrbaren Ehefrauen (Untreue) vorwerfen und hierauf nicht vier Zeugen beibringen, die geißelt mit achtzig Hieben und nehmt von ihnen niemals mehr eine Zeugenaussage an - das sind die (wahren) Frevler -,
ref: Those who defame chaste women and do not bring four witnesses should be punished with eighty lashes, and their testimony should not be accepted afterwards, for they are profligates,

result.output: Those who accuse honorable wives (of infidelity) without producing four witnesses, whip them with eighty lashes and never accept their testimony again-they are the true wrongdoers -

src: Und verzehrt ihn nicht maßlos und ihrem Erwachsenwerden zuvorkommend.
ref: And do not consume it extravagantly or hastily before they grow up.

result.output: And don't consume it excessively and considerate of their growing up.

src: Alsdann sagte einer von ihnen: "Tötet Yusuf nicht, sondern werft ihn in die Tiefe des Brunnens hinein, so finden ihn einige Reisende, solltet ihr dies tun wollen."
ref: One of them said: "If you must do so, then do not kill Joseph, but throw him into an unused well. Some passing caravan may rescue him."

result.output: Then one of them said: 'Do not kill Joseph, but throw him into the depths of the well, so some travelers may find him, if you want to do this.'

src: Erklärt nicht für haram die Tay-yibat dessen, was ALLAH euch für halal erklärte, und übertretet nicht!
ref: Make not unlawful the Taiyibat (all that is good as regards foods, things, deeds, beliefs, persons, etc.) which Allah has made lawful to you, and transgress not.

result.output: Do not declare the Tay-yibat among the things that Allah has declared halal for you as haram, and do not transgress!

src: Und sie erkundigen sich bei dir: "Ist es wahr?"
ref: Yet they want to be informed if it is true.

result.output: And they ask you: "Is it true?"

src: Eine Gruppe davon pflegte er zu unterdrücken, indem er ihre Söhne erschlug und ihre Frauen leben ließ.
ref: He persecuted a group of them, slaughtering their sons, while sparing their daughters.

result.output: He used to suppress a group of them by killing their sons and leaving their wives alive.

src: Ein Buch, dessen Zeichen im einzelnen dargelegt sind, als arabischer Koran, für Leute, die Bescheid wissen,
ref: A Book whose verses have been distinguished and explained, a lucid discourse for people who understand,

result.output: A book, the individual characters of which are set out, as an Arabic Koran, for people who know their stuff.

src: Und sie fragen dich nach einer Fatwa, sag: "ALLAH gibt euch Fatwa hinsichtlich der Kalala. Wenn ein Mensch stirbt, ohne daß er Kinder (oder Eltern), aber eine Schwester (väterlicherseits) hinterläßt, so bekommt sie die Hälfte dessen, was er hinterläßt, und er beerbt sie, wenn sie keine Kinder (oder Eltern) hinterläßt.
ref: They ask you for a ruling. Say, ‘Allah gives you a ruling concerning the kalalah: If a man dies and has no children [or parents], but has a sister, for her shall be a half of what he leaves, and he shall inherit from her if she has no children.

result.output: And they ask you for a verdict. Say: Allah instructs you about the inheritance of those who have no descendants. If a man dies without leaving any children, but he has a sister from the father's side, then she will inherit half of what he leaves behind, and she becomes his heir if she does not leave any children or parents behind.

src: Laß die Ungläubigen nicht meinen, sie hätten (Uns) übertroffen.
ref: The infidels should not think that they can bypass (the law of God).

result.output: Do not let the unbelievers think they have (outdone Us).

src: "Yusuf, du Wahrhaftiger! Gib uns eine Antwort über sieben fette Kühe, die von sieben mageren Kühen gefressen werden, und über sieben grüne Ähren und (sieben) andere Vertrocknete, vielleicht kehre ich zu den Menschen zurück, vielleicht wissen sie es dann."
ref: (And coming to the prison) he said: "O Joseph the truthful, tell us (the meaning of) seven fat cows being devoured by seven lean ones, and seven green ears of corn and seven seared, that I may go back to the people and tell them."

result.output: Yusuf, you Truthful! Give us an answer about seven fat cows that are eaten by seven skinny cows, and about seven green ears and (seven) others that have withered. Maybe I will return to humans, maybe then they will know.

src: Ihr dient anstatt Allahs nur Götzen und schafft (dabei nur) ungeheuerliche Lüge. Gewiß, diejenigen, denen ihr anstatt Allahs dient, vermögen euch nicht zu versor gen.
ref: You only serve, apart from God, idols and you create a calumny; those you serve, apart from God, have no power to provide for you.

result.output: You only serve idols instead of Allah and (thus) create only monstrous lies. Indeed, those whom you serve instead of Allah cannot provide for you.

src: Auf Ihn vertraue ich.
ref: In Him I have put my trust.

result.output: I trust him.

src: (Und auch) acht Tiere zu Paaren: von den Schafen zwei und von den Ziegen zwei. - Sprich: Sind es die beiden Männchen, die Er verboten hat, oder die beiden Weibchen, oder was der Leib der beiden Weibchen enthält?
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats. Ask them which has He forbidden, the two males or the two females, or what the females carry in their wombs?

result.output: And also) eight animals to pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats. - That is to say: Are they the two males that He has forbidden, or the two females, or what the bodies of the two females contain?

src: Dieser (Quran) ist nichts als eine Ermahnung für die Welten.
ref: This is only a warning for mankind.

result.output: This (Quran) is nothing but a reminder for the worlds.

src: Und den, der an Allah glaubt und recht handelt, wird Er in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (er) auf ewig verweilen wird. Allah hat ihm wahrlich eine treffliche Versorgung gewährt.
ref: And those who believe in Allah and work righteousness, He will admit to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, to dwell therein for ever: Allah has indeed granted for them a most excellent Provision.

result.output: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness, He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein for them is perpetual abode. Allah has indeed granted him a desirable provision.

src: Und sie sagen: "Er ist ja fürwahr besessen."
ref: They say: “Surely he is afflicted with madness”;

result.output: And they say, 'He is truly possessed.'

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allumfassend, allwissend.
ref: Allah is All-Sufficient for His creatures' needs, All-Knowing.

result.output: Certainly, Allah is all-encompassing, all-knowing.

src: So machten Wir es zu einem warnenden Beispiel für die Zeitgenossen und die Nachfolgenden und zu einer Ermahnung für die Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And whom We made an example for the people (of the day) and those after them, and warning for those who fear God.

result.output: So we made it into a warning example for contemporaries and posterity and as an exhortation for the God-fearing.

src: (Damals als Allah sie dir in deinem Traum in geringer Anzahl zeigte; und hätte Er sie dir in großer Anzahl gezeigt, wäret ihr sicherlich Versager und über die Sache uneins gewesen; Allah aber bewahrte (euch davor); wahrlich, Er kennt wohl, was in den Herzen ist.
ref: God showed (the Makkans) to be few in your dream, for if He had shown them to be many you would surely have lost courage and disagreed about the (wisdom) of the battle. But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.

result.output: Back then when Allah showed them to you in your dream in small number; and if He had shown them to you in large numbers, you would have surely lost courage and disputed about the matter; but Allah saved you from that; surely, He knows best what is in the hearts.

src: Gewiß, für die Unrecht-Begehenden ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: Verily, there is a painful torment for the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.)."

result.output: Certainly, a painful punishment is intended for those who commit injustice.

src: Damit Gott einem jeden vergelte, was er erworben hat.
ref: That God may reward each soul for its deeds.

result.output: So that God may reward each person with what he has earned.,

src: So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: Even thus will be the life after death.

result.output: This is also how the coming out takes place.

src: Und ER machte für euch Bekleidungen, die euch vor der Hitze schützen, und Bekleidungen, die euch vor eurer Gewalttätigkeit (gegeneinander) schützen.
ref: He has given you garments to protect you from the heat, and garments to protect you from your own violence.

result.output: And HE made clothing for you to protect you from the heat, and clothing to protect you from your own violence (towards each other).

src: Und wer von euch es vorsätzlich tötet, so ist die Vergeltung (dafür) Gleiches von den An'am wie das, was man getötet hat, - darüber befinden zwei Redliche von euch - als Hady-Opfertier, das bei der Ka'ba geopfert wird.
ref: Whoever of you kills any intentionally, its penalty shall be a domestic animal comparable to what he killed, as determined by two honest persons among you—an offering delivered to the Kaabah.

result.output: And whoever kills intentionally among you, then retribution shall be equivalent to what was killed of the livestock, as judged by two just men among you as an offering [to Allah ] delivered to the Ka'bah, or an expiation: the feeding of needy people or the equivalent of that in fasting, that he may taste the consequence of his deed. Allah has pardoned what is past; but whoever returns [to violation], then Allah will take retribution from him. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.

src: Das Gleichnis Seiner Erleuchtung ist wie eine Aushöhlung, in der eine Leuchte ist.
ref: The allegory of His light is that of a pillar on which is a lamp.

result.output: The parable of his enlightenment is like a hollowing in which there is a light.

src: Da erretteten Wir ihn und diejenigen, die mit ihm waren, im Schiff. Und Wir machten sie zu Nachfolgern und ließen diejenigen ertrinken, die Unsere Zeichen für Lüge erklärten.
ref: They denied him, but We delivered him, and those with him in the ship, and We made them generations replacing one after another, while We drowned those who belied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.).

result.output: So We saved him and those who were with him in the ship, and We made them successors and We drowned those who denied Our signs.

src: Wie kann Ihm ein Sohn gehören, wo ER niemals eine Partnerin hatte und doch alles erschuf?! Und ER ist über alles allwissend.
ref: How can He have children when He has no wife? He created all things and He is the All-Knower of everything.

result.output: How can he have a son when HE never had a partner and yet created everything?! And HE is all-knowing above all.

src: Sowie die Bewohner von Madyan. Auch Musa wurde der Lüge bezichtigt, so gewährte ICH den Kafir noch längere Zeit, dann richtete ICH sie zugrunde.
ref: and so did the dwellers of Midian, and Moses too was branded a liar. Initially I granted respite to the unbelievers for a while and then seized them.

result.output: As well as the inhabitants of Madyan. Also Musa was accused of lies, so I granted the Kafir even longer time, then I destroyed them.

src: Sie waren gegen den Gesandten ihres Herrn ungehorsam. I) a ergriff Er sie mit einem sich steigernden heftigen Griff.
ref: When they disobeyed the apostle of their Lord He seized them with an overwhelming punishment.

result.output: They were disobedient to the envoy of their lord. I) He grabbed her with an increasingly violent grip.

src: Sollte euch ALLAHs Peinigung unerwartet oder voraussehbar überkommen, werden etwa andere damit zugrunde gerichtet außer den unrecht-begehenden Leuten?"
ref: If God's chastisement comes upon you, suddenly or openly, shall any be destroyed, except the people of the evildoers?'

result.output: Should Allah's punishment come upon you unexpectedly or predictably, will anyone be destroyed by it other than the wrongdoers?

src: Als sie deren Zusammenfluß erreicht hatten, vergaßen sie ihren Fisch, so nahm er seinen Weg ins Meer wie einen Tauchpfad.
ref: When they reached the confluence they forgot the fish (they had brought as food) which swiftly made its way into the sea.

result.output: As they reached its confluence, they forgot their fish, so he took his way to the sea like a diving path.

src: Und (ER gebietet euch), daß ihr eure Verantwortung den Waisen gegenüber in gerechter Weise erfüllt."
ref: Allah directs you to treat the orphans with justice.

result.output: And (HE commands you) to fulfill your responsibility towards orphans in a just manner.

src: Und wenn ihr krank oder auf Reisen seid, oder wenn einer von euch vom Abort kommt, oder wenn ihr die Frauen berührt habt und ihr kein Wasser findet, dann sucht einen sauberen Boden und streicht euch davon über das Gesicht und die Hände. Gott will euch keine Bedrängnis auferlegen, sondern Er will euch rein machen und seine Gnade an euch vollenden, auf daß ihr dankbar seid.
ref: When you wish to stand up for prayer, wash your faces, and your hands up to the elbows, and pass wet palms over your heads and wash your feet up to the ankles; and if you need a bath, clean yourselves thoroughly; and if you are sick or on a journey, or one of you returns from answering the call of nature, or you have cohabited with women, and you do not find water, then cleanse (yourself) with clean soil – therefore stroke your soiled palms over your faces and your hands with it; Allah does not will to place you in hardship, but He wills to fully purify you and complete His favour upon you, so that you may be grateful.

result.output: And if you are sick or travelling, or if one of you comes from the toilet, or if you have touched women and cannot find water, then look for a clean surface and wipe your faces and hands with it. Allah does not want to cause you hardship, but He wants to purify you and complete His grace upon you, so that you may be grateful.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der Herzensruhe in die Herzen der Mumin hinabsandte, damit sie mehr Iman zu ihrem Iman gewinnen. Und ALLAH gehören die Gehilfen der Himmel und der Erde. Und ALLAH ist immer allwissend, allweise.
ref: It is He who sent down the sense of security into the hearts of believers so that their faith may increase with belief, -- God's are the armies of the heavens and the earth; and God is all-knowing and all-wise; --

result.output: He is the one who sent tranquillity into the hearts of the Mumin so that they may increase in faith. And to Allah belong the helpers of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is always all-knowing, all-wise.

src: Esset von ihren Früchten, wenn sie Früchte tragen, doch gebet davon am Tage der Ernte (dem Armen) seinen Anteil, seid (dabei aber) nicht verschwenderisch! Wahrlich, Er liebt diejenigen nicht, die nicht maßhalten.
ref: So eat of their fruit when they are in fruit, and give on the day of harvesting His due, and do not be extravagant, for God does not love those who are prodigal.

result.output: Eat from their fruits when they bear fruits, but give their due portion to the poor on the day of harvest, and do not be excessive. Indeed, He does not like those who commit excess.

src: (Alles) Lob gehört Allah, dem Herrn der Weltenbewohner!
ref: All praise be to God, the Lord of all the worlds.

result.output: (All) praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds!

src: Ihr meintet, daß der Gesandte und die Gläubigen niemals mehr zu ihren Angehörigen zurückkehren würden, und das ist euch in euren Herzen ausgeschmückt worden.
ref: You had imagined that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and this notion was embellished in your hearts.

result.output: You thought that the messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and this has been embellished in your hearts.

src: Und gehorcht ALLAH und gehorcht dem Gesandten!
ref: Obey God and obey His Apostle.

result.output: And obey ALLAH and obey the messenger!

src: Als der Prophet einer seiner Gattinnen eine Mitteilung im geheimen anvertraute.
ref: The Prophet told something in confidence to one of his wives.

result.output: As the prophet confided a message in secret to one of his wives.

src: Sie haben außer Ihm keinen Freund.
ref: How well does He hear!

result.output: They have no friend except for him.

src: Demjenigen von beiden, von dem er dachte, daß er doch gerettet wird, sagte er dann: "Erwähne mich vor deinem Gebieter!"
ref: Then he said to the one he deemed should be saved of the two, 'Mention me in thy lord's presence.'

result.output: To the one of the two whom he thought would be saved he said: "Mention me to your lord!"

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Tamud ihren Bruder Salih. Er sagte: "O mein Volk, dient Allah! Keinen Gott habt ihr außer Ihm. Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu besiedeln gegeben. So bittet Ihn um Vergebung, hierauf bereut vor Ihm. Mein Herr ist nahe und erhört (die Gebete)."
ref: And to the Thamud tribe, We sent their fellow man Saleh; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah, there is no other True God except Him; He created you from the earth and established you in it, so seek forgiveness from Him and incline towards Him in repentance; indeed my Lord is Close, Acceptor of Prayer.”

result.output: And (We sent) to Thamud their brother Saleh. He said, 'O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. He has produced you from the earth and settled you in it, so ask forgiveness of Him and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.'

src: So macht Allah euch Seine Zeichen klar, auf daß ihr begreifen möget.
ref: So does God pronounce His decrees that you may understand.

result.output: Thus Allah makes His signs clear to you, so that you may understand.

src: Richte deine Augen nicht auf das, was WIR manchen von ihnen an vergänglichen Verbrauchsgütern zur Verfügung stellten. Und trauere nicht um sie, und behandle die Mumin milde!
ref: So covet not things We have bestowed on a portion of them to enjoy, and do not grieve for them, and protect those who believe;

result.output: Do not focus your eyes on what WE provided some of them with perishable consumer goods. And do not mourn them, and treat the Mumin kindly!

src: Und diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht und gottgefällig Gutes getan haben, werden WIR in Dschannat eintreten lassen, die von Flüssen durchflossen sind, darin werden sie für immer und ewig bleiben. Dies ist ALLAHs Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges.
ref: And those who believed and did good deeds – We shall soon admit them into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding in them for ever and ever; a true promise from Allah; and whose Words are more true than those of Allah?

result.output: And those who have internalized faith and done good deeds that are pleasing to God, We will admit them into Jannah, which is crossed by rivers, and they will remain there forever. This is Allah's true promise.

src: Auf Gott sollen die Gläubigen vertrauen.
ref: The believers should only place their trust in God.

result.output: Believers should trust in God.

src: Alsdann wird jeder Seele nach ihrem Verdienst vergolten werden, und es soll ihnen kein Unrecht geschehen.
ref: Then every person shall be paid in full what he has earned, - and they shall not be dealt with unjustly.

result.output: Then every soul will be rewarded according to its merit, and no injustice shall be done to them.

src: Als Mose zu unserem Termin kam und sein Herr zu ihm sprach, sagte er: «Mein Herr, zeige (Dich) mir, daß ich zu Dir schaue.»
ref: When Moses arrived at the appointed time and his Lord spoke to him, he said: "O Lord, reveal Yourself to me that I may behold You."

result.output: When Moses came to our appointment and his master spoke to him, he said: 'My Lord, show me that I may look upon you.'

src: Ist die Ermahnung unter uns nur zu ihm allein gekommen?" Nein, sie hegen Zweifel über Meine Er mahnung. Nein, sie haben Meine Strafe nicht gekostet.
ref: What, out of all of us, has the Remembrance been sent down to him (Prophet Muhammad)' No, they are doubtful about My Remembrance, no, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

result.output: Has the admonition come only to him among us? "No, they have doubts about My admonition. No, they did not taste My punishment."

src: Dann lächelte er doch wegen ihrer Aussage und sagte: "Mein HERR!
ref: So he [Sulaiman (Solomon)] smiled, amused at her speech and said: "My Lord!

result.output: Then he smiled because of her statement and said: "My Lord!"

src: Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam zu euch doch eine Ermahnung von eurem HERRN, eine Heilung von dem, was in den Brüsten (an Zweifel) ist, eine Rechtleitung und eine Gnade für die Mumin.
ref: O men, a warning has come to you from your Lord, a remedy for the (doubts) of the heart, and a guidance and grace for those who believe.

result.output: O mankind! There has come to you a guidance from your Lord, a healing for what is in the breasts (doubts), a guidance and a mercy to the believers.

src: Übertreibt nicht in eurem Din (und sagt nichts) außer der Wahrheit und folgt nicht den Neigungen von Leuten, die bereits vorher irregegangen sind, viele in die Irre verleitet haben und vom rechten Weg abgekommen sind."
ref: Do not wrongfully commit injustice in your religion, and do not follow the people who earlier went astray, and led many others astray, and wandered away from the Straight Path.”

result.output: Do not exaggerate in your din (and say nothing) except the truth and do not follow the inclinations of people who have gone astray before, misled many and deviated from the right path.

src: Lasse die Kinder Isra'ils mit uns gehen, und strafe sie nicht.
ref: So let the children of Israel come with us, and do not oppress them.

result.output: Let the Children of Israel go with us, and do not punish them.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, kehrt zu Gott um in aufrichtiger Umkehr. Möge Gott euch eure Missetaten sühnen und euch in Gärten eingehen lassen, unter denen Bäche fließen, am Tag, da Gott den Propheten und die, die mit ihm gläubig sind, nicht zuschanden macht!
ref: O ye who believe! Turn to Allah with sincere repentance: In the hope that your Lord will remove from you your ills and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow,- the Day that Allah will not permit to be humiliated the Prophet and those who believe with him.

result.output: O you who believe, turn to God in sincere repentance. May God atone for your sins and allow you to enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, on the Day when God will not humiliate the Prophet and those who believe with him!

src: Und die Himmel sind zusammengerollt mit Seiner Allmacht. Gepriesen-erhaben ist ER und immer höher über das, was sie an Schirk betreiben.
ref: Hallowed be He and Exalted above that which they associate.

result.output: And the skies are rolled up in His omnipotence. He is exalted and always higher than what they associate with Him.

src: (Erinnere daran), als er zum voll beladenen Schiff floh.
ref: When he fled on the laden ship,

result.output: Remember when he fled to the fully loaded ship.

src: Das bewirkt es eher, daß ihr euch vor Ungerechtigkeit bewahrt.
ref: This is better than being iniquitous.

result.output: This rather prevents you from injustice.

src: Darum esset davon und speist den Notleidenden, den Bedürftigen.
ref: So eat thereof, and feed the hungry poor.

result.output: Therefore eat of it and feed the needy, the impoverished.

src: Und pflegt keinen Verkehr mit ihnen, während ihr euch in die Moscheen zurückgezogen habt.
ref: And do not have sexual relations with them (your wives) while you are in I'tikaf (i.e. confining oneself in a mosque for prayers and invocations leaving the worldly activities) in the mosques.

result.output: And do not associate with them while you have withdrawn to the mosques.

src: Die bittere Armut und die Krankheit suchten sie heim und sie wurden erschüttert, bis der Gesandte und diejenigen mit ihm, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, sagten: "Wann kommt ALLAHs Beistand?" Ja!
ref: Hardship and adversity befell them and they were shaken, to the extent that the Noble Messenger and the believers along with him said, “When will the help of Allah come?”; pay heed!

result.output: The bitter poverty and illness plagued them, and they were shaken until the emissary and those with him who internalized the faith said, "When will Allah's help come?" Yes!

src: Sie werden, wenn sie die Pein sehen, zu wissen bekommen, wer weiter vom Weg abgeirrt ist.
ref: They will know soon who is farther away from the path when they see the punishment!

result.output: You will know who has strayed further from the path when they see the pain.

src: Diejenigen, die nicht umkehren, sind die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: Those who do not repent behave wickedly.

result.output: Those who do not repent are the ones who do wrong.

src: Bereits ALLAH hat uns von euren Begebenheiten kundgetan. Und ALLAH wird eure Taten sehen sowie Sein Gesandter, dann werdet ihr zum Allwissenden über das Verborgene und das Sichtbare zurückgebracht, dann wird ER euch das kundtun, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: And God will watch your actions, and so will the Messenger; then you will be returned to the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, and He will inform you of what you used to do.”

result.output: Even Allah has made us aware of your occurrences. And Allah will see your deeds as well as His Messenger, then you will be brought back to the All-Knowing about the hidden and the visible, then He will make known to you what you used to do.

src: Das ist die Rede eines edlen Gesandten,
ref: That this is indeed the word of the noble Messenger,

result.output: This is the speech of a noble envoy.

src: Und ihnen wurde kein Aufschub gewährt.
ref: They were granted no respite.

result.output: And they were granted no reprieve.

src: Und sie riefen: "Malik! Laß deinen HERRN uns vernichten!" Er sagte: "Gewiß, ihr müsst bleiben."
ref: And they shall call, 'O

result.output: And they cried out: 'Malik, let your Lord destroy us!' He said, 'Certainly, you will have to stay.'

src: Alif Lam Ra. Dies sind die Zeichen des weisen Buches.
ref: Alif-Lam-Ra*; these are verses of the Book of wisdom. (*alphabets of the Arabic language; Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)

result.output: Alif Lam Ra. These are the signs of the wise book.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen! Und keiner begeht noch mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erfindet!
ref: These, our people, have taken for themselves gods beside Him - wherefore bring they not for them an authority manifest? --and who doth greater wrong than he who fabricateth against God a lie?

result.output: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. If only they would present a clear confirmation for it! And none commit greater wrong than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah!

src: Da sprach Pharao: "Bringt mir einen jeden kundigen Zauberer herbei."
ref: "Bring the cleverest magicians to me," said the Pharaoh.

result.output: Then Pharaoh said, "Bring me every skilled magician."

src: Ja! Nieder mit Madyan, wie es nieder mit Thamud war.
ref: Lo! a far removal for Madyan, even as Thamud were removed afar!

result.output: Yes! Down with Midian, as it was down with Thamud.

src: Verzeihe uns, vergib uns und erbarme Dich unser!
ref: Pardon us and grant us Forgiveness.

result.output: Forgive us, pardon us and have mercy upon us!

src: So war es.
ref: Thus it was.

result.output: So it was.

src: Bring du sie vom Westen.»
ref: You make it come from the West."

result.output: Bring them from the West.

src: Erbärmlich ist der Fisq-Name nach dem Iman. Und wer nicht bereut, so sind diese die Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: And whoever does not repent – then it is they who are unjust.

result.output: Despicable is the name of fisk [disobedience to Allah] after having faith. And those who do not repent, they are the wrongdoers.

src: ER ist unser Maula!"
ref: He is our Maula (Lord, Helper and Protector)."

result.output: HE is our boss/leader!

src: Ihr habt doch keine Gottheit außer Ihm und mindert nicht das Maß und das Wiegen. Ich sehe doch, daß es euch gut geht, auch gewiß, ich fürchte um euch die Peinigung eines alles umfassenden Tages.
ref: Worship Allah, you have no other Ilah (God) but Him, and give not short measure or weight, I see you in prosperity; and verily I fear for you the torment of a Day encompassing.

result.output: You have no deity other than Him, so do not diminish the measure and the balance. I see that things are going well for you, but I fear for you the punishment of a day that encompasses everything.

src: Er sagte: "Kann ich ihn euch etwa anders anvertrauen, als ich euch seinen Bruder vorher anvertraut habe? Doch ALLAH ist Der beste Beschützer und ER ist Der Allgnädigste der Gnade-Erweisenden."
ref: He said: I intrust you with him only as I intrusted you with his brother aforetime; Allah is the best Guard, and He is the Most Merciful of the merciful.

result.output: He said, “Can I entrust him to you in any way different than how I entrusted his brother to you before? But Allah is the best protector, and He is the most merciful of those who show mercy.”

src: Diejenigen, die ungläubig waren, sagten zu ihren Gesandten: "Wir werden euch ganz gewiß aus unserem Land vertreiben, oder aber ihr kehrt zu unserem Glaubensbekenntnis zurück!"
ref: The unbelievers said to their apostles: "We shall drive you out of our land, or else you come back to our fold."

result.output: Those who disbelieved said to their messengers: 'We will surely drive you out of our land, or you must return to our creed!'

src: Als sie kam, da wurde gesprochen: "Ist dein Thron wie dieser?" Sie sagte: "Es ist, als wäre er ein und derselbe." Und uns wurde (davon) Wissen, schon vor ihr, verliehen; und wir hatten uns bereits (Allah) ergeben.
ref: And when she came she was asked: 'Is your throne like this' And she replied: 'It looks like it' And we were given the knowledge before her, and wereMuslims.

result.output: When she arrived, it was said: "Is your throne like this?" She said: "It is as if it were the same." And knowledge was given to us before her, and we had already submitted to Allah.

src: Und wenn ihr Schwierigkeiten miteinander habt, so wird für ihn eine andere stillen.
ref: But if you find this difficult, let some other woman suckle (the child) for her.

result.output: And if you have difficulty with each other, then another will satisfy him quietly.

src: Am Tag, an dem Wir den Himmel zusammenfalten, wie das Urkundenbuch die Schriftstücke zusammenfaltet. Wie Wir eine erste Schöpfung am Anfang gemacht haben, wiederholen Wir sie.
ref: The day We shall roll up the heavens like a written scroll, We shall revert it (to nothing) as it was before We first created it.

result.output: On the day when we fold the sky together, as the charter book folds the documents together. As we made a first creation in the beginning, we repeat it.

src: Und den Juden haben Wir alles Getier untersagt, das Krallen hat; und von den Rindern und vom Kleinvieh haben Wir ihnen das Fett verboten, ausgenommen das, was an ihrem Rücken sitzt oder in den Eingeweiden oder mit den Knochen verwachsen ist. Damit haben Wir ihnen ihre Auflehnung vergolten. Und siehe, Wir sind Wahrhaftig.
ref: And for the Jews We forbade all animals with claws; and forbade them the fat of oxen and sheep except which is on their backs or joined to their intestines or to the bone; We awarded this to them for their rebellion; and indeed, surely, We are truthful.

result.output: And We have forbidden to the Jews anything that has claws, and from the cattle and from the sheep We have forbidden them fat, except what is attached to their backs or entrails or is joined to bones. By that We have repaid them for their rebellion. And verily, We are truthful.

src: Sind diese (Mumin) etwa diejenigen, von denen ihr geschworen habt, daß ALLAH ihnen keinerlei Gnade erweisen würde?!
ref: “Are these the people (Muslims) regarding whom you swore that Allah would not have mercy on them at all?

result.output: Are these (mumins) the ones whom you swore that Allah would not show them any mercy?!

src: Und ermahne damit diejenigen, die fürchten, zu ihrem HERRN versammelt zu werden, während es für sie (dabei) anstelle von Ihm weder Wali noch Fürbittenden gibt, damit sie Taqwa gemäß handeln.
ref: Warn those who fear, through this (Qur'an), that they will be gathered before their Lord, and they will have none to protect or intercede for them apart from Him. They may haply take heed for themselves.

result.output: And admonish thereby those who fear to be gathered to their Lord - they will have no protector or intercessor other than Him - that they may become righteous.

src: Und gewiß, wir sind doch wahrhaftig."
ref: We are verily speaking the truth.'"

result.output: And certainly, we are truly.

src: Wenn euch Gutes trifft, werden sie traurig. Wenn euch jedoch Übel überkommt, freuen sie sich darüber. Doch wenn ihr euch in Geduld übt und Taqwa gemäß handelt, wird ihre Heimtücke euch nicht im Geringsten schaden. Gewiß, ALLAH ist dessen, was sie tun, (mit Seinem Wissen) allumfassend.
ref: If good comes your way, they are vexed; but if evil befalls you they are pleased and rejoice; yet if you are patient and guard yourselves against evil, their cunning will not harm you in the least, for whatsoever they do is well within the reach of God.

result.output: When good fortune comes your way, they are saddened. But when an evil affliction strikes you, they rejoice. However, if you remain patient and act with piety, their schemes will not harm you in the least. Surely, Allah encompasses everything they do with His knowledge.

src: Darin werden sie auf immer ewig weilen.
ref: Which they will enjoy for ever.

result.output: There they will dwell forever and ever.,

src: Dies ist für das, was ihr euch erworben habt. Und gewiß ist ALLAH den Dienern in keiner Weise ein Unrecht- Zufügender."
ref: “This is the recompense of what your own hands have sent ahead, and Allah does not oppress His bondmen.”

result.output: This is for what you have acquired. And surely Allah does not wrong the servants in any way."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt kein Riba in vervielfacht verdoppelter Höhe ein, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber, damit ihr erfolgreich seid.
ref: O you who believe, do not practice usury, charging doubled and redoubled (interest); but have fear of God: you may well attain your goal.

result.output: You who have internalized the faith! Do not take riba (usury) that is multiplied and doubled, and act in accordance with Taqwa with respect to ALLAH, so that you may be successful.

src: denjenigen, deren Leben die Engel beenden, während sie rein sind. Sie (die Engel) sagen: "Salam sei mit euch, tretet in Dschanna ein wegen dem, was ihr zu tun pflegtet."
ref: When the angels receive the souls of those who are blameless they will say: "Peace on you. Enter Paradise as recompense for what you did."

result.output: Those whose lives the angels end while they are pure, they (the angels) say: "Peace be upon you, enter Paradise because of what you used to do."

src: Und wenn ihr krank oder auf Reisen seid oder der eine von euch von der Notdurft kommt oder ihr die Frauen (intim) berührt habt und kein Wasser finden könnt, dann sucht reine Erdoberfläche und streicht euch über eure Gesichter und Hände (bis zu den Ellbogen).
ref: And if you are ill, or on a journey, or one of you comes after answering the call of nature, or you have been in contact with women (by sexual relations) and you find no water, perform Tayammum with clean earth and rub therewith your faces and hands (Tayammum).

result.output: And if you are sick or traveling or one of you comes from relieving himself or you have touched women and can't find water, then seek clean ground and wipe your faces and hands (up to the elbows).

src: Sag: "Ich suche Schutz bei Dem HERRN des Morgengrauens
ref: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of rising day

result.output: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of the dawn.

src: Durch sie gewinnt ihr Wärme und (andere) Produkte. Und ihr ernährt euch von ihnen.
ref: He hath created them. For you in them there is warmth and other profits and of them ye eat.

result.output: Through them you gain warmth and (other) products. And you nourish yourselves with them.

src: Und wenn ihr den Iman und Taqwa verinnerlicht, läßt er euch eure Belohnung zuteil werden und verlangt von euch nicht euer Vermögen.
ref: If you believe and fear God, he will give you your reward, and will not ask for your possessions.

result.output: And if you internalize faith and piety, he will grant you your reward and will not demand your wealth from you.

src: Diejenigen von den Leuten des Buches und von den Polytheisten, die nicht glauben, mögen es nicht gern, daß auf euch etwas Gutes von eurem Herrn herabgesandt wird. Gott aber schenkt seine Barmherzigkeit in besonderer Weise, wem Er will. Und Gott besitzt große Huld.
ref: Those who disbelieve – the People given the Book(s) or the polytheists – do not wish that any good be sent down upon you from your Lord; and Allah chooses whomever He wills by His Mercy; and Allah is the Most Munificent.

result.output: Those of the people of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve do not like anything good to be sent down to you from your Lord. But God selects for His mercy whom He wills, and God is possessor of great bounty.

src: Also manche von ihnen sind rechtgeleitet, und viele von ihnen sind Fasiq.
ref: Then of them some are guided ones, and many of them are transgressors.

result.output: So some of them are guided, and many of them are disobedient.

src: Und gewiß, bereits vor dir wurden Gesandte der Lüge bezichtigt, so haben sie sich in Geduld geübt für das, weswegen sie der Lüge bezichtigt wurden und ihnen Schaden zugefügt wurde, bis Unser Sieg ihnen zuteil wurde. Und es gibt keinen, der ALLAHs Versprechen abändern kann.
ref: Rejected were the messengers before thee: with patience and constancy they bore their rejection and their wrongs, until Our aid did reach them: there is none that can alter the words (and decrees) of Allah.

result.output: And certainly, messengers have been accused of lies before you, but they patiently endured that which they were accused of, and they were harmed until Our victory came to them. And there is no one who can alter the promise of Allah.

src: So (war es).
ref: Thus (it was)!

result.output: So (it was).

src: Sprich: Ob ihr das geheimhaltet, was in eurem Inneren ist, oder es offenlegt, Gott weiß es.
ref: Say: 'Whether you hide what is in your breasts or publish it, God knows it.

result.output: Say: Whether you conceal what is in your hearts or reveal it, God knows it.

src: Aber dann, am Tag der Auferstehung verleugnet ihr einander und verflucht ihr einander.
ref: But then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will disown one another, and curse one another.

result.output: But then, on the day of resurrection, you deny each other and curse each other.

src: Und WIR schmückten den untersten Himmel mit Lampen und Bewahrendem.
ref: And We adorned the nearest (lowest) heaven with lamps (stars) to be an adornment as well as to guard (from the devils by using them as missiles against the devils).

result.output: And WE adorned the lowest heaven with lamps and preservers.

src: So ertrage geduldig, was sie sagen, und lobpreise deinen Herrn vor dem Aufgang der Sonne und vor dem (Sonnen-)untergang
ref: So you bear with patience what they say, and sing the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun and its setting,

result.output: So patiently endure what they say, and proclaim the Praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting.

src: O die ihr glaubt, berauschender Trank, Glücksspiel, Opfersteine und Lospfeile sind nur ein Greuel vom Werk des Satans.
ref: O believers, this wine and gambling, these idols, and these arrows you use for divination, are all acts of Satan; so keep away from them.

result.output: O you who believe, intoxicating drinks, gambling, sacrificial altars, and divining arrows are but defilement from the work of Satan.

src: Diese jedoch lehrten niemanden, ohne zu sagen: «Wir sind nur eine Versuchung, so werde nicht ungläubig.»
ref: They learnt what led to discord between husband and wife.

result.output: However, they did not teach anyone without saying, “We are only a temptation, so do not become disbelievers.”

src: Und wer dies tut, der fügt sich selbst Unrecht zu.
ref: He who does so will wrong himself.

result.output: And whoever does this, wrongs himself.

src: Sie sagen: «Die Wahrheit.» Und Er ist der Erhabene, der Große.
ref: They say, “All that He has proclaimed is the Truth; and He is the Supreme, the Great.”

result.output: They say: The truth. And He is the Exalted, the Great.

src: Und WIR prüften sie mit gottgefälligen guten Taten und mit den gottmißfälligen Taten, damit sie umkehren.
ref: And We tried them with good (blessings) and evil (calamities) in order that they might turn (to Allah's Obedience).

result.output: And WE tested them with God-pleasing good deeds and with God-displeasing deeds, so that they may turn back.

src: Wenn Er damit die von seinen Dienern, die Er will, trifft, da sind sie froh,
ref: Then, when He makes it fall upon whom He wills of His servants, behold, they rejoice.

result.output: If He hits those of His servants whom He wills, then they are glad.

src: Für die Ungläubigen nicht leicht.
ref: Dolorous for the unbelievers.

result.output: For the unbelievers not easy.

src: Und sie schreien darin laut: "Unser Herr, bringe uns heraus, so werden wir rechtschaffen handeln, anders als das, was wir zu tun pflegten." - "Haben Wir euch nicht ein so langes Leben gewährt, daß jeder, der hätte bedenken wollen, darin hätte bedenken können? Und ist nicht der Warner zu euch gekommen?
ref: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you?

result.output: And they shout loudly in it: "Our Lord, bring us out and we will do righteous deeds, not like what we used to do." - "Did We not grant you a long enough life for whoever would be mindful therein to be mindful therein? And did the warner not come to you?

src: Bringt mir Eisenstücke!" Als er dann (die Lücke) zwischen den beiden Wallabhängen auf gleicher Höhe zuschütten ließ, sagte er: "Blast!"
ref: Bring me ingots of iron," (which they did) until the space between two mountain sides was filled up.

result.output: Bring me pieces of iron! When he then had (the gap) filled up at the same level between the two rampart slopes, he said, Blow!

src: Und verrichtet das Gebet und entrichtet die Abgabe.
ref: Fulfil your devotional obligations and pay the zakat.

result.output: And perform the prayer and pay the alms.

src: Also hinsichtlich des Schaums, so wird er beiseite geworfen, doch hinsichtlich dessen, das den Menschen nützt, so verbleibt es in der Erde.
ref: The scum disappears like the foam on the bank, and that which is useful to man remains on the earth.

result.output: Regarding the foam, it is discarded, but regarding that which benefits mankind, it remains in the earth.

src: Darin hören sie nichts Unnützes - (sie hören) nur den Salam-Gruß! Und ihnen ist ihre Versorgung darin morgens und abends gesichert!
ref: They will hear no vain talk there, but only salutations of peace, and they will have their sustenance morning and evening."

result.output: In it, they hear nothing but what is useful - (they hear) only the greeting of peace! And their provision is guaranteed for them therein, morning and evening!

src: Gewiß, bereits haben WIR Nuh zu seinen Leuten entsandt, dann sagte er: "Meine Leute!
ref: Indeed, We sent Nuh (Noah) to his people and he said: "O my people!

result.output: Certainly, we have already sent Noah to his people. Then he said: "My people!

src: Sie sagten: "Salih! Bereits hast du unter uns Vertrauen vor dieser (Aufforderung) genossen.
ref: They said, 'Salih, thou hast hitherto been a source of hope among us.

result.output: They said: Salih! You have already gained trust among us prior to this (request).

src: Und wer Kufr betreibt ALLAH, Seinen Engeln, Seinen Schriften, Seinen Gesandten und dem Jüngsten Tag gegenüber, der ist bereits weit in die Irre gegangen.
ref: But he who believes not in God and His angels and the Books and the prophets and the Last Day, has wandered far away.

result.output: And whoever commits disbelief in Allah, His angels, His Books, His messengers, and the Last Day has certainly gone far astray.

src: Gewiß, Wir haben um ihre Hälse Fesseln gelegt.
ref: We have enchained their necks up to their chins.

result.output: Certainly, we have put fetters around their necks.

src: Das sind die, für die es die guten Dinge geben wird, und das sind diejenigen, denen es wohl ergeht.
ref: These are they for whom are goods, and these: they are the blissful.

result.output: These are the ones who will be the recipients of the good things, and these are the ones who are doing well.

src: und ehrerbietig gegen meine Mutter (zu sein); Er hat mich nicht gewalttätig und unselig gemacht.
ref: And be dutiful to my mother. He has not made me haughty or rebellious.

result.output: and to be respectful towards my mother; he did not make me violent and miserable.

src: Dies ist besser für euch und reiner. Und wenn ihr (es) nicht vermögt, also gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: Yet if you find not means, God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

result.output: This is better for you and purer. And if you are not able to do it, then certainly Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

src: Bei Gott steht ein großartiger Lohn bereit.
ref: Indeed God has greater rewards with Him.

result.output: A great reward awaits with God.

src: Dann gaben Wir ihn seiner Mutter zurück, damit ihr Auge mit Freude erfüllt würde und damit sie sich nicht grämte und damit sie wüßte, daß Allahs Verheißung wahr sei. Jedoch die meisten von ihnen wissen es nicht.
ref: Thus We restored him to his mother that she may be tranquil and not grieve, and know that the promise of God is true, though most men do not know.

result.output: Then We returned him to his mother in order to make her heart glad and that she might not grieve and that she would know that the promise of Allah is true. But most of them do not know.

src: Doch wahrlich, er (Jesus) ist ein Vorzeichen der Stunde.
ref: He is certainly the sign of the Hour (of change).

result.output: : But truly He (Jesus) is a sign of the Hour.

src: Aber nein! Ihr werdet es bald erfahren.
ref: But you will come to know soon; --

result.output: But no! You will soon find out.

src: Und sie haben gesagt: .Verlaßt doch nicht eure Götter; verlaßt doch nicht Wadd, noch Suwa", noch Yagut,Ya'uq und Nasr.'
ref: And said: 'Do not abandon your gods, and do not abandon Wadda or Suwa', or Yaghuth, Ya'uq or Nasr.'

result.output: And they said: 'Do not leave your gods; do not leave Wadd, nor Suwa', nor Yagut, Ya'uq and Nasr.'

src: "Unser Herr, belange uns nicht, wenn wir (etwas) vergessen oder einen Fehler begehen. Unser Herr, lege uns keine Bürde auf, wie Du sie denjenigen vor uns auferlegt hast.
ref: Do not seize us if we forget or are mistaken; our Lord!

result.output: Our Lord, do not punish us if we forget or make a mistake. Our Lord, do not burden us as You have burdened those before us.

src: Und so erweckten Wir sie auf, damit sie sich gegenseitig fragten. Einer von ihnen sagte: "Wie lange habt ihr verweilt?" Sie sagten: "Verweilt haben wir einen Tag oder den Teil eines Tages." Sie sagten: "Euer Herr weiß am besten, wie (lange) ihr verweilt habt. So schickt einen von euch mit diesen euren Silbermünzen in die Stadt; er soll sehen, welche ihre reinste Speise ist, und euch davon eine Versorgung bringen. Er soll behutsam sein und ja niemanden etwas von euch merken lassen.
ref: And similarly We awakened them so that they may enquire about each other; a speaker among them said, “How long have you stayed here?” Some among them said, “We have stayed a day or part of a day”; the others said, “Your Lord well knows how long you have stayed; therefore send one of you to the city with this silver coin – he may then check which food available there is purer, in order to bring some of it for you to eat – and he must be courteous and not inform anyone about you.”

result.output: And so We awakened them that they might question one another. Said one of them, 'how long have you tarried?' They said, 'we have tarried a day or some part of a day.' They said, 'your Lord knows best how long you have tarried, now send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the city, and let him see which of them has purest food, and let him bring you provision from it, and let him behave with gentleness, and not make your case known to anyone;

src: An jenem Tag gehört die Königsherrschaft Gott (allein). Er wird zwischen ihnen urteilen. Dann werden diejenigen, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, in den Gärten der Wonne sein.
ref: For Allah only is the kingship on that day; He will judge between them; so those who believed and did good deeds are in Gardens of content.

result.output: On that day, the kingdom belongs only to God. He will judge between them. Then, those who believe and do good deeds will be in the Gardens of Paradise.

src: Und wäre nicht über euch Allahs Huld und Seine Barmherzigkeit, nicht einer von euch wäre rein geworden; doch Allah macht rein, wen Er will.
ref: Were it not for God’s grace towards you, and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever. But God purifies whomever He wills.

result.output: And had it not been for Allah's grace and His mercy upon you, not one of you would ever have been pure, but Allah purifies whom He wills.

src: Und ALLAH ist immer über alles allmächtig.
ref: God is powerful over everything.

result.output: And Allah is always almighty over everything.

src: Auch kennt ER, was auf dem Festland und was im Meer ist.
ref: He knows what is in land and sea; not a leaf falls, but He knows it.

result.output: He also knows what is on the mainland and what is in the sea.

src: Sagen sie: "Wir teilten Dir mit, keiner von uns ist Zeuge."
ref: They will answer: "We profess to You not one of us can vouch for them."

result.output: They say, 'We informed you that none of us is a witness.'

src: Und er sagte: «O meine Söhne, geht nicht durch ein einziges Tor hinein.
ref: And he said: O my sons!

result.output: And he said: 'O my sons, do not enter through a single gate.'

src: Auch der Warner kam zu euch. Also erfahrt (die Peinigung)!
ref: To you the warner came; taste you now!

result.output: The warner also came to you. So experience (the torment)!.

src: (Dies ist) eine Offenbarung von Ihm, Der die Erde und die hohen Himmel erschuf.
ref: A revelation from Him who created the earth and the high ascending skies,

result.output: (This is) a revelation from Him who created the earth and the lofty heavens.

src: Und gebt ihnen etwas vom Vermögen Gottes, das Er euch gegeben hat. Und zwingt nicht eure Sklavinnen, wenn sie sich unter Schutz stellen wollen, zur Hurerei im Trachten nach den Gütern des diesseitigen Lebens.
ref: And constrain not your slave-girls to prostitution, if they desire to live in chastity, that you may seek the chance goods of the present life.

result.output: And give them [i.e., the poor] from the wealth of Allah which He has given you. And do not compel your slave girls to prostitution, if they desire chastity, to seek [thereby] the temporary interests of worldly life.
