src: Er hört alles und ist nahe.
ref: He is all-hearing and all-too-near."

result.output: He hears everything and is near.

src: Und in der Morgendämmerung baten sie um Vergebung,
ref: And every morning asked forgiveness,

result.output: And at dawn they asked for forgiveness,

src: Weder darf die Sonne den Mond einholen, noch kommt die Nacht dem Tag zuvor.
ref: It is not for the sun to overtake the moon, nor does the night outstrip the day.

result.output: Neither may the sun catch up with the moon, nor does the night come before the day.

src: Ihr dient anstatt Allahs nur Götzen und schafft (dabei nur) ungeheuerliche Lüge.
ref: You worship idols in place of God and invent lies.

result.output: Instead of Allah, you only worship idols and create monstrous lies (in the process).

src: (Erlaubt sind) auch die unter Schutz gestellten gläubigen Frauen und die unter Schutz gestellten Frauen aus den Reihen derer, denen vor euch das Buch zugekommen ist, wenn ihr ihnen ihren Lohn zukommen laßt und mit ihnen in der Absicht lebt, (sie) unter Schutz zu stellen, nicht Unzucht zu treiben und (sie) nicht als heimliche Konkubinen zu nehmen.
ref: The food (slaughtered cattle, eatable animals, etc.) of the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians) is lawful to you and yours is lawful to them. (Lawful to you in marriage) are chaste women from the believers and chaste women from those who were given the Scripture (Jews and Christians) before your time, when you have given their due Mahr (bridal money given by the husband to his wife at the time of marriage), desiring chastity (i.e. taking them in legal wedlock) not committing illegal sexual intercourse, nor taking them as girl-friends.

result.output: \(Allowed are) also the believing women who are under protection and the women of those who were given the Scripture before you, as long as you give them their due compensation and desire chastity, not unlawful sexual intercourse, or taking [secret] lovers.\,

src: Und Wir ließen ihn all unsere Zeichen schauen, aber er erklärte (sie) für Lüge und weigerte sich.
ref: So We showed him all Our signs, but he denied them and refused,

result.output: And we showed him all our signs, but he declared them as lies and refused.

src: An jenem Tag trifft (die Stunde) ein, die eintreffen wird,
ref: On that Day will come what is to come.

result.output: On that day, the hour will come that will arrive.

src: Er (David) sagte: "Wahrlich, er hat ein Unrecht an dir verübt, als er dein Mutterschaf zu seinen eigenen Mutterschafen hinzu verlangte. Und gewiß, viele Teilhaber vergehen sich gegeneinander; nur die (sind davon) ausgenommen, die glauben und gute Werke tun; und das sind wenige." Und David merkte, daß Wir ihn auf die Probe gestellt hatten; also bat er seinen Herrn um Verzeihung und fiel betend nieder und bekehrte sich.
ref: He said: Surely he has been unjust to you in demanding your ewe (to add) to his own ewes; and most surely most of the partners act wrongfully towards one another, save those who believe and do good, and very few are they; and Dawood was sure that We had tried him, so he sought the protection of his Lord and he fell down bowing and turned time after time (to Him).

result.output: He (David) said, "Truly, he has wronged you by asking to add your ewe to his own ewes. And indeed, many partners wrong one another, only those who believe and do good are exempted; and they are few." And David realized that We had tested him, so he sought forgiveness from his Lord and fell down prostrate and turned (to Him in repentance).

src: Sag: "Gibt es unter den von euch (ALLAH) beigesellten Partnern einen, der zur Wahrheit rechtleitet?" Sag: "ALLAH leitet zur Wahrheit recht!"
ref: Say: 'Do any of your partners guide you to the truth' Say: 'Allah, He guides to the truth.

result.output: Say: "Is there among the partners you (ALLAH) associate anyone who can guide to the truth?" Say: "ALLAH guides to the truth!"

src: Und wer krank oder auf Reisen war, (fastet) an anderen Tagen die gleiche Anzahl.
ref: Whoever of you witnesses the month, shall fast it.

result.output: And whoever was sick or traveling (fasts) on the same number of days on other occasions.

src: ER wird sie doch in einen Eingang eingehen lassen, an dem sie Wohlgefallen finden werden. Und gewiß, ALLAH ist zweifelsohne allwissend, allnachsichtig.
ref: He will certainly admit them to a place they will love; and indeed Allah is All Knowing, Most Forbearing.

result.output: He will indeed lead them to an entrance they will find pleasing. And surely, Allah is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.

src: Da ergriff Ich sie.
ref: Then I seized them.

result.output: I took hold of her.

src: Habt ihr das Was ser betrachtet, das ihr trinkt?
ref: Consider the water that you drink.

result.output: Have you considered the water that you are drinking?

src: enn sie so glauben, wie ihr glaubt, dann werden sie rechtgeleitet sein; wenn sie sich aber abwenden, so sind sie nur in Abspaltung geraten.
ref: So if they believe in the like of that which ye believe in, surely they are guided; but if they turn away, then they are but in Cleavage.

result.output: If they believe as you believe, they will be guided aright; but if they turn away, they will only be in schism.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir ahnen Böses von dir und von denen, die mit dir sind." Er sagte: "Euer Unheil ist bereits bei Allah. Nein, ihr seid ein Volk, das geprüft wird."
ref: They said, “We consider you an evil omen, and your companions”; he said, “Your evil omen is with Allah – in fact you people have fallen into trial.”

result.output: They said: 'We suspect evil from you and those who are with you.' He said: 'Your calamity is already with Allah. No, you are a nation being tested.',

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Entsinnt euch der Gabe ALLAHs euch gegenüber, als ein Volk euch Schaden zufügen wollte und ER sie von euch abgehalten hat. Und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber. Und ALLAH gegenüber sollen die Mumin Tawakkul üben!
ref: O believers, remember God's blessing upon you, when a certain people purposed to stretch against you their hands, and He restrained their hands from you; and fear God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.

result.output: You who have internalized the iman! Remember the gift of Allah to you when a people wanted to harm you and He stopped them, and act with taqwa towards Allah. And the mumin should put their trust in Allah!

src: Auch vor dir schickten Wir keine Gesandten, die keine Speise aßen oder nicht auf den Märkten umhergingen. Allein, Wir machen die einen unter euch zur Prüfung für die anderen.
ref: And all the Noble Messengers We sent before you were like this – eating food and walking in the markets; and We have made some of you a test for others; so will you, O people, patiently endure?

result.output: We did not send any messengers before you who did not eat food and walk around markets. However, We make some of you a test for others.

src: So ließen WIR die 'Alaqa zu einer Mudgha werden, und WIR ließen die Mudgha zu Knochen werden, und die Knochen bedeckten WIR mit Fleisch, dann ließen WIR ihn als eine andere Schöpfung entstehen.
ref: Then We developed the lump into bones. Then We clothed the bones with flesh.

result.output: Thus We made the 'Alaqa into a chewed lump, and We made the chewed lump into bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation.

src: Und ALLAH vergibt den Mumin-Männern und den Mumin-Frauen. Und ALLAH ist immer allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: But Allah pardoneth believing men and believing women, and Allah is ever Forgiving, Merciful.

result.output: And Allah forgives the believing men and the believing women. And Allah is always all-forgiving, most merciful.

src: Dann hat er (Schu'aib) sich von ihnen abgewendet und sagte: "Meine Leute! Gewiß, bereits habe ich euch die Botschaft meines HERRN verkündet und euch Ratschläge gemacht, also weshalb soll ich kufr-betreibenden Leuten nachtrauern?!
ref: So he turned his back on them, and said, 'O my people, I have delivered to you the Messages of my Lord, and advised you sincerely; how should I grieve for a people of unbelievers?'

result.output: Then he (Shu'aib) turned away from them and said, My people! Certainly, I have already conveyed to you the message of my Lord and given you advice, so why should I grieve for disbelieving people?

src: Ihr, die den Iman bekundet habt! Verinnerlicht den Iman an ALLAH, an Seinen Gesandten, an die Schrift, die ER Seinem Gesandten nach und nach hinabsandte und an die Schrift, die ER vorher hinabsandte.
ref: O believers, believe in God and His Messenger and the Book He has revealed to His Apostle, and the Books revealed before.

result.output: You who have professed faith! Internalize the faith in ALLAH, in His Messenger, in the Scripture that HE sent down to His Messenger gradually, and in the Scripture that HE sent down before that.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir sind zu einem Volk von Übeltätern gesandt,
ref: "We have been sent," they said, "to (punish) a sinful people,

result.output: They said: "We have been sent to a people of evildoers,

src: Und was euch an Dingen zuteil wurde, ist nur Verbrauchsgut des Diesseits und dessen Schmuck.
ref: Whatsoever has been given you is the stuff this life is made of, and only its embellishment.

result.output: And what has befallen you of the things of this world is only [temporary] enjoyment and adornment of worldly life.

src: Aber sie möchten nicht an das glauben, was sie zuvor geleugnet hatten. So versiegelt Allah die Herzen der Ungläubigen.
ref: Thus it is that Allah seals the hearts of those who deny the truth.

result.output: But they do not want to believe in what they had previously denied. Thus Allah seals the hearts of the disbelievers.

src: Gewiß, Wir haben die Tora hinabgesandt, in der Rechtleitung und Licht sind, womit die Propheten, die sich (Allah) ergeben hatten, für diejenigen, die dem Judentum angehören, walten, und so auch die Leute des Herrn und die Gelehrten, nach dem, was ihnen von der Schrift Allahs anvertraut worden war und worüber sie Zeugen waren. So fürchtet nicht die Menschen, sondern fürchtet Mich.
ref: Verily We sent down the Taurat wherein was a guidance and a light. By it the prophets who submitted themselves judged those who were judaised, and so did the divines and the priests by that wherewith they were entrusted of the Book of Allah and they had become witnesses thereof.

result.output: Indeed, We have revealed the Torah, in which there is guidance and light. The prophets who submitted to Allah judged the Jews by it, as did the rabbis and scholars, according to what they were entrusted with in Allah's scripture and were witnesses to. So do not fear people, but fear Me.

src: Und diejenigen, denen Wissen und Glauben zugekommen sind, sagen: «Nach dem Buch Gottes habt ihr bis zum Tag der Auferweckung verweilt. Und das ist der Tag der Auferweckung.
ref: Those who have received knowledge and have faith will say, "By the decree of God, you have remained for the exact period which was mentioned in the Book of God about the Day of Resurrection.

result.output: And those who have received knowledge and faith say: 'You have stayed until the Day of Resurrection according to the Book of God. And this is the Day of Resurrection.'

src: Diejenigen von euch, die sie zu Freunden nehmen, das sind die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: Whosoever of you then befriendeth them then those! they are the wrong-doers.

result.output: Those of you who take them as friends, they are the ones who do wrong.

src: Fir'aun hatte sein Volk in die Irre geführt und nicht rechtgeleitet.
ref: The Pharaoh had led his people astray, and did not rightly guide them.

result.output: Pharaoh had misled his people and not guided them rightly.

src: Gewiß, dieser ist ein Feind für dich und für deine Gattin. Also lasst ihn nicht euch beide aus der Dschanna herausbringen, sonst mußt du dich mühen.
ref: This is an enemy unto thee and unto thy wife, so let him not drive you both out of the Garden so that thou come to toil.

result.output: Certainly, he is an enemy for you and for your wife. Therefore, do not let him bring both of you out of the Jannah, otherwise you will have to struggle.

src: ER vergibt, wem ER will, und peinigt, wen ER will.
ref: No: You are only mortals, of His creation."

result.output: HE forgives whom HE wants, and punishes whom HE wants.

src: Das sind die Parteien.
ref: These were the hordes.

result.output: These are the parties.

src: Und sie pflegten zu sagen: "Wie?
ref: And said: "What!

result.output: And they used to say, How?.

src: Das ist der Genuß im diesseitigen Leben. Doch bei Allah ist die schöne Heimstatt.
ref: That is the enjoyment of the present life; but God -- with Him is the fairest resort.

result.output: That is the pleasure in this worldly life. But with Allah is the beautiful abode.

src: So legen Wir die Zeichen ausführlich dar, - auf daß sie umkehren mögen.
ref: That is how We explain Our signs distinctly so that they may come back (to the right path).

result.output: So we explain the signs in detail, so that they may turn back.

src: Das ist die Frohbotschaft, die Gott seinen Dienern, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, verkündet. Sprich: Ich verlange von euch keinen Lohn dafür, es sei denn die Liebe wie zu den Verwandten.
ref: That is that whereof Allah giveth the glad tidings Unto His bondmen who believe and work righteous works, Say thou: I ask of you no hire therefor save affection in respect of kinship.

result.output: This is the good news that God proclaims to his servants who believe and do good works. Say: 'I demand no payment from you for this, except love for relatives.'

src: Und vor Mir (allein) sollt ihr Ehrfurcht haben.
ref: Me, you must fear.

result.output: And before me (alone) you shall have reverence.

src: Und Wir haben ihn als Koran in Abschnitte geteilt, damit du ihn den Menschen ohne Hast verliest. Und Wir haben ihn nach und nach hinabgesandt.
ref: And We sent down the Qur’an in parts, that you may gradually recite it to the people, and We sent it down slowly in stages.

result.output: And We have divided him into the Quranic sections, so that you may recite it to people without haste. And We have sent it down gradually.

src: Sollte Der Allgnade Erweisende mir Schaden zufügen, würden weder ihre Fürbitte mir etwas nützen, noch würden sie mich erretten.
ref: So that if the Most Gracious should wish me any harm, their intercession would be of no use to me, nor would they be able to save me?”

result.output: If the merciful one were to cause me harm, neither their intercession would benefit me, nor would it save me.,

src: Und (einen Teil) der Nacht, verbringe ihn damit, zusätzlich für dich.
ref: And in some parts of the night (also) offer the Salat (prayer) with it (i.e. recite the Quran in the prayer), as an additional prayer (Tahajjud optional prayer Nawafil) for you (O Muhammad SAW).

result.output: And (a part of) the night, spend it additionally for yourself.

src: Ein anderer Teil sorgte sich jedoch nur um sich selbst, sie dachten von ALLAH alles andere als das Wahre, eben das Denken der unwissenden Gemeinschaft, sie sagten: "Haben wir in dieser Angelegenheit irgendwelchen Einfluß?!"
ref: Slumber overtook a party of you, while another party was thinking about themselves (as how to save their ownselves, ignoring the others and the Prophet SAW) and thought wrongly of Allah - the thought of ignorance.

result.output: However, another part was only worried about themselves, thinking about ALLAH anything but the truth, and was just part of the ignorant community, they said: 'Do we have any influence in this matter?!'

src: Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber, strebt nach dem, womit ihr Sein Wohlgefallen erreicht und leistet Dschihad fi-sabilillah, damit ihr erfolgreich werdet.
ref: Fear Allah, and seek the means towards Him, and strive in His cause, in the hope of attaining success.

result.output: Act taqwa according to ALLAH, strive for what pleases Him and make Jihad in the way of Allah so that you may be successful.

src: (Dies), außer das Wort Ibrahims zu seinem Vater: "Ich werde ganz gewiß für dich um Vergebung bitten; doch vermag ich für dich vor Allah gar nichts auszurichten.
ref: (Except that Abraham said unto his father, 'Certainly I shall ask pardon for thee; but I have no power to do aught for thee against God.')

result.output: Dies except for Ibrahim's words to his father: I will certainly ask for forgiveness for you, but I cannot do anything for you before Allah.

src: Also manche von ihnen haben den Iman verinnerlicht und manche von ihnen haben Kufr betrieben. Und hätte ALLAH es gewollt, hätten sie den bewaffneten Kampf gegenseitig nicht geführt, doch ALLAH macht, was ER will.
ref: If Allah had willed, they would not have fought against one another, but Allah does what He likes.

result.output: Also, some of them have internalized the Iman and some of them have committed Kufr. And if ALLAH had wanted, they would not have fought each other in armed combat, but ALLAH does what HE wills.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, bereits tat er dir Unrecht mit seiner Forderung zur Überlassung deines Schafsweibchen zu seinen Schafsweibchen. Und gewiß, die meisten der Beteiligten begehen doch Übertretungen die einen von ihnen gegen die anderen außer denjenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht und gottgefällig Gutes getan haben. Doch diese sind wenige." Und Dawud dachte, daß WIR ihn nur einer Fitna unterzogen haben. Dann bat er seinen HERRN um Vergebung, fiel in Ruku' nieder und war umkehrend.
ref: Said he, 'Assuredly he has wronged thee in asking for thy ewe in addition to his sheep; and indeed many intermixers do injury one against the other, save those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness -- and how few they are!' And David thought that We had only tried him; therefore he sought forgiveness of his Lord, and he fell down, bowing, and he repented.

result.output: He said, 'Surely, he did you wrong by demanding that you give him your female sheep for his female sheep. And surely, most of those involved commit transgressions against one another, except for those who have internalized faith and have done good deeds that are pleasing to God. But, they are few.' And Dawud thought that WE only subjected him to a trial. Then, he asked his LORD for forgiveness, fell down in Ruku' (bowing position in prayer), and repented.

src: Dies (geschah deshalb), weil sie immer wieder die Zeichen Allahs leugneten und die Propheten zu Unrecht töteten; dies (geschah), weil sie sich auflehnten und immer wieder übertraten.
ref: This, because they were ever disbelieving in the signs of Allah and slaying the prophets without justice. This, because they disobeyed and were ever trespassing.

result.output: This happened because they repeatedly denied the signs of Allah and unjustly killed the prophets; this happened because they rebelled and repeatedly transgressed.

src: (Hätten Wir dich nicht entsandt), würden sie sagen, wenn sie ein Unglück trifft wegen dessen, was ihre Hände vorausgeschickt haben: "Unser Herr, hättest Du doch einen Gesandten zu uns gesandt, so daß wir Deinen Zeichen hätten folgen können und zu den Gläubigen'hätten gehören können!"
ref: And in case disaster comes upon them for what they have done themselves, they should say: "O Lord, why did You not send an apostle to us that we should have followed Your commands, and been with those who are believers;"

result.output: If We had not sent you, they would say, when disaster struck them for what their hands had put forth, Why did we not send a messenger to us so that we could have followed Your verses and been among the believers?

src: An dem Tag, wenn ER sie allesamt erweckt, werden sie Ihm schwören, wie sie euch schwören, und sie denken, sie verfügen über etwas (Nützliches).
ref: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all together (for their account), then they will swear to Him as they swear to you (O Muslims).

result.output: On the day when HE raises all of them, they will swear to Him as they swear to you, and they think they have something useful.

src: Vielleicht tue ich Gutes in dem, was ich hinterlassen habe.» Nein, das ist nur ein Wort, das er (so) sagt.
ref: "In order that I may work righteousness in the things I neglected." - "By no means!

result.output: Maybe I am doing good in what I leave behind.» No, that's just a word he says.

src: Dann konnten sie weder aufstehen, noch wurde ihnen beigestanden.
ref: And neither stand up nor defend themselves.

result.output: Then they could neither get up nor were they assisted.

src: Ich bitte euch nicht um eine Belohnung dafür. Meine Belohnung obliegt doch nur Demjenigen, Der mich erschuf.
ref: “O my people, I ask you no wage for it; my wage lies with Him who originated me.

result.output: I do not ask you for a reward for it. My reward is solely up to the one who created me.

src: Dann entsandten Wir nach ihnen Mose mit unseren Zeichen zu Pharao und seinen Vornehmen.
ref: Then after them We sent Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his elite, but they wronged them.

result.output: Then We sent Moses to them with Our signs to Pharaoh and his noble ones.

src: Und Al'ahrsch von deinem HERRN tragen über ihnen an diesem Tag acht.
ref: And on that Day, eight (of them) will carry the Throne of your Lord above them.

result.output: And the burden on that day shall be carried by eight angles of your Lord.

src: Wenn die Heuchler und diejenigen, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, und diejenigen, die beunruhigende Falschmeldungen in der Stadt verbreiten, (damit) nicht aufhören, werden Wir dich bestimmt gegen sie antreiben.
ref: If the hypocrites and those who have a disease in their hearts, and those who make a commotion in the City do not desist, We will surely urge you against them.

result.output: If the hypocrites and those whose hearts are sick, and those who spread disturbing fake news in the city, do not stop, We will certainly incite you against them.

src: Und die weiblichen Guten sind für die männlichen Guten, und die männlichen Guten sind für die weiblichen Guten bestimmt, diese sind unschuldig hinsichtlich dessen, was sie (die anderen an Ifk-Lüge) sagen. Für sie ist Vergebung und edles Rizq bestimmt.
ref: Good statements are for good people (or good women for good men) and good people for good statements (or good men for good women), such (good people) are innocent of (each and every) bad statement which they say, for them is Forgiveness, and Rizqun Karim (generous provision i.e. Paradise).

result.output: And the female good ones are for the male good ones, and the male good ones are intended for the female good ones, they are innocent with respect to what they say (about the accusation of adultery). For them, there is forgiveness and noble provision.

src: (Es gilt) schöne Geduld (zu üben). Gott ist der, der um Hilfe gebeten wird gegen das, was ihr beschreibt.»
ref: He said: nay! your selves have embellished for you an affair; so seemly patience! and Allah is to be implored for help in that which ye ascribe

result.output: Beautiful patience is to be practiced. God is the one who is asked for help against what you describe.

src: Doch es ist nichts als eine Ermahnung für die Weltenbewohner.
ref: Whilst it is no more than reminder for the people of the world.

result.output: But it is nothing but a reminder for the inhabitants of the worlds.

src: Oder glaubt ihr in Sicherheit davor zu sein, daß Er euch ein anderes Mal aufs Meer zurückbringt und einen verheerenden Wind gegen euch sendet und euch ertrinken läßt, weil ihr ungläubig seid, und (daß) ihr dann für euch keinen Gefolgsmann findet, der Uns deswegen belangen könnte?
ref: Or you feel so secure that He will not send you back (to sea) again or send a gravel-hurtling storm against you, and drown you for your ingratitude? Then you will not find any avenger against Us.

result.output: Or do you think you are secure that He will not bring you back to sea another time and send a devastating wind against you and drown you because you are unbelievers, and (that) then you will not find for yourself any advocate who could help you against Us?,

src: Doch WIR sehen mit euch nicht eure Fürbittenden, die ihr unter euch als Partner (für ALLAH) angenommen habt.
ref: We do not see your intercessors with you who, you imagined, had partnership with you.

result.output: But WE do not see with you your intercessors that you have accepted among yourselves as partners (for ALLAH).

src: Seht ihr denn nicht?
ref: Can you not perceive?

result.output: Don't you see?

src: Sie sagte: "Ihr Entscheidungsträger!

result.output: She said: You decision maker!

src: Und die Ungläubigen sagen von den Gläubigen: "Wäre er (der Quran) etwas Gutes, hätten sie ihn nicht vor uns erlangt." Und da sie sich nicht von ihm leiten lassen, sagen sie: "Dies ist eine alte Lüge."
ref: And the disbelievers said regarding the Muslims, “If there were any good in it, the Muslims would not have surpassed us in achieving it!”; and since they did not receive guidance with it, they will now say, “This is an old slander.”

result.output: And the unbelievers say of the believers, 'If [the Quran] were something good, they would not have preceded us to it.' And since they are not guided by it, they say, 'This is an ancient lie.'

src: Er hat die Schlüssel der Himmel und der Erde. Diejenigen, die die Zeichen Gottes verleugnen, das sind die Verlierer.
ref: He has the keys of the heavens and the earth; and those who deny the revelations of God will be losers.

result.output: He has the keys of heavens and earth. Those who deny the signs of God are the losers.

src: Ihre Gesandten sagten: "Existiert etwa ein Zweifel über Allah, den Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde?
ref: Said their apostles: "Can there be doubt about God, the originator of the heavens and the earth?

result.output: Their envoys said, "Is there any doubt about Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth?"

src: Jene sind (überhaupt) die Unachtsamen.
ref: They are the heedless ones.

result.output: Those are the (extremely) inattentive ones.

src: Einen Teil tötetet ihr, und einen Teil nahmt ihr gefangen.
ref: Some of them you killed, and others you took captive.

result.output: You killed a part of them and captured a part of them.

src: Allah hat gesagt: Nehmt euch nicht zwei Götter. Er ist nur ein Einziger Gott. Vor Mir (allein) sollt ihr Ehrfurcht haben.
ref: And Allah has proclaimed, “Do not ascribe two Gods; indeed He is the only One God; therefore fear Me alone.”

result.output: Allah said: Do not take two gods for yourselves. He is only one god. You shall have awe only for me (alone).

src: Ehefrauen des Propheten! Welche von euch eine bewiesene Abscheulichkeit vollbringt, für diese wird die Peinigung verzweifacht. Und dies ist für ALLAH immer ein Leichtes.
ref: Wives of the Prophet, whosoever among you commits a flagrant indecency, for her the chastisement shall be doubled; that is easy for God.

result.output: Wives of the Prophet! Whoever among you commits a proven wickedness, her punishment shall be doubled. And this is easy for ALLAH.

src: Und hätte dein HERR es gewollt, hätte ER doch die Menschen zu einer einzigen Umma gemacht - sie aber bleiben uneins
ref: But if your Lord had pleased He could have made all human beings into one community of belief. But they would still have differed from one another,

result.output: And if your Lord had willed, He could have made mankind one community; but they will not cease to differ.

src: Und seid nicht wie diejenigen, die sich gespalten haben und uneins geworden sind, nachdem die deutlichen Zeichen zu ihnen gekommen waren.
ref: So be not like those who became disunited and differed among themselves after clear proofs had come to them.

result.output: And do not be like those who have split and become divided after the clear signs have come to them.

src: Sie sagten: "Fürchte dich nicht!" Und sie überbrachten ihm frohe Botschaft über einen äußerst wissenden Jungen.
ref: They said, “Do not fear,” and they announced to him the good news of a knowledgeable boy.

result.output: They said, Fear not! And they brought him good news about an extremely knowledgeable boy.

src: Dies (ist deshalb so), weil jene, die ungläubig sind, dem Trügerischen folgen, und weil diejenigen, die gläubig sind, der Wahrheit ihres Herrn folgen. So beschreibt Allah den Menschen ihre Lage.
ref: This is because the disbelievers followed falsehood and the believers followed the Truth which is from their Lord; this is how Allah illustrates the examples of people to them.

result.output: This (is so) because those who are unbelievers follow the deceptive (ways) and because those who are believers follow the truth of their Lord. Thus Allah describes to mankind their position.

src: Als die Nacht über ihn hereinbrach, sah er einen Himmelskörper. Er sagte: "Das ist mein Herr."
ref: When the night came with her covering of darkness he saw a star, and (Azar, his father) said: "This is my Lord."

result.output: As the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial object. He said, "That is my Lord."

src: Aber Allah ist voll Huld gegen die Weltenbewohner.
ref: But gracious is God to the people of the world.

result.output: But Allah is full of grace towards the inhabitants of the worlds.

src: Und Wir haben den untersten Himmel mit Leuchten geschmückt und haben sie zu Wurfsteinen gegen die Satane gemacht.
ref: We have adorned the lower heaven with lamps, and have made them a means to drive away the satans.

result.output: And We have adorned the lowest heaven with lights, and made them [as] missiles against the devils;

src: Ihr könnt auf der Erde nichts vereiteln. Und ihr habt außer Gott weder Freund noch Helfer.
ref: You cannot thwart Him on the earth, and have no friend or helper apart from Him.

result.output: You cannot thwart anything on Earth. And you have no friend or helper besides God.

src: "Aber jetzt erst! Wo du dich doch zuvor widersetztest und zu den Unheilstiftern gehörtest?
ref: "Yes, now" (was the answer), "though before this you were disobedient and rebellious.

result.output: But now! Where you previously resisted and belonged to the troublemakers?

src: Und euch wird nur für das vergolten, was ihr zu tun pflegtet,
ref: And be rewarded but only for what you had done,

result.output: And you will only be rewarded for what you used to do

src: Du bist aber nur ein Warner.
ref: (Muhammad), you are only a warner.

result.output: But you are just a warner.

src: Sag: Wollt ihr mit uns über Allah streiten, wo Er doch unser und euer Herr ist?
ref: Say: "Why do you dispute with us about God when He is equally your Lord and our Lord?

result.output: Say: Do you wish to argue with us about Allah, while He is our Lord and your Lord?

src: Und derjenige (Mann) aus Ägypten, der ihn gekauft hatte, sagte zu seiner Frau: "Nimm ihn freundlich auf.
ref: The Egyptian who bought him instructed his wife: "House him honourably.

result.output: And the man from Egypt who had bought him said to his wife, Receive him kindly.

src: So richte dein Antlitz in aufrichtiger Weise auf den Glauben; (dies entspricht) der natürlichen Veranlagung, mit der Allah die Menschen geschaffen hat.
ref: So keep yourself exclusively on the true way, the creational law of God according to which He created man with the quality of choosing right or wrong.

result.output: So turn your face towards the faith sincerely and uprightly, (this corresponds to) the nature which Allah has created people with.

src: Hast du nicht jene gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde?
ref: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture?

result.output: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given?

src: Und jedesmal wenn du den Quran rezitiert hast, errichteten WIR zwischen dir und denjenigen, die keinen Iman an das Jenseits verinnerlichen, einen unsichtbaren Vorhang.
ref: When you recite the Qur'an, We place a hidden veil between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter;

result.output: And every time you recite the Quran, We set up between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter a hidden barrier.

src: Und bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde und lobpreise deinen Herrn am Abend und am frühen Morgen.
ref: And ask forgiveness for thy sin, and proclaim the praise of thy Lord at evening and dawn.

result.output: And ask for forgiveness for your sins and praise your Lord in the evening and early morning.

src: Für diejenigen von euch, die sich von ihren Frauen durch den Rückenspruch scheiden...
ref: Those among you who make their wives unlawful (Az-Zihar) to them by saying to them "You are like my mother's back."

result.output: For those of you who get divorced from their wives through the saying behind their back...

src: Es wird dir nichts gesagt außer dem, was den Gesandten vor dir gesagt wurde.
ref: Nothing is said to you which had not been said to other apostles before you.

result.output: You are told nothing except what was said to the messengers before you.

src: Dann trifft ihn das Alter, während er (noch) schwache Nachkommen hat. Nun trifft ihn ein Wirbelsturm mit Feuer, er verbrennt.
ref: But he is afflicted with old age and has weak offspring, and it is hit by a whirlwind containing fire and is burned.

result.output: Then old age hits him, while he still has (weak) offspring. Now a tornado with fire hits him, and he burns.

src: Und sie wurden zum Guten des Gesagten rechtgeleitet.
ref: They were guided to purity of speech.

result.output: And they were guided right to the good of what was said.

src: Es ist nur eine Ermahnung für die ganze Schöpfung.
ref: It is only a warning for all mankind.

result.output: It is just an exhortation for the entire creation.

src: Und urteile zwischen ihnen nach dem, was Gott herabgesandt hat, und folge nicht ihren Neigungen.
ref: And judge between them according to what God revealed, and do not follow their desires.

result.output: And judge between them according to what God has revealed, and do not follow their inclinations.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH liebt nicht die Freudenerregten.
ref: God does not like those who exult.

result.output: Surely, Allah does not love those who are joyfully arrogant.

src: Und wenn eine jede Seele, die Unrecht begangen hat, alles besäße, was auf Erden ist, würde sie versuchen, sich damit (von der Strafe) loszukaufen.
ref: And if every one that hath wronged had all that is in the earth, surely he would ransom himself therewith.

result.output: And if every soul that has done wrong had everything on earth, it would try to buy itself out (of punishment) with it.

src: Und auch die in Erfahrung bringe, die heucheln.
ref: And that he might know those who played the hypocrite.

result.output: And even those who pretend, find out about them.

src: Und das Wasser begann zu sinken, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: Withhold (your rain)." And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).

result.output: And the water began to sink, and the matter was decided. And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Er ist es, Der in Seiner Barmherzigkeit die Winde als frohe Botschaft schickt, bis daß Wir sie, wenn sie eine schwere Wolke tragen, zu einem toten Ort treiben; dann lassen Wir Wasser aus ihr herab, mit dem Wir Früchte von jeglicher Art hervorbringen. So bringen Wir auch die Toten hervor, auf daß ihr dessen eingedenk sein möget.
ref: And it is He Who sends the winds giving glad tidings, ahead of His mercy; until when they come bearing heavy clouds, We drove it towards a city devoid of vegetation, and then rained water upon it, then produced fruits of various kinds from it; this is how We will bring forth the dead, so that you may heed advice.

result.output: He is the one who sends the winds as glad tidings of his mercy until, when they carry a heavy cloud, We drive it to a dead land and then send down water from it with which We bring forth fruits of every kind. Thus, do We bring forth the dead so that you may remember.

src: Gewiß, sie sind ein Volk von Frevlern."
ref: They are certainly a rebellious people."

result.output: Sure, they are a people of transgressors.

src: Gewiß, WIR haben dir die Schrift mit der Wahrheit hinabgesandt, damit du zwischen den Menschen richtest mit dem, was ALLAH dir erklärt hat.
ref: Surely We have sent down to thee the Book with the truth, so that thou mayest judge between the people by that God has shown thee.

result.output: Certainly, WE have sent down to you the Scripture with the truth that you may judge between the people by that which Allah has shown you.

src: Dafür werdet ihr dann Uns gegenüber keinen Rächer für euch finden.
ref: Then you will not find any avenger against Us.

result.output: Therefore, you will not find any avenger in us towards you.

src: Und es gibt keinen unter euch, der nicht dahin wie zur Tränke gehen würde?
ref: There is not one among you who will not reach it.

result.output: And there is none among you who would not go there like to drink?

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden. Das ist der großartige Erfolg.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, and superb dwellings in everlasting Gardens of Eden; this is the greatest success.

result.output: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and to pleasant dwellings in the Gardens of Eden. That is the great attainment.

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann zu den Bewohnern einer Stadt kamen, sie ihre Bewohner um etwas zu essen baten; diese aber weigerten sich, sie gastlich aufzunehmen. Da fanden sie in ihr eine Mauer, die einzustürzen drohte, und so richtete er sie auf. Er (Musa) sagte: "Wenn du wolltest, hättest du dafür wahrlich Lohn nehmen können."
ref: So they both set out again; until they came to the people of a dwelling – they asked its people for food – they refused to invite them – then in the village they both found a wall about to collapse, and the chosen bondman straightened it; said Moosa, “If you wished, you could have taken some wages for it!”

result.output: They both then continued until, when they came to the inhabitants of a city, they asked for food from its people; but they refused to host them hospitably. Then they found a wall in it that was about to collapse, and so he (Musa) set it up. He said: If you had wanted, you could certainly have taken a reward for this.

src: Dann werden diese ihnen die Rede erwidern: "Gewiß, ihr seid zweifelsohne Lügner."
ref: They will fling back at them the saying, 'Surely, you are truly liars.'

result.output: Then they will respond to them saying, 'Indeed, you are certainly liars.'

src: Ist es denn für die Menschen verwunderlich, daß Wir einem Mann von ihnen (als Offenbarung) eingegeben haben: "Warne die Menschen und verkünde denen, die glauben, die frohe Botschaft, daß sie bei ihrem Herrn einen wahrhaftigen Stand haben"? Die Ungläubigen sagen: "Das ist wahrlich ein deutlicher Zauberer.3"
ref: Are people amazed that We have sent to a man among them, the divine revelation that “Warn the people and convey glad tidings to the believers that for them with their Lord is the place* of truth”? The disbelievers say, “Indeed he is an open magician.” (* Positions of honour on the Day of Resurrection or in heaven.)

result.output: Is it surprising for the people that We have revealed to a man from among themselves, saying, 'Warn the people and give glad tidings to those who believe that they are on a true footing with their Lord'? The disbelievers say, 'This is clearly a sorcerer.'

src: Allah weiß besser über ihren Glauben Bescheid. Wenn ihr sie dann als gläubig erkennt, dann schickt sie nicht zu den Ungläubigen zurück.
ref: When believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them, Allah knows best as to their Faith, then if you ascertain that they are true believers, send them not back to the disbelievers, they are not lawful (wives) for the disbelievers nor are the disbelievers lawful (husbands) for them.

result.output: Allah knows better about their faith. If you then recognize them as believers, do not send them back to the unbelievers.

src: ALLAH erlegt einer Seele nichts auf, außer was sie vermag. Ihr gebührt, was sie erworben, und ihr obliegt, was sie sich angeeignet hat.
ref: Allah does not burden anyone, except with something within its capacity; beneficial for it is the virtue it earned, and harmful for it is the evil it earned; “Our Lord!

result.output: Allah does not burden any soul beyond its capacity. It will have the consequences of its good deeds, and it will bear the consequences of its bad deeds.

src: ER sagte: "Du wirst Mich nicht sehen!
ref: "You cannot behold Me," He said.

result.output: He said: 'You will not see me!'

src: Er sprach: "O Noah, er gehört nicht zu deiner Familie; siehe, dies ist kein rechtschaffenes Benehmen. So frage Mich nicht nach dem, von dem du keine Kenntnis hast.
ref: He said: "O Nuh (Noah)! Surely, he is not of your family; verily, his work is unrighteous, so ask not of Me that of which you have no knowledge!

result.output: He said: O Noah, he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] conduct was other than righteous, so do not ask Me for that about which you have no knowledge.

src: Auch hat Er die Herdentiere erschaffen.
ref: And the cattle! He hath created them.

result.output: He also created the herd animals.

src: Er sagte zu seinen Angehörigen: "Bleibt hier.
ref: "Wait here," he said to his family; "I have seen a fire.

result.output: He said to his relatives: "Stay here."

src: Und wir erklärten den Tag des Gerichtes für Lüge,
ref: And rejected the Day of Judgement as a lie

result.output: And we declared the Day of Judgment to be a lie.

src: Und gewähre ihnen Einblick, denn sie werden den Einblick haben.
ref: And wait; they will come to know soon.

result.output: And grant them insight, for they will have the insight.

src: Dem das Königreich der Himmel und der Erde gehört; und Allah ist Zeuge von allem.
ref: Whose kingdom spreads over the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.

result.output: To whom belongs the kingdom of Heaven and Earth; and Allah is witness to all.

src: Sie möchten gern die Worte Gottes abändern. Sprich: «Ihr dürft uns nicht folgen.
ref: They want to change God's word, but tell them, "You shall not follow us.

result.output: You would like to modify the words of God. Say, "You must not follow us.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr eure beigesellten Partner, an die ihr anstelle von ALLAH Bittgebete richtet? Zeigt mir, was sie von der Erde erschufen!
ref: Proclaim, “Just show me your partners (false deities) whom you worship other than Allah; show me which part of the earth have they created – or do they have any share in the heavens?”

result.output: Say: \How do you view your associated partners, to whom you direct supplications instead of ALLAH? Show me what they have created on earth!,

src: Dann erretten WIR Unsere Gesandten und diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben. Solcherart obliegt es Uns, die Mumin zu erretten.
ref: Then We shall save Our Noble Messengers and the believers – this is it; it is incumbent upon Our mercy to save the Muslims.

result.output: Then WE save our messengers and those who have internalized the faith. Thus it is Our responsibility to save the believers.

src: Allah ist mit den Standhaften.
ref: Truly! Allah is with As-Sabirin (the patient ones, etc.).

result.output: Allah is with the steadfast.

src: Die die Engel abberufen, während sie gute (Menschen) gewesen sind.
ref: Those whom the angels cause to die (when they are) good.

result.output: The angels call them back even though they have been good (people).

src: Und wer von euch krank ist oder an seinem Haupt ein Leiden hat, der soll Ersatz leisten durch Fasten, Mildtätigkeit oder Darbringen eines Schlachtopfers.
ref: But if you are sick or have ailment of the scalp (preventing the shaving of hair), then offer expiation by fasting or else giving alms or a sacrificial offering.

result.output: And whoever among you is sick or has a head ailment should make amends by fasting, charity or offering a sacrificial animal.

src: O die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr gläubige Frauen heiratet und euch hierauf von ihnen scheidet, bevor ihr sie berührt habt, dann dürft ihr für sie keine von euch berechnete Wartezeit aussetzen; gewährt ihnen eine Abfindung und gebt sie auf schöne Weise frei.
ref: O you who believe, when you marry believing women then divorce them before having (sexual) contact with them, you have no right to demand observance of the 'waiting period' of them. But provide suitably for them, and let them go with honour.

result.output: O you who believe, if you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, you shall not have any waiting period to fulfill against them. So compensate them and release them in a beautiful manner.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr es? Wenn ALLAH mich und diejenigen mit mir zugrunde richtet oder Gnade erweist, wer gewährt den Kafir einen Schutz vor einer qualvollen Peinigung?"
ref: Say: "Just think: If God destroys me and those with me, or is benevolent to us, who will then protect the unbelievers from a painful doom?"

result.output: Say: "How do you see it? If Allah destroys me and those with me or shows mercy, who will grant refuge to the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"

src: Es ist die Gemeinschaft eures Vaters Ibrahim. ER nannte euch Muslime vorher und in diesem (Quran), damit der Gesandte Zeuge über euch wird und ihr Zeugen über die Menschen werdet.
ref: He hath named you Muslims of old time and in this (Scripture), that the messenger may be a witness against you, and that ye may be witnesses against mankind. So establish worship, pay the poor-due, and hold fast to Allah.

result.output: It is the community of your father Ibrahim. He called you Muslims before and in this (Quran), so that the messenger will be a witness over you and you will be witnesses over the people.

src: Den Herrn von Mose und Aaron.»
ref: "The Lord of Moses and Aaron."

result.output: The Lord of Moses and Aaron.

src: Und sie sagten: "Was ist los mit diesem Gesandten, er ißt die Speisen und geht zu den Märkten, würde zu ihm doch ein Engel herabgesandt, damit er mit ihm einWarner wird!
ref: But they say: "What sort of prophet is this who eats food and walks the market places? Why was no angel sent to him to act as admonisher with him?

result.output: And they said, 'What's wrong with this messenger? He eats food and goes to the markets. Why wasn't an angel sent down to him to be a warner with him?'

src: Er ist es, Der euch bei Nacht abberuft und weiß, was ihr bei Tag begangen habt, und euch hierauf an ihm auferweckt, damit eine festgesetzte Frist erfüllt wird.
ref: It is He indeed who sends you to death at night, and knows what you do in the day, then makes you rise with it again in order that the fixed term of life be fulfilled.

result.output: He is the one who calls you by night and knows what you have done by day, and then raises you up to him so that a fixed term may be fulfilled.

src: Und hütet ja eure Eide. So macht euch Allah Seine Zeichen klar, auf daß ihr dankbar sein möget.
ref: So God makes clear to you His signs; haply you will be thankful.

result.output: And guard your oaths. Thus Allah makes clear to you His verses that you may be grateful.

src: Sie sagten: "Verbrennt ihn und helft euren Göttern, wenn ihr etwas tun wollt."
ref: They said: "Burn him, and save your gods, if you are men of action."

result.output: They said, "Burn him and help your gods if you want to do something."

src: Gewiß, ALLAH bleibt immer allwissend, allkundig.
ref: Indeed Allah is Ever All-Knower, Well-Acquainted with all things.

result.output: Certainly, ALLAH always remains all-knowing, all-cognizant.

src: Ihr werdet (noch) erfahren, über wen eine Strafe kommen wird, die ihn in Schande stürzt, und wer ein Lügner ist.
ref: You will come to know who it is on whom descends the torment that will cover him with ignominy, and who is a liar!

result.output: You will (still) learn who will receive a punishment that will bring him to shame, and who is a liar.

src: Aber diejenigen, die böse Taten begehen und danach bereuen und glauben-, gewiß, dein Herr ist danach wahrlich Allvergebend und Barmherzig.
ref: Yet those who do wrong, then repent and believe, are forgiven, for your Lord is forgiving and kind.

result.output: But those who commit evil deeds and then repent and believe, surely your Lord is thereafter truly All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Sie sind doch nicht ihre Mütter. Ihre Mütter sind die, die sie geboren haben.
ref: Their mothers are none else but those who gave birth to them.

result.output: You are not their mothers. Their mothers are the ones who gave birth to them.

src: Als ob sie wohlverwahrte Eier wären.
ref: Like sheltered eggs in a nest.

result.output: As if they were well-preserved eggs.

src: Reisende kamen vorbei. Sie sandten ihren Wasserschöpfer, und er ließ seinen Eimer hinunter.
ref: A caravan happened to pass, and sent the water-carrier to bring water from the well.

result.output: Travelers passed by. They sent down their water dipper, and he lowered his bucket.

src: Er ist zweifelsohne dieWahrheit von unserem HERRN! Wir waren doch vor ihm Muslime."
ref: Indeed even before it we have been from those who submit themselves to Allah in Islam as Muslims (like 'Abdullah bin Salam and Salman Al-Farisi, etc.).

result.output: He is undoubtedly the truth of our LORD! We were Muslims before him.

src: 'Ain-sin-qaf.
ref: 'Am Sin Qaf.

result.output: Ain-sin-qaf

src: Und Wir wollen euch sicherlich prüfen, bis Wir diejenigen von euch ausscheiden, die kämpfen und standhaft sind.
ref: We shall certainly test you until We know those who strive hard for the cause of God and those who exercise patience.

result.output: And We will certainly test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.

src: ALLAH gewährt viel Rizq, wem ER will, und läßt es wenig sein.
ref: God outspreads and straitens His provision unto whomsoever He will.

result.output: ALLAH grants a lot of Rizq (provisions) to whom HE wills, and makes it little for others.

src: Du brichst das Versprechen nicht.»
ref: Verily Thou failest not the tryst.

result.output: You don't break the promise.

src: Und diejenigen, die weder neben ALLAH an einen anderen Gott Bittgebete richten, noch den Menschen töten, den ALLAH für haram erklärte, außer mit Berechtigung, noch Zina begehen.
ref: And those who call not unto anot her god along with Allah and slay not any soul which Allah hath forbidden, save in justification, and commit not fornication.

result.output: And those who do not associate anything with Allah in their supplication to Him and do not kill any soul, which Allah has forbidden, except in the pursuit of justice, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse.

src: (Sei nicht traurig,) denn du kannst nicht die Toten hören lassen noch die Tauben den Ruf hören lassen, wenn sie den Rücken kehren.
ref: You cannot make the dead to listen nor the deaf hear the call when they have turned back and retreated,

result.output: Don't be sad because you cannot make the dead hear nor make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs.

src: Diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig sein.
ref: Those are the dwellers of the Fire, and they will abide therein forever.

result.output: These are the companions of fire. Therein they will be eternally.

src: Darum führe uns unter den Bezeugenden auf."
ref: Enroll us among the witnesses."

result.output: Lead us among the witnesses.

src: Also lasse uns das zuteil werden, wovor du uns warnst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: If so, bring on us what you threaten us with, if what you say is true."

result.output: So let us have what you warn us of, if you are one of the truthful.

src: O Prophet, mühe dich gegen die Ungläubigen und Heuchler ab und sei hart gegen sie! Ihr Zufluchtsort wird die Hölle sein - ein schlimmer Ausgang!
ref: O Herald of the Hidden! Fight against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be stern with them; and their destination hell; and what an evil place to return!

result.output: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.

src: Es sind Finsternisse, die einen über den anderen, wenn er seine Hand ausstreckt, beinahe sieht er sie nicht.
ref: If you stretch your hand, you could hardly see it.

result.output: They are eclipses that stack upon each other, you almost can't see them when reaching out your hand.

src: Darin bleiben sie ewig, wie die Himmel und die Erde (des Jenseits) bleiben - außer was dein HERR will. Gewiß, dein HERR macht, was ER will.
ref: Remaining in it as long as the heavens and the earth remain, except as much as your Lord willed*; indeed your Lord may do whatever, whenever, He wills. (* Remaining forever even after the heavens and the earth are destroyed.)

result.output: In it they will remain forever, as the heavens and the earth (of the Hereafter) remain - except what your LORD wills. Surely your LORD does what HE wills.

src: Zwei Männer von denjenigen, die Ehrfurcht haben und denen ALLAH von Seinen Gaben gewährte, sagten: "Tretet zu ihnen durch das Tor ein! Und wenn ihr es durchschritten habt, werdet ihr dann doch Sieger sein.
ref: Two men of those who feared, but whom God had blessed, said, “Go at them by the gate; and when you have entered it, you will prevail.

result.output: Two men, among those who were blessed and feared Allah, said: 'Enter through the gate; for once you have entered it, you will surely be victorious.'

src: Am Tag, da Allah sie alle auferweckt, da werden sie Ihm schwören, wie sie euch schwören, und meinen, sie hätten eine Grundlage.
ref: On the day that God will raise them together, they will swear before Him as they swear before you, and imagine they are on the right path.

result.output: On the day when Allah will awaken them all, they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they have an excuse.

src: Aber trefft nicht heimlich eine Abmachung mit ihnen, außer ihr sagt geziemende Worte.
ref: And do not consummate the marriage until the term prescribed is fulfilled.

result.output: But do not secretly make an agreement with them except for speaking in honorable terms.

src: Dann wurde er ein Blutklumpen; dann bildete und vervollkommnete Er (ihn)
ref: Then formed into an embryo? Then He fashioned, shaped and proportioned

result.output: Then, he became a blood clot; then He formed and perfected it.

src: Um undankbar zu sein für das, was Wir ihnen zukommen ließen. So genießet nur.
ref: That they may show ingratitude for that which We have vouchsafed unto them.

result.output: To be ungrateful for what We bestowed upon them. So enjoy only.

src: Wissen sie denn nicht, daß Allah die Versorgung großzügig gewährt, wem Er will, und auch bemißt?
ref: Do they not know that God enhances or restricts the provision of any one He will.

result.output: Do they not know that Allah bestows provision generously on whom He wills and restricts it?

src: Und ALLAH gegenüber sollen die Mumin Tawakkul üben!
ref: And in God let the believers put their trust.

result.output: And the believers shall put their trust in Allah!

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il! Gewiß, er war wahrhaftig im Versprechen und war ein Gesandter, ein Prophet.
ref: And remember Ismail in the Book; he was indeed true to his promise and was a Noble Messenger, a Prophet.

result.output: And mention Ishmael in the Book. He was truthful in his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet.

src: Oder (sind jene sicher davor,) daß Er sie nicht durch vorgewarnte Vernichtung erfaßt? Euer Herr ist wahrlich Gütig Barmherzig.
ref: Or, that he will not take hold of them by giving them a fright? verily thy Lord is Kind, Merciful.

result.output: Or are they [not also] aware that the misfortunes of doom come to them suddenly while they perceive it not? Indeed, your Lord is kind and merciful.

src: Und Allah hat euch aus Erde erschaffen, dann aus einem Samentropfen, dann machte Er euch zu Paaren. Und kein weibliches Wesen wird schwanger oder entbindet ohne Sein Wissen.
ref: God has created you from dust, then from a drop of semen and then divided you into pairs; no female conceives or gives birth without His knowledge; and no one's life is prolonged or shortened, but it is recorded in a Book.

result.output: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then made you pairs. And no female conceives or gives birth except with His knowledge.

src: Und wenn sie ein Zeichen sehen, so verdrehen sie es zu Spott
ref: When they see a sign, they laugh at it,

result.output: And when they see a sign, they twist it into ridicule.

src: Belehrt hat ihn der Besitzer starker Kräfte,
ref: Bestowed on him by the Supreme Intellect,

result.output: The owner of strong powers has educated him.

src: Und ALLAH ist über das, was ihr tut, allwissend.
ref: God is aware of what you do.

result.output: And Allah is all-knowing of what you do.,

src: Sie sagten: "O Moses, siehe, dort lebt ein tyrannisches Volk, und wir werden es (das Land) nicht betreten, ehe jene es nicht verlassen haben.
ref: They said: "O Moses, in that land live a people who are formidable; we shall never go there until they leave.

result.output: They said, O Moses, behold, there is a tyrannical people living therein, and we will not go forth until they leave it.

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen).
ref: What comes to you of good is verily from God; and what comes to you of ill is from your own self (your actions).

result.output: What befalls you of good is from Allah, and what befalls you of evil is from yourself.

src: Und zu Uns führt der Lebensweg.
ref: To Us is the arrival.

result.output: And the path of life leads us to Us.

src: Das ist die Ermahnung derer, die mit mir sind, und die Ermahnung derer, die vor mir lebten. Aber die meisten von ihnen kennen die Wahrheit nicht, so wenden sie sich ab.
ref: Say, “Bring your proof; this is the remembrance of those with me and those before me”; but in fact most of them do not know the Truth, so they turn away.

result.output: This is the admonition of those who are with me, and the admonition of those who lived before me. But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away.

src: Gewiß, manches Spekulieren ist eine Verfehlung.
ref: And spy not, neither backbite one another.

result.output: Certainly, some speculating is a transgression.

src: Er sprach: "lch bin der Bote deines Herrn.
ref: If thou fearest God...

result.output: He said, "I am the messenger of your Lord."

src: Und sie folgten dem, was die Satane während der Herrschaft Salomos vortrugen; doch nicht Salomo war ungläubig, sondern. die Satane waren ungläubig; sie brachten den Menschen die Zauberei bei sowie das, was den beiden Engeln in Babel, Harut und Marut, herabgesandt wurde.
ref: And they follow that which the Satans recited in the reign of Sulaiman; and Sulaiman blasphemed not, but the Satans blasphemed.; teaching people magic; and they follow that also which was sent down unto the two angels in Babil, Harut, and Marut.

result.output: And they followed what the devils attributed to the reign of Solomon. But Solomon was not unbelieving; rather the devils were unbelieving. They taught people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.

src: (Dies) als Belohnung von deinem Herrn, als hinreichende Gabe,
ref: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,

result.output: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift.

src: Du siehst dann die, die Unrecht tun, erschrocken vor dem, was sie erworben haben, und es wird über sie hereinbrechen. Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses.
ref: You will see (on the Day of Resurrection), the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.) fearful of that which they have earned, and it (Allah's Torment) will surely befall them, while those who believe (in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism) and do righteous deeds (will be) in the flowering meadows of the Gardens (Paradise), having what they wish from their Lord.

result.output: Then you will see those who do wrong, frightened by what they have earned, and it will fall upon them. But those who believe and do good deeds are in the gardens of paradise.

src: (Die Folgen) eurer Übertretungen tragt nur ihr selbst.
ref: Your violations are against your own souls.

result.output: The consequences of your transgressions are borne only by yourselves.

src: Ihm gehört, wer in den Himmeln und auf der Erde ist. Alle sind Ihm demütig ergeben.
ref: All those who are in the heavens and the earth are His, and they are all obedient to Him.

result.output: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and on the earth. All are humbly obedient to Him.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen!
ref: “These – the people of ours – have set up Gods besides Allah; why do they not bring a clear proof regarding them?

result.output: These are our people, they took Gods in place of Him. If only they could present a clear confirmation for it!

src: Er ist es, Der euch Gehör, Augenlicht und Herzen hat entstehen lassen.
ref: It is He, Who has created for you (the sense of) hearing (ears), sight (eyes), and hearts (understanding).

result.output: He is the one who created for you hearing, eyesight, and hearts.

src: "O Moses, tritt vor und fürchte dich nicht; denn du gehörst zu jenen, die in Sicherheit sind.
ref: "O Moses, approach," (said the Voice), "and have no fear. You will be safe.

result.output: O Moses, step forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are safe.

src: Zu ihnen kam ein edler Gesandter:
ref: A respected prophet had come to them (saying):

result.output: A noble envoy came to them

src: Ist das (etwa) eine Gunst, die du mir vorhältst, daß du die Kinder lsra'ils geknechtet hast?"
ref: But the favour you oblige me with is that you have enslaved the children of Israel."

result.output: Is that a favor you hold against me that you enslaved the Children of Israel?

src: Und Allah gab ihm die Herrschaft und die Weisheit und lehrte ihn von dem, was Er wollte.
ref: David slew Goliath, and Allah bestowed on him the kingship and wisdom, and taught him from that He willed.

result.output: And Allah gave him the sovereignty and wisdom and taught him of what He wanted.

src: Und die Engel stehen an seinem Rand.
ref: The angels will stand on all its sides.

result.output: And the angels stand at its edge.

src: Wisset, daß wahrlich das diesseitige Leben nur ein Spiel und ein Zeitvertreib ist und ein Prunk und Geprahle unter euch und ein Wettrennen um Vermehrung von Gut und Kindern. Es gleicht dem reichlichen Regen, dessen Pflanzenwuchs den Säern gefällt. Dann verdorrt er; und du siehst ihn vergilben; hierauf wird er brüchig; und im Jenseits gibt es eine strenge Strafe, aber auch Vergebung von Allah und Wohlgefallen. Und das diesseitige Leben ist nichts anderes als eine Nutznießung, durch die man sich betören läßt.
ref: Know that the life of this world is nothing but play and pastime, and adornment, and boasting amongst yourselves, and the desire to surpass each other in wealth and children; like the rain the produce of which pleased the farmer, then dried so you see it yellow, and then turned into dry trampled hay; and in the Hereafter is a severe punishment, and the forgiveness from Allah and His pleasure; and the life of this world is nothing but counterfeit wealth.

result.output: Know that the present life is only a game, a diversion, an adornment, a cause of boasting among yourselves, and a rivalry in the multiplication of wealth and children. It is like the plants that flourish after the rain: the growth of which pleases the sowers, but then they wither and you see them turning yellow, and then they become straw. In the hereafter, there is severe punishment but also forgiveness from Allah and His good pleasure. The life of this world is nothing but an illusory pleasure.

src: Der Mensch lehnt sich wahrlich auf,
ref: Verily, man does transgress all bounds (in disbelief and evil deed, etc.).

result.output: The human being truly rebels.

src: Dann werden Wir euch eure Sünden vergeben; wahrlich, Wir werden jenen, die Gutes tun, noch mehr (an Gnade) erweisen."
ref: We shall forgive you your wrong-doings. We shall increase (the reward) for the good-doers."

result.output: Then We will forgive you your sins; Verily, We will bestow more (grace) upon those who do good.

src: Kein Willkomm (sei) ihnen! Sie sollen im Feuer brennen.
ref: Verily, they shall burn in the Fire!

result.output: No welcome to them! They shall burn in fire.

src: Und erlahmt nicht in der Verfolgung der Leute. Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: Do not relax in pursuit of the disbelievers; if you are suffering, they also suffer as you do; and you expect from Allah what they do not; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.

result.output: And do not weaken in the persecution of people. If you suffer, they suffer too, just as you suffer; but you hope for from God what they do not hope for. God knows and is wise.

src: Und wir werden gewiß nicht gepeinigt werden.»
ref: We are not the punished!

result.output: And we certainly will not be tortured.

src: Diejenigen, die auf ihren Herrn hören, erhalten das Beste. Diejenigen, die nicht auf ihn hören, würden wohl, wenn sie alles, was auf der Erde ist, besäßen und noch einmal soviel dazu, sich damit loskaufen wollen. Sie erwartet eine böse Abrechnung, und ihre Heimstätte ist die Hölle - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: For those who obeyed the command of Allah is goodness and if those who did not obey Him owned all that is in the earth and in addition a similar one like it, they would give it to redeem their souls; it is they who will have a wretched account, and their destination is hell; and what a wretched resting place!

result.output: Those who listen to their Lord receive the best. Those who do not listen to him would indeed want to buy themselves out with everything that is on earth and twice as much. They will have a bad reckoning, and their abode is hell - what a terrible resting place!

src: ALLAH leitet zum Seinem Licht recht, wen ER will.
ref: God guides to His light whom He will.

result.output: ALLAH guides to His light whom He wills.

src: Diesen wird ALLAH Gnade erweisen.
ref: Allah will have His Mercy on them.

result.output: Allah will show mercy to him/her,

src: Sie sagen: "Pflegten nicht doch eure Gesandten mit den klaren Beweisen zu euch zu kommen?"
ref: They will say: "Did not your apostles come to you with clear proofs?"

result.output: They say, "Did not your messengers come to you with clear proofs?"

src: Meine Söhne! Geht und erkundigt euch nach Yusuf und seinem Bruder und verzweifelt nicht an den Ruhh von ALLAH, denn es zweifeln an den Ruhh von ALLAH nur die Kafir-Leute."
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God. Only they despair of God's mercy who do not believe."

result.output: My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair over the plan of Allah, for only the unbelieving people doubt the plan of Allah.

src: Sag: "Weshalb habt ihr ALLAHs Propheten vorher getötet, solltet ihr Mumin sein?!"
ref: Say: "Why have you then been slaying God's apostles as of old, if you do believe?"

result.output: Say: If you are true believers, why did you kill Allah's prophets before?

src: Und unter den Leuten der Schrift gibt es wahrlich manche, die an Allah glauben und (an) das, was zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt worden ist, und was zu ihnen (selbst) herabgesandt worden ist.
ref: And there are, certainly, among the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians), those who believe in Allah and in that which has been revealed to you, and in that which has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before Allah.

result.output: And among the People of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and what was revealed to you and what was revealed to them, [being] humbly submissive to Allah.

src: Darin ist wahrlich ein Zeichen für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid.
ref: In this will be a portent for you if you do believe.

result.output: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you are believers.

src: Und zu Madyan (entsandten WIR) ihren Bruder Schu'aib. So sagte er: "Meine Leute!
ref: And We sent towards Madyan, their fellowman Shuaib – he therefore said, “O my people!

result.output: And to Madyan, We sent their brother Shu'aib. So he said: "My people!

src: DU bist unser Wali, so vergib uns und erweise uns Gnade! Und DU bist der Beste der Vergebenden.
ref: You are our saviour, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the best of forgivers.

result.output: You are our guardian, so forgive us and show us mercy! And You are the best of forgivers.,

src: Und es begreifen sie nur die Wissenden.
ref: But only those endowed with knowledge will comprehend them.

result.output: And only the knowledgeable understand them.

src: Oder fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER über euch Sandsturm schickt?!
ref: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you?

result.output: Or do you feel safe from Him whose instruction is in heaven, that He may send a sandstorm upon you?,

src: Kann es sein, daß wenn er stirbt oder getötet wird, daß ihr auf euren Fersen (zum Kufr) umkehrt?
ref: So what if he dies or is killed! Will you turn back and go away in haste?

result.output: Is it possible that if he dies or is killed, you will turn back on your tracks (to Kufr)?

src: Und da die Berge versetzt und zu einer Luftspiegelung werden.
ref: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.

result.output: And as the mountains move and become a mirage.

src: Und gehorcht Allah und Seinem Gesandten, und streitet nicht miteinander, sonst würdet ihr den Mut verlieren, und eure Kraft würde vergehen! Und seid standhaft!
ref: And obey Allah and His apostle, and dispute not, lest ye flag and your predominance depart, and be patient.

result.output: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight with one another, or you would lose courage and your strength would be gone. And be steadfast!

src: Das sind die (wahren) Lügner.
ref: These are the liars.

result.output: Those are the (true) liars.

src: Doch sollten sie dich verraten wollen, so haben sie ALLAH bereits vorher verraten, dann hat ER sie unterwerfen lassen.
ref: But if they intend to betray you (O Muhammad SAW), they have already betrayed Allah before. So He gave (you) power over them.

result.output: But if they want to betray you, they have already betrayed ALLAH before, then HE has caused them to fall under submission.

src: Und wenn die Gräber umgewühlt werden,
ref: When the graves are overturned,

result.output: And when the graves are disturbed,

src: Allah wird alles ans Licht bringen, wovor ihr euch fürchtet."
ref: Say: 'Mock on; God will bring forth what you fear.'

result.output: Allah will bring to light everything that you fear.

src: Richte Bittgebete an deinen HERRN mit dem, wozu ER dich verpflichtete, wir sind gewiß rechtgeleitet!"
ref: Pray for us to your Lord, by the means of His covenant which is with you; we will certainly come to guidance.”

result.output: Direct your supplications to your Lord with what He has enjoined you, and say: 'Our Lord, lead us to the right path; we are convinced that you have given us guidance.'

src: Entweder peinigst du sie, oder du gewährst ihnen Gutes."
ref: Either you punish them, or treat them with kindness."

result.output: Either you torment them, or you grant them good.

src: Dies ist ein von Ihm gemachtes Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges - (erwähnt) in At-taurat, Alindschil und im Quran. Und wer hält sein Versprechen besser als ALLAH ein?!
ref: Rejoice wherefore in your bargain which ye have made.

result.output: This is a true promise made by Him, mentioned in the Torah, the Gospel and the Quran. And who fulfills his promise better than ALLAH?!

src: Die (wahren) Gläubigen sind ja diejenigen, die an Allah und Seinen Gesandten glauben und hierauf nicht zweifeln und sich mit ihrem Besitz und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf Allahs Weg abmühen.
ref: They alone are believers who come to believe in God and His Apostle, then never doubt again, and struggle wealth and soul in the way of God.

result.output: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt it and strive with their possessions and their own selves in the cause of Allah.

src: Aber die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But most of them do not know.

result.output: The most of them do not know.

src: Da kam seine Frau in Aufregung heran, und sie schlug ihre Wange und sagte: "(Ich bin doch) eine unfruchtbare alte Frau!"
ref: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"

result.output: Then his wife came up in agitation, and she slapped her cheek and said, "(I am) an infertile old woman!"

src: Solltest DU sie peinigen, so sind sie doch Deine Diener.
ref: If Thou punish them, lo! they are Thy slaves, and if Thou forgive them (lo! they are Thy slaves).

result.output: : If you should torment them, they are still your servants.

src: Und wenn diejenigen, die Schirk betrieben, die von ihnen beigesellten Partner gesehen haben, werden sie sagen: "Unser HERR!
ref: And when the polytheists will see their ascribed partners, they will say, “Our Lord!

result.output: And those who associate partners with Allah will say: 'Our Lord!'

src: So wurden ihre Häuser dem Erdboden gleichgemacht, auch der Brunnen ist verlassen und das Schloß ist errichtet.
ref: How many a well and fortress reinforced lie abandoned!

result.output: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is abandoned and the castle has been built.

src: Dann brachten WIR heraus, wer in ihr von den Mumin war.
ref: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,

result.output: Then WE figured out who among them was a Moomin.

src: Wollt ihr denn geduldig sein? Und dein Herr ist Allsehend.
ref: And O dear Prophet, your Lord is All Seeing.

result.output: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.

src: Sie haben sich ihre Schriftgelehrten und Mönche zu Herren genommen außer Allah; und den Messias, den Sohn der Maria.
ref: They have taken their rabbis and their priests as lords instead of God, as well as the Messiah son of Mary.

result.output: They have taken their scribes and monks as lords besides Allah; and the Messiah, the Son of Mary.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr das, was ALLAH euch vom Rizq hinabsandte, dann ihr es in Haram und Halal eingeteilt habt?"
ref: Say: "Have you thought of what God has sent you for food, of which you have labelled some as lawful and some forbidden?"

result.output: Say, How do you see what ALLAH sent down to you as provision, then you divided it into Haram and Halal?

src: Ebenso zu Seinen Ayat zählt, daß ER für euch von eurem Wesen Partnerwesen erschuf, damit ihr bei ihnen Geborgenheit findet. Und ER setzte zwischen euch Liebe und Barmherzigkeit. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die nachdenken.
ref: And among His signs is that He created spouses for you from yourselves for you to gain rest from them, and kept love and mercy between yourselves; indeed in this are signs for the people who ponder.

result.output: Similarly, among His signs is that He created for you from among yourselves mates so that you may dwell in tranquility with them; and He has placed between you affection and mercy. Surely, in these are signs for those who reflect.

src: Hierauf legte Er sie den Engeln vor und sagte: "Teilt Mir deren Namen mit, wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid!"
ref: After this he taught Adam the names of all things. Then He set these before the angels and asked, "Tell Me the names of these things, if you are right (in thinking that the appointment of a vicegerent will cause disorder)".

result.output: Then He presented them to the angels and said, 'Tell Me their names, if you are truthful!',

src: Und ohne die Huld Allahs gegen euch und Seine Barmherzigkeit würde niemand von euch jemals lauter sein.
ref: And whosoever followeth the footsteps of the Satan, then he only urgeth to indecency and abomination.

result.output: And without the grace of Allah towards you and His mercy, no one among you would ever be pure.

src: Dann entfernten sie sich. ALLAH möge ihre Herzen (vom Iman) entfernen, weil sie gewiß Leute sind, die nicht begreifen.
ref: Indeed God has turned their hearts away (from the truth), for they cannot discern the law of heaven.

result.output: Then they moved away. MAY ALLAH remove their hearts (from Iman) for they are indeed a people who do not understand.

src: Darum, wenn sie sich von euch fernhalten und nicht gegen euch kämpfen, sondern euch Frieden bieten; dann hat Allah euch keinen Grund gegen sie gegeben.
ref: If they keep aloof and do not fight, and offer peace, God has left you no reason to fight them.

result.output: Therefore, if they keep away from you and do not fight against you, but rather offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight against them.

src: Wenn wir wollten, könnten auch wir etwas Derartiges sagen. Das sind nichts als Fabeln der Früheren.»
ref: Had we wanted, we could have said the like of this; these are nothing but myths of the ancients.”

result.output: If we wanted to, we could also say something like that. These are nothing but tales of the past.

src: Josef, wende dich davon ab. Und (du), bitte um Vergebung für deine Schuld. Du gehörst ja zu denen, die sich versündigt haben.»
ref: Ignore this affair, O Joseph; and you, O woman, ask forgiveness for your sin, for you were surely errant."

result.output: Josef, turn away from it. And ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You are one of those who have sinned.

src: Und gewiß, manch einer von euch zögert. Und wenn ein Unglück euch heimsucht, sagt er: "ALLAH hat mir bereits eine Wohltat erwiesen, daß ich unter ihnen nicht anwesend war."
ref: Someone among you will surely lag behind, and if calamity should befall you, will say: "God was gracious to me that I was not among them."

result.output: And certainly, some of you hesitate. And if a misfortune befalls you, he says, "ALLAH has already bestowed a favor upon me that I was not present among them."

src: Und als sie die Peinigung überkam, sagten sie: "Musa!
ref: And whenever the punishment came upon them they said, “O Moosa!

result.output: And when the torment came upon them, they said, "Musa!"

src: Sie schwören euch bei ALLAH, damit sie euch zufriedenstellen, während ALLAH und Sein Gesandter doch berechtigter sind, zufriedengestellt zu werden, sollten sie Mumin sein.
