ref: They swear by God to please you; but if they are believers it would have been worthier to have pleased God and His Apostle.

result.output: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, while Allah and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied if they are believers.

src: So wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der geschützten Gebetsstätte!
ref: And wheresoever you people are, turn your faces (in prayer) in that direction.

result.output: So turn your face towards the protected place of worship!

src: Also vergalten Wir es ihnen. Siehe nun, wie das Ende der Leugner war!
ref: So We took revenge from them – therefore see what sort of fate befell those who denied!

result.output: So we rewarded them. Now see how the end of the deniers was!

src: Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu bebauen und zu bestellen gegeben.
ref: He hath caused you to spring out of the earth, and hath made you dwell therein.

result.output: He has made you emerge from the earth and has given it to you to cultivate and care for.

src: Und sie sagen: "Dies sind verwehrtes Vieh und verwehrte (Früchte auf den) Saatfelder(n).
ref: They also say: "These cattle and these crops are consecrated. None may eat of them other than those we permit," -- so they assert.

result.output: And they say, "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruit from the) crops."

src: Er sagte: "Ihr befindet euch in einer (noch) schlechteren Lage. Und Allah weiß sehr wohl, was ihr beschreibt."
ref: But Joseph kept this secret and did not disclose it to them, and said (to himself): "You are worse in the degree of evil, for God knows better of what you allege."

result.output: He said, 'You are in an even worse situation. And Allah knows very well what you describe.'

src: Und er wird froh zu seinen Angehörigen zurückkehren.
ref: And will return to his people full of joy.

result.output: And he will return happily to his relatives.

src: Darin sind gehobene Liegen
ref: And within it are couches placed on high,

result.output: There are elevated loungers.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Was ist denn der Herr der Weltenbewohner?"
ref: The Pharaoh asked: "And what is the Lord of all the worlds?"

result.output: Pharaoh said, 'So, who is the Lord of the Worlds? '

src: Und wer Kufr gegenüber dem Iman betreibt, dessen Handeln ist zweifellos nichtig, und er gehört im Jenseits zu den Verlierern.
ref: Useless shall be rendered the acts of those who turn back on their faith, and they will be among the losers in the life to come.

result.output: And whoever commits disbelief against the Imam, his actions are undoubtedly in vain, and in the Hereafter he will be among the losers.

src: ER sagte: "Ist dies nicht dieWahrheit?!"
ref: He will say, 'Is not this the truth?'

result.output: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"

src: Die Menschen fragen dich nach der Stunde. Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah.
ref: People ask thee ccncerning the Hour.

result.output: People ask you about the hour. Say: Knowledge about it is only with Allah.

src: Und ALLAH erschuf alles sich bewegende Lebewesen aus Wasser. So geht manch einer von ihnen auf seinem Bauch, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf zwei Beinen, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf Vieren. ALLAH erschafft, was ER will! Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: And Allah created every animal on earth, from water; so among them is a kind that moves upon its belly; and among them is a kind that moves upon two legs; and among them a kind that moves upon four legs; Allah creates whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.

result.output: And Allah created every moving creature from water. Some of them go on their bellies, and some of them go on two legs, and some of them go on four. Allah creates whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.

src: Die Juden sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Christen"; und die Christen sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Juden", obwohl sie doch (beide) die Schrift lesen.
ref: The Jews say, 'The Christians stand not on anything'; the Christians say, 'The Jews stand not on anything'; yet they recite the Book.

result.output: The Jews say: "Christians do not stand on anything"; and the Christians say: "Jews do not stand on anything", although they both read the scripture.

src: Das Gleichnis dessen, was sie in diesem diesseitigen Leben spenden, ist wie das Gleichnis vom Wind, der bittere Kälte bringt und die Äcker von Leuten, die Unrecht begangen haben, heimsucht und dann zerstört. Und ALLAH fügte ihnen kein Unrecht zu, sondern sie fügten sich selbst Unrecht zu.
ref: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is similar to the freezing cold wind which struck the fields of a nation who wronged themselves, and destroyed it completely; and Allah did not oppress them, but it is they who wronged themselves.

result.output: The parable of those who spend their possessions in the way of Allah is that of a grain out of which grow seven ears, in every ear a hundred grains: for Allah grants manifold increase unto whom He wills; and Allah is infinite, all-knowing.,

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war.
ref: They were that day, nearer to disbelief than to Faith, saying with their mouths what was not in their hearts.

result.output: On that day they were closer to disbelief than to belief, they said with their mouths what was not in their hearts.

src: (Ich vermag) nur etwas zu übermitteln von Allah und Seinen Botschaften. Und wer sich Allah und Seinem Gesandten widersetzt, gewiß, für ihn wird es das Feuer der Hölle geben, ewig und auf immer darin zu bleiben.
ref: “I only convey the commands from Allah, and His messages; and whoever disobeys the commands of Allah and His Noble Messenger – then indeed for him is the fire of hell, in which they will remain for ever and ever.”

result.output: I am only able to convey something from Allah and His messages. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger, surely for him will be the fire of Hell, to abide therein forever.

src: Dann erfaßte Ich jene, die ungläubig waren, und wie war es mit der Verleugnung!
ref: So We seized the unbelievers. How great was the change I wrought in their condition then!

result.output: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!

src: Und die Soldaten deines HERRN kennt niemand außer Ihm.
ref: And none knoweth the hosts of thy Lord but He.

result.output: And the soldiers of your LORD, no one knows them except Him.

src: Doch sie fügten damit niemandem Schaden zu, es sei denn mit der Ermächtigung Allahs.
ref: Yet they could not harm any one or without the dispensation of God.

result.output: But they did not harm anyone with it, unless by the permission of Allah.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Laßt mich Musa töten; soll er (doch) seinen Herrn anrufen!
ref: "Let me kill Moses," the Pharaoh said, "and let him call to his Lord.

result.output: Pharaoh said, 'Let me kill Moses; let him call upon his Lord!'

src: Und wer Allah Götter zur Seite stellt, der hat wahrhaftig eine gewaltige Sünde begangen.
ref: And he who ascribes compeers to God is guilty of the gravest sin.

result.output: And whoever associates any partners with Allah has certainly committed a great sin.

src: Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: Indeed, He knows the secrets of the hearts.

result.output: Surely, he knows what is in the innermost of the breasts.,

src: Sie sagten: "Wir brachen das Versprechen dir gegenüber nicht aus eigener Kraft.
ref: They replied: 'We have not failed in our promise to you through our choosing.

result.output: They said: We did not break the promise to you on our own.

src: Sollte er von ihr dann (zum dritten Mal) die Talaq-Scheidung vollzogen haben, so wird sie für ihn danach nicht mehr halal, bis sie einen anderen Ehemann heiratet.
ref: If a man divorces her again (a third time), she becomes unlawful for him (and he cannot remarry her) until she has married another man.

result.output: Should he then have (for the third time) the Talaq divorce from her, she will not be halal for him afterwards until she marries another husband.

src: Und es ist für euch kein Vergehen, wenn ihr Heiratsabsichten gegenüber solchen Frauen andeutet oder bei euch innerlich hegt.
ref: You commit no error by announcing your engagement to women, or by keeping it to yourselves.

result.output: And it is not a sin for you to hint at or hold inwardly the intention of marriage towards such women.

src: Und WIR erretteten diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten und Taqwa gemäß zu handeln pflegten.
ref: We deliver those who believe and take heed for themselves.

result.output: And WE saved those who internalized the faith and acted according to Taqwa.

src: Du bist der, der alles hört und weiß.»
ref: Thou art the Hearer, the Knower.

result.output: You are the one who hears and knows everything.

src: Aber wenn sie sich dessen enthalten, ist das besser für sie.
ref: But to refrain (i.e. not to discard their outer clothing) is better for them.

result.output: But if they refrain from it, it is better for them.

src: Abziehende der Kopfhäute,
ref: That would skin the scalp.

result.output: removers of the scalp

src: Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, auch ich handle.
ref: Do on your part what you can, O people, I will do what I will.

result.output: My people! Act according to your positions, so do I.

src: Waret ihr dabei, als Allah euch dies gebot?" Wer ist also ungerechter als der, welcher eine Lüge gegen Allah ersinnt, um die Leute ohne Wissen irrezuführen?
ref: Then who doth greater wrong than he who deviseth a lie concerning Allah, that he may lead mankind astray without knowledge. Lo!

result.output: Were you present when Allah commanded you with this? So who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah to mislead people without knowledge?

src: Den Menschen erschaffen hat aus einem Embryo.
ref: Created man from an embryo;

result.output: God has created man from an embryo

src: (Dies ist) das Gleichnis des (Paradies)gartens, der den Gottesfürchtigen versprochen ist: Er ist durcheilt von Bächen'; sein Ernteertrag ist immerwährend und (auch) sein Schatten.
ref: The likeness of Paradise promised the pious and devout is (of a garden) with streams of rippling water, everlasting fruits and shade.

result.output: (This is) the parable of the paradise garden that is promised to the God-fearing: It is traversed by streams; its harvest is everlasting and (so is) its shade.

src: Und die ihr Zeugnis ablegen,
ref: Who uphold their testimonies,

result.output: And those who give their testimony,

src: Aber Er läßt in seine Barmherzigkeit eingehen, wen Er will.
ref: But He admits whomsoever He pleases into His Mercy.

result.output: But He admits into His mercy whom He wants.

src: Und als Unsere Boten zu Lot kamen, war er ihretwegen besorgt und fühlte sich außerstande, ihnen zu helfen. Sie sprachen: "Fürchte dich nicht und sei nicht traurig, wir wollen dich und die Deinen sicher retten, bis auf deine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen.
ref: And when Our sent angels came to Lut, he was unhappy at their arrival and was depressed – and they said, “Do not fear or grieve; we will surely rescue you and your family, except your wife, who is of those who will stay behind.”

result.output: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was worried about them and felt unable to help them. They said: "Do not fear and do not be sad, we will safely rescue you and yours, except for your wife, who is one of those who should stay behind.

src: Und gewiß, bereits erleichterten WIR den Quran zur Ermahnung! Gibt es etwa einen sich Erinnernden?!
ref: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?

result.output: And indeed, We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance. So is there any who will remember?

src: Allah sieht die Menschen wohl,
ref: And under God's eyes are devotees

result.output: Allah sees people well

src: (Erinnere) an den Tag, wenn er euch zum Tag des Zusammenbringens zusammenbringt. Dies ist der (Anklage-)Tag wegen Übervorteilung.
ref: The day He will gather you together on the Day of Gathering, will be the day of Judgement.

result.output: Remind him of the day when he brings you together for the day of reconciliation. This is the day of accusation because of fraud.

src: Und am Tag, da Er sie versammelt, als hätten sie nur eine Stunde vom Tag verweilt, um einander kennenzulernen. Den Verlust haben diejenigen, die die Begegnung mit Gott für Lüge erklärt haben und der Rechtleitung nicht gefolgt sind.
ref: And on the day when He will raise all of them together, as if they had never stayed on earth except for a moment during the day, they will recognise one another; for completely ruined are those who denied the meeting with Allah and were not on guidance.

result.output: And on the day when He gathers them together, as if they had not stayed away from each other but an hour of the day to get to know each other. The loss is on those who declared the encounter with Allah as a lie and did not follow the guidance.

src: ALLAH will ihnen keinen Anteil am Jenseits gewähren.
ref: It is Allah's Will to give them no portion in the Hereafter.

result.output: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the Hereafter.

src: Sie sagte zu seiner Schwester: "Spüre ihm nach."
ref: She told his sister: "Follow him."

src: Zakaria! Gewiß, WIR überbringen dir doch frohe Botschaft von einem Jungen Namens Yahya. Dessen Namen haben WIR niemandem zuvor gegeben.
ref: O Zakariyya! verily We give thee the glad tidings of a boy: his name shall be Yahya; We have not afore-time made his namesake.

result.output: Zakaria! Surely, we bring you good news of a boy named Yahya. We have never given this name to anyone before.

src: Und wer an Allah glaubt und das Rechte tut - Er wird seine Übel von ihm nehmen und wird ihn in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (sie) auf ewig verweilen.
ref: He who believed and did the right, will have his evil deeds expunged by God and admitted to gardens with rivers flowing by, and abide there perpetually.

result.output: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove his misdeeds from him and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.,

src: Da könnt ihr weder (etwas) abwenden noch Hilfe erfahren. Und wer von euch Unrecht tut, den lassen Wir große Strafe kosten "
ref: Then you shall neither be able to repel your punishment nor shall get any help from anywhere; and whoso is guilty. of iniquity'' among you, We shall make him taste a severe torment.

result.output: You can neither divert (anything) nor receive help. And whoever among you does wrong, we shall make him suffer a great punishment.

src: Wer ist dieser, der um ALLAHs willen eine Hasan-Anleihe macht, damit ALLAH sie für ihn um ein Vielfaches vermehrt?!
ref: Who will give a goodly loan to God which He might double many times?

result.output: Who is this person who, for the sake of Allah, makes a Hasan investment so that Allah may multiply it for him many times over?!

src: So fragt die Leute der Ermahnung, wenn ihr (es) nicht wißt.
ref: If you do not know, then ask the keepers of the oracles of God.

result.output: So ask the people of admonition if you do not know.,

src: Du Mensch!
ref: O Man!

result.output: You human!

src: Zu Ihm ist eure Rückkehr, alle zusammen - ein wahrhaftiges Versprechen von ALLAH.
ref: To Him will you all return: God's promise is true.

result.output: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from ALLAH.

src: Gewiß, denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, werden weder ihre Vermögenswerte noch ihre Kinder vor ALLAH etwas nutzen.
ref: As for those who disbelieve, neither wealth nor children will avail them in the least against God.

result.output: Of course, those who have committed kufr, neither their assets nor their children will be of any use to Allah.

src: Sag: "Nennt sie doch!" Oder macht ihr Ihm etwa Mitteilung über das, was ER auf der Erde nicht kennt oder sind dies nur Worthülsen?!
ref: Proclaim, “Just name them – or is it that you inform Him of something which in His knowledge does not exist in the earth – or is it just superficial talk?”

result.output: Say: Name them! Or are you telling Him about something HE doesn't know on Earth, or are these just empty words?

src: Sie sagten: "Wer hat dies mit unseren Göttern getan? Er gehört wahrlich zu den Ungerechten."
ref: They said: who hath wrought this to our gods? verily he is of the wrong-doers.

result.output: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? Surely, he is one of the unjust."

src: Diese sind diejenigen, die ihrem HERRN gegenüber Kufr betrieben haben. Und diese sind es, um deren Hälse Eisenringe sein werden.
ref: They are the ones who deny their Lord, and they will have collars around their necks.

src: So diene Mir und verrichte das Gebet zu Meinem Gedenken.
ref: So serve Me and establish Prayers to remember Me.

result.output: So serve Me and perform prayer for My remembrance.

src: Was ist mit diesem Buch, daß es nichts, weder klein noch groß, ausläßt, ohne es zu erfassen?»
ref: What sort of Book is this that leaves neither a small thing nor a big thing, but has recorded it with numbers!"

result.output: What is it about this book that leaves nothing, neither small nor large, without capturing it?

src: Und für sie ist eine andauernde Peinigung bestimmt,
ref: There is perpetual punishment for them,

result.output: And for them, an ongoing torment is certain

src: Das ist eine Ermahnung für dich und dein Volk. Und ihr werdet zur Verantwortung gezogen.
ref: And it is undoubtedly an honour for you and your people; and you will soon be questioned.

result.output: This is an admonition for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.

src: Das ist etwas von Allahs Huld gegen uns und gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten Menschen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: This is among God's favours to us and to all mankind; but most men are not grateful.

result.output: This is something of Allah's grace towards us and towards mankind. But most people are not grateful.

src: Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Walk behind them and let no one turn around.

result.output: And none of you shall turn around.

src: Das ist eine Gemeinschaft, die dahingegangen ist. Sie erhält, was sie erworben hat, und ihr erhaltet, was ihr erworben habt.
ref: Those are a people who have passed away; theirs is that which they earned and yours that which ye earn.

result.output: This is a community that has passed away. It receives what it has acquired, and you receive what you have acquired.

src: Aber die bösen Ränke umschließen nur ihre Urheber.
ref: But their evil plots will turn back on the plotters themselves.

result.output: But the evil machinations only engulf their perpetrators.,

src: Er ist es, Der in Wahrheit die Himmel und die Erde erschuf; und am Tage, da Er spricht: "Sei!" wird es so sein.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose. The day He will say "Be, " it will be.

result.output: He it is who created the heavens and the earth in truth; and on the day when He will say Be!, it will be.

src: Doch wenn sie dich auffordern, Mir das zur Seite zu setzen, wovon du keine Kenntnis hast, dann gehorche ihnen nicht. In weltlichen Dingen aber verkehre mit ihnen auf gütige Weise.
ref: But if they (both) strive with you to make you join in worship with Me others that of which you have no knowledge, then obey them not, but behave with them in the world kindly, and follow the path of him who turns to Me in repentance and in obedience.

result.output: But if they ask you to put aside from Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. However, in worldly matters, deal with them kindly.

src: Das ist es, was Er euch geboten hat, auf daß ihr es begreifen möget.
ref: These things has God enjoined on you. Haply you may understand.

result.output: That is what He has commanded you, so that you may understand it.

src: Das geschah, um Schlechtigkeit und Unsittlichkeit von ihm abzuwenden.
ref: Thus it was, that We might turn away from him evil and illegal sexual intercourse.

result.output: This happened in order to avert his wickedness and immorality.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter.
ref: As for these our people here, they have taken to other gods apart from Him.

result.output: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.

src: Es steht uns nicht zu, eine Ermächtigung zu bringen - außer mit der Erlaubnis Allahs.
ref: It is not in our power to bring a miracle for you without the leave of God.

result.output: It is not our place to bring an authorization - except with the permission of Allah.

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es?
ref: He said: "O my people, think.

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden sagen: "Unser Herr, zeige uns jene der Ginn und der Menschen, die uns irreführten, damit wir sie mit unseren Füßen treten, so daß sie zu den Niedrigsten gehören."
ref: Those who disbelieve will say: "O Lord, show us those among the jinns and men who had led us astray that we may trample them underfoot and make them wholly abject."

result.output: And the unbelievers will say, 'Our Lord, show us those of the jinn and mankind who led us astray so that we may trample them underfoot and put them among the lowest.'

src: Aber nein, bei deinem Herrn!
ref: But no, by your Lord!

result.output: But no, with your Lord!,

src: So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: (The image of) the calf had sunk deep into their hearts on account of unbelief.

result.output: So in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted because of their disbelief.

src: Und wir sind Ihm ergeben.
ref: To Him we are submitters (Muslims)'

result.output: And we are devoted to Him.

src: So siehe wiederholt hin, siehst du irgend etwas an Rissen?!
ref: Turn your eyes again. Do you see any fissures?

result.output: So look repeatedly, do you see anything about cracks?!

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung. Und wenn sie euch gern etwas davon erlassen, so könnt ihr dies unbedenklich zum Wohlsein verbrauchen.
ref: Give to women their dowers willingly, but if they forego part of it themselves, then use it to your advantage.

result.output: And give women their bridal offerings as a free gift. And if they are willing to relinquish something from it for you, then consume it joyfully and with a good conscience.

src: Aber er kann ihnen keinen Schaden zufügen, außer mit Allahs Erlaubnis. Und auf Allah sollen sich die Gläubigen verlassen.
ref: But he cannot harm them in the least, except as Allah permits, and in Allah let the believers put their trust.

result.output: But he cannot harm them in the least, except by Allah's permission, and on Allah let the believers rely.

src: Muhammad ist nicht der Vater eines eurer Männer, sondern der Gesandte Allahs und der letzte aller Propheten, und Allah besitzt die volle Kenntnis aller Dinge.
ref: Muhammad is not the father of any man among you, but a messenger of God, and the seal of the prophets. God has knowledge of everything.

result.output: Muhammad is not the father of any one of your men, but he is the Messenger of Allah and the last of the prophets. Allah has full knowledge of all things.

src: Denn ER ist mir gegenüber immer großzügig gewesen.
ref: He has been gracious to me.

result.output: Because he has always been generous to me.

src: "So halte sie fest und befiel deinem Volk, sich an das Schönste in ihnen zu halten!
ref: “Hold fast to them, and exhort your people to adopt the best of them.

result.output: So hold on to them and command your people to hold on to the most beautiful things in them!

src: Und wer darauf verzichtet, wird dies eine Kaffara für ihn sein.
ref: But if anyone remits the retaliation by way of charity, it shall be for him an expiation.

result.output: And whoever refrains [from doing so] - then it is an expiation for him.

src: Und nachdem das Beben sie erfaßt hatte, sagte er: "HERR!
ref: When they arrived they were seized by a tremor.

result.output: And after the quake had seized them, he said, "Lord!

src: Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers, sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: They are the residents of Hell, and will there for ever abide.

result.output: These are the companions of the fire, they will dwell therein forever.

src: Dabei lesen sie (alle) das Buch. Auch diejenigen, die unwissend sind, äußern sich in der gleichen Weise.
ref: So too the ignorant say the like of them.

result.output: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.

src: Und wer sich Satan statt Allah zum Beschützer nimmt, der hat sicherlich einen offenkundigen Verlust erlitten
ref: He who holds Satan as friend in place of God will assuredly be damned to perdition.

result.output: And whoever takes Satan instead of Allah as a protector, he has certainly suffered a clear loss.

src: Sie versuchten ihn in bezug auf seine Gäste zu überreden.
ref: And they indeed sought to shame his guest (by asking to commit sodomy with them).

result.output: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.

src: Und sagte: «Ich bin krank.»
ref: And said: "I am sick (of what you worship)!"

result.output: And said: 'I am sick.'

src: Gewiß, wir kehren zu unserem HERRN zurück,
ref: We shall return to our Lord.

result.output: Surely, we are returning to our Lord.

src: Aber sie ziehen ihn der Lüge.
ref: But they denounced him as a liar.

result.output: But they accuse him of lying.

src: Und sie leisten wissentlich falsche Eide.
ref: And they swear to a lie while they know.

result.output: And they knowingly make false oaths.

src: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und gute Werke tun, werden die Bewohner des Paradieses sein. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: But those who believe and do good deeds are people of Paradise, and shall live there forever.

result.output: But those who believe and do good deeds will be the inhabitants of Paradise, wherein they will abide eternally.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der für euch das Meer gratis fügbar machte, damit die Schiffe darauf nach Seiner Anweisung fahren, damit ihr von Seiner Gunst anstrebt und damit ihr euch dankbar erweist.
ref: It is God who subjugated the ocean for you so that ships may ply through it by His command, and you may seek His bounty, and may haply be grateful.

result.output: ALLAH is the One Who made the sea readily available for you so that ships may sail on it, in accordance with His command, that you may seek His bounty and be grateful.

src: Aber gegen sie wird Allah dir genügen.
ref: So Allah will suffice you against them.

result.output: But Allah will suffice you against them.

src: Sag: "Entsinnt ihr euch nicht?!"
ref: Say: "Then why do you not bethink yourselves?"

result.output: Say: "Do you not remember?!"

src: Außer deinen auserwählten Dienern unter ihnen.»
ref: Except the chosen ones among Your creatures."

result.output: Except for your chosen servants among them.

src: Doch verkünde den Geduldigen eine frohe Botschaft
ref: But give good news to the steadfast.

result.output: Announce a joyful message to the patient ones.

src: ER sagte: "Geh! Wer dir von ihnen folgt, dann ist Dschahannam gewiß eure Vergeltung - eine ausreichende Vergeltung!
ref: He said, “Be gone – therefore whoever among them follows you – so hell is the recompense for you all, a sufficient punishment.”

result.output: He said: Go! Whoever follows you from among them, then surely Hell is your recompense, a sufficient recompense!

src: Und sie gesellten ALLAH einen Teil von dem bei, was ER an Äckern und An'am erschuf, und sagten: "Dies gehört ALLAH - ihrer Behauptung nach - und dies gehört den von uns beigesellten Partnern." Und was den von ihnen beigesellten Partnern gehört, erreicht ALLAH nicht, aber was ALLAH gehört, dies erreicht die von ihnen beigesellten Partner.
ref: They allocate a share from God's own created fields and cattle to God, and they say: "This is God's" -- or so they think -- "and that, of the compeers of God," so that what belongs to the compeers does not reach God, but that which is God's may reach the compeers (set up by them).

result.output: And they attributed to Allah a share of what He created of crops and livestock, and said, “This is for Allah,” by their claim, “and this is for our partners [associated with Him].” But what is for their partners does not reach Allah, while what is for Allah - this reaches their partners. How foul is that which they judge.

src: ALLAH ermahnt euch, daß ihr jemals Gleiches wiederholt, solltet ihr Mumin sein.
ref: God counsels you not to do a thing like this, if you are believers.

result.output: ALLAH admonishes you to never repeat the same mistake again, should you be a believer.

src: Tritt ein unter Meine Diener,
ref: "Enter then among My votaries,

result.output: Enter among My servants.

src: Und in der Nacht.
ref: Or at night.

result.output: And at night.

src: Den Geduldigen wird ihr Lohn voll erstattet, ohne daß es (viel) gerechnet wird.
ref: Only those who persevere will get their reward measureless."

result.output: The patient ones will be fully reimbursed for their reward, without it being (much) calculated.

src: Gewiß, er ist doch euer Meister, der euch die Magie lehrte, und ihr werdet es doch noch wissen. Ich werde zweifelsohne eure Füße und eure Hände wechselseitig abtrennen und werde euch gewiß noch allesamt kreuzigen!"
ref: He is indeed your leader who taught you magic; so now you will come to know; I swear, I will certainly cut off your hands and your feet from alternate sides, and crucify all of you.”

result.output: Surely, he is your master who taught you magic, and you still know it. Without doubt, I will cut off your hands and feet alternately and will surely crucify you, all of you!

src: Aber wir werden gewiß, so Gott will, die richtige finden.»
ref: If God wills we shall be guided aright."

result.output: But we will certainly find the right one, God willing.

src: Not und Leid berührten sie, und sie wurden hin und her geschüttelt, so daß der Gesandte und diejenigen, die mit ihm gläubig waren, dann sagten: Wann kommt die Unterstützung Gottes? Wahrlich, die Unterstützung Gottes ist nahe.
ref: Affliction and adversity befell them; and they were shaken until the Messenger, and those who believed with him, said: 'When will the victory of Allah come' Is it not so that the victory of Allah is near.

result.output: Hardship and suffering touched them, and they were shaken back and forth, so that the envoy and those who believed with him said: When will the help of God come? Verily, the help of God is near.

src: Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah. Aber die meisten Menschen wissen nicht.
ref: Say: 'The knowledge of it is only with God, but most men know not.'

result.output: Say: The knowledge of that is only with Allah. But most people do not know.

src: Und wenn du zehn (Jahre) vervollständigst, dann ist dies dir überlassen. Und ich will es dir nicht schwer machen.
ref: If thou completest ten, that shall be of thy own accord; I do not desire to' press hard 'upon thee.

result.output: And when you complete ten (years), then it is up to you. And I don't want to make it difficult for you.

src: Wenn es unter euch auch nur zwanzig gibt, die standhaft sind, werden sie zweihundert besiegen. Und wenn es unter euch hundert gibt, werden sie tausend von denen, die ungläubig sind, besiegen.
ref: Urge the believers to fight; if there are twenty persevering men among you, they shall overcome two hundred; and if there are a hundred among you, they shall overcome a thousand disbelievers because the disbelievers are a people who do not have sense.

result.output: If there are only twenty among you who are steadfast, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are one hundred among you, they will defeat a thousand of those who are disbelievers.

src: Er sprach: "So ist es; dein Herr aber spricht: "Es ist Mir ein leichtes, und Ich habe dich zuvor geschaffen, als du ein Nichts warst.""
ref: (The angel) answered: "Thus will it be. Your Lord said: 'This is easy for Me; for when I brought you into being you were nothing.'

result.output: He spoke: So it is; but your Lord says: 'It is easy for Me, and I created you before, when you were nothing.'

src: "Gewiß, ihr und das, dem ihr anstatt Allahs dient, seid Brennstoff der Hölle. Ihr werdet dahin hinabgehen."
ref: Verily you and those you worship other than God will be faggots for Hell; and come to it you will.

result.output: Assuredly, You and the ones you worship instead of Allah, are the fuel for the Hell. You will go down to there.

src: Das ist das, was im Jenseits für die Gottesfürchtigen folgt.
ref: Such is the payment of the righteous.

result.output: This is what follows in the afterlife for the God-fearing.

src: Und Pharao und diejenigen, die vor ihm lebten, und die verschwundenen Städte zeigten sündiges Verhallen.
ref: Then came the Pharaoh, and those before him whose habitations were overthrown while they were committing crimes.

result.output: And Pharaoh and those who came before him, and the vanished cities showed sinful behavior.

src: Besitzer von Kraft und beim Herrn des Thrones in Ansehen,
ref: Full of power, well-established (in position) with the Lord and Master of the Throne,

result.output: Owners of power and in the Lord of the Thrones' favor,

src: Und wenn dem Menschen Unglück zustößt, richtet er an Uns Bittgebete im Liegen, im Sitzen oder im Stehen.
ref: When man is afflicted with adversity he calls to Us, whether lying on his side, or sitting or standing.

result.output: And when a person encounters misfortune, they offer supplications to Us while lying down, sitting, or standing.

src: Für sie gibt es Strafe im diesseitigen Leben; aber die Strafe des Jenseits ist wahrlich härter. Und sie werden vor Allah keinen Behüter haben.
ref: They will be punished in the life of this world, and indeed the punishment of the Hereafter is the most severe; and there is none to save them from Allah.

result.output: For them is punishment in this worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter is harder. And they will have no protector against Allah.

src: Weiß er denn nicht, wenn der Inhalt der Gräber herausgeworfen wird
ref: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare

result.output: He doesn't know then, when the contents of the graves are thrown out.

src: Er vergibt, wem Er will, und Er bestraft, wen Er will.
ref: He forgiveth whomsoever He will and tormenteth whomsoever He will.

result.output: He forgives whom He wills, and He punishes whom He wills.

src: Ausgenommen davon sind jene, derer dein Herr Sich erbarmt hat, und dazu hat Er sie erschaffen. Und das Wort deines Herrn ist in Erfüllung gegangen: "Wahrlich, Ich werde Gahannam mit den Ginn und den Menschen insgesamt füllen."
ref: Except those upon whom your Lord had mercy; and this is why He created them; and the Word of your Lord has been concluded that, “Indeed I will, surely, fill hell with jinns and men combined.”

result.output: Except for those whom your Lord has mercy on – and for that He created them – the Word of your Lord has been fulfilled: ‘I will fill Gehenna with jinn and people all together.’

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr Allah fürchtet, wird Er euch Entscheidungskraft gewähren und eure Übel von euch nehmen und euch vergeben; und Allah ist voll großer Huld.
ref: O believers, if you follow the path shown by God, He will give you a standard (of right and wrong), and overlook your sins, and forgive you. God is abounding in benevolence.

result.output: O you who believe! If you fear Allah, He will grant you a criterion (to judge between right and wrong), remove from you (all) evil (that may afflict) you, and forgive you: for Allah is the Lord of grace unbounded.

src: Und er setzte es ihnen vor.
ref: He set it before them.

result.output: And he presented it to them.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als Ibrahim von seinem HERRN mit Worten geprüft wurde, und er sie dann einhielt. ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH mache dich zum Imam für die Menschen."
ref: Remember, when his Lord tried Abraham by a number of commands which he fulfilled, God said to him: "I will make you a leader among men."

result.output: And (remember) when Ibrahim was tried by his Lord with words and he fulfilled them. He (Allah) said, "Surely, I will make you a leader (Prophet) of mankind."

src: Mein HERR schenke mir von den gottgefällig Guttuenden."
ref: (And he prayed:) "O Lord, grant me a righteous son."

result.output: My LORD grant me from the god-pleasing good deeds.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, ich bin der Gesandte des Herrn der Weltenbewohner."
ref: He said: "I have been sent by the Lord of all the worlds."

result.output: He said, "Certainly, I am the messenger of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."

src: Nun - und beim Schreibrohr und bei dem, was sie nie derschreiben!
ref: NUN. I CALL to witness the pen and what they inscribe,

result.output: Now - and with the pen and with what they never write!

src: Wir aber sehen sie nahe.
ref: But We see it very near.

result.output: : But we see them close.

src: Ich habe doch davor ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: (Remember that I am one of you) and have lived a whole life with you before (its revelation).

result.output: But I've lived among you my whole life.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Zweifelsohne eignen sich viele von den Rabbinern und Priestern Vermögenswerte von Menschen durch das für nichtig Erklärte an und halten vom Weg ALLAHs ab.
ref: O believers, many rabbis and priests devour the possessions of others wrongfully, and keep men away from the path of God.

result.output: You who have internalized the imam! Undoubtedly, many of the rabbis and priests appropriate the assets of people through the declared invalid and deviate from the path of Allah.

src: Und als Unsere Gesandten zu Lut kamen, geriet er ihretwegen in eine böse Lage und war durch ihre Anwesenheit beklommen.
ref: And when Our Messengers came to Lout (Lot), he was grieved on their account and felt himself straitened for them (lest the town people should approach them to commit sodomy with them).

result.output: And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was distressed and felt uneasy because of their presence.

src: ER war Derjenige, Der dich mit Seinem Sieg und mit den Mumin gestärkt hat.
ref: It is He who has strengthened you with His help and with believers

result.output: He was the one who strengthened you with his victory and with the believers.

src: Bestimmt ist für sie eine gewaltige Pein,
ref: For them is great suffering.

result.output: Certainly, it is a tremendous pain for her,

src: Als Abraham sagte: «Mein Herr, mache dieses Gebiet sicher, und laß mich und meine Söhne es meiden, den Götzen zu dienen.
ref: Remember when Abraham prayed: "O Lord, make this a city of peace, and preserve me and my progeny from worshipping idols:

result.output: As Abraham said: 'My Lord, make this area safe and let me and my sons avoid serving the idols.'

src: Diese haben eine höhere Rangstufe als die, die erst nachher gespendet und gekämpft haben.
ref: They are higher in position than those who spent after (the victory) and fought.

result.output: These have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought afterwards.

src: Und wenn gegen euch tatsächlich gekämpft wird, werden wir euch ganz gewiß helfen."
ref: If you are fought against, we will help you.'

result.output: And if you are really fought against, we will certainly help you.

src: Sag: "Seht ihr, woran ihr anstelle von ALLAH Bitt-gebete richtet, sollte ALLAH mir Schädigendes wollen, könnten sie das Schädigende von Ihm wegnehmen? Oder sollte ER mir eine Gnade wollen, könnten diese Seine Gnade zurückhalten?"
ref: Say: "Then just think. Can those whom you worship apart from God remove the distress God is pleased to visit upon me, or withhold a blessing God is pleased to favour me with?'

result.output: Say, 'Do you see that instead of Allah, you invoke supplication to other than Allah? If Allah should intend me harm, could they remove His harm? Or if He should intend me mercy, could they withhold His mercy?'

src: Sie sagen: «Ja doch.
ref: They will say, “Yes indeed, why not?”

result.output: They say: 'Yes, indeed.'

src: ALLAH setzte keinem Mann zwei Herzen in seinem Innern ein. Und ER machte eure Ehefrauen, denen ihr (die Formel von) Zihar aussprecht, nicht zu euren Müttern. Ebenfalls machte ER die nach euch Genannten nicht zu euren Söhnen. Dies ist euer Wort aus euren Mündern. Und ALLAH sagt dasWahre und ER leitet zum wahren Weg recht.
ref: Allah has not kept two hearts in the body of any man; nor has He made them your mothers those wives of yours, whom you declare to be your mothers; nor has He made them your sons, whom you have adopted; this is the statement of your mouths; and Allah proclaims the truth and it is He Who shows the path.

result.output: ALLAH did not place two hearts in any man's inner being. And HE did not make your wives whom you pronounce Zihar to, your mothers. Similarly, HE did not make those called after you, your sons. This is a statement uttered by your mouths. And ALLAH speaks the truth, and HE guides to the right way.

src: Die vor einem jagenden Löwen fliehen?
ref: Fleeing from a lion?

result.output: Fleeing from a hunting lion?

src: Ich habe ihnen nichts anderes gesagt als das, was Du mir befohlen hast, nämlich: >Dienet Gott, meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn. < Ich war Zeuge über sie, solange ich unter ihnen weilte. Als Du mich abberufen hast, warst Du der Wächter über sie. Und Du bist über alle Dinge Zeuge.
ref: “I have not told them except what You commanded me, that ‘Worship Allah, Who is my Lord and is also your Lord’; I was aware of them till I was among them; and when You raised me, only You watched over them; and all things are present before You.”

result.output: I have told them nothing but what you ordered me to, namely: 'Serve God, my Lord and your Lord.' I was a witness over them as long as I stayed among them. When You called me away, You were the Watcher over them. And You are a witness over all things.

src: Immer wieder, wenn eine Umma eingetreten ist, hat sie ihre Vorgängerin verflucht.
ref: Every time a crowd enters, it will curse its sister-crowd.

result.output: Again and again, when a successor has entered, she has cursed her predecessor.

src: Ihre Herberge wird Gahannam sein, und dies ist ein schlimmes Ende!
ref: Their abode is Hell, an evil destination?

result.output: Your refuge will be Gahannam and this is a terrible end!

src: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. Das sind die Verse des Buches. Und was dir von deinem Herrn hinabgesandt wurde, ist die Wahrheit. Jedoch die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
ref: Alif-Lam-Meem-Ra*; these are verses of the Book; and that which has been sent down upon you from your Lord is true, but most men do not believe. (* Alphabets of the Arabic language – Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)

result.output: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the Book. And what has been sent down to you from your Lord is the truth, but most of the people do not believe.

src: Also hinsichtlich des Schaums, so wird er beiseite geworfen, doch hinsichtlich dessen, das den Menschen nützt, so verbleibt es in der Erde. Solcherart prägt ALLAH die Gleichnisse.
ref: Thus Allah sets forth parables (for the truth and falsehood, i.e. Belief and disbelief).

result.output: As for the foam, it is discarded, but that which benefits mankind remains in the earth. Thus does Allah present examples.

src: Und die Thamud, das Volk Lots und die Leute des Waldes.
ref: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, as well as the dwellers of the Wood, had denied.

result.output: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, and the dwellers of the forest.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber, und eine Seele soll danach schauen, was sie für morgen vorausschickte!
ref: O ye who believe! fear Allah, and let every soul look to that which it sendeth forward for the morrow.

result.output: You who have internalized the iman! Act in accordance with Taqwa towards ALLAH, and a soul should then look at what it sent ahead for tomorrow!

src: Diejenigen, die ihr Vermögen bei Nacht und Tag, geheim oder offen, spenden, haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn, sie haben nichts zu befürchten, und sie werden nicht traurig sein.
ref: Those who spend of their wealth in the way of God, day and night, in secret or openly, have their reward with their Lord, and have nothing to fear or regret.

result.output: Those who donate their wealth, in secret or openly, by night and day, will have their reward with their Lord; they have nothing to fear, nor shall they grieve.

src: Sag: Die Angelegenheit ist ganz und gar (in) Allahs (Entscheidung). Sie halten in ihrem Innersten verborgen, was sie dir nicht offenlegen; sie sagen: "Wenn wir etwas von der Angelegenheit (zu entscheiden) hätten, würden wir hier nicht getötet."
ref: Slumber overtook a party, while another party cared only for themselves, thinking of Allah thoughts that were not true, the guess of ignorance, saying: 'Have we any say in the affair' Say: 'The entire affair belongs to Allah' They conceal in themselves what they do not disclose to you.

result.output: Say: The matter is entirely in Allah's (decision). They keep hidden in their hearts what they do not reveal to you; they say: 'If we had any say in the matter, we would not be killed here.'

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt.
ref: But Allah saved (you).

result.output: But Allah has saved (you).

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben und zu ihren Brüdern sagten, als diese sich auf Handelsreisen oder Feldzügen befanden: "Wären sie bei uns geblieben, wären sie weder gestorben, noch getötet worden." (Sagt es nicht), damit ALLAH dies als Bitterkeit (nur) in ihren Herzen bleiben läßt. Und ALLAH (alleine) macht lebendig und läßt sterben. Und ALLAH ist dessen, was ihr tut, allsehend.
ref: O People who Believe! Do not be like the disbelievers who said regarding their brothers who went on a journey or on holy war, “If they had been here with us they would not have died or been killed” – so that Allah may make it as despair in their hearts; and Allah gives life and causes death; and Allah is seeing your deeds.

result.output: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not be like those who have committed Kufr and told their brothers when they were on business trips or campaigns: 'If they had stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed.' (Do not say it,) so that Allah leaves bitter taste (only) in their hearts. And Allah alone gives life and causes death. And Allah watches over what you do.

src: Und ALLAH kennt das, was ihr verheimlicht und was ihr offenlegt.
ref: God knows what you hide and disclose.

result.output: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you reveal.

src: Und wer krank oder auf Reisen war, (fastet) an anderen Tagen die gleiche Anzahl. ALLAH will für euch Erleichterung, doch ER will für euch keine Erschwernis.
ref: So whosoever of you witnesseth the month, he shall fast it, and whosoever sick or journeying, for him the like number of other days.

result.output: And whoever was sick or on a journey then he should fast on other days their equivalent. Allah intends for you ease and does not intend for you hardship.

src: Nun hatten Wir ihm zuvor Ammenbrüste verwehrt.
ref: We made (Moses) refuse a wet nurse.

result.output: Now we had previously denied him wet nurses.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ihren Herrn fürchten, für sie wird es Obergemächer geben, über denen (andere) Obergemächer gebaut sind, unterhalb derer Flüsse strömen. (Das ist) Allahs Versprechen.
ref: But as for those who are wary of their Lord, for them there will be lofty abodes with [other] lofty abodes built above them, with streams running beneath them—a promise of Allah.

result.output: But those who fear their Lord, for them there will be high chambers, above which are higher chambers built, beneath which rivers flow. That is the promise of Allah.

src: Dann sag: "Wollt ihr denn nicht Taqwa gemäß handeln!"
ref: So tell them: "Why do you not fear Him?"

result.output: Then say, "Do you not want to act according to Taqwa!"

src: Es ist wie das Gleichnis derjenigen (, die es) nahe vor ihnen (erlebten).
ref: Like those who had tasted the gravity of their actions a little before them.

result.output: It is like the parable of those who experienced it before them.

src: Und unterlaßt nicht aus Verdruß, es aufzuschreiben, ob es klein oder groß ist, (um es festzulegen) bis zu seiner Frist. Das ist für euch gerechter bei Gott und richtiger für das Zeugnis und bewirkt eher, daß ihr keine Zweifel hegt.
ref: Unless it be merchandise present that you give and take between you; then it shall be no fault in you if you do not write it down.

result.output: And do not fail out of vexation to write it down, whether it be small or great (in order to) fix it until its term. That is more just for you near to God and more upright for testimony and more likely to keep you from doubt.

src: Das (allein schon) genügt als deutliche Sünde.
ref: And this is a sufficient manifest sin.

result.output: That alone is sufficient as a clear sin.

src: Aber wenn ihr euch von ihnen scheidet, bevor ihr sie berührt und euch ihnen gegenüber schon (zu einer Morgengabe) verpflichtet habt, dann (händigt) die Hälfte dessen (aus), wozu ihr euch verpflichtet habt, es sei denn, daß sie (es) erlassen oder der, in dessen Hand der Ehebund ist. Und wenn ihr (es) erlaßt, kommt das der Gottesfurcht näher. Und versäumt es nicht, gut zueinander zu sein . Was ihr tut, sieht Allah wohl.
ref: If you divorce them before you have touched them and have appointed the bridal money, then payment of half of what is agreed is ordained unless the women forgo some of it, or he in whose hand is the marriage tie, pays more; and O men, your paying more is closer to piety; and do not forget the favours to each other; indeed Allah is seeing what you do.

result.output: But if you divorce them before you touch them and you have already agreed to give them a bridal gift, then give them half of what you have agreed, unless they forgo it or the one in whose hands is the marriage contract forgoes it. And to forego (it) is nearer to righteousness. And do not forget generosity between you. Allah sees whatever you do.

src: Sag: "Das Schlechte und das Gute sind nicht gleich, selbst dann nicht, solltest du an dem großen Ausmaß des Schlechten Gefallen finden." So handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber - ihr Verständige! -, damit ihr erfolgreich werdet.
ref: Say, “The impure (evil) and the pure (good) are not equal, even though the abundance of the impure may attract you; therefore keep fearing Allah, O men of intellect, so that you may succeed.”

result.output: Say: "The bad and the good are not equal, even if you may take pleasure in the enormity of the bad." That's how Taqwa acts according to ALLAH - you, the wise ones! - so that you may be successful.

src: Dann bestimmte ER sie zu sieben Himmeln in zwei Ay-yam, und ließ in jedem Himmel seine Anweisung als Wahy zuteil werden.
ref: Then He completed and finished from their creation (as) seven heavens in two Days and He made in each heaven its affair.

result.output: Then HE determined her to seven heavens in two Ay-yam, and in each heaven he let his instruction be granted as Wahy.

src: Und dem, der von ihnen sagen wollte: "lch bin ein Gott neben Ihm", würden Wir es mit Gahannam vergelten. Und ebenso vergelten Wir es den Ungerechten.
ref: If any one of them said: "I am God besides Him," We should award him Hell; for this is how We requite the evil-doers.

result.output: And whoever among them should say, 'Indeed, I am a god besides Him,' that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.

src: Oder haben sie (etwa) Teilhaber?
ref: Or have they any partners?

result.output: Or do they have (perhaps) partners?

src: Das ist Frevel. Heute sind diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, an eurer Religion verzweifelt, so fürchtet sie nicht, sondern fürchtet Mich.
ref: Today the unbelievers have despaired of your religion; therefore fear them not, but fear you Me.

result.output: This is a sacrilege. Today those who are unbelievers have despaired of your religion, so do not fear them, but fear Me.

src: Nur ein wenig erweist ihr euch dankbar.
ref: How little are the thanks you offer!"

result.output: Only a little do you prove grateful.

src: Sind sie etwa nicht auf Erden umhergezogen, damit sie sehen, wie das Anschließende derjenigen vor ihnen war.
ref: Did they not travel in the land to see what sort of fate befell those before them?

result.output: Have they not meandered on earth so that they can see how the consequence of those before them was?

src: Da kam Allah über sie, von wo sie nicht (damit) rechneten, und jagte in ihre Herzen Schrecken, so daß sie ihre Häuser mit ihren (eigenen) Händen und den Händen der Gläubigen zerstörten.
ref: But God came upon them from where they did not suspect, and filled their hearts with terror, so that they destroyed their homes with their own hands (or were destroyed) by the hands of believers.

result.output: Then Allah came upon them from where they did not reckon, and He cast terror into their hearts so they destroyed their houses with their own hands, and the hands of the believers.

src: Und Wir ließen sie in Unsere Barmherzigkeit eingehen; denn sie gehörten zu den Rechtschaffenen.
ref: And they were admitted to Our grace. Verily they were among the doers of good.

result.output: And We made them enter into Our mercy, for they were of the righteous.

src: Das Urteil ist allein Allahs.
ref: Authority belongs to God alone.

result.output: The judgement is solely Allah's.

src: Und du hattest nicht erwartet, daß das Buch an dich gerichtet würde.
ref: (O Prophet), you never looked forward for the Book to be revealed to you.

result.output: And you had not expected that the book would be addressed to you.

src: Das ist ein Versprechen Gottes. Gott bricht sein Versprechen nicht. Aber die meisten Menschen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: The promise of Allah; Allah does not renege on His promise, but most people do not know.

result.output: This is a promise of God. God does not break his promise. But most people do not know.

src: Schau, wie Wir die Zeichen verschiedenartig darlegen!
ref: Behold how We turn about the signs!

result.output: Look how We present the signs in different ways!

src: Den Gottesfürchtigen obliegt nicht die Verantwortung für jene, sondern nur das Ermahnen, auf daß jene gottesfürchtig werden mögen.
ref: As for the heedful and devout, they are not accountable for them, but should give advice: They may haply come to fear God.

result.output: The responsibility for those does not fall to the God-fearing, but only the admonition, so that they may become God-fearing.

src: Das ist besser für euch und lauterer. Wenn ihr aber nicht (die Möglichkeit dazu) findet, dann ist Allah wahrlich All verzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: When you wish to humbly consult with the Noble Messenger, give some charity before you consult; that is much better and much purer for you; so if you do not have the means, then (know that) Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.

result.output: This is better for you and purer. If, however, you do not find the opportunity to do so, then Allah is indeed the Pardoner, the Merciful.

src: Die Ungläubigen geben wahrlich ihr Vermögen (dafür) aus, um von Allahs Weg abzuhalten.
ref: Those who disbelieve spend their possessions on turning men away from God.

result.output: The disbelievers surely spend their wealth to strive against Allah's way.

src: Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm. Gepriesen-erhaben ist ER über das, was sie an Schirk betreiben.
ref: Too holy is He for what they ascribe to Him!

result.output: There is no deity except Him. He is glorified and exalted above what they associate with Him.

src: Ihr macht ja daraus Papyrusblätter, die ihr offen zeigt - und ihr haltet vieles geheim; und euch wurde beigebracht, was ihr nicht wußtet, weder ihr noch eure Väter. Sprich: Gott.
ref: Some of it ye disclose and much thereof ye conceal. And ye were taught that which ye knew not: neither ye nor your fathers.

result.output: You make it out of papyrus leaves that you show openly - and you keep much secret; and you have been taught that which you did not know, neither you nor your fathers. Say: God.

src: Und darin sollen die Konkurrierenden konkurrieren,
ref: So for this let the competitors compete.

result.output: And in this, the competitors should compete.

src: Und es gibt nichts, dessen Schatzkammern nicht bei Uns wären.
ref: And there is not a thing, but with Us are the stores thereof.

result.output: And there is nothing whose treasure chambers are not with Us.

src: Und WIR haben dich über sie nicht als Hüter eingesetzt und du bist über sie kein Wakil.
ref: We have not appointed you their guardian, nor are you their pleader.

result.output: And WE did not appoint you as a guardian over them, nor are you over them a trustee.

src: Vergib mir und schenke mir eine Herrschaft, die niemandem nach mir möglich wird. Gewiß, DU bist Der reichlich Schenkende."
ref: Forgive me and bestow upon me a kingdom, which shall not befit anyone after me; indeed only You are the Great Bestower.”

result.output: Forgive me and grant me a dominion which will not be possible for anyone after me. Surely, YOU are the one who grants abundantly.

src: Das Ende von beiden war, daß sie nun im Feuer sind; darin werden sie ewig weilen. Und das ist die Vergeltung für die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: So the fate of them both is that they are both in the fire, to remain in it forever; and this is the proper punishment for the unjust.

result.output: The end of both was that they are now in the fire; they will dwell therein forever. And this is the recompense for those who do wrong.

src: Und nachdem sie von da weiterzogen, sagte er seinem Dienstjungen: "Bereite uns unser Mittagessen, gewiß, bereits haben wir auf dieser unserer Reise große Mühe gehabt.
ref: When they had gone past (the confluence), Moses said to his servant: "Give me my breakfast. I am exhausted from this journey."

result.output: And after they moved on from there, he said to his servant: "Prepare our lunch, certainly, we have already had great difficulties on this journey of ours."

src: Den Gläubigen ist dies verboten.
ref: This is forbidden the believers,

result.output: Believers are forbidden from doing this.

src: O mein Volk, seht ihr, wie ich euch zur Rettung rufe, ihr mich aber zum (Höllen)feuer ruft?
ref: O my people, what is wrong with me that I am calling you to preservation, while you invite me to the Fire!

result.output: Oh my people, do you see how I call you to salvation, but you call me to the (fires of) hell?

src: Doch schön geduldig sein. Vielleicht wird Allah sie mir alle wiederbringen; denn Er ist der Allwissende, der Allweise."
ref: "You have made up the story; but patience is best; God may bring them back to me. He is all-knowing and all-wise."

result.output: But be beautifully patient. Perhaps Allah will bring them all back to me; for He is the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.

src: Sollen wir wirklich, wenn wir gestorben und zu Staub geworden sind...? Das ist doch eine Rückkehr von weiter Entfernung.»
ref: When we are dead and turned to dust, this returning (to life) is most far-fetched."

result.output: We really should, when we have died and turned to dust...? That is a return from far away.

src: Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, auch ich handle. Ihr werdet noch wissen, wen Peinigung überkommt, welche ihn erniedrigt, und wer Lügner ist. Wartet nur ab! Ich warte ebenfalls mit euch ab."
ref: “And O my people! Keep on with your works in your positions, I am doing mine; very soon you will come to know – upon whom comes the punishment that will disgrace him, and who is the liar; and wait – I too am waiting with you.”

result.output: My people! Act according to your principles, just as I do. You will soon know who will be punished, who will be humiliated, and who is a liar. Just wait! I'm also waiting with you.

src: Als sie vorbeigegangen waren, sagte er zu seinem Burschen: "Bringe uns unser Mittagessen. Wir haben ja durch diese unsere Reise (viel) Mühsal erlitten."
ref: So when they had gone beyond that place, Moosa said to his assistant, “Bring our breakfast – we have indeed faced great exertion in this journey of ours.”

result.output: When they had passed, he said to his boy, "Bring us our lunch, for we have endured much hardship through this journey of ours."

src: Also sag: "Das Verborgene kennt nur ALLAH, so wartet ab!
ref: Tell them: "Unknown things are only known to God.

result.output: Also say: 'Only Allah knows the hidden, so wait!'

src: Und erinnert euch an das, was in euren Wohnstätten von ALLAHs Ayat und der Weisheit vorgetragen wird. Gewiß, ALLAH ist immer allgütig, allkundig.
ref: And remember that which is recited in your houses of the signs of God and the Wisdom; God is All-subtle, All-aware.

result.output: And remember what is recited in your dwellings of Allah's verses and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever kind and acquainted [with all things].

src: Sag: "Mein HERR kennt das Gesagte im Himmel und auf Erden.
ref: He said: "My Lord knows whatever is spoken in the heavens and the earth.

result.output: Say: \My LORD knows what was said in heaven and on earth.\,

src: Ist es denn Unsere Strafe, die sie beschleunigen wollen?
ref: Do they wish Us then to hasten the punishment?

result.output: Is it then our punishment that they want to accelerate?

src: Auch wenn sie den Weg der Rechtschaffenheit erkennen, folgen sie ihm nicht als (ihren) Weg, doch wenn sie den Weg des Fehlgehens erkennen, folgen sie ihm als (ihren) Weg, dies weil sie Unsere Ayat verleugnen und ihnen gegenüber achtlos zu sein pflegten.
ref: This is so for they have called Our messages lies, and have been heedless of them."

result.output: Even though they recognize the path of righteousness, they do not follow it as their path, but when they recognize the path of wrongdoing, they follow it as their path, because they deny Our signs and used to disregard them.

src: Und er hält nicht aus Geiz das (ihm offenbarte) Verborgene zurück.
ref: He is not chary of making public what is unknown.

result.output: And he does not withhold the (revealed) hidden out of greed.

src: Wenn diese dann dicke Regenwolken trugen, lassen WIR ihn (den Regen) zu einer toten Landschaft treiben, dann lassen WIR darauf das Wasser herab. Und damit lassen WIR von den verschiedenen Früchten sprießen.
ref: Then, when they have gathered up heavy clouds, We drive them to a dead land, where We make water come down, and with it We bring out all kinds of fruits.

result.output: If they (the clouds) then carried thick rain clouds, WE made it (the rain) drift towards a dead landscape, then WE let the water fall on it. And thus, WE let various fruits sprout.

src: Und an ALLAH werden die Angelegenheiten gewandt.
ref: To God all matters revert.

result.output: And the affairs are turned to Allah.

src: Und sie folgten dem, was die Satane unter der Herrschaft Salomos vortrugen.
ref: They followed what the Shayatin (devils) gave out (falsely of the magic) in the lifetime of Sulaiman (Solomon).

result.output: And they followed what the Satans presented during the reign of Solomon.

src: Und Wir werden ihnen ihren Anteil fürwahr unverringert zukommen lassen.
ref: We shall verily give them their meed without diminution.

result.output: And we will certainly provide them with their share unimpaired.

src: Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Musa verleumdeten, dann erklärte ihn ALLAH von dem, was sie ihm unterstellten, für unschuldig. Und er war bei ALLAH hochgeschätzt.
ref: Do not be like the people who troubled Moosa – so Allah freed him from the allegations they had uttered; and Moosa is honourable in the sight of Allah.

result.output: Do not be like those who slandered Musa, then Allah declared him innocent of what they accused him of. And he was highly esteemed by Allah.

src: Sodann lasse sie mit ihren schweifenden Gesprächen ihr Spiel treiben.
ref: Say: "God," and leave them to the sport of engaging in vain discourse.

result.output: Then let them indulge in their wandering conversations

src: Die Gänge der Himmel, daß ich zum Gott des Mose emporsteige.
ref: to the heavens and be able to climb up to the Lord of Moses.

result.output: The passages of the heavens that I ascend to the God of Moses.

src: Und ich war ihr Zeuge, solange ich unter ihnen weilte, doch nachdem Du mich abberufen hattest, bist Du ihr Wächter gewesen; und Du bist der Zeuge aller Dinge.
ref: And so long as I dwelt with them I was witness over their actions. And after my life had been done, You were their keeper; and You are a witness over all things.

result.output: And I was their witness while I lived among them, but after You called me away, You have been their guardian; and You are the witness of all things.

src: Sie sagte: "HERR! Wie kann ich einen Sohn haben, wo kein Mann mich jemals intim berührt hat."
ref: She said: "How can I have a son, O Lord, when no man has touched me?"

result.output: She said, "Lord! How can I have a son when no man has ever touched me intimately?"

src: Ich folge doch nur dem, was mir an Wahy zuteil wird."
ref: I only follow what is revealed to me.'

result.output: I'm only following what comes to me as a revelation.

src: Ihm gebührt die wahre Anrufung. Diejenigen, die sie an seiner Stelle anrufen, erhören sie in keinem Anliegen.
ref: For Him (Alone) is the Word of Truth (i.e. none has the right to be worshipped but He).

result.output: He deserves the true invocation. Those who invoke it in his place do not hear it in any matter.

src: Die Bitte Abrahams um Vergebung für seinen Vater erfolgte nur aufgrund eines Versprechens, das er ihm gegeben hatte. Als es ihm aber deutlich wurde, daß er ein Feind Gottes war, sagte er sich von ihm los. Abraham war voller Trauer und langmütig.
ref: And the seeking of forgiveness for his father (paternal uncle) by Ibrahim was only because of a promise he had made to him; then when it became clear to him that he was an enemy of Allah, Ibrahim broke off ties with him; indeed Ibrahim is surely very soft-hearted, most forbearing.

result.output: Abraham's request for forgiveness for his father was made only because of a promise he had given him. But when he realized that his father was an enemy of God, he separated himself from him. Abraham was full of grief and forbearance.

src: Da erwies Allah uns eine Wohltat und bewahrte uns vor der Strafe des Glutwindes.
ref: But God has been gracious to us, and has saved us from the torment of scorching wind.

result.output: Then Allah showed us a kindness and saved us from the punishment of the fiery wind.

src: Es entgeht Ihm nicht das Gewicht eines Stäubchens, weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde. Und es gibt nichts, was kleiner ist als dies oder größer, das nicht in einem deutlichen Buch (verzeichnet) wäre,
ref: Not even an atom's weight in the heavens and the earth, or something smaller or greater than it, is hidden from Him, and which is not recorded in the all-too-manifest Book,

result.output: He is not unaware of the weight of a particle, whether it be in the heavens or on the earth. And there is nothing smaller than this or greater that is not in a clear book (recorded).,

src: Und sie sagen: "Wenn doch ein Zeichen von seinem Herrn auf ihn herabgesandt würde!" Sag: Das Verborgene ist nur Allahs.
ref: And they say, “Why is not a sign sent down upon him from his Lord?”

result.output: And they say, "Why is not a sign sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "The unseen is only for Allah [to administer],"

src: Dem vergelten WIR mit Dschahannam.
ref: I am a god beside Him, that one We should repay with hell.

result.output: We will reward him with Jahannam.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Weshalb sagt ihr, was ihr nicht macht?!
ref: O you who believe, why do you profess what you do not practise?

result.output: You, who have internalized the Imam! Why do you say what you do not do?!

src: Dann entsprangen daraus zwölf Quellen, bereits kennt jede Gruppe ihre Trinkstelle. Esst und trinkt von ALLAHs Rizq und übertreibt nicht auf Erden als Verderben-Anrichtende!
ref: Then there gushed forth thereout twelve springs; every people already knew their drinking-place; eat and drink of the provision of Allah, and commit not evil on the earth as corrupters.

result.output: Then twelve springs gushed forth from it, so that each group knew its watering place. Eat and drink from Allah's provision, and do not act corruptly on the earth as corrupters.

src: Und sollte dich eine Versuchung des Satans (vom Wahren) ablenken, so suche Zuflucht bei ALLAH!
ref: And if an evil whisper comes to you from Shaitan (Satan) then seek refuge with Allah.

result.output: And if you are tempted by Satan's (from the truth) temptation, then seek refuge in ALLAH!

src: Und sporne die Gläubigen an, vielleicht wird Gott die Schlagkraft derer, die ungläubig sind, zurückhalten. Und Gott besitzt eine noch stärkere Schlagkraft und verhängt eine noch härtere Strafe.
ref: And urge on the believers; haply God will restrain the unbelievers' might; God is stronger in might, more terrible in punishing.

result.output: And urge on the faithful, perhaps God may restrain the force of those who disbelieve. And God has even greater force and inflicts even harsher punishment.

src: Und gewiß, bereits ließen WIR Musa Wahy zuteil werden: "Brich nachts auf mit Meinen Dienern, dann schlage ihnen einen getrockneten Weg ins Meer! Habe keine Angst vor Verfolgung und fürchte dich nicht!"
ref: And We divinely inspired Moosa that, “Journey with My bondmen in a part of the night and strike a dry path in the sea for them, you shall have no fear of Firaun getting to you, nor any danger.”

result.output: And surely, WE have already bestowed upon Musa Wahy saying: 'Set forth with My servants by night, then strike for them a dry path in the sea, fearing not being overtaken, nor be afraid'

src: Am Tag, da der Geist und die Engel in einer Reihe stehen. Sie werden nicht sprechen, ausgenommen der, dem der Erbarmer es erlaubt und der das Richtige sagt.
ref: Upon the day when the Spirit and the angels stand in ranks they shall speak not, save him to whom the All-merciful has given leave, and who speaks aright.

result.output: On the day when the Spirit and the angels stand in line, they will not speak except for the one whom the Merciful allows and who speaks the right thing.

src: Wenn ihr ALLAH (Seiner Sache) eine Hasan-Anleihe gebt, wird ER euch vervielfachen und euch vergeben. Und ALLAH ist reichlich belohnend, allnachsichtig.
ref: If you lend an excellent loan to Allah, He will double it for you and forgive you; and Allah is Most Appreciative, Most Forbearing.

result.output: If you give Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you; and Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.

src: Alles, was in den Himmeln, und alles, was auf Erden ist, preist Allah; und Er ist der Erhabene, der Allweise.
ref: WHATEVER IS IN the heavens and the earth sings the praises of God. He is all-mighty and all-wise.

result.output: All that is in the heavens and on the earth praises Allah, and He is the Sublime, the Wise.

src: Also laß von ihnen und von dem ab, was sie erlügen.
ref: Leave them to their falsehoods.

result.output: So let go of them and what they lie about.

src: Es gibt welche unter den Juden, die Worte aus ihren Stellungen verdrehen und sagen: "Wir hören und wir gehorchen nicht", und "Höre, ohne gehört zu werden", und "Sei uns nachsichtig", indem sie mit ihren Zungen lügen und den Glauben lästern. Und hätten sie gesagt: "Wir hören und wir gehorchen", und "Höre", und "Schaue gnädig auf uns", wäre es besser für sie gewesen und aufrechter. Aber Allah hat sie zur Strafe für ihren Unglauben verflucht; darum glauben sie nur wenig.
ref: Some of the Jews interchange the words from their places and say, “We hear and disobey” – and they say “Hear- may you not be able to hear” – and they say “Raena (Be considerate towards us)” distorting it with their tongues and in order to slander religion; had they said, “We hear and we obey” and “Kindly listen to us, O dear Prophet,” and “Look mercifully upon us, O dear Prophet”, it would have been much better for them and more just – but Allah has cursed them for their disbelief; so they do not believe except a little.

result.output: There are some among the Jews who twist words from their places and say, 'We hear and we do not obey,' and 'Hear, without hearing back,' and 'Be lenient towards us,' as they lie with their tongues and blaspheme faith. And if they had said, 'We hear and we obey,' and 'Hear,' and 'Look kindly upon us,' it would have been better for them and more upright. But Allah has cursed them with punishment for their disbelief, and so they believe very little.

src: Vielleicht möchtest du einen Teil von dem, was dir (als Offenbarung) eingegeben wird, auslassen und deine Brust ist dadurch beklommen, und dies, weil sie sagen: "Wäre doch ein Schatz auf ihn herabgesandt worden oder ein Engel mit ihm gekommen!" Du aber bist nur ein Warner. Und Allah ist Sachwalter über alles.
ref: Perhaps you are leaving part of what has been sent down to you, and your chest is straitened by it, because they say: 'Why has no treasure been sent down to him, or an angel come with him' You are only a warner, and Allah is a Guardian over everything.

result.output: Perhaps you would like to excise a portion of what has been revealed to you, and your chest feels tight because they say, 'Why has treasure not been sent down to him, or an angel come with him?' But you are only a warner, and Allah is the Guardian over everything.

src: Abraham war weder Jude noch Christ, sondern er war Anhänger des reinen Glaubens, ein Gottergebener, und er gehörte nicht zu den Polytheisten.
ref: Neither was Abraham a Jew nor a Christian, but upright and obedient, and not an idolater.

result.output: Abraham was neither Jewish nor Christian, but he was a follower of the pure faith, a God-submissive, and he did not belong to the polytheists.

src: Am Tag, da sie sehen, was ihnen angedroht wird, wird ihnen sein, als hätten sie nur eine Stunde vom Tag verweilt.
ref: The Day when they see what they had been warned against they will feel as though they had remained in the world no more than an hour of a day.

result.output: On the day they see what is being threatened to them, it will be as if they have lingered only one hour of the day.

src: Oder bis du den Himmel auf uns in Stücken herabfallen läßt, wie du behauptet hast, oder Gott und die Engel vor unsere Augen bringst,
ref: Or, let chunks of sky fall over us, as you assert (you will); or, bring God and the angels as a surety;

result.output: Or until you let the sky fall down on us in pieces, as you claimed, or bring God and the angels before our eyes.

src: Und wisst, daß unter euch ALLAHs Gesandter ist. Würde er auf euch in vielen der Angelegenheiten hören, würdet ihr sicherlich unter Unannehmlichkeiten leiden.
ref: Know that the Apostle of God is among you: If he agreed with you in most matters you would surely come to grief.

result.output: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to listen to you in many matters, you would surely suffer harm.

src: Und ALLAH ist immer über alles allwissend.
ref: God has knowledge of everything.

result.output: And Allah is always all-knowing about everything.

src: Diejenigen, die von den Engeln abberufen werden - da sie gegen sich selber gefrevelt haben und nun unterwürfig geworden sind (sagen): "Wir pflegten ja, nichts Böses zu tun." Nein, wahrlich, Allah weiß wohl, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: whom the angels take while they were still harming themselves' Then they will offer submission, saying: 'We have done no evil' No, surely Allah knows what you have done.

result.output: Those who are taken away by the angels - since they have sinned against themselves and have become submissive (say): 'We used to not do anything wrong.' No, indeed, Allah knows well what you used to do.

src: Hätten aber die Bewohner (jener) Städte geglaubt und wären sie gottesfürchtig gewesen, so hätten Wir ihnen ganz gewiß die Segnungen von Himmel und Erde eröffnet. Doch sie leugneten; also erfaßten Wir sie um dessentwillen, was sie begangen hatten.
ref: But if the people of these regions had believed and feared God, We would surely have showered on them blessings of the heavens and the earth; but they only denied, and We punished them for their deeds.

result.output: But had the inhabitants of those cities believed and been righteous, We would have opened for them blessings from heaven and earth. But they denied [the truth], so We seized them for what they were earning [of sins].,

src: (Er ist der) Herr der Himmel und der Erde und all dessen, was zwischen beiden liegt.
ref: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them.

result.output: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them.

src: So ziehen sie ihn der Lüge.
ref: So they belied him, and We destroyed them.

result.output: So they expose him to the lie.

src: Diese sind es, die eine schlimme Abrechnung haben werden, und ihre Herberge ist Gahannam.
ref: They will be subjected to a severe reckoning and Hell shall be their refuge.

result.output: These are the ones who will have a terrible reckoning, and their abode is Gehenna.

src: Und reinige mein Haus für diejenigen, die den Umlauf vollziehen, und für die, die aufrecht stehen, sich verneigen und niederwerfen.
ref: And do thou purify My House for those that shall go about it and those that stand, for those that bow and prostrate themselves;

result.output: And clean my house for those who make the circuit, and for those who stand upright, bow and prostrate themselves.

src: (Was nun) die älteren Frauen (betrifft), die nicht mehr auf Heirat hoffen können, so trifft sie kein Vorwurf, wenn sie ihre Tücher ablegen, ohne ihre Zierde zur Schau zu stellen. Aber wenn sie sich dessen enthalten, ist das besser für sie. Und Allah ist Allhörend, Allwissend.
ref: And the old women residing in houses who do not have the desire of marriage – it is no sin upon them if they discard their upper coverings provided they do not display their adornment; and avoiding even this is better for them; and Allah is All Hearing, All Knowing.

result.output: (As for) the elderly women who can no longer hope for marriage, no blame attaches to them if they lay aside their garments, without displaying their adornment. But if they refrain from this, it is better for them. And Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

src: Und wenn sie zu euch kommen, sagen sie: "Wir haben den Iman bekundet.", während sie selbst doch mit dem Kufr eingetreten und mit diesem fortgegangen sind.
ref: And when they come to you they say: we believe; whereas surely with infidelity they entered and surely with it they went forth.

result.output: And when they come to you, they say, 'We have declared faith', while they have actually entered with disbelief and left with it.
