src: Und Wir trafen mit ihnen ein festes Abkommen.
ref: We made a solemn covenant with them.

result.output: And we made a firm agreement with them.

src: Und WIR setzten für ihr Zugrunde-Richten einen Termin fest.
ref: And We appointed a fixed time for their destruction.

result.output: : And WE set a date for their downfall.

src: Mein HERR! Schenke mir Weisheit und lasse mich den gottgefällig Guttuenden folgen!
ref: O Lord, give me wisdom and admit me among the righteous,

result.output: My LORD! Grant me wisdom and let me follow the God-pleasing good deeds!

src: Für diejenigen, die Unrecht tun, ist ein Los bestimmt wie das Los ihrer Gefährten.
ref: Those who do wrong will indeed come to the same end as their fellows (of old).

result.output: For those who do wrong, a fate is determined like the fate of their companions.

src: Erwarten Sie denn etwas anderes, als daß die Engel zu ihnen kommen, oder daß der Befehl deines Herrn eintrifft?
ref: So what are they waiting for, except that the angels come upon them or that your Lord’s punishment comes?

result.output: Do you expect something other than that the angels come to you or that the command of your Lord arrives?

src: Und wer macht die Schöpfung am Anfang und wiederholt sie? Und wer versorgt euch vom Himmel und von der Erde?
ref: Or He Who initiates the creation, then will create it again, and He Who provides you sustenance from the skies and the earth?

result.output: And who creates the creation at the beginning and repeats it? And who provides for you from the sky and from the earth?

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Wer von euch sich von seinem Din abwendet, so wird ALLAH Menschen bringen, die ER liebt und welche Ihn lieben.
ref: Believers, if any among you renounce the faith, God will replace them by others who love Him and are loved by Him, who will be kind and considerate towards believers and firm and unyielding towards those who deny the truth.

result.output: O you who have internalized the faith! Whoever of you turns away from his Din, then Allah will bring people whom He loves and who love Him.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du zu uns gekommen, um uns von dem abzubringen, worin wir unsere Väter (vor)gefunden haben, und damit euch beiden die Oberhoheit im Land werde?
ref: "Have you come," said they, "to turn us back from what we found our ancestors doing, so that the two of you may attain supremacy in the land?

result.output: They said, Have you come to dissuade us from what our fathers found, so that both of you may have supremacy in the land?

src: Und (Er läßt dies zu,) damit diejenigen, denen das Wissen gegeben wurde, erkennen, daß es die Wahrheit von deinem Herrn ist, auf daß sie daran glauben und ihre Herzen sich Ihm friedvoll unterwerfen mögen. Und siehe, Allah leitet jene, die gläubig sind, auf den geraden Weg.
ref: And so that the people given the knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord, in order that they may accept faith in it, therefore their hearts may humble before Him; and indeed Allah will guide the believers on the Straight Path.

result.output: And (He allows this) so that those to whom knowledge has been given may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts may humbly submit to Him. Indeed, Allah guides those who believe to a straight path.

src: Hätten sie gesagt: «Wir hören, und wir gehorchen», und: «Höre», und: «Schau auf uns» (unzurnaa), wäre es besser und richtiger für sie. Aber Gott hat sie wegen ihres Unglaubens verflucht, so glauben sie nur wenig.
ref: If they had said, 'We have heard and obey' and 'Hear' and 'Regard us,' it would have been better for them, and more upright; but God has cursed them for their unbelief so they believe not except a few.

result.output: If they had said, 'We hear and we obey,' and 'Listen,' and 'Look at us' (unzurnaa), it would be better and more proper for them. But God has cursed them for their unbelief, so they believe only a little.

src: Dann befände ich mich wahrlich in einem offenkundigen Irrtum.
ref: In that case I would surely be in clear error.

result.output: Then I would truly be in an obvious mistake.

src: Wenn aber jemand (dazu) gezwungen ist, ohne (es) zu begehren und ohne das Maß zu überschreiten, so trifft ihn keine Schuld; wahrlich, Allah ist Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: If one is obliged by necessity to eat it without intending to transgress, or reverting to it, he is not guilty of sin; for God is forgiving and kind.

result.output: If, however, someone is forced to do so without desiring it and without exceeding the limit, then he is not guilty; truly, Allah is All-Forgiving, Merciful.

src: Sag: "Ihr Schriftbesitzer! Ihr habt nichts (vom Din), bis ihr At-taurat und Alindschil und das einhaltet, was euch von eurem HERRN hinabgesandt wurde.
ref: Say to them: "O people of the Book, you have no ground (for argument) until you follow the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to you by your Lord."

result.output: Say, "O owners of the scripture, you are not [an acceptable] people until you observe the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to you from your Lord."

src: Und (erinnere daran), als Musa zu seinen Leuten sagte: "Gewiß, ALLAH gebietet euch, eine Kuh zu schlachten."
ref: And when Moses said to his people, 'God commands you to sacrifice a cow.'

result.output: And (remember) when Musa said to his people: "Surely Allah commands you to slaughter a cow."

src: Könntest du nur sehen wenn sie mit Furcht geschlagen sein werden!
ref: And couldst thou see the time when they shall be terrified!

result.output: If only you could see when they will be struck with fear!

src: ER ist Der Allhörende, Der Allwissende.
ref: He is the Hearer, the Knower.

result.output: He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

src: Und ALLAHs Erde ist weit.
ref: And God’s earth is vast.

result.output: And Allah's earth is vast.

src: Gewiß, die Unrecht-Begehenden werden nie erfolgreich werden."
ref: But surely the wicked will not prosper."

result.output: Certainly, wrongdoers will never be successful.

src: Verleihe uns Geduld und lasse uns als Muslime sterben!"
ref: Pour (bestow abundantly) patience on us, and bestow us death as Muslims.”

result.output: Grant us patience and let us die as Muslims!

src: Könnt ihr uns vor Gottes Pein etwas nützen?»
ref: They will say: "Had Allah guided us, we would have guided you.

result.output: Can you help us with God's torment?

src: Diese erhalten einen Anteil von dem, was sie sich erworben haben. Gott ist schnell im Abrechnen.
ref: They are those who will surely have their share of whatsoever they have earned; for God is swift at the reckoning.

result.output: These will receive a share of what they have earned. God is quick in reckoning.

src: (Das ist) Allahs Versprechen in Wahrheit.
ref: The Promise of Allah is true.

result.output: (That is) Allah's promise in truth.

src: Sie können doch sich selbst nicht helfen, und sie werden keinen Beistand gegen Uns erhalten.
ref: But they are not able to help themselves, nor can they find protection against Us.

result.output: You cannot help yourselves, and you will not receive any support from us.

src: Und lauert nicht auf jedem Weg auf, um (Menschen) einzuschüchtern und von ALLAHs Weg diejenigen abzuhalten, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben - erstrebt nach dem Krümmen (dieses Weges). Und entsinnt euch, als ihr noch wenige wart, dann ließ ER euch mehr werden. Und nehmt wahr, wie das Anschließende von den Verderben-Anrichtenden war.
ref: “And do not be seated on every road in order to scare the travellers, and to prevent from Allah’s path the people who believe in Him, wishing to distort it; and remember when you were few and He increased your numbers; and see what sort of fate befell the mischievous!”

result.output: And do not lie in wait on every path to frighten (people) and to bar from Allah's way those who believe firmly therein, and to seek twistedness in it; and remember when you were a small group, how He bestowed upon you a great increase, and how the disbelievers were scheming against you to imprison you or to kill you or to expel you. They were planning and Allah too was planning, and Allah is the Best of planners.

src: ER sagte: "WIR ließen doch deine Leute nach dir der Fitna aussetzen.
ref: Said He, 'We have tempted thy people since thou didst leave them.

result.output: He said, We did expose your people to Fitna after you.

src: Und verkünde denen, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, daß für sie Gärten bestimmt sind, unter denen Bäche fließen.
ref: And bear thou the glad tidings unto those who believe and do righteous works that verily for them shall be Gardens whereunder rivers flow.

result.output: And proclaim to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow.

src: Und gewiß, viele führen mit ihren Gelüsten durch Mangel an Wissen zum Irrweg.
ref: Surely many (men) mislead others into following their vain desires through lack of knowledge.

result.output: And certainly, many are led astray by their desires due to a lack of knowledge.

src: So prüfen Wir sie dafür, daß sie zu freveln pflegten.
ref: We tried them in this way, for they were disobedient.

result.output: So we test them for having dared to sin.

src: Gewiß, WIR entsandten Nuh zu seinen Leuten: "Warne deine Leute, bevor zu ihnen eine qualvolle Peinigung kommt."
ref: SENT NOAH to his people to warn them before the painful punishment came upon them.

result.output: Certainly, WE sent Noah to his people: "Warn your people before they are subjected to a painful punishment."

src: Vielmehr sind sie Leute, die (Allah andere) gleichsetzen.
ref: Nay, but they are a people who ascribe equals (to Him)!

result.output: Rather, they are people who equate (Allah with others).

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allwürdig, allweise.
ref: He is indeed all-mighty and all-wise.

result.output: Surely, Allah is all-worthy, all-wise.

src: Und WIR werden euch bestimmt das Land nach ihnen bewohnen lassen. Dies ist für denjenigen, der Ehrfurcht vor der Vorstellung Mir gegenüber hat, und der Meine Androhung fürchtet."
ref: “And indeed We will establish you in the land after them; this is for him who fears to stand before Me and fears the commands of punishment declared by Me.”

result.output: And WE will certainly let you inhabit the land after them. This is for the one who has awe for the thought of Me and who fears My threat.

src: Hast du etwa nicht diejenigen wahrgenommen, denen gesagt wurde: "Haltet euch zurück, verrichtet ordnungsgemäß das rituelle Gebet und entrichtet die Zakat"?!
ref: Have you not seen the people who were told: "Hold back your hands (from attacking), observe your devotional obligations and pay the zakat?"

result.output: Did you not perceive those who were told, 'Restrain your hands, establish prayer and give zakah?'

src: "Und gewiß, als ALLAHs Diener aufstand, an Ihn Bittgebete zu richten, beinahe wären sie ihn Niederdrückende."
ref: When the devotee of God stood up to invoke Him (the jinns) crowded upon him (to listen).

result.output: And certainly, when Allah's servant stood up to pray to Him, almost they pressed him down.

src: Und sie sind vor (jedem) Schrecken an jenem Tag in Sicherheit'.
ref: He will be secure from the terror of the Day of Judgment.

result.output: And they are safe from every terror on that day.

src: Gewiß ALLAH verfügt bei Sich über das Wissen der Stunde, ER läßt den helfenden (Regen) nieder und ER weiß, was in den Mutterschößen ist. Und kein Lebewesen weiß, was es morgen erwirbt, und kein Lebewesen weiß, in welchem Lande es stirbt. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allwissend, allkundig.
ref: Surely Allah is He with Whom is the knowledge of the hour, and He sends down the rain and He knows what is in the wombs; and no one knows what he shall earn on the morrow; and no one knows in what land he shall die; surely Allah is Knowing, Aware.

result.output: Indeed, Allah alone has knowledge of the Hour. He sends down rain, bringing life to the earth, and knows what is in the womb. No soul knows what it will earn tomorrow, and no soul knows in which land it will die. Allah alone is all-knowing, all-aware.

src: Das Königreich, das wahrhaftige - an jenem Tage wird es des Allerbarmers sein; und ein Tag soll es sein, (der) schwer für die Ungläubigen (ist)
ref: The real sovereignty will belong to Ar-Rahman. How grievous will be the day for the infidels!

result.output: The kingdom, the truthful - on that day it shall belong to the Most Merciful; and it will be a day difficult for the disbelievers.

src: Allah wird uns zusammenbringen.
ref: Allah will bring us all together.

result.output: Allah will bring us together.

src: Sag: "Setzt ihr ALLAH etwa (damit) in Kenntnis über etwas, was ER weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde kennt?!" Gepriesen-erhaben sei ER über das, was sie an Schirk betreiben.
ref: Say: "Do ye indeed inform Allah of something He knows not, in the heavens or on earth?- Glory to Him! and far is He above the partners they ascribe (to Him)!"

result.output: Say: \Do you inform ALLAH about something that HE neither knows in the heavens nor on the earth?!\ Glorified and exalted is HE above what they associate with HIM. ,

src: Du bringst das Lebendige aus dem Toten, und Du bringst das Tote aus dem Lebendigen hervor, und Du bescherst Unterhalt, wem Du willst, ohne (viel) zu rechnen.
ref: You bring forth the living out of the dead, and You bring the dead out of the living, and You give sustenance to whom You will beyond all reckoning.'

result.output: You bring the living from the dead, and you bring the dead from the living, and you bestow sustenance upon whom you will, without (much) account.

src: Aber er ist nicht den steilen Paßweg hinaufgestürmt.
ref: But he could not scale the steep ascent.

result.output: But he did not rush up the steep mountain path.

src: Erhebt nicht eure Stimmen über die Stimme des Propheten, und seid ihm gegenüber nicht so laut mit dem Gesagten, wie die einen von euch den anderen gegenüber laut sind, sonst werden eure Handlungen zunichte, während ihr es nicht merkt.
ref: Do not raise your voices higher than the voice of the Prophet, nor speak to him loudly the way you shout to one another, lest your deeds go to waste whilst you are unaware. (Faith will go waste due to the slightest disrespect towards the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.

result.output: Do not raise your voices above the voice of the prophet, and do not speak loudly to him as some of you are loud to others, otherwise your actions will be in vain without you realizing it.

src: Sie pflegten nicht zuzuhören und sie pflegten nicht einzublicken.
ref: They could not bear to hear (the preachers of the truth) and they used not to see (the truth because of their severe aversin, inspite of the fact that they had the sense of hearing and sight).

result.output: They were not used to listening and they were not used to looking in.

src: Und WIR ließen Musa Wahy zuteil werden, als seine Leute ihn um Wasser baten: "Schlage mit deinem Stock gegen den Felsen!"
ref: And We revealed unto Musa, when his people asked him for drink: Smite the rock with thy rod.

result.output: And WE caused Musa to receive wahy (revelation) when his people asked him for water: "Strike the rock with your staff!"

src: Und wenn der Himmel (wie ein Fell) abgezogen wird,
ref: The curtain drawn back from the skies,

result.output: And when the sky is pulled off like a fur coat

src: Und daß ihr fastet, ist besser für euch, wenn ihr (es) nur wißt!
ref: And if you fast it is good for you, if you knew.

result.output: And [know that] fasting is better for you, if only you knew.,

src: Und verheiße den Gläubigen die frohe Botschaft.
ref: So convey glad tidings to those who believe.

result.output: And give the believers the good news.

src: Diejenigen, die es lieben, daß sich das Abscheuliche unter denjenigen, die glauben, verbreitet, für sie wird es schmerzhafte Strafe geben im Diesseits und Jenseits. Allah weiß, ihr aber wißt nicht.
ref: There is painful punishment in this world and the next for those who like that immorality should spread among the believers, for God knows and you do not know.

result.output: Those who love that the abominable should spread among those who believe, they will have a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. Allah knows, but you do not know.

src: Sie sagen: "Allah hat Sich Kinder genommen." Preis sei Ihm! Er ist der Unbedürftige. Ihm gehört, was in den Himmeln und was auf der Erde ist. Keine Ermächtigung habt ihr dafür. Wollt ihr über Allah etwas sagen, was ihr nicht wißt?
ref: They said, “Allah has created a son for Himself”- Purity is to Him! He is the Perfect (Unwanting, free of needs); to Him only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; “You do not have any proof of this; do you say a thing concerning Allah which you do not know?”

result.output: They say, \Allah has taken children to Himself.\ Praise be to Him! He is the Self-Sufficient. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. You have no authority for this. Do you say about Allah that which you do not know? ,

src: Und hätten sie sich doch in Geduld geübt, bis du zu ihnen herauskommst, wäre dies sicher besser für sie.
ref: If they had waited for you to come out it would have been better for them.

result.output: And if they had practiced patience until you came out to them, this would certainly be better for them.

src: Möge sein Herr ihm, wenn er euch (alle) entläßt, zum Tausch andere Gattinnen geben, die besser sind als ihr: muslimische Frauen, die gläubig und demütig ergeben sind, bereit zur Umkehr sind, (Gott) dienen und umherziehen, ob sie früher verheiratet waren oder Jungfrauen sind.
ref: In case he divorces you, his Lord will give him better wives in return, who will be modest, true believers, obedient to God, repentant, observant of prayer and fasting, both widows and virgins.

result.output: May his lord give him (when he dismisses you all) in exchange [other] wives better than you - submissive [to Allah], believing, pious, penitent, devout, inclined to fasting - previously married and virgins.

src: Das ist ein gerader Weg."
ref: This is the straight path."

result.output: That is a straight path.

src: Da wollte er sie aus dem Land aufschrecken.
ref: So he resolved to turn them out of the land (of Egypt).

result.output: He wanted to scare her out of the country.

src: Kostet nun die Pein dafür, daß ihr ungläubig waret.»
ref: Therefore now taste the punishment, the result of your disbelief.”

result.output: Now taste the agony for being unbelievers.

src: Dachten sie etwa nicht über sich selbst nach?!
ref: What, have they not considered within themselves?

result.output: Didn't they think about themselves?!

src: Und die frohe Botschaft gib den Demütigen
ref: Give good tidings to those who bow in obedience to God,

result.output: And give the humble the joyful message

src: Das Gleichnis derer, denen die Thora auferlegt wurde, und die ihr dann nicht nachlebten, ist wie das Gleichnis eines Esels, der Bücher trägt. Übel steht es um die Leute, die Allahs Zeichen leugnen. Und Allah rechtleitet kein ungerechtes Volk.
ref: The example of those who were entrusted with the Taurat, and did not carry out its commands, is like the donkey carrying books; what a wretched example is of the people who denied the signs of Allah; and Allah does not guide the unjust.

result.output: The parable of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not follow it is like the parable of a donkey who carries books. It is a bad state of affairs for those who deny the signs of Allah. And Allah does not guide unjust people.

src: Und WIR wiesen dem Menschen zu, seinen Eltern Ihsan zu erweisen. Seine Mutter war schwanger mit ihm in Angestrengtheit und brachte ihn zur Welt in Angestrengtheit.
ref: We have enjoined on man to be good to his parents: His mother carries him in her womb with hardship, and gives birth to him in pain.

result.output: And we commanded man to be good to his parents. His mother carried him with hardship and gave birth to him with hardship.

src: Sie sagten: "Al-'aziz!
ref: They said, “O governor!

result.output: They said: Al-'aziz!

src: Und euer HERR ist gewiß Der Allgnade Erweisende.
ref: Surely your Lord is Ar-Rahman.

result.output: And your Lord is certainly the Most Gracious.

src: Und wenn du sie fragst, wer die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen und die Sonne und den Mond dienstbar gemacht hat, sagen sie bestimmt: «Gott.» Wie leicht lassen sie sich doch abwenden!
ref: And if you ask them, “Who created the heavens and the earth, and subjected the sun and the moon?”, they will surely say, “Allah”; so where are they reverting?

result.output: And if you ask them who created the heavens and the earth and made the sun and the moon subservient, they will certainly say, 'God.' How easily they are turned away!

src: Und wenn die Menschen (vor Mir) versammelt werden, werden sie ihre Feinde sein und ihre Anbetung verleugnen.
ref: When all men are gathered together (on that Day) they will become their enemies and deny their worship.

result.output: And when people are gathered (before Me), they will be their enemies and deny their worship.

src: Sag: "Ja!
ref: Say: "Yes!

result.output: Say: "Yes!"

src: Als er zu seinem Vater sagte: "Mein Vater! Weshalb betest du etwas an, das weder sieht, noch hört, noch von dir irgend etwas abwenden kann?
ref: Remember, when he said to his father: "O my father, why do you worship that which can neither hear nor see nor even profit you the least?

result.output: When he said to his father, "My father! Why do you worship something that neither sees, nor hears, nor can turn away anything from you?"

src: sie würden gewiß sagen: "Nur unsere Blicke sind benommen; wahrlich, man hat uns nur etwas vorgegaukelt."
ref: They will say all the same: "Our eyes were dazed (and clouded over). We were a people ensorcelled."

result.output: They would certainly say: "Only our eyes are muddled; truly, we have only been shown something."

src: Es ist so! Denn ALLAH wandelt keine Gabe (in Bestrafung) um, die ER Leuten beschert hat, bis sie sich selbst (zum Schlechten) verändern.
ref: That is so because Allah will never change a grace which He has bestowed on a people until they change what is in their ownselves.

result.output: It is so! Because ALLAH does not change any gift (into punishment) that HE has given to people until they themselves change (for the worse).

src: Ihr Menschen! Esst von dem, was auf Erden ist, an genießbaren Halalmitteln, und folgt nicht den Fußstapfen des Satans!
ref: O men, eat only the things of the earth that are lawful and good.

result.output: O mankind! Eat of that which is on earth lawful and good, and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.

src: Sagt: "Wollt ihr mit uns über ALLAH disputieren, wo ER unser und euer HERR ist, und wo uns unsere Taten und euch eure Taten gehören, und wo wir Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig sind?!"
ref: Say: "Why do you dispute with us about God when He is equally your Lord and our Lord? To us belong our actions, to you yours; and we are true to Him."

result.output: He says, 'Do you want to argue with us about ALLAH, while HE is our and your LORD, and while our deeds and your deeds belong to us, and where we are sincere to Him?!'

src: Und WIR ließen sie in Unsere Gnade eintreten.
ref: And they were admitted to Our grace.

result.output: And we let them enter into our grace.,

src: Auch hat mein Bruder Aaron eine redegewandtere Zunge. So sende ihn mit mir zur Unterstützung, daß er mich bestätige. Ich fürchte, daß sie mich der Lüge zeihen.»
ref: So send my brother Aaron with me as helper for he is more fluent than I with words, that he should affirm me, for I fear that they would call me a liar."

result.output: Also, my brother Aaron has a more eloquent tongue. So send him with me for support, that he may confirm me. I fear they will accuse me of lying.

src: Immer wieder wenn sie aus ihr (Dschahannam) aus einer Drangsal herausgehen wollten, werden sie wieder zu ihr zurückgeschickt.
ref: Whenever in their anguish they try to get out of it, they are restored to it.

result.output: Again and again when they wanted to go out of it (Dschahannam) from affliction, they are sent back to it (Dschahannam) again.

src: Jene laden zum (Höllen)feuer ein. Allah aber lädt zum (Paradies)garten und zur Vergebung ein, mit Seiner Erlaubnis, und macht den Menschen Seine Zeichen klar, auf daß sie bedenken mögen.
ref: They invite you to Hell, but God calls you to Paradise and pardon by His grace. And He makes His signs manifest that men may haply take heed.

result.output: Those invite to the (Hell)fire. Allah invites to Paradise and to forgiveness, by His permission, and makes clear His verses to the people that they may remember.

src: Und solltest du diejenigen sehen, die über Unsere Ayat lästern, so wende dich von ihnen (so lange) ab, bis sie zu einem anderen Thema übergehen.
ref: When you see them argue about Our messages, withdraw from their company until they begin to talk of other things.

result.output: And if you see those who ridicule Our verses, turn away from them until they enter into another conversation.

src: Er aber erklärte (es) für Lüge und war ungehorsam.
ref: But (the Pharaoh) disavowed and disobeyed.

result.output: But he declared it to be a lie and was disobedient.

src: Haben WIR euch etwa nicht ein langes Lebensalter gewährt, während dessen derjenige sich erinnern konnte, der sich erinnern wollte?! Auch der Warner kam zu euch.
ref: But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you?

result.output: Did WE not grant you a long life during which the one who wanted to remember could remember?! Even the warning came to you.

src: Der Satan ist gegen den Erbarmer widerspenstig.
ref: Verily Satan was disobedient to Ar-Rahman.

result.output: Satan is rebellious against the Merciful.

src: Und (auch) diejenigen unter diesen da, die Unrecht tun, werden die bösen Taten treffen, die sie begangen haben.
ref: So will the evil deeds of those who are sinners among them recoil back on them.

result.output: And (also) those among them who do wrong will be afflicted by the evil deeds they have committed.

src: Euer Besitz und eure Kinder sind nur eine Versuchung; Allah aber - bei Ihm gibt es großartigen Lohn.
ref: Your wealth and children are surely meant as trial for you: But with God is the great reward.

result.output: Your possessions and your children are but a trial; and Allah - with Him is a great reward.

src: Und dort vor Salomo wurden dessen Heerscharen der Ginn und Menschen und Vögel versammelt, und sie standen in Reih und Glied geordnet
ref: His armies of jinns and men and Tair assembled, formed into ranks, (and marched)

result.output: And before Solomon the armies of the jinn, human beings and birds were assembled, and they stood arranged in ranks and files

src: Das ist der Tag, an dem sie nicht reden
ref: They will not be able to speak that day,

result.output: This is the day on which they don't speak

src: Vielmehr sind es geehrte Diener.
ref: (Those whom they think are God's sons) are only His honorable servants.

result.output: Rather, they are honored servants.

src: Sie werden ihrem Herrn begegnen. Allein, ich erachte euch für ein Volk, das unwissend ist.
ref: Surely, they are going to meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people that are ignorant.

result.output: You will meet your Lord. However, I consider you to be a people who are ignorant.

src: Auch ist es eine Erinnerung für die Mumin.
ref: You are to warn with it—and a reminder for the believers.

result.output: It is also a memory for the Moomins.

src: So kehre dich von ihnen ab; du bist (hierin) nicht zu tadeln.
ref: Turn away from them. You will not be blamed.

result.output: So turn away from them; you are not to blame (in this).

src: Du versuchst nur, ein Tyrann im Land zu werden, und du willst kein Friedensstifter sein."
ref: You only want to be a tyrant in the land and no peacemaker."

result.output: You are only trying to become a tyrant in the country, and you do not want to be a peacemaker.

src: Ob er wohl (die Botschaft) für Lüge erklärt und sich abkehrt?
ref: If he cries lies, and turns away -

result.output: Will he declare (the message) a lie and turn away?

src: Allah hatte ja mit den Kinder Isra'ils ein Abkommen getroffen. Und Wir beriefen von ihnen zwölf Obmänner.
ref: God covenanted the people of Israel and raised twelve leaders among them, and said: "I shall verily be with you.

result.output: Allah had indeed made a covenant with the Children of Israel, and We appointed twelve leaders from among them.,

src: Und gewiß, ich denke doch über dich, du Pharao! - daß du verleitet bist."
ref: I truly think, O Pharaoh, your days are done."

result.output: And surely, I am thinking of you, you Pharaoh! - that you are deceived.

src: Laß Mich in Ruhe mit denen, die diese Botschaft für Lüge erklären.
ref: So leave those who deny this Discourse to Me.

result.output: Leave me alone with those who declare this message a lie.

src: Geh hinaus. Du gehörst zu den Erniedrigten.»
ref: Go, and away; you are one of the damned."

result.output: Go out. You belong to the humiliated.

src: Und Gott zürnt ihm und verflucht ihn und bereitet ihm eine gewaltige Pein.
ref: For him a greater punishment awaits.

result.output: And God is angry with him and curses him and prepares him a great pain.

src: (Es sind) diejenigen, die glauben und deren Herzen im Gedenken Allahs Ruhe finden.
ref: “Those who accepted faith and whose hearts gain solace from the remembrance of Allah; pay heed!

result.output: Those who believe and find tranquility in the remembrance of Allah.

src: Die Entscheidungsträger vom Pharaos Leuten sagten: "Gewiß, dieser ist doch ein im Wissen fundierter Magier!
ref: The nobles of Pharaoh said: "He surely is a clever magician.

result.output: The decision makers of the pharaoh's people said: 'Certainly, he is a magician based on knowledge!

src: Wir fordern von keiner Seele etwas über das hinaus, was sie zu leisten vermag. Und wenn ihr eine Aussage macht, so übt Gerechtigkeit, auch wenn es einen nahen Verwandten (betrifft); und haltet den Bund Allahs ein.
ref: Give full measure and weight, according to justice, We never charge a soul with more than it can bear, when you speak, observe justice, even though it concerns a close relative; and fulfil the covenants of God.

result.output: We ask nothing of any soul beyond what it can achieve. And if you make a statement, practice justice, even if it concerns a close relative; and keep the covenant of Allah.

src: Sie (die Königin) sagte: "Ihr Vornehmen, ein ehrenvoller Brief ist mir überbracht worden.
ref: (The Queen said): "O nobles, a venerable letter has been delivered to me.

result.output: She (the queen) said: \Your Lordships, a honorable letter has been brought to me.\,

src: Dann bezichtigten sie ihn der Lüge, dann verletzten sie ihm (dem Kamelweibchen) die Beine, dann richtete ihr HERR sie wegen ihrer Verfehlung zugrunde, dann ließ ER es ihnen gleichmäßig sein.
ref: But they called him a liar and hamstrung her. So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.

result.output: Then they accused him of lying, then they injured his (the female camel's) legs, then their LORD destroyed them because of their transgression, then He made it fair for them.

src: Und wenn diejenigen, die Unrecht begingen, die Peinigung gesehen haben, wird diese ihnen weder erleichtert, noch wird ihnen Zeitaufschub gewährt.
ref: And when the wicked shall face the torment it will not be decreased, nor will they be reprieved.

result.output: And when those who committed injustice see the punishment, it will neither be lightened for them nor will they be reprieved.

src: Ihre Angelegenheit unterliegt nur ALLAH, dann wird ER ihnen das kundtun, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: Their affair is with God. He will tell them the truth of what they were doing.

result.output: Your matter belongs only to Allah, then He will inform you of what you used to do.

src: So ließen Wir die einen von ihnen auf die anderen folgen und machten sie zu(m Gegenstand von) Geschichten. Weg darum mit Leuten, die nicht glauben!
ref: So oft as there came unto a community their apostle, they belied him, so We made them follow one anot her, and We made them bywords: so away with a people who believe not!

result.output: So We let some of them follow others and made them (the subject of) stories. Away with people who do not believe!

src: Bis auf eine alte Frau unter denen, die zurückblieben und dem Verderben anheimfielen.
ref: Except one old woman who remained behind.

result.output: Except for an old woman among those who remained behind and fell into ruin.

src: Der Mensch ist ja eilfertig.
ref: Curse him, etc." and that one should not do, but one should be patient].

result.output: The human being is indeed hasty.

src: Allah wird sie bald in Seine Barmherzigkeit einführen. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allvergebend, Barmherzig.
ref: This is certainly a means of achieving nearness (to God), and God will admit them to His mercy, for God is forgiving and kind.

result.output: Allah will soon lead them into His mercy. Verily, Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

src: Sie glauben nicht eher, bis sie dich über das richten lassen, was zwischen ihnen umstritten ist, und hierauf in sich selbst keine Bedrängnis finden durch das, was du entschieden hast, und sich in voller Ergebung fügen.
ref: They will not believe until they make you a judge in their disputes, then do not find within their hearts any dissent to your verdict and submit in full submission.

result.output: They will not believe until they have you decide on what is disputed among them, and afterwards they find no distress within themselves from what you have decided, and they fully submit.

src: In Deiner Hand ist das Gute; wahrlich, Du hast Macht über alle Dinge.
ref: All goodness is Yours (entirely). Indeed You have the power over all things.

result.output: In your hand is the good; truly, you have power over all things.

src: ALLAH möge euch vergeben.
ref: God will forgive you.

result.output: May Allah forgive you.

src: Und auswirft, was in ihr ist, und somit ganz leer wird
ref: And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,

result.output: And casts out what is in it, and thus becomes completely empty

src: Und sie sagen: "Wann wird dieses Versprechen (verwirklicht werden), wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid?"
ref: They say: "When is this promise going to come, if what you say is true?"

result.output: And they say, 'When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?'

src: Vielmehr wissen die meisten von ihnen nicht.
ref: Nay, most of them know not.

result.output: Rather, most of them don't know.

src: Die Vergeltung für diejenigen unter euch, die dies tun, ist nichts als Schande im diesseitigen Leben, und am Tag der Auferstehung werden sie der härtesten Pein zugeführt werden. Und Gott läßt nicht unbeachtet, was ihr tut.
ref: There is no other award for them who so act but disgrace in the world, and on the Day of Judgement the severest of punishment; for God is not heedless of all that you do.

result.output: The retribution for those of you who do this is nothing but disgrace in this life, and on the Day of Resurrection, they will be subjected to the severest torment. And Allah is not unaware of what you do.

src: Und wenn sie um Hilfe rufen, wird Ihrem Hilferuf entsprochen mit Wasser wie das Geschmolzene, das die Gesichter schmort.
ref: If they ask for water they will be helped to liquid like molten brass that would scald their mouths.

result.output: And when they call for help, their cry for help will be answered with water like that of melted metal, which scalds the faces.

src: Ihr Menschen! Bereits ist zu euch doch ein Gesandter mit der Wahrheit von eurem HERRN gekommen, so verinnerlicht den Iman, dies ist besser für euch.
ref: O men, the Messenger has now come to you with the truth from your Lord; so believe; better is it for you.

result.output: O people! A Messenger has already come to you with the truth from your Lord, so believe in him; this will be better for you.

src: Uns beeilen, ihnen gute Dinge (zu gewähren)? Aber nein! Sie merken nicht.
ref: We provide them with the means of competing with each other in virtuous deeds, but they do not realize this.

result.output: Hurry up to grant them good things? But no! They don't notice.

src: Nein, sondern wir glauben, daß ihr Lügner seid!"
ref: In fact, we think you are a liar."

result.output: No, but we believe that you are liars!

src: Dient eurem HERRN, Der euch erschuf und diejenigen vor euch, damit ihr Taqwa gemäß handelt.
ref: Worship your Lord, Who has created you and those before you, in the hope of attaining piety.

result.output: Serve your Lord who created you and those before you, so that you may become righteous.

src: Und stifteten darin viel Unheil.
ref: And multiplied corruption.

result.output: And caused a lot of harm in it.

src: Betreiben sie etwa Schirk mit dem, was Nichts schafft, während sie alle doch erschaffen werden?!
ref: Do they associate those with Him who cannot create a thing, and are themselves created,

result.output: Are they operating Schirk with what does not create anything, while they are all created?!

src: Da ergriff sie Gott wegen ihrer Sünden.
ref: But Allah seized them with punishment for their sins.

result.output: She was touched by God because of her sins.

src: Dies sind Allahs Grenzen, so übertretet sie nicht! Wer aber Allahs Grenzen übertritt, diejenigen sind die Ungerechten.
ref: Do not exceed the limits of God, for those who exceed the bounds set by God are transgressors.

result.output: These are the limits set by Allah, so do not transgress them! And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah, they are indeed wrongdoers.

src: Euch wird euer Lohn am Tag der Auferstehung voll erstattet.
ref: And only on the Day of Resurrection shall you be paid your wages in full.

result.output: You will be fully reimbursed your reward on the day of resurrection.

src: Doch wenn ihr Kufr betreibt, so ist Meine Peinigung gewiß qualvoll."
ref: My punishment is dire.

result.output: However, if you commit disbelief, then My punishment is certainly painful.,

src: Und für euch gibt es anstelle von ALLAH weder Wali, noch Beistehenden.
ref: And you have not besides Allah any protector or helper.

result.output: And for you there is neither Wali nor a supporter instead of Allah.

src: Und für diejenigen, welche die gottmißfälligen Taten intrigieren, ist eine harte Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: To Him ascend (all) the goodly words, and the righteous deeds exalt it (the goodly words i.e. the goodly words are not accepted by Allah unless and until they are followed by good deeds), but those who plot evils, theirs will be severe torment.

result.output: And for those who plot the displeasing actions towards God, a severe punishment is destined.

src: Doch solltet ihr euch abwenden, so fürchte ich doch für euch die Peinigung eines langen Tages.
ref: But if you turn away, I fear the punishment of a terrible Day for you.

result.output: However, should you turn away, I fear for you the torment of a long day.

src: Es sind aber nur die Ungläubigen, die Unsere Zeichen leugnen.
ref: Only those who are infidels will deny it.

result.output: Only the unbelievers deny Our signs.

src: Gepriesen-erhaben ist ER! ER ist ALLAH, Der Einzige, Der Allbezwingende.
ref: Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing.

result.output: Praised and exalted is HE! HE is ALLAH, the One, the Almighty.

src: Also gräme dich nicht wegen der fisq-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: So do not grieve for these, the wicked people."

result.output: Also, don't worry about the fisq-operating people!

src: Seine Mutter war schwanger mit ihm in Angestrengtheit und brachte ihn zur Welt in Angestrengtheit. Und (die Zeit) der Schwangerschaft mit ihm und sein Entwöhnen ist dreißig Monate.
ref: His mother beareth him with reluctance, and bringeth him forth with reluctance, and the bearing of him and the weaning of him is thirty months, till, when he attaineth full strength and reacheth forty years, he saith: My Lord!

result.output: His mother was pregnant with him in difficulty and gave birth to him in difficulty. And the duration of his pregnancy and his weaning is thirty months.

src: Aber dir gehört es, zu befehlen.
ref: It is for you to decide.

result.output: But it belongs to you to command.

src: Sie sind doch im Zweifel über die Begegnung mit ihrem HERRN.
ref: They are in doubt concerning the Meeting with their Lord? (i.e. Resurrection after their deaths, and their return to their Lord).

result.output: They are doubtful about meeting their LORD.

src: Und der Gesandte sagt: "O mein Herr, mein Volk mied diesen Qur'an unter Mißachtung."
ref: The prophet will say: "O my Lord, my people had fettered the Qur'an."

result.output: And the messenger said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."

src: So haben Wir ihn als klare Zeichen hinabgesandt, und (es ist so,) daß Allah rechtleitet, wen Er will.
ref: That is why We have sent down these clear revelations, for God gives guidance whomsoever He please.

result.output: Thus We sent it down as clear signs, and Allah guides whom He wills.

src: So wendet euch nicht als Schuldige ab."
ref: So do not turn away from Him as sinners."

result.output: So do not turn away as guilty.

src: Und dein HERR genügt als Wakil."
ref: Thy Lord suffices as a guardian.

result.output: And your Lord is sufficient as a Guardian

src: Dem, der Gutes vollbringt, wird Besseres als das zuteil sein, und sie werden vor dem Schrecken an jenem Tag sicher sein.
ref: Whoever comes with good (deeds) will receive better than (what he had done), and be safe that day from terror.

result.output: Whoever does good deeds will receive something better than that, and they will be safe from terror on that day.

src: Und hätten sie doch das getan, womit sie ermahnt werden, wäre es besser für sie und würde sie noch mehr (im Iman) bestärken.
ref: And did they do that which they are exhorted to do, it would be for them better and more strengthening.

result.output: And if they had done what they were exhorted to do, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them in faith even more.

src: um undankbar zu sein für das, was Wir ihnen gegeben haben, und um zu genießen; sie werden (es noch) erfahren.
ref: And deny what We had given them, in order to go on enjoying themselves. They will come to know soon.

result.output: To be ungrateful for what We have given them and to enjoy it; they will (still) experience it.

src: (Aber) gewiß, Meine List ist fest.
ref: Verily, My Plan is strong.

result.output: Indeed, my cunning is firm.

src: Ihnen genügt Dschahannam, sie werden darin hineingeworfen.
ref: Hell is enough for them. They will roast in it.

result.output: Hell is sufficient for them, they will be thrown therein.,

src: Das ist Allah, euer Herr. Segensreich ist darum Allah, der Herr der Welten.
ref: That then is God, your Lord, so blessed be God, the Lord of all Being.

result.output: This is Allah, your Lord. Allah, the Lord of the worlds, is blessed.

src: Allah wird ganz gewiß diejenigen kennen, die die Wahrheit sprechen, und Er wird ganz gewiß die Lügner kennen.
ref: So Allah will surely know those who are true and He will surely know the liars.

result.output: Allah will surely know those who speak the truth and He will surely know the liars.

src: (Ihre Abneigung gegen diese Einteilung von Al-anfal ist) genauso (wie damals), als dein HERR dich aus deiner Wohnstätte mit der Wahrheit herausführen ließ, während eine Gruppe von den Mumin gewiß dem doch abgeneigt war.
ref: As your Lord sent you from your home (to fight) for the true cause, a section of the faithful were averse,

result.output: Your aversion to this classification of Al-Anfal is just like when your LORD brought you out of your dwelling place with the truth, while a group of believers were certainly averse to it.

src: Die Kaffara dafür ist die Speisung von zehn Bedürftigen in jenem Maß, wie ihr die Eurigen im Durchschnitt speist, oder Ihre Bekleidung oder die Befreiung eines Unfreien.
ref: The atonement for it is by feeding ten needy people from the average of what you feed your families, or by clothing them, or by freeing a slave.

result.output: The expiation for that is the feeding of ten needy persons with the average of that which you feed your people, or clothing them, or freeing a slave.

src: Gewiß, sie waren jungeMänner, die den Iman an ihren HERRN verinnerlichten, undWIR ließen sie noch mehr Rechtleitung gewinnen.
ref: They were a few young men who believed in their Lord; so We gave them greater guidance.

result.output: Certainly, they were young men who internalized the faith in their Lord, and we allowed them to gain even more guidance.

src: Aber der Lohn des Jenseits ist wahrlich besser für diejenigen, die glauben und gottesfürchtig sind.
ref: And certainly the recompense of the life to come is better for those who believe and follow the right path.

result.output: But the reward of the Hereafter is certainly better for those who believe and are righteous.

src: ER trifft damit von Seinen Dienern, wen ER will.
ref: He makes it reach whomever He wills of His servants.

result.output: HE thereby meets whom HE wills of His servants.

src: Und Wir legten zwischen ihnen und den Städten, die Wir gesegnet haben, sichtbare Städte an.
ref: We placed other prominent towns between them, the towns that We had blessed and had set well-measured stages between them.

result.output: And We created visible cities between them and the cities which We have blessed.

src: Wahrlich, Allah ist über alle Dinge Allwissend.
ref: Verily God has knowledge of everything.

result.output: Truly, Allah is All-Knowing above all things.

src: Ha Mim.
ref: HA MIM.

result.output: Ha Mim,

src: Die Engel und Gabriel steigen zu Ihm auf in einem Tage, dessen Ausmaß fünfzigtausend Jahre beträgt.
ref: To whom the angels and the soul take a day to ascend, whose length is fifty thousand years.

result.output: The angels and Gabriel ascend to Him in a day whose length is fifty thousand years.

src: Seine Leute kamen eilig zu ihm getrieben. Zuvor pflegten sie böse Taten zu begehen.
ref: And his people came to him, running towards him; and erstwhile they had been doing evil deeds.

result.output: His people came rushing to him. Previously they used to commit evil deeds.

src: Und manche von ihnen bezichtigen dich (ungerechter Verteilung) der Sadaqa. Doch würde ihnen davon etwas gegeben, wären sie zufrieden. Aber wenn ihnen davon nichts gegeben wird, so sind sie wütend.
ref: And among them is one who slanders you regarding the distribution of charity; so if they receive some of it they would be happy – and if not, thereupon they get displeased!

result.output: And some of them accuse you (of unfair distribution) of charity. But if something were given to them, they would be satisfied. But if they are not given anything, then they are angry.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als Musa für seine Leute um Wasser bat, dann sagten WIR: "Schlage mit deinem Stock an den Felsen!" Dann entsprangen daraus zwölf Quellen, bereits kennt jede Gruppe ihre Trinkstelle. Esst und trinkt von ALLAHs Rizq und übertreibt nicht auf Erden als Verderben-Anrichtende!
ref: And when Moosa asked for water for his people, We said, “Strike this rock with your staff”; thereupon twelve springs gushed forth from it; each group recognised its drinking-place; “Eat and drink from what Allah has provided, and do not roam about the earth making turmoil in it.”

result.output: And (remember) when Musa (Moses) asked for water for his people, We said: “Strike the rock with your stick,” and twelve springs gushed forth from it. Each tribe knew its drinking place. Eat and drink from Allah’s provision, and do not act corruptly on the earth, spreading corruption.

src: Und esst und trinkt, bis für euch der weiße Faden (der Dämmerung) vom schwarzen Faden (der Nacht) unterscheidbar wird, dann vollendet das Siyam bis zur Nacht! Und werdet nicht intim mit ihnen, während ihr I'tikaf in den Moscheen vollzieht.
ref: And eat and drink, until the white thread shows clearly to you from the black thread at the dawn; then complete the Fast unto the night, and do not lie with them while you cleave to the mosques.

result.output: And eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct to you from the black thread of the night. Then complete the Siyam (fast) till the nightfall. And do not have sexual relations with them (your wives) while you are in I'tikaf (i.e. confining oneself in a mosque for prayers and invocations leaving the worldly activities) in the mosques.

src: So verinnerlicht den Iman an ALLAH und an Seine Gesandten.
ref: So have faith in Allah and His apostles, and do not say, ‘[God is] a trinity.’

result.output: So internalize the faith in ALLAH and His messengers.

src: Also esset von dem, was sie für euch fangen, und sprecht Allahs Namen darüber aus.
ref: So eat from what they catch for you, and pronounce God’s name over it.

result.output: So eat from what they catch for you and mention the name of Allah over it.

src: Und keine lasttragende (Seele) nimmt die Last einer anderen auf sich.
ref: If you are grateful He will be pleased with you.

result.output: And no load-bearing (soul) takes on the burden of another.

src: Und sie eilen dann zum Weg um die Wette, aber wie könnten sie da sehen?
ref: Then they would have raced along to cross the Bridge but how could they have seen (their way)?

result.output: And then they hurry to the path to compete, but how could they see there?

src: Gewiß, ER ist Seinen Dienern gegenüber allkundig, allsehend.
ref: He is all-aware and all-seeing.

result.output: Surely, HE is omniscient and all-seeing towards his servants.

src: Sie geben einander zum Trug prunkende Rede ein und hätte es dein Herr gewollt, hätten sie es nicht getan; so überlaß sie sich selbst mit dem, was sie erdichten.
ref: But if your Lord had willed they would not have done so. Pay no attention to them and to what they fabricate.

result.output: They give each other deceptive, boastful speeches and if your Lord had wished, they would not have done so; therefore leave them to their own inventions.

src: Das Gebäude, das sie errichtet haben, wird nicht aufhören, Zweifel in ihren Herzen zu errregen, bis ihre Herzen in Stücke gerissen sind. Und Allah ist Allwissend, Allweise.
ref: The edifice they have built will always fill their minds with perturbation (which will not cease) till their hearts are rent to pieces, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.

result.output: The building they have built will not cease to incite doubt in their hearts until their hearts are torn apart. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

src: Und gehöre nicht zu den Unachtsamen!
ref: Be not thou among the heedless.

result.output: And do not belong to the careless!

src: Das ist Allahs Anordnung, die Er zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt hat.
ref: This is the commandment of God that is sent down to you.

result.output: This is Allah's ordinance, which He has revealed to you.

src: Dann ist es an jenem Tag ein schwerer Tag,
ref: It will be a day of distress,

result.output: Then on that day it is a difficult day.

src: So wartet ab! Ich gehöre mit euch zu den Abwartenden."
ref: So wait (for what is to come), I am waiting with you."

result.output: So wait! I belong with you to the ones who are waiting.

src: Um damit Korn und Pflanzen hervorzubringen
ref: That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,

result.output: To produce grain and plants with it

src: Gewiß, das Gebet hält davon ab, das Schändliche und das Verwerfliche (zu tun). Und das Gedenken Allahs ist wahrlich größer.
ref: Surely prayer keeps you away from the obscene and detestable, but the remembrance of God is greater far; and God knows what you do.

result.output: Certainly, prayer prevents (one) from committing indecency and evil. And the remembrance of Allah is the greatest.

src: O die ihr glaubt, nehmt nicht die Ungläubigen anstatt der Gläubigen zu Schutzherren!
ref: O believers, do not hold unbelievers as friends in preference to the faithful.

result.output: O you who believe, do not take the unbelievers as protectors instead of the believers!

src: Sind beide im Gleichnis etwa gleich?!
ref: Can they be equal?

result.output: Are both roughly equal in the analogy?!,

src: Er aber gab (dir) Macht über sie; und Allah ist Allwissend, Allweise.
ref: So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.

result.output: But He gave power over them to you; and Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

src: Es ist wie mit den Leuten des Pharao und denen, die vor ihnen lebten: Sie erklärten die Zeichen ihres Herrn für Lüge, so ließen Wir sie für ihre Sünden verderben, und Wir ließen die Leute des Pharao ertrinken.
ref: Their case is like that of the people of Pharaoh and those before them: they rejected the signs of their Lord as false and so We destroyed them for their sins, and caused the people of Pharaoh to drown.

result.output: It is like with the people of Pharaoh and those who lived before them: They rejected the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins and We caused the people of Pharaoh to drown.

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf. Und Er begann die Schöpfung des Menschen aus Ton.
ref: Who made all things He created excellent; and first fashioned man from clay,

result.output: He who did everything well that He created. And He began the creation of human from clay.

src: Keineswegs haben sie ALLAH verherrlicht, wie es Ihm gebührt, als sie sagten: "ALLAH hat keinem Menschen irgend etwas hinabgesandt." Sag: "Wer hat denn die Schrift hinabgesandt, mit der Musa als Licht und als Rechtleitung für die Menschen kam?
ref: And they (the Jews) did not realise (or appreciate) the importance of Allah as was required when they said, “Allah has not sent down anything upon any human being”; say, “Who has sent down the Book which Moosa brought, a light and guidance for mankind, which you have divided into different papers, some which you show and hide most of them?

result.output: They did not glorify ALLAH as He deserves when they said: 'ALLAH did not reveal anything to any human being.' Say: 'Who then revealed the Book which came as guidance and light to humanity through Musa?',

src: Dann bringe uns, was du uns androhst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: Then bring upon us what you predict for us, if you are a man of truth."

result.output: Then bring us what you threatened us with, if you be of the truthful.

src: Die Zahl der Monate bei Gott ist zwölf Monate, im Buch Gottes festgestellt am Tag, da Er die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat. Vier davon sind heilig. Das ist die richtige Religion. So tut euch selbst in ihnen kein Unrecht. Und kämpft gegen die Polytheisten allesamt, wie sie gegen euch allesamt kämpfen. Und wißt, Gott ist mit den Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: Indeed the number of months before Allah is twelve – in the Book of Allah – since the day He created the heavens and the earth, of which four are sacred; this the straight religion; so do not wrong yourselves in those months; and constantly fight against the polytheists as they constantly fight against you; and know well that Allah is with the pious.

result.output: The number of months with God is twelve months, established in the book of God on the day He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred. This is the right religion, so do not wrong yourselves during them. And fight against the polytheists all together, as they fight against you all together. And know that God is with the righteous.

src: Doch ihr seid keineswegs dessen Aufbewahrer.
ref: It is not ye who are the holders of the store thereof.

result.output: However, you are by no means its keepers.

src: Darin liegen Zeichen für die Leute, die Verstand haben.
ref: Verily there are signs in this for men of understanding.

result.output: Therein lie signs for people who have common sense.

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich All verzeihend und Allvergebend.
ref: But God is forbearing and forgiving.

result.output: And Allah is truly All-forgiving and All-merciful.

src: Und niemand kann Uns voraus sein.
ref: And we are not to be outrun.

result.output: And no one can be ahead of Us.

src: Und ALLAH hat euch erschaffen, dann läßt ER euch sterben. Und manch einer von euch wird in das faselnde Alter zurückgesetzt, damit er nichts mehr weiß, nachdem er über Wissen verfügte.
ref: It is God who creates you, then makes you die; and some reach the age of dotage when they forget what they had known before.

result.output: And ALLAH created you, then He lets you die. And someone among you will be reset to the babbling age, so that he no longer knows anything, after he had knowledge.

src: Und erfüllt die (eingegangene) Verpflichtung. Gewiß, nach der (Erfüllung der) Verpflichtung wird gefragt werden.
ref: And fulfil the covenant; surely the covenant shall be questioned of.

result.output: And fulfill the (incurred) obligation. Certainly, there will be a request for (the fulfillment of) the obligation.

src: Und nehmt Zeugen, wenn ihr miteinander Handel treibt. Und weder dem Schreiber noch dem Zeugen soll Schaden zugefügt werden.
ref: Have witnesses to the deal, (and make sure) that the scribe or the witness is not harmed.

result.output: And take witnesses when you deal with each other. And neither the scribe nor the witness should be harmed.

src: Dies sind wahrlich die Worte eines edlen Gesandten,
ref: That this is indeed the word of an honoured Messenger,

result.output: These are truly the words of a noble messenger.

src: Haben sie denn nicht auf das geschaut, was vom Himmel und von der Erde vor ihnen und was hinter ihnen ist?
ref: Do they not see what is before them and what is behind them of the heavens and the earth?

result.output: Do they not look at what is before them from the sky and the earth and what is behind them?

src: Als die Munafiq zu dir kamen, sagten sie: "Wir bezeugen, daß du doch ALLAHs Gesandter bist." Und ALLAH weiß, daß du doch Sein Gesandter bist. Und ALLAH bezeugt: "Gewiß, die Munafiq sind doch Lügner."
ref: When the hypocrites come in your presence (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) they say, “We testify that you surely are Allah’s Noble Messenger”; and Allah knows that you indeed are His Noble Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are indeed liars.

result.output: When the hypocrites come to you, they say, We testify that you are indeed the Messenger of Allah. And Allah knows that you are indeed His Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are indeed liars.

src: Bestimme für mich eine Aya!"
ref: Make a sign for me."

result.output: Determine an Aya for me!

src: Darin werden sie auf immer ewig weilen; und sie werden weder Freund noch Helfer finden.
ref: They will live in it for ever, and will find no saviour or helper.

result.output: Therein they will dwell forever and ever; and they will find neither friend nor helper.

src: Und die spenden, was sie spenden, während ihre Herzen sich (davor) ängstigen, daß sie zu ihrem Herrn zurückkehren werden,
ref: Who give whatsoever they give (in His way), and their hearts tremble with fear that they have to go back to their Lord,

result.output: And they give what they give while their hearts fear that they will return to their Lord.

src: Und sie haben Allah andere als Seinesgleichen zur Seite gestellt, um (die Menschen) von Seinem Weg abirren zu lassen.
ref: They have appointed equals of God to mislead people from His path. Tell them: "Enjoy yourselves (so long as you may).

result.output: And they have set up allies besides Allah to lead people astray from His way.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist al-Masih, der Sohn Maryams", wo doch al-Masih (selbst) gesagt hat: "O Kinder Isra'ils, dient Allah, meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn!"
ref: They are surely infidels who say: "God is the Christ, son of Mary." But the Christ had only said: "O children of Israel, worship God who is my Lord and your Lord."

result.output: Forsooth, unbelieving are those who say: Verily, Allah is Al-Masih (Jesus), the son of Maryam (Mary). But Al-Masih (Jesus) said: O Children of Israel! Worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord.

src: Und wenn WIR wollten, hätten WIR sie mit ihresgleichen eingetauscht.
ref: And whenever We list, We can replace them with others like Unto them.

result.output: And if WE wanted, WE could have exchanged them with their own kind.

src: Wir begreifen nicht viel von dem, was du sagst - außerdem gewiß sehen wir, daß du doch unter uns ein Schwacher bist.
ref: We do not understand much of what you say, and we see you a weak (man, it is said that he was a blind man) among us.

result.output: We do not understand much of what you say - moreover, surely we see that you are a weak one among us.

src: Könnt niemanden gegen Ihn verführen,
ref: Can mislead anyone away from Him,

result.output: Can't seduce anyone against him.,

src: Bestimmt ist für sie bei ihrem Herrn die Wohnstätte des Friedens. Er ist ihr Freund wegen dessen, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: For them is the abode of peace with their Lord and He is their Master – the result of their deeds.

result.output: Surely for them, with their Lord, is the home of peace. He will be their friend because of what they used to do.

src: Und wer dem Gesandten widerspricht - nachdem ihm die Rechtleitung deutlich wurde, und einem anderen als dem Weg der Mumin folgt, den werden WIR das verantworten lassen, wofür er verantwortlich war, und dann werden WIR ihn in Dschahannam hineinwerfen lassen. Und erbärmlich ist dieses Werden.
ref: And he who opposes the Prophet even after the way has become clear to him, and follows a path other than the way of believers, We shall lead him to what he has chosen for himself, and shall take him to Hell: How evil a journey's end.

result.output: And whoever opposes the Messenger after the right path has been made clear to him and follows other than the way of the believers - We will give him what he has taken and drive him into Hell, and evil it is as a destination.

src: Als dein Herr Mose rief: «Geh zum Volk, das Unrecht tut,
ref: When your Lord called upon Moses: "Go to the wicked people,

result.output: As your Lord Moses called: Go to the people who do wrong,

src: Dennoch gibt es unter euch welche, die nur auf sie hören. Und Gott weiß über die Bescheid, die Unrecht tun.
ref: They have some spies among you, and Allah knows best the wrongdoers.

result.output: Nevertheless, among you are those who only listen to them. And God knows about those who do wrong.

src: Und damit Staub aufwirbeln,
ref: Raising clouds of dust,

result.output: And to raise dust

src: Und nehmt zwei gerechte Leute von euch zu Zeugen, und erhaltet das Zeugnis Gottes aufrecht.
ref: And call in to witness two men of equity from among yourselves; and perform the witnessing to God Himself.

result.output: And take two just persons from among yourselves as witnesses to what you are about to do and let them bear witness to the effect that there is no god but Allah, and that you are devoted to Him alone. And keep your testimony the closest to the truth even if it be against your own selves or your parents or your near relatives; whether the case be of a rich man or a poor man, for Allah can best protect both. Follow not the fancies of your own hearts lest you swerve from the truth. If you distort the evidence or refuse to bear witness, you should know that Allah is fully aware of all that you do.
